tika-vin09t0:7_10: paccayādīnaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ sakkacca karaṇaṃ sakkāro, tesaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:8_8: “Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghañca pubbācariyasīhānañcā”ti avatvā kasmā visuṃ vuttanti ce?
tika-vin09t0:8_10: Vatthuttayassa hi paṇāmakaraṇassa antarāyanivāraṇaṃ payojanaṃ attano nissayabhūtānaṃ ācariyānaṃ paṇāmakaraṇassa upakāraññutādassanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:8_11: Tena buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca vanditvā, ca-
tika-vin09t0:8_13: Atha vā “vanditvā”ti cetovandanaṃ dassetvā tato “namo katvā”ti vācāvandanā,
tika-vin09t0:9_3: Yathā ca sattānaṃ khajjabhojjaleyyapeyyavasena catubbidhopi āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgamaṅgāni pharati,
tika-vin09t0:9_4: evaṃ yoginopi cātubhūmakaṃ kusalaṃ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ sampādeti.
tika-vin09t0:9_7: tena mokkhappavesāya nibbānasacchikiriyāya mukhaṃ upāyoti attho.
tika-vin09t0:10_5: kiṃ dussīlena vā duṭṭhena vā alajjinā vā yācitena vaṇṇanā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ce?
tika-vin09t0:11_0: Nāmenāti attano guṇanāmena. Saddalakkhaṇasubhato, vinicchayasubhato, viññeyyasubhato ca subhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:14_2: evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:14_3: Ettheva yāvatatiyānusāvanakathāvasāne atha kho uddesakāle “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:14_6: Tattha pubbe vuttaṃ pacchā āgatasuttena virujjhati.
tika-vin09t0:14_10: “Āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:14_11: Tatthāyasmante pucchāmī”tiādinā suuddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti etaṃ uddesalakkhaṇaṃ idhāpi khandhakepi vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:14_12: Tasmā “phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “tatthāyasmante pucchāmī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne avuttampi ānetvā gahetabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:14_15: Apica “nidānuddeso”ti padaṃ uddharitvā nidānuddesaṃ dassetukāmopi “suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:14_17: āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti pāṭhavasena āgataṃ nidānaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā upari aṭṭhakathāvasena yojetabbaṃ pāḷiṃ idha yojetvā “tatthāyasmante pucchāmi…pe…
tika-vin09t0:14_18: dhārayāmī”ti nidānapāḷiṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā puna “tattha nidānuddeso”ti uddhaṭapadavasena saṅkhepato nidānuddesalakkhaṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:14_19: dassetuṃ “evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:14_20: tasmā evaṃ upari ca khandhake ca,
tika-vin09t0:14_21: atha kho uddesakāle “āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti vatvā “uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:15_0: Savanāṇattivacananti ettha saṅghanavakatarena vattuṃ ayuttanti ce?
tika-vin09t0:15_2: “Pātimokkhuddesakena evaṃ vattabba”nti bhagavatā vuttattā bhagavatova āṇatti,
tika-vin09t0:15_5: Theropi pana uddisituṃ labhatīti dassanatthaṃ “therādhikaṃ pātimokkha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:15_6: Iminā suttena navakataro na labhatīti ce?
tika-vin09t0:16_0: Yathā catuvaggena ṭhapetvā upasampadāpavāraṇāabbhānāni sabbaṃ saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:16_1: evaṃ “atirekavīsativaggena imaṃ nāma kammaṃ kātabba”nti avatvā atirekavacanattā aññaṃ atthaṃ sūceti,
tika-vin09t0:16_5: vīsativaggena na kiñci saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin09t0:16_6: Ettha “dasavaggena abbhānakammamattaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti vadantena catupañcavaggena karaṇīyānipi dasavaggena kātuṃ anuññātāni.
tika-vin09t0:16_15: Sabbappakārena pana atirekavīsatianatirekavīsativagge vuttepi dīpitaṃ hotīti vajirabuddhittherena likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:17_4: “Pacchimakattikapuṇṇamā evā”ti avadhāraṇaṃ tato paraṃ pavāraṇādivasassa natthitāya kataṃ.
tika-vin09t0:17_5: Uddhaṃ pakatiuposathe vuttena pakaticārittena saddhiṃ idampi.
tika-vin09t0:18_0: “Nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā”ti na vattabbaṃ “tividhasampattiyuttā”ti vuttattāti ce?
tika-vin09t0:18_7: Apica “tividhasampattiyuttā”ti sampayogaṅgesu dassetvā puna tameva pahānaṅgesu dassetuṃ “nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:18_8: Nadisamuddajātassaresu sammatasīmāto kammāni na vipajjanti udakukkhepasīmattāti “vipattisīmāyo nāmā”ti kasmā vuttāti ce?
tika-vin09t0:18_9: Sesalakkhaṇāni sampādetvā nadiyaṃ sīmāya baddhāya udakapariyantaṃ katvā sīmāgatattā puna taṃ nadiṃ anto
tika-vin09t0:18_10: katvā taḷāke kate sace tassā sīmāya kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭeyya,
tika-vin09t0:18_12: Yasmā pana evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:19_0: Vīsativaggakaraṇīyattā saṅghakammassa kammārahena saddhiṃ ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkontī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:19_3: Tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvāti majjhe ṭhatvā diyaḍḍhaṃ katvā tiyojanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:20_0: Rāsikataṃ paṃsupi rukkhesu jātesu suddhapaṃsupabbato hoti.
tika-vin09t0:20_3: Bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito”ti iminā kuṭasarāvādīsu ropitaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:20_4: tato apanetvā pana taṅkhaṇampi bhūmiyaṃ ropito vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:20_6: Khandhaṃ chinditvā ropite pana etaṃ yujjati.
tika-vin09t0:20_11: tasmā khuddakopi mahantopi vaṭṭati evāti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:21_0: Jātassare paripuṇṇameva udakaṃ nimittūpagaṃ disvā aparipuṇṇaṃ antarā ṭhitibhūtaṃ “jātassare sammatā”ti vuttaṃ vipattiṃ na āpajjatīti “nadiyā sammatā,
tika-vin09t0:21_2: jātassare sammatā”ti etthāpi loṇī na gahitā.
tika-vin09t0:21_3: Baddhasīmaṃ vā nadisamuddajātassare vā anokkamitvāti etthāpi “nadiyā vā,
tika-vin09t0:21_5: samudde vā jātassare vā”ti etthāpi na gahitā.
tika-vin09t0:21_8: “Yopi nadiṃ vā samuddaṃ vā bhinditvā nikkhantaudakena kato sobbho etaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin09t0:21_9: ayampi jātassaroyevā”ti vuttattā jātassaraggahaṇena gahitāti tattha tattha avuttā.
tika-vin09t0:21_10: “Yāvatikā tasmiṃ gāmakhette”ti vuttattā aññampi gāmaṃ anto katvā samānasaṃvāsakasīmāsammannanakāle tasmiṃ gāme bhikkhū āgacchantu vā mā vā, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:22_0: Agamanapathesūti ettha ekadivasena gantvā paccāgantuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṭṭhāneti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:23_2: tato gahetabbo “yasmiṃ padese pakativīciyo ottharitvā saṇṭhahanti,
tika-vin09t0:23_4: tattha ṭhatvā uposathādikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:23_7: Yo pana kenaci antamaso tiracchānenapi khaṇitvā akatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:24_0: “Aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopi kammaṃ kopetī”ti vuttattā atikkamitvā ṭhito na kopetīti dīpitameva hotīti upatissatthero,
tika-vin09t0:24_1: taṃ pana “dvinnaṃ udakukkhepānaṃ antare añño eko udakukkhepo upacāratthāya ṭhapetabbo”ti vacanena virujjhati.
tika-vin09t0:24_4: Antoudakukkhepasīmāya upacāratthāya ṭhapitaṃ udakukkhepaparicchedaṃ anatikkamitvāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:25_0: “Sabhāgavatthunā lahukāpatti”nti vuttattā sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ce?
tika-vin09t0:25_1: Na vaṭṭati desanāgāminiṃ sandhāya idha vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:25_2: Tasmā eva samuccayakkhandhake “sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvikātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:25_9: evaṃ tīhi dvīhipi aññaṃ suddhaṃ passitvā “paṭikarissāmā”ti vatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:25_10: Ekenāpi “parisuddhaṃ labhitvā paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin09t0:25_11: Aṭṭhakathāyampi “sāmanto bhikkhu evamassa vacanīyoti ettha sabhāgo eva vattabbo.
tika-vin09t0:25_13: tasmā tassa avatvā ito vuṭṭhahitvā paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā uposatho kātabboti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:25_14: vutta”nti vatvā tassa appaṭikkhittattā vaṭṭatīti dīpitameva.
tika-vin09t0:25_16: tadā tassa santike”ti vuttattā lahukasseva anuññātattā samuccayakkhandhake vuttattā sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ
tika-vin09t0:25_17: pana ñattiyā ārocetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:26_0: Devabrahmā pana “tiracchānagato”ti padaṃ ṭhapetvā yena kenaci padena asaṅgahitāpi iminā saṅgahitāti dassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:27_0: “Cātumāsiniyaṃ pana pavāritānaṃ santike anupagatena vā chinnavassena vā vuṭṭhavassena vā”ti avatvā “anupagatena
tika-vin09t0:27_2: Vuṭṭhavasso pana tasmiṃ kāle anupagatattā “anupagato”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatoti.
tika-vin09t0:27_3: Sabbāya vuṭṭhitāya sabbe vuṭṭhahitvā gate sannipātetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin09t0:27_4: ekacce sannipātetvā pārisuddhiṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatīti vadanti. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:27_5: Ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā kattabbasaṅghakammābhāvā vaggaṃ na hotīti.
tika-vin09t0:27_8: sace purimikāya upagatehi pacchimikāya upagatā thokatarā ceva honti samasamā ca,
tika-vin09t0:27_12: aññesaṃ anāgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā”ti vuttattā adhiṭṭhānuposathaṃ sīmaṃ pavisitvā kātuṃ na sakkāti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:28_0: “Kiṃ saṅghassa pubbakicca”nti idaṃ na ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:28_6: Na hi taṃ ñattiyā anto karīyatīti.
tika-vin09t0:28_7: Evaṃ sante netaṃ vattabbanti āpajjati payojanābhāvāti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:28_10: Idaṃ pubbakiccaṃ akatvā uposathakammaṃ karonto saṅgho,
tika-vin09t0:28_12: Tasmiñhi khette atikkante sammajjanādikaraṇe āpattimokkho na hoti uposathakammato pubbe kattabbakammākaraṇapaccayattā tassā āpattiyā.
tika-vin09t0:28_14: tasmā pātimokkhuddesako bhikkhu “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”ti vattukāmo paṭhamameva pārisuddhāpārisuddhipaccayaṃ pubbakiccaṃ sarāpeti.
tika-vin09t0:28_19: Tattha akatapakkhe tāva pārisuddhiārocanakkamanidassanatthaṃ parato “yassa siyā āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:28_21: katapakkhe “asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabba”nti ca vakkhati.
tika-vin09t0:29_5: Uposathakaraṇatthaṃ sannipatite saṅghe bahi uposathaṃ katvā āgatassa kattabbākāradassanatthañca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:29_6: Padhānagharavāsino padhānagharaṃ pavisitukāmā attano sabhāgabhikkhūnaṃ chandaṃ datvā sace saṅgho sannipatati,
tika-vin09t0:29_10: Pañcasu bhikkhūsu ekasmiṃ vihāre vasantesu ekassa chandapārisuddhiṃ āharitvā catunnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ
tika-vin09t0:29_11: anuññātattā sannipatite chando gahetabbo ārocetabboti vacanaṃ niratthakaṃ viya.
tika-vin09t0:29_14: “sace pubbe chandaṃ datvā bahisīmāgato puna pavisati,
tika-vin09t0:29_16: tassa payogo sīmāsammutivasena veditabbo”ti ca “chandadāne tikkhattuṃ vacane idaṃ payojanaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:29_19: tatiyaṃ chandahārakassa dukkaṭamocanaṃ dīpetī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:29_22: tathā sāpi na katthaci gacchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:29_23: Itarathā visesanaṃ niratthakaṃ hotīti ācariyena gahitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:30_0: “Na hi taṃ akatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pubbe dassitattā “idampi hi ubhaya”nti kasmā vuttanti ce?
tika-vin09t0:30_2: ime pana dve therena vā pātimokkhuddesakena vā ñattiṭṭhapanakena vā yena vā tena vā kātabbānīti ca,
tika-vin09t0:30_3: sammajjanādīni tattha tattha tādisāni payojanāni nipphādenti,
tika-vin09t0:30_4: ime pana dve tattha tattha na kiñci kammaṃ sādhenti,
tika-vin09t0:30_5: tasmā “kiṃ iminā”ti avatvā kātabbamevāti dassetuñca “idampi hi ubhaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:30_6: “Āyasmantānaṃ pāde vandatī”ti gaṇavasena vatvā puggalavasena na vuttaṃ tena ārocetabbassa aññassa abhāvā.
tika-vin09t0:31_0: Saṅghassa uddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti saṅghena uddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:31_1: Samaggassa hi saṅghassāti ettha samaggabhāvassa kāyasāmaggikāraṇattā natthi dosoti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-vin09t0:31_4: bhante”ti hi iminā cittasāmaggiṃ dīpeti savane sabbehi ekībhūtabhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:32_0: Sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjatīti ettha anādariyavasena āpajjanto eva alajjī hoti,
tika-vin09t0:32_2: Āpattiṃ parigūhatīti ettha lajjāya parigūhanto alajjī na hoti,
tika-vin09t0:32_3: ‘kiṃ iminā’ti anādariyavasena parigūhanto hotī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:33_3: Pārājikāpattiṃ āpanno hi sace attano sāpattikabhāvaṃ pakāseti,
tika-vin09t0:33_5: tassa ca gihibhāvena vā sāmaṇerabhāvena vā suddhi hotīti.
tika-vin09t0:34_0: Ekacce ācariyā nāma dhammabhāriko kira ācariyo.
tika-vin09t0:34_3: Tathā pāṭhe anāgatattā kevalaṃ “yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvita”nti padameva disvā “yassa siyā āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:34_6: “Asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabba”nti idampi tamevatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin09t0:34_7: “Tuṇhībhāvena kho panāyasmante parisuddhāti vedissāmī”ti idampi tamevāti evamatthaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ kira.
tika-vin09t0:35_1: Etaṃ sandhāyāti ettha “sakimpi anusāvita”nti padassa vacanena tikkhattuṃ anusāvanā kātabbāti ettakameva dīpitaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin09t0:36_0: Imamatthaṃ sandhāya vuttanti kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin09t0:37_8: etena na kevalaṃ saṅghamajjhe evāyaṃ musāvādo sambhavati,
tika-vin09t0:37_9: atha kho ettha vuttalakkhaṇena asatipi “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”tiādividhāne gaṇuposathepi sāpattiko
tika-vin09t0:37_10: hutvā uposathaṃ kattukāmo anārocetvā tuṇhībhūtova ce karoti,
tika-vin09t0:37_11: ayaṃ sampajānamusāvādāpattiṃ āpajjatīti imassatthassa āvikaraṇato lakkhaṇavacanaṃ kiretanti vuttanti takkikā.
tika-vin09t0:37_12: Aññathā “gaṇamajjhe vā”ti na vattabbanti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:37_14: Ārocento hi “saṅghassa ārocemī”ti adhippāyena āvikaronto saṅghamajjhe āvikaroti nāma,
tika-vin09t0:37_15: ubhatopasse nisinnānaṃ ārocento gaṇamajjhe āvikaroti nāma,
tika-vin09t0:37_16: “ekasseva ārocessāmī”ti adhippāyena āvikaronto ekapuggale āvikaroti nāma.
tika-vin09t0:37_18: paṭikarissāmīti evaṃ kate yāva vematiko hoti,
tika-vin09t0:37_21: Puna nibbematiko hutvā desetabbaṃ vā na vāti neva pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:37_24: Tathā ito vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissāmīti ettha ca sakalasaṅghe sabhāgāpattiṃ āpanne,
tika-vin09t0:41_0: Idha pana ṭhatvā sikkhāpadānaṃ kamabhedo pakāsetabbo. Kathaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:41_5: Tattha bhagavatā rājagahe bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujānantena pātimokkhuddesassa yo desanākkamo anuññāto,
tika-vin09t0:41_6: taṃ desanākkamaṃ anukkamantova mahākassapo paṭhamaṃ pārājikuddesaṃ pucchi,
tika-vin09t0:41_11: Tato paraṃ tayo āpattikkhandhe saṅgahetuṃ vinā gaṇanaparicchedena sekhiyadhamme pucchi.
tika-vin09t0:41_12: Āpattikkhandhe sabhāgato paṭṭhāya pucchanto vīsatikhandhake pucchi.
tika-vin09t0:41_13: Nidānuddesantogadhānaṃ vā sarūpena anuddiṭṭhānaṃ pucchanatthaṃ khandhake pucchi.
tika-vin09t0:41_14: Etena khandhake paññattā thullaccayāpi saṅgahitā honti.
tika-vin09t0:41_17: Ubhatovibhaṅgakhandhakato pana uccinitvā tadā parivāro visuṃ pāḷi kato,
tika-vin09t0:41_18: imameva vacanaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “eteneva upāyena khandhakaṃ parivārepi āropayiṃsū”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:41_20: Puṭṭho puṭṭho āyasmā upāli vissajjesī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:41_22: Vissajjanto pana āyasmā upāli niravasesaṃ dassento khandhakaparivāre anto katvā desesi.
tika-vin09t0:41_23: Gaṇasajjhāyakāle pana tadā khandhakaparivārā visuṃ pāḷi katāti ayamettha desanākkamo.
tika-vin09t0:42_0: Yadi evaṃ nidānuddeso paṭhamadesanāti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:42_4: Akusalābyākatānaṃ āpattīnaṃ diṭṭhadhammasamparāyikāsavaṭṭhāniyattā yathābhūtaṃ sīlasaṃvarakena parivajjanena
tika-vin09t0:42_5: pahātabbattā pahānakkamopettha sambhavati “tāvadeva cattāri akaraṇīyāni ācikkhitabbānī”ti vacanato.
tika-vin09t0:42_6: Tathā “samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū”ti vacanato yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhanasikkhanena paṭipattikkamopi sambhavati.
tika-vin09t0:42_8: evamimehi tīhi kamehi desetabbānametesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ uppattikkamo sambhavati.
tika-vin09t0:42_10: taṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uppanne eva vatthusmiṃ “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhamma”ntiādinā nayena bhikkhunīnampi paññattaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:42_11: Yato bhikkhunīnaṃ taṃ anuppannapaññatti na siyā,
tika-vin09t0:42_12: tato anuppannapaññatti tasmiṃ natthīti parivāravacanaṃ na virujjhati.
tika-vin09t0:42_13: Ettāvatā purimena kamattayena yaṃ paṭhamaṃ desetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:42_14: taṃ pārājikuddese paṭhamuppannattā methunadhammapārājikaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ desetukāmo āyasmā upālitthero
tika-vin09t0:42_15: “tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharatī”ti vesāliyameva pāpetvā ṭhapesi.
tika-vin09t0:43_0: Idāni sabbesaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ paññāpanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t0:43_3: imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti evaṃ sauddesaanuddesabhedato duvidhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:43_4: Tattha pātimokkhe sarūpato āgatā pañca āpattikkhandhā sauddesapaññatti nāma.
tika-vin09t0:43_6: Tattha yassā paññattiyā anto āpattiyā saha,
tika-vin09t0:44_1: Tattha adassitāpattikā nāma aṭṭha pārājikā dhammā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:44_2: “Pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti hi puggalova tattha dassito, nāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:44_3: Dassitāpattikā nāma bhikkhunipātimokkhe āgatā sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā.
tika-vin09t0:44_4: “Ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesa”nti hi tattha āpatti dassitā saddhiṃ puggalena.
tika-vin09t0:46_7: paccattaṃ tāva dvīsu aniyatesu upayogena missaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:46_15: Sesesu paṭhamāniyataṃ ṭhapetvā ādimhi “yo pana bhikkhū”ti evamāgataṃ paccattaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t0:46_16: dutiyāniyataṃ ṭhapetvā paṇītabhojanasamaṇuddesatatiyacatutthapāṭidesanīyasikkhāpadesu majjhe “yo pana bhikkhū”ti evamāgataṃ paccattaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t0:46_17: dubbacakuladūsakasaṃsaṭṭhasikkhāpadesu ādimhi kevalaṃ “bhikkhū”ti āgataṃ paccattaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t0:46_18: bhedānuvattakasikkhāpade majjhe āgataṃ paccattaṃ vā aññāya vibhattiyā amissameva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:47_3: rājasikkhāpade karaṇasāmipaccattehīti upayogo tidhā misso hoti.
tika-vin09t0:47_6: aṭṭhasu sāminā missanti karaṇaṃ dvidhā missaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:47_9: Atirekapattabhesajjasikkhāpadesu aggahitaggahaṇena sāmivibhatti amissāva hotīti veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:48_0: Pañcadhā ca tidhā ceva, dvidhā cepi tathekadhā;
tika-vin09t0:50_0: Evaṃ tāva yathāvuttesu sauddesapaññattisaṅkhātesu sikkhāpadesu aggahitaggahaṇena paññāsuttaresu tisatesu
tika-vin09t0:50_5: Avasesesu tiṃsatiyā sikkhāpadesu missopayogakaraṇāni pañca honti,
tika-vin09t0:51_8: Visesakāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade sampatte āvibhavissati.
tika-vin09t0:51_9: Evaṃ tāva sauddesapaññattiṃ ñatvā sesavinayapiṭake yā kāci paññatti anuddesapaññattīti veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:52_1: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evamādikā padabhājane sandissamānāpatti padabhājanasikkhāpadaṃ nāma. “Na ca,
tika-vin09t0:52_8: divāpaṭisallīyantena dvāraṃ saṃvaritvā paṭisallīyitu”nti evamādi vinītavatthusikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:52_11: anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo”ti evamādi paṭikkhepasikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:53_0: Yasmā pana tena tena paṭikkhepena “yo pana bhikkhu samaggaṃ saṅghaṃ adhammasaññī bhindeyya,
tika-vin09t0:53_2: Yo pana bhikkhu duṭṭhacitto bhagavato jīvamānakasarīre lohitaṃ uppādeyya,
tika-vin09t0:53_3: pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso”ti sikkhāpadāni paññattāni honti.
tika-vin09t0:53_13: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti idameva sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti sādhakaṃ hoti. “Paṇḍako,
tika-vin09t0:53_16: upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti evamādīsu pana upajjhāyādīnaṃ dukkaṭameva paññattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:53_20: Tathā “na acchinne theve pakkamitabba”nti evamādikañca paṭikkhepasikkhāpadameva nāma.
tika-vin09t0:54_4: Idaṃ tesaṃ vibhattikammakkhaṇe apaññattattā avijjamānampi bhagavato vacanena visuddhakkhaṇepi vijjamānaṃ jātanti eke.
tika-vin09t0:54_5: “Bhedānuvattake desāpehī”ti vacanato sesabhedānuvattakānaṃ “yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṅghabhedakānaṃ anuvatteyya,
tika-vin09t0:54_6: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:54_9: Yathāha “paññatte taṃ upāli mayā āgantukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āgantukavattaṃ…pe…
tika-vin09t0:54_10: evaṃ supaññatte kho mayā upāli sikkhāpade”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:54_11: “Yā pana bhikkhunī naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya,
tika-vin09t0:54_12: pācittiya”nti iminā suttena bhikkhunī nacceyya vā gāyeyya vā vādeyya vā,
tika-vin09t0:54_13: pācittiyanti evamādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci aṭṭhakathāya dissamānaṃ āpattijātaṃ vinayakammaṃ vā avuttasiddhisikkhāpadaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:54_14: Chabbidhampetaṃ chahi ākārehi uddesārahaṃ na hotīti anuddesasikkhāpadaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:54_16: pañcahi uddesehi yathāsambhavaṃ visabhāgattā thullaccayadubbhāsitānaṃ sabhāgavatthukampi dukkaṭathullaccayadvayaṃ
tika-vin09t0:57_0: Pubbe vattabbavidhānā-bhāvato ca ādito yopanena sahā”ti. –
tika-vin09t0:58_2: ye te aniddiṭṭhakārakā pubbe vuttappabhedā sukkavisaṭṭhiādayo sikkhāpadavisesā,
tika-vin09t0:58_3: tesu adhippāyakammavatthupuggalapayoge apekkhāya bhāvato kārako na niddiṭṭho tesaṃ sāpekkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:58_4: Taṃ sabbaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade āvibhavissati,
tika-vin09t0:58_5: idha pana pārājikapaññattiyaṃ apekkhāya abhāvato kārako niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin09t0:58_6: Yo pana kārako “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmi”ntiādīsu viya pubbe vattabbavidhānābhāvato karaṇādivasena
tika-vin09t0:58_8: Tattha niddisiyamāno sesadutiyāniyatapaṇītabhojanaṃ samaṇuddesatatiyacatautthapāṭidesanīyesu viya majjhe aniddisitvā “na heva kho pana…pe…
tika-vin09t0:58_9: obhāsitu”ntiādi viya pubbe vattabbavidhānābhāvato eva ādimhi niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin09t0:58_10: Ādimhi niddisiyamānopi pubbe vuttappabhedesu bhedānuvattakādīsu pañcattiṃsesu sikkhāpadesu viya aniddisitvā
tika-vin09t0:58_11: pubbe vattabbavidhānābhāvato eva “yo pana bhikkhū”tiāditova yopana-
tika-vin09t0:58_13: Evaṃ niddisiyamānopi so yasmā “yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭeyyu”ntiādi āpatti viya parappabhavaṃ āpattiṃ na āpajjati,
tika-vin09t0:58_15: Methunadhammāpattipi parappabhavā “dvayaṃdvayasamāpattī”ti vacanatoti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-vin09t0:58_21: Ayamattho catasso methunadhammapaccayāti aṭṭhavatthukaṃ sandhāya “chejjaṃ siyā methunadhammapaccayā”ti ca parivāre vuttavacanena sādhetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:59_2: Nayadassanatthaṃ āditova “bhikkhū hontī”ti bahuvacananiddesaṃ katvā puna “eko vā dve vā tayo vā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:59_3: aññathā na tato uddhaṃ “anuvattakā hontī”ti āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:59_6: Yaṃ pana sattasatikakkhandhake “saṅgho cattāro pācīnake bhikkhū,
tika-vin09t0:59_9: taṃ “ubbāhikāya imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametu”nti vuttattā tehi kattabbavidhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:59_11: Na hi te tena kammena kammārahā kammakatā honti.
tika-vin09t0:59_14: Na ca tadā saṅgho tesaṃ aṭṭhannampi bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ akāsi.
tika-vin09t0:59_16: Adhikaraṇavūpasamakammassa pattā yuttā saṅghena katāti katvā kammapattā eva hi te honti.
tika-vin09t0:59_17: “Te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāyā”ti vacanato tehi kattabbavidhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:59_18: Sammutikaraṇameva kammaṃ hotīti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-vin09t0:59_20: tassa paṭinissaggāya eva te bhikkhū kammārahā kātabbā,
tika-vin09t0:59_22: Na hi pācīnakādīnaṃ sammutiyā adhikaraṇavūpasamasiddhi viya tesaṃ samanubhāsanakammena tassa paṭinissaggasiddhi hoti,
tika-vin09t0:59_23: sammuti nāmesā paṭhamaṃ anumatiṃ gahetvā yācitvāva karīyati,
tika-vin09t0:60_0: “Methunadhamma”nti evaṃ bāhullanayena laddhanāmakaṃ sakapayogena vā parapayogena vā attano nimittassa
tika-vin09t0:60_1: sakamagge vā paramagge vā paranimittassa vā sakamagge eva pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭṭhitauddharaṇesu yaṃ kiñci
tika-vin09t0:60_4: Keci pana “pavesanādīni cattāri vā tīṇi vā dve vā ekaṃ vā paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin09t0:60_11: Tesaṃ matena catūsupi catasso pārājikāpattiyo āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:60_15: saṅghādisesāpattiñca āpajjitvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya gahaṭṭhakāle methunādikaṃ pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā puna
tika-vin09t0:60_16: pabbajitvā upasampajjitvā ekaṃ saṅghādisesāpattiṃ ekamanekaṃ vā paṭikaritvāva so puggalo yasmā nirāpattiko hoti,
tika-vin09t0:60_19: Vuṭṭhānadesanāhi pana asujjhanato “payoge payoge āpatti pārājikassā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:60_21: atha kho padabhājane “āpatti pārājikassā”ti vacanenāyamattho siddhoti yuttiñca vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:61_0: Yadi evaṃ mātikāyampi “yo pana bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin09t0:61_4: bhikkhugaṇanañca anavasesetvā tiṭṭhatīti anavasesavacananti katvā paveseva āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:61_6: Tamevekaṃ sandhāya “yassa siyā āpattī”ti pārājikāpattimpi anto katvā nidānuddesavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:61_7: Tasmā mātikāyaṃ “pārājika”nti avatvā “pārājiko hotī”ti puggalaniddesavacanaṃ tena sarīrabandhanena upasampadāya abhabbabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:61_8: “Āpatti pārājikassā”ti padabhājane vacanaṃ antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassāpi pārājikassa asaṃvāsassa sato puggalassa atheyyasaṃvāsakabhāvadīpanatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:61_9: Na hi so saṃvāsaṃ sādiyantopi theyyasaṃvāsako hoti,
tika-vin09t0:61_11: Tenevāha “asuddho hoti puggalo aññataraṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:61_12: tañce suddhadiṭṭhi samāno anokāsaṃ kārāpetvā akkosādhippāyo vadati,
tika-vin09t0:61_13: āpatti omasavādena dukkaṭassā”ti anupasampannassa tadabhāvato siddho so upasampanno “bhikkhū”tveva vuccatīti,
tika-vin09t0:64_3: vajjiputtakavatthu cāti tippabhedavatthu imassa sikkhāpadassa nidānaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:64_11: no ubhatobyañjanake cā”ti makkaṭipārājiko viya aññopi lesaṃ oḍḍetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin09t0:64_12: tasmā tādisassa alesokāsassa dassanatthaṃ idaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin09t0:64_15: Tasmā vibhaṅgo tanniyāmako tassā mātikāya adhippetatthaniyāmako vibhaṅgoti.
tika-vin09t0:64_21: tiracchānagatapurisassa dve magge”tiādinā nayena sabbalesokāsaṃ pidahitvā niyamo kato. Etthāha –
tika-vin09t0:64_22: yadi evaṃ sādhāraṇasikkhāpadavasena vā liṅgaparivattanavasena vā na kevalaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:64_24: Tadavacanena hi bhikkhunī purisaliṅgapātubhāvena bhikkhubhāve ṭhitā evaṃ vadeyya “nāhaṃ upasampadākaraṇakāle bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpannā,
tika-vin09t0:64_25: tasmā na apaccakkhātasikkhāpi methunadhammena pārājikā homī”ti. Vuccate –
tika-vin09t0:64_28: Tathā vutte bhikkhunīnampi sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ atthīti āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:64_33: taṃyeva upajjhaṃ tameva upasampadaṃ tāni vassāni bhikkhūhi saṅgamitu”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:64_34: Tato āpattiyā bhedoti tato vibhaṅgato “akkhayite sarīre pārājikaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:64_35: yebhuyyena khayite thullaccaya”ntiādi āpattiyā bhedo hoti.
tika-vin09t0:64_36: Anāpatti tadaññathāti tato eva vibhaṅgato yena ākārena āpatti vuttā,
tika-vin09t0:64_41: anāpattī”ti hi vibhaṅge asati na paññāyati.
tika-vin09t0:64_42: Ettāvatā “nidānā mātikābhedo”ti ayaṃ gāthā samāsato vuttatthā hoti.
tika-vin09t0:64_43: Visesakāraṇaṃ pana tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade āvibhavissati.
tika-vin09t0:65_1: āyasmato sudinnassa aṭṭhavassikakāle paññattattā ca rattaññumahattaṃ pattakāle paññattā,
tika-vin09t0:65_3: So hi āyasmā makkaṭipārājiko yathā mātugāmappaṭisaṃyuttesu sikkhāpadesu tiracchānagatitthī na adhippetā,
tika-vin09t0:65_7: Tatiyapaññatti lābhaggamahattaṃ pattakāle uppannā “yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā”tiādi vacanato,
tika-vin09t0:65_8: vepullamahattampi ettheva labbhatīti imaṃ paṭhamapārājikasikkhāpadaṃ tividhampi vatthuṃ upādāya catubbidhampi taṃ kālaṃ patvā paññattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:66_4: yā bhagavatā yāya kāyaci upasampadāya upasampannabhikkhūnaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedena sikkhitabbā sikkhā vihitā,
tika-vin09t0:66_5: “ettha saha jīvantī”ti yo ca sājīvo vutto,
tika-vin09t0:66_8: Yāya kāyaci upasampadāya upasampannasamanantarameva tadubhayaṃ jānantopi ajānantopi tadajjhupagatattā samāpannova nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t0:66_9: Saha jīvantīti yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti,
tika-vin09t0:66_11: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sikkhaṃ paripūrento sikkhāsamāpanno sājīvaṃ avītikkamanto sājīvasamāpanno”ti,
tika-vin09t0:66_14: kāmavitakkādibahulo vā ekaccaṃ sāvasesaṃ sājīvaṃ vītikkamanto vā sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno nāma na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:67_1: “atthi bhikkhu sikkhāsamāpanno sīlāni paccavekkhanto na sājīvasamāpanno acittakaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamanto,
tika-vin09t0:67_2: atthi na sikkhāsamāpanno kāmavitakkādibahulo sājīvasamāpanno nirāpattiko,
tika-vin09t0:67_3: atthi na sikkhāsamāpanno na ca sājīvasamāpanno anavasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno,
tika-vin09t0:67_4: atthi ubhayasamāpanno sikkhaṃ paripūrento sājīvañca avītikkamanto”ti.
tika-vin09t0:67_5: Ayamettha catuttho bhikkhu ukkaṭṭho idha adhippeto siyā.
tika-vin09t0:67_6: Na hi bhagavā anukkaṭṭhaṃ vattuṃ yuttoti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:67_8: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vacanavirodhato,
tika-vin09t0:67_9: ukkaṭṭhaggahaṇādhippāye sati “sikkhāti tisso sikkhā”ti ettakameva vattabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:67_11: “Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti parato vacanaṃ apekkhitvā adhisīlasikkhāva vuttāti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:67_21: ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā sikkhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:67_22: Tasmā adhisīlasikkhāya saṅgāhako sājīvo sikkhāsājīvoti vutto.
tika-vin09t0:67_27: Tañca upasampadūpagamanantarato paṭṭhāya sikkhanādhikārattā “sikkhatī”ti ca “samāpanno”ti ca vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:67_29: tādisaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca aparabhāge sājīvasaṅkhātameva sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya tasmiṃyeva dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā
tika-vin09t0:68_3: Sabbesu sikkhāpadesu idameva bhikkhulakkhaṇaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ yadidaṃ “bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti.
tika-vin09t0:68_7: tasmā sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ sāmaññamidaṃ bhikkhulakkhaṇanti katvā kevalaṃ sikkhāsamāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:68_12: tena vuccati sājīvasamāpanno”ti ettha sikkhāsaddassa avacane parihāraṃ vatvā yasmā pana so sikkhampi samāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:68_13: tasmā sikkhāsamāpannotipi atthato veditabboti ca vatvā “yaṃ sikkhaṃ samāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:68_16: tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti vuttanti ayamaṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:68_17: Etasmiṃ pana adhippāye adhisīlasikkhāya eva gahaṇaṃ sabbatthikattā,
tika-vin09t0:68_19: Yathā ca sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyanto sīlaṃ samādiyatīti vuccati,
tika-vin09t0:68_20: evaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paccakkhanto sīlaṃ paccakkhātīti vattuṃ yujjati,
tika-vin09t0:68_23: Ettāvatā samāsato “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti ettha vattabbavinicchayo niṭṭhito hoti.
tika-vin09t0:69_1: nanu “yo pana bhikkhu sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā…pe…
tika-vin09t0:69_7: sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya ca methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa pārājikāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:69_8: Yo vā pacchā pārājikaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno, tassa ca,
tika-vin09t0:69_9: yo vā pakkhapaṇḍakattā paṇḍakabhāvūpagamanena na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:69_11: Paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe ca paṇḍako upasampadāya na vatthū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:69_13: Tasmiṃ pakkhe upasampanno paṇḍakabhāvapakkhe paṇḍakattā na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:69_14: so pariccajitabbāya sikkhāya abhāvena sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya mukhena parassa aṅgajātaggahaṇanayena methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya,
tika-vin09t0:69_16: Ayaṃ nayo apaṇḍakapakkhaṃ alabhamānasseva parato yujjati,
tika-vin09t0:69_17: labhantassa pana arūpasattānaṃ kusalādisamāpattikkhaṇe bhavaṅgavicchede satipi amaraṇaṃ viya paṇḍakabhāvapakkhepi bhikkhubhāvo atthi.
tika-vin09t0:69_18: Saṃvāsaṃ vā sādiyantassa na theyyasaṃvāsakabhāvo atthi antimavatthuajjhāpannassa viya.
tika-vin09t0:69_20: Gaṇapūrako pana na hoti antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno viya.
tika-vin09t0:69_27: Yato upasampadā tassa apaṇḍakapakkhe anuññātā sahetukappaṭisandhikattā.
tika-vin09t0:70_0: Apica “sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”ti iminā tassa sikkhāsamādānaṃ dīpetvā taṃ samādinnaṃ sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya,
tika-vin09t0:70_1: tattha ca dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti vattuṃ yujjati,
tika-vin09t0:70_2: na aññathāti iminā kāraṇena yathāvuttāniṭṭhappasaṅgato “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:70_4: evaṃ “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā gāmā vā araññā vā adinnaṃ…pe…
tika-vin09t0:70_5: yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāya dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ
tika-vin09t0:71_4: Ayaṃ tāva mātikāya vinicchayo aññatthāpi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetvā dīpetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:72_0: Sāriputtabelaṭṭhasīsānandādayopi sikkhāpadapaññattikāraṇattā ca āpattiāpajjanato ca kasmā mahāvibhaṅge ñatticatutthaupasampadāyeva āgatāti?
tika-vin09t0:72_2: Āpattiyā bhabbataṃ sandhāya tasmimpi vutte pubbe paṭikkhittāpi bhagavatā puna anuññātāti bhikkhūnaṃ micchāgāho vā vimati vā uppajjati,
tika-vin09t0:73_5: Yadi evaṃ “ṭhānārahenā”ti idameva vattabbaṃ iminā akuppasiddhitoti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:73_6: aṭṭhānārahena akuppena upasampanno imasmiṃ atthe na adhippeto aniṭṭhappasaṅgato.
tika-vin09t0:73_7: Dvīhi panetehi ekato vuttehi ayamattho paññāyati –
tika-vin09t0:73_8: kevalaṃ tena akuppena upasampanno ayampi imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti,
tika-vin09t0:73_9: ṭhānārahena ca akuppena ca upasampanno ayampi imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti,
tika-vin09t0:74_0: “Paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya aparipuṇṇavīsativasso”ti vuttattā opapātikañcāti soḷasavassuddesikā opapātikā
tika-vin09t0:74_2: ‘Soḷasavassuddesikā hontī’ti vuttattā puna cattāri vassāni icchitabbāni,
tika-vin09t0:74_3: ‘paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāyā’ti idaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena vutta”nti eke.
tika-vin09t0:74_5: tattha tattha vicāretvā atthaṃ suṭṭhu upalakkhaye.
tika-vin09t0:76_0: Rājabhayādīhi gahitaliṅgānaṃ “gihī maṃ ‘samaṇo’ti jānantū”ti vañcanacitte satipi bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya
tika-vin09t0:76_1: ca tehi saṃvasitukāmatāya ca abhāvā doso na jātoti.
tika-vin09t0:76_3: so theyyasaṃvāsako nāma hotī”ti vā “evaṃ kātuṃ na labbhatī”ti vā “evaṃ pabbajito sāmaṇero na hotī”ti vā na jānāti, vaṭṭati. “Jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:76_5: “Rājadubbhikkhādiatthāya cīvaraṃ pārupitvā saṃvāsaṃ sādiyanto theyyasaṃvāsako hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:76_8: kiṃ etenāti vippaṭisārena vā paccayādisulabhatāya vā karissāmī’ti suddhamānaso hutvā yāva so saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti,
tika-vin09t0:76_10: Evaṃ suddhacittuppattito paṭṭhāya saṃvāsaṃ sādiyati ce,
tika-vin09t0:77_0: “Nābhiparāmāsādinā jāto tathārūpaṃ pitaraṃ ghāteti ce, pitughātako hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:78_2: Bhikkhuniṃ pana ekatoupasampannaṃ dūsetvāpi bhikkhunidūsako hoti,
tika-vin09t0:79_0: “Sampajānamusāvāde pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ mariyādaṃ avītikkamanto tasmiñca sikkhāpade sikkhatīti vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:79_9: Yasmā sikkhāya guṇasammatāya puññasammatāya tantiyā abhāvato lokassa dubbalyāvikammaṃ tattha na sambhavati.
tika-vin09t0:79_14: Dubbalyāvikammapadaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānapadassa byañjanasiliṭṭhatāya vā parivārakabhāvena vā veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:79_15: Atha vā yasmā sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ekaccaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ akataṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:79_16: tasmā taṃ sandhāya “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti padassa atthaṃ vivaranto “dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti āha.
tika-vin09t0:79_17: Tattha siyā yasmā na sabbaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:79_18: tasmā “dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti paṭhamaṃ vatvā tassa atthaniyamatthaṃ “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti vattabbanti? Taṃ na, kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:79_23: tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti vuccamāne anukkameneva attho vutto hoti,
tika-vin09t0:81_0: Pavesanaṃ nāma aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa aṅgajātena samphusanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:81_1: Paviṭṭhaṃ nāma yāva mūlaṃ pavesentassa vippakatakālo vāyāmakālo.
tika-vin09t0:81_4: Vinayagaṇṭhipade pana “vāyāmato oramitvā ṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:82_0: Ubhatovibhaṅge eva paññattāni sandhāya “idañhi sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ nidāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:82_1: “Vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadā”ti vuttattā idha tatiyā sahayogena vuttā.
tika-vin09t0:82_8: “Kathaṃ vatthuto vā ñattito vā anussāvanato vā sīmato vā parisato vā”ti ettakaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:82_9: nanu ayaṃ “parisato vā”ti vacanena saṅgahitoti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:82_10: “dvādasahi ākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjantī”ti suttassa hi vibhaṅge tassa anāmaṭṭhattāti ayamattho
tika-vin09t0:82_11: yasmā tattha tattha sarūpena vuttapāḷivaseneva sakkā jānituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:82_13: “Aṅga”nti padaṃ uddharitvā “sabbasikkhāpadesu āpattīnaṃ aṅgānaṅgaṃ veditabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:82_15: Samuṭṭhanādīnaṃ parivārādīsu saṅkhepena āgatattā tattha gahetvā idhāpi niddiṭṭhānaṃ anaṅgānaṃ vavatthānābhāvato,
tika-vin09t0:82_16: sabbattha saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca anaṅgatte vuccamāne ativitthāratāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade anūnaṃ vattabbato cāti veditabbo,
tika-vin09t0:83_1: tesaṃ vasena kāyavācā saha viññattiyā veditabbā,
tika-vin09t0:83_6: Aviññattijanakampi ekaccaṃ bāhullanayena “kiriya”nti vuccati yatheva paṭhamapārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:83_11: viññattisaṅkhātāpi kiriyā vinā sevanacittena na hoti vuttacittajattā,
tika-vin09t0:83_15: itaraṃ cittajarūpaṃ viya janakacittena vinā na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:83_17: tasmā kiriyāya sati ekantato tajjanakaṃ sevanacittaṃ atthi evāti katvā na sādiyati,
tika-vin09t0:83_19: Yasmā viññattijanakampi samānaṃ sevanacittaṃ na sabbakālaṃ viññattiṃ janeti,
tika-vin09t0:83_20: tasmā vināpi viññattiyā sayaṃ uppajjatīti katvā “sādiyati,
tika-vin09t0:83_25: Teneva bhagavā “kiṃcitto tvaṃ bhikkhū”ti citteneva āpattiṃ paricchindati,
tika-vin09t0:84_0: Ettha samuṭṭhānaggahaṇaṃ kattabbato vā akattabbato vā kāyādibhedāpekkhameva āpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin09t0:84_4: Tena yaṃ cittaṃ kiriyalakkhaṇe vā akiriyalakkhaṇe vā sannihitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:84_5: yato vā kiriyā vā akiriyā vā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:84_6: na taṃ avisesena āpattiyā aṅgaṃ vā anaṅgaṃ vā hoti.
tika-vin09t0:84_10: Idāni yena cittena sikkhāpadaṃ sacittakaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:84_16: tasmā manokammampi siyā āpattīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇappayojanaṃ kammaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:85_3: taṃ ekaccaṃ avedanampi nirodhaṃ samāpanno āpajjatīti vedanāttikaṃ ettha na labbhatīti aniṭṭhappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ vedanāttikaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:85_4: Sikkhāpadañhi sacittakapuggalavasena “ticittaṃ tivedana”nti laddhavohāraṃ acittakenāpannampi “ticittaṃ tivedana”miceva vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:86_4: Surāpānasmiñhi “surā”ti vā “pātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vā jānitvā pivane akusalamevāti.
tika-vin09t0:86_5: Tattha “na vaṭṭatīti jānitvā”ti vuttavacanaṃ na yujjati paṇṇattivajjassapi lokavajjatāpasaṅgato.
tika-vin09t0:86_6: Imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ pariharitukāmatāya ca vajirabuddhittherena likhitaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:86_7: “idha ‘sacittaka’nti ca ‘acittaka’nti ca vicāraṇā vatthuvijānane eva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:86_12: Tasmā vatthuvijānane eva hotīti idaṃ yujjati. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:86_15: Ayaṃ panettha attho sikkhāpadasīsena āpattiṃ gahetvā yassa sikkhāpadassa sacittakassa cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:86_17: sacittakācittakasaṅkhātassa acittakassa ca sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:86_18: tampi surāpānādilokavajjanti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:86_21: Na hi ekaṃsato sacittakāya “sacittakapakkhe”ti visesane payojanaṃ atthīti,
tika-vin09t0:86_22: evaṃ santepi aniyamena vuttañca niyamavasena eva gahetabbanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:87_2: Kiriyāti ettha “ṭhitaṃ sādiyatī”ti vuttattā taṃ kathanti ce?
tika-vin09t0:87_4: Evaṃ sante “kāyakammaṃ manokamma”nti vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:87_10: padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hotī”ti vadantenāpi atthassa sukhaggahaṇatthameva padabyañjanassa sunikkhittabhāvo icchito,
tika-vin09t0:90_0: Gāmā vā araññā vāti lakkhaṇānupaññattikattā ādimhi vuttā.
tika-vin09t0:90_10: Tattha atthi gāmo na gāmaparihāraṃ katthaci labhati,
tika-vin09t0:90_12: tathā atthi araññaṃ na araññaparihāraṃ katthaci labhati,
tika-vin09t0:90_13: atthi araññaṃ na araññakiccaṃ karotīti ayampi bhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:91_0: Tattha avippavāsasīmāsammannanakammavācāya ṭhapetvā “gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti ettha gāmo nāma parikkhitto ce,
tika-vin09t0:91_7: Tathā antaragharappaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ sekhiyānaṃ ayameva paricchedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:91_8: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyyā”ti etthāpi ayameva paricchedo adhippeto “parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantiyā,
tika-vin09t0:92_1: taṃ vikāle gāmappavesanasikkhāpadesu āciṇṇaṃ nayaṃ gahetvā pamādena likhīyati,
tika-vin09t0:92_3: Yesu ca potthakesu vikāle gāmappavesanasikkhāpadassa vibhaṅge “gāmaṃ paviseyyāti parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa,
tika-vin09t0:92_7: Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro adinnādāne vuttanayeneva veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:93_0: Yaṃ pana katthaci potthake “bhikkhuniyā gāmantarādhikāre ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ vā atikkamante,
tika-vin09t0:93_7: Katthaci potthake “okkantamatte cā”ti padaṃ na dissati,
tika-vin09t0:93_17: ekena pādena itarassa gāmassa parikkhepe vā upacāre vā atikkante thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:94_0: Gaṇṭhipade cassa “parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā”ti vatvā “upacārepi eseva nayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:94_1: Anugaṇṭhipade ca “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ ‘okkamantiyā’tipi potthakesu ekaccesu dissati,
tika-vin09t0:94_3: Aparampi vuttaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ ‘atikkāmentiyā’ti vacanenāpi evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:94_4: vikāle gāmappavesane dvinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ eva vasena upacāro paricchinditabbo,
tika-vin09t0:94_5: itarathā yathā ettha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ parikkhepaṃ viya katvā ‘atikkāmentiyā’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:94_6: evaṃ tatthāpi ‘aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkāmentassā’ti vadeyya.
tika-vin09t0:94_7: Yasmā pana tattha parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato uttarimeko leḍḍupāto upacāroti adhippeto.
tika-vin09t0:94_8: Tasmā tadatthadīpanatthaṃ ‘aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassā’ti vutta”nti.
tika-vin09t0:95_0: Yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃyeva upacāranti sallakkhetvā “parikkhepapaakkhepārahaṭṭhānānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:95_2: pāḷivisesamasallakkhetvā “aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ atikkamantassa idha upacāro parikkhepo yathā bhaveyya,
tika-vin09t0:95_3: taṃ upacāraṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentassa āpatti dukkaṭassa,
tika-vin09t0:95_4: dutiyaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:95_9: Ettāvatā imesu yathāvuttesu ṭhānesu yathāvuttaparicchedova gāmoti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:95_10: Imassa atthassa dīpanatthaṃ “gāmo nāma ekakuṭikopī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:95_12: upacārokkamane vā antarārāmato vā bhikkhunupassayato vā titthiyaseyyato vā paṭikkamanato vā taṃ gāmaṃ pavisantassa antarārāmaparikkhepassa,
tika-vin09t0:95_13: upacārassa vā atikkamanavasena gāmapaccayā āpattiyo veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:96_0: Gāmūpacāro pana “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti ettha parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepova,
tika-vin09t0:96_4: Tesu adhiṭṭhitatecīvariko bhikkhu parihāraṃ na labhatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:96_9: Aṭṭhuppattito “tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ‘bhagavatā ticīvarena avippavāsasammuti anuññātā’ti antaraghare
tika-vin09t0:96_10: cīvarāni nikkhipantī”ti imissā hi aṭṭhuppattiyā “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:96_13: Tena ca udositasikkhāpade “antogāme cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā antogāme vatthabba”nti ca “sabhāye vā dvāramūle vā,
tika-vin09t0:96_14: hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabba”nti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:96_15: Kappiyabhūmiyaṃ vasantoyeva hi kappiyabhūmiyaṃ nikkhittacīvaraṃ rakkhati.
tika-vin09t0:96_16: Sāsaṅkasikkhāpade pana “yasmā yattha gāme cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:96_17: tena gāmena vippavasanto cīvarena vippavasatīti vuccati,
tika-vin09t0:96_18: tasmā puna gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:96_19: Tasmiñhi sikkhāpade gāmasīmā gāmo nāmāti adhippeto.
tika-vin09t0:96_20: Tattha vikāle gāmappavesanasikkhāpadavibhaṅge “parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vacanato parikkhepo na gāmo.
tika-vin09t0:96_22: Imasmiṃ pana sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti ārabhitvā “aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa
tika-vin09t0:96_23: majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti iminā aparikkhittassa parikkhepokāso gāmūpacāroti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:96_24: Tadatthasambhavato tasmiṃ gharūpacāre ṭhitassa leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāroti kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:96_29: aparikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepokāso”ti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:96_32: Tathā pāḷiyampi “ajjhārāmo nāma parikkhittassa ārāmassa anto ārāmo,
tika-vin09t0:96_34: Ajjhāvasatho nāma parikkhittassa āvasathassa anto āvasatho,
tika-vin09t0:97_0: “Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassā”ti pāḷivisesasambhavato ca paṭhamo leḍḍupāto gāmo eva,
tika-vin09t0:97_2: Parikkhittassa pana gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāroti vuttanti ettha bhedo natthi.
tika-vin09t0:98_0: Gāmakhettassa ca gāmasīmāya ca lakkhaṇaṃ aṭṭhakathāyameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:99_0: Gāmasīmūpacāro nāma manussānaṃ kaṭṭhatiṇapupphaphalādiatthikānaṃ vanacarakānaṃ valañjanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:99_2: “agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā”ti āgataṭṭhāne khandhake ca veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:99_3: Ettha hi bhagavā gāmantavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīmaṃ dassento “yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharatī”ti vatvā dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:99_5: Tasmā yo bhikkhu gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya na viharati,
tika-vin09t0:99_6: kevalaṃ nāvāyaṃ vā thalamaggena vā addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti,
tika-vin09t0:99_7: tassa tattha tattha sattabbhantarasīmā labbhatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:99_9: satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā purato vā pacchato vā sattabbhantarā na vijahitabba”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:99_10: Idameva araññaṃ sandhāya “āraññakasīmāya ekaṃ agāmakaṃ arañña”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:100_0: Yaṃ sandhāya “agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:100_1: Idaṃ saṃvidhānasikkhāpadānaṃ ekaṃ agāmakaṃ araññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:101_2: Yaṃ sandhāya gaṇamhā ohīyanādhikāre aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “agāmake araññeti ettha ‘nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā
tika-vin09t0:101_3: sabbametaṃ arañña’nti evaṃ vuttaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ araññaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:101_6: Yaṃ sandhāya “āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:101_7: Idaṃ āraññakasenāsanaṃ nāma parikkhittassa parikkhepato bahi,
tika-vin09t0:101_8: aparikkhittassa pana parikkhepokāsato bahi sarukkhaṃ vā arukkhaṃ vā vihāre kunnadisamākiṇṇampi araññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:101_11: Idaṃ pana pubbe agāmakabhāvena āgataṭṭhāne vuttalakkhaṇameva hutvā nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā dassanūpacāravijahane ekameva āpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:101_13: “Saṃvidhānasikkhāpadānaṃ eka”nti vuttaṃ pana addhayojane addhayojane ekekaṃ āpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:101_15: Itarāni tīṇi yathāvuttaparicchedato orameva tattha vuttavidhiṃ na sampādenti,
tika-vin09t0:102_0: Tattha pañcavidhe gāme yo “parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa leḍḍupāto”ti vutto,
tika-vin09t0:102_1: so na katthaci vinayapiṭake upayogaṃ gato,
tika-vin09t0:102_2: kevalaṃ aparikkhittassa parikkhepokāsato aparo eko leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāro nāmāti dīpanatthaṃ vutto.
tika-vin09t0:102_3: Parikkhittassapi ce gāmassa eko leḍḍupāto kappiyabhūmisamāno upacāroti vutto,
tika-vin09t0:102_5: So pana pākaṭattā ca ajjhokāsattā ca okkamantassa āpattiṃ karoti ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpattiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:102_6: Bhikkhuniyo hi tasmiṃ dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhāte gāmūpacāre vasantī āpattiñca āpajjanti,
tika-vin09t0:102_8: Tāsañhi ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ araññasaṅkhyaṃ gacchati “tāvadeva chāyā metabbā…pe…
tika-vin09t0:102_13: kappiyabhūmibhāvavacanato ca “ekā gaṇamhā ohīyeyyāti agāmake araññe dutiyikāya bhikkhuniyā dassanūpacāraṃ
tika-vin09t0:102_14: vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijahantiyā āpatti thullaccayassā”tiādisikkhāpadapaññattito ca bhikkhunikkhandhakanayaena
tika-vin09t0:102_15: vā yasmā parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīlato paṭṭhāya aparikkhittassa upacārato paṭṭhāya nīyati,
tika-vin09t0:102_16: tattha antaraghare nikkhittacīvare sati caturaṅgasamodhānena bhikkhū vasanti,
tika-vin09t0:103_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato bhikkhunīnaṃ araññavāso nāma natthīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:103_5: Tāya hi araññe bhikkhunupassaye sati antoāvāsepi dutiyikāya dassanasavanūpacāraṃ vijahantiyā āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:103_6: Tasmā avippavāsasīmādhikāre “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti ettha yaṃ ṭhānaṃ ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:104_0: Tāsañca avippavāsasīmākammavācāyaṃ “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vacanaṃ natthīti katvā tesveva gāmagāmūpacāresu pharati.
tika-vin09t0:104_1: Tato paraṃ dutiyesu leḍḍupātādīsu tāsaṃ akappiyabhūmikattā na samānasaṃvāsakasīmā araññe pharati bhikkhūnaṃ gāmagāmūpacāraṃ viya.
tika-vin09t0:105_1: araññabhedañca ñatvā idāni “atthi gāmo na gāmaparihāraṃ katthaci labhatī”tiādibhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:105_2: Tattha yo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “amanusso nāma yo sabbaso vā manussānaṃ abhāvena yakkhapariggahabhūto”ti vutto,
tika-vin09t0:105_3: so gāmo na gāmaparihāraṃ katthaci sikkhāpade labhati.
tika-vin09t0:105_8: kevalaṃ bhayena vā chaḍḍito sagharova antarahitagāmabhūto,
tika-vin09t0:105_9: so “gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassā”ti vuttapācittiyaṃ janeti,
tika-vin09t0:105_12: Yo pana gāmo yato vā manussā kenacideva karaṇīyena punapi āgantukāmā eva apakkantāti vutto,
tika-vin09t0:106_0: Atthi araññaṃ na araññaparihāraṃ katthaci labhatīti ettha “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro nāma agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā ekūpacāro,
tika-vin09t0:106_1: tato paraṃ nānūpacāro”ti ettha yvāyaṃ nānūpacāroti vutto,
tika-vin09t0:106_3: Yo pana parikkhittassa ekaleḍḍupātasaṅkhāto gāmūpacāranāmako gāmo,
tika-vin09t0:106_5: so atthi gāmo na gāmakiccaṃ karoti.
tika-vin09t0:106_6: Na hi taṃ ṭhānaṃ okkamanto gāmappavesanāpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:106_7: Yaṃ pana gāmasīmāya pariyāpannaṃ manussānaṃ valañjanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ araññaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:106_8: taṃ atthi araññaṃ na araññakiccaṃ karoti nāma.
tika-vin09t0:106_10: Ettāvatā “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti imissā anupaññattiyā lakkhaṇānupaññattibhāvo dassito hoti.
tika-vin09t0:107_0: “Gonisādiniviṭṭhopi gāmo”ti ettha sace tassa gāmassa gāmakhettaparicchedo atthi,
tika-vin09t0:107_3: Sace gāmakhette sati kānici tāni gharāni aññamaññaupacārappahonakaṃ ṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā dūre dūre katāni honti,
tika-vin09t0:107_6: bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpattīsu ca gharānaṃ parikkhepārahaṭṭhānaṃ pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:107_8: āraññakasenāsanassa āsannagharassa dutiyaleḍḍupātato paṭṭhāya pañcadhanusatantaratā pamāṇanti evaṃ no paṭibhānanti ācariyā.
tika-vin09t0:108_0: “Yampi ekasmiṃyeva gāmakhette ekaṃ padesaṃ ‘ayampi visuṃgāmo hotū’ti paricchinditvā rājā kassaci deti,
tika-vin09t0:108_1: sopi visuṃgāmasīmā hotiyevā”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanato taṃ pavisantiyā bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpatti hoti eva.
tika-vin09t0:108_2: Sace tattha vihāro vā devakulaṃ vā sabhā vā gehaṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin09t0:108_6: Tañca ṭhānaṃ itarassa gāmassa parikkhepabbhantare vā upacārabbhantare vā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:108_7: vikāle gāmappavesanaṃ āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ. No ce,
tika-vin09t0:108_9: Tattha ce ārāmo vā titthiyaseyyādīsu aññatarovā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:108_12: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantiyā bhikkhuniyā gāmantarāpatti pariharitabbā.
tika-vin09t0:108_13: “Araññaṃ nāma ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmā”ti ettha parikkhepe sati yathāvuttaparicchedaṃ
tika-vin09t0:108_16: parikkhepe asati yathāvuttaparicchedaṃ gāmūpacārameva ṭhapetvā tato paraṃ avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:108_17: Evaṃ sati “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti vuttalakkhaṇe agāmake araññe gaṇamhāohīyanāpatti,
tika-vin09t0:108_18: tattha avippavāsasīmāya pharaṇaṃ vikāle gāmappavesanāpattiyā anāpattīti evamādivinayavidhi sameti,
tika-vin09t0:109_0: “Ṭhapetvā gāmūpacāraṃ avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmā”ti vutte gāmūpacārato paro araññanti siddhe “ṭhapetvā gāma”nti visesattho na dissati,
tika-vin09t0:109_1: gāmassa pana araññabhāvappasaṅgabhayā vuttanti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:109_7: parova gāmoti katvā na yuttaṃ gāmassa araññabhāvappasaṅgato ca.
tika-vin09t0:109_8: Tasmā “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti ettha gāmūpacāropi “gāmo” tveva saṅgahito.
tika-vin09t0:109_10: Yadi evaṃ “ṭhapetvā gāmaṃ avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāmā”ti ettakaṃ vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:109_12: Tathā hi vutto “araññaparicchedo na paññāyatī”ti no laddhi.
tika-vin09t0:109_14: Yadi evaṃ “gāmassa ca araññassa ca paricchedadassanatthaṃ vutta”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:109_15: “araññassa paricchedadassanatthaṃ vutta”nti kimatthaṃ vuttanti ce? Vuccate –
tika-vin09t0:109_17: hi bāhiraindakhīlato paṭṭhāya gāmūpacāraṃ araññaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:109_18: Gāmaparicchedavacane payojanaṃ panettha natthi parikkhepeneva pākaṭabhūtattā.
tika-vin09t0:109_19: Dutiyagāmūpacārova gāmassa paricchedadassanatthaṃ vutto parikkhepabhāvena apākaṭattā.
tika-vin09t0:109_23: Evaṃ sante subyattataraṃ araññaparicchedo dassito hoti,
tika-vin09t0:110_0: “Majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti hi vutte ayaṃ gāmūpacārova araññaṃ gāmūpacārassa vibhaṅgattā.
tika-vin09t0:110_3: araññato paranti ca micchāgāho hotīti ce,
tika-vin09t0:110_4: nanu vuttaṃ “paṭhamameva idaṃ parikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraniyamanatthaṃ vutta”nti?
tika-vin09t0:110_6: indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupātoti pana evaṃ vacanappayojanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:110_7: Aparikkhittassa ca gāmassa yvāyaṃ leḍḍupāto upacāro”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto,
tika-vin09t0:110_10: “Araññaṃ nāmā”ti padaṃ anuddharitvā “gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti uddharaṇassa katattā.
tika-vin09t0:110_11: Tattha “gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti mātikāyaṃ avijjamānaṃ padaṃ uddharanto tayo atthavase dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:110_15: na kevalaṃ aparikkhittassayeva upacāro vinayādhikāre sappayojano dassitabbo,
tika-vin09t0:110_16: nippayojanopi parikkhittassa upacāro iminā pariyāyena labbhatīti anusaṅgappayojanameko atthopi veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:111_0: “Aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti idaṃ bhagavā tayo atthavase paṭicca abhāsi.
tika-vin09t0:111_4: tattha ṭhitassa dutiyo leḍḍupāto sabbattha gāmappaṭisaṃyuttesu sikkhāpadesu sakiccako upacāroti dassanamekoti
tika-vin09t0:111_5: evaṃ bhagavā attano desanāvilāsappattiyā ekekapaduddhāraṇena tayo atthavase dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:112_0: Tathā avippavāsasīmākammavācāya “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti etthāpi parikkhepe sati gāmaṃ ṭhapetvā,
tika-vin09t0:112_3: aparikkhittassa ca majjhe ārāme avippavāsasīmāsammannanakāle ayaṃ nayo ativiya yujjati.
tika-vin09t0:112_4: Ubhayaparivajjanato pubbe vuttanayena vā ubhayattha ubhayaṃ labbhateva.
tika-vin09t0:112_5: “Antarārāmesu pana āciṇṇakappā bhikkhū avippavāsasīmaṃ sammannantī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:112_6: “Antaragharappaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ sekhiyānaṃ antarārāmesu asambhavato antarārāmo na gāmasaṅkhaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:112_8: Te bhikkhū dutiyassa gāmūpacārassa gāmasaṅkhāsabhāvato tāsaṃ imāya dutiyāya avippavāsakammavācāya abhāvaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā.
tika-vin09t0:112_9: Ajjhārāmo pana gāmopi samāno titthiyaseyyādi viya kappiyabhūmīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:119_2: agilānenapi ārāme ārāmūpacāre chattaṃ dhāretu”nti evamādīsu bāhire upacāre dissati.
tika-vin09t0:119_8: aparikkhittassa upacāro”tiādīsu pana upacārasaddo abbhantare upacāre dissati.
tika-vin09t0:119_15: Tesu bāhirabbhantarabhedabhinnesu dvīsu upacāresu avippavāsasīmādhikāre “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti
tika-vin09t0:119_19: tassā gāmantarāpattiyā ṭhānabhūtattā ca abbhantaraupacārassāti idamettha kāraṇadvayaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:119_20: Tattha idha adinnādānapārājikavibhaṅgeyeva paṭhamo gāmūpacāro dassito,
tika-vin09t0:119_23: Paṭhamena ca aparikkhittassa gāmassa dutiyaleḍḍupātasaṅkhāto bāhiro upacāro,
tika-vin09t0:119_24: dutiyena ca parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepato bāhirasaṅkhāto abbhantaro upacāro lesena dassitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:119_25: Evaṃ cattāropi upacārā idha bhagavatā desanāvilāsappattena desanālīlāya dassitā hontīti ayaṃ nayo suṭṭhu
tika-vin09t0:119_26: lakkhetvā ācariyehi sammantayitvā yathānurūpaṃ tattha yojetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:132_1: gāmasaṅkhāto upacāro gāmūpacāro nāmā”ti uddharitvā gāmassa upacāraṃ dassento “indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa
tika-vin09t0:132_2: purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti vatvā puna gāmasaṅkhātaṃ upacāraṃ dassento “gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa
tika-vin09t0:132_4: Imamatthaṃ sandhāya vikāle gāmappavesanagāmantaraaappavāsasammutiādīsu parikkhepārahaṭṭhānameva gāmūpacāranti vuttanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:133_0: Atthato ekanti ettha saṅkhāsaddaṃ saṅkhātasaddena samānayati.
tika-vin09t0:133_2: Ṭhānācāvanavasena ca khīlādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasena cāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:133_3: Ṭhānācāvane yathā sāmikassa dhuranikkhepādiṃ anoloketvāva āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:134_0: “Asukaṃ nāma bhaṇḍaṃ avaharissāmī”ti sabbesaṃ ekāsayattā “ekenāpī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:135_2: Idāni suddhacittena gahitepi hoti evāti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:135_4: Ettha pana vinicchayo samantapāsādikaṃ oloketvā gahetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:137_3: saddena pātane na rakkhatīti atthe siddhepi atthasādhakavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ uddharitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:138_4: Rājānoti kiñci aniddisitvā sādhāraṇavasena kiñcāpi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:139_0: Pubbappayogeti ettha gamanakāle maggasodhanādhikaraṇe apācittiyakhette dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:139_2: Gantvā pana kumbhimatthake jātalatādicchedane sahapayogattā dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:139_5: ahampi ekapassaṃ gaṇhāmī’ti saṃvidahitvā ubhayesaṃ payogena ṭhānācāvane kate kāyavācācittehi samuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin09t0:139_6: Aññathā sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin09t0:139_7: āṇattikaṃ vā sāhatthikassāti vuttalakkhaṇena virujjhatī”ti vinayagaṇṭhipade likhitaṃ. Pi-
tika-vin09t0:141_0: Tatra vācaṅgaṃ cittaṃva, kammaṃ nassā vidhīyati.
tika-vin09t0:143_0: Na yuttaṃ taṃ viruddhattā, kammamekaṃva yujjatīti. ;
tika-vin09t0:146_2: tīraṇapariññā pana dhammasabhāvena saddhiṃ aniccādivasena pavattamānaṃ “rūpaṃ aniccanti vā”tiādi,
tika-vin09t0:146_3: evamidha saddhiṃ cetetvā ekattenāpi pāṇātipātābhāvā “jīvitā voropeyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:146_4: “Manussaviggaha”nti vuttattā gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena sabbasukhumaattabhāvato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ “kalalato paṭṭhāyā”ti āha.
tika-vin09t0:146_7: santatipaccuppannaṃ vā addhāpaccuppannaṃ vā sakkā. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t0:146_8: Tasmiñhi upakkame kate laddhūpakkamaṃ jīvitadasakaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ dubbalassa parihīnavegassa paccayo hoti.
tika-vin09t0:146_9: Santatipaccuppannaṃ yathā dve tayo javanavāre javitvā nirujjhati,
tika-vin09t0:146_12: Tato santatipaccuppannaṃ vā addhāpaccuppannaṃ vā yathāparicchinnakālaṃ apatvā antarāva nirujjhati.
tika-vin09t0:147_0: “Imassa panatthassā”ti vohāravasena vuttamatthaṃ paramatthavasena āvibhāvatthaṃ “pāṇo veditabbo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:147_1: Kāyaviññattisahitāya cetanāya payujjatīti payogo, ko so?
tika-vin09t0:147_2: Sarīre satthādīnaṃ gamanaṃ paharaṇanti kāyavacīviññattisahitāya cetanāya parasarīre satthapātanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:147_7: Yo koci maratūti ettha mahājanasamūhe na sakkā.
tika-vin09t0:147_14: Etesu hi avirajjhitesu eva āṇattipayogo hoti,
tika-vin09t0:150_0: Duṭṭhacitto sace yāti, hoti so itthimārako.
tika-vin09t0:151_0: Bhikkhatthāya sace yāti, jānantopi na mārako;
tika-vin09t0:152_0: Anatthiko hi so tassā, maraṇena upekkhako.
tika-vin09t0:153_0: Viyogena ca me jāyā, jananī ca na jīvati;
tika-vin09t0:154_0: Iti jānaṃ viyuñjanto, tadatthiko hoti mārako.
tika-vin09t0:156_0: Anatthiko hi so tassā, maraṇena upekkhako.
tika-vin09t0:157_0: Hārakasaddassa bhedato atthaṃ vitthāretvā ubhayampi ekamevāti dassetuṃ “satthañca taṃ hārakañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:157_2: “Iti cittamano”ti uddharitvāpi itisaddassa attho na tāva vutto.
tika-vin09t0:157_4: adhikāravasena pana āgataṃ itisaddaṃ yojetvā iti cittasaṅkappoti ettha “maraṇasaññī maraṇacetano maraṇādhippāyo”ti
tika-vin09t0:157_7: Sāhatthikanissaggiyappayogesu sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya sattamāya saha uppannakāyaviññattiyā sāhatthikatā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:157_8: Āṇattike pana sattahipi cetanāhi saha vacīviññattisambhavato satta satta saddā ekato hutvā ekekakkharabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:157_9: gantvā yattakehi akkharehi attano adhippāyaṃ viññāpenti,
tika-vin09t0:160_3: Kevalaṃ “pāpicchatāyā”ti vacanato mandattā momūhattā samudācarantassa anāpattīti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:160_6: so bhikkhu arahā”tiādīsu viya sikkhāpadepi “iti jānāmī”ti paccuppannameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:162_2: lambīādayo ca cattāro paṭhamapārājikaṃ āpannā evāti katvā kuto catuvīsatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:162_4: Mātughātakādayo hi cattāro idhānupasampannā eva adhippetā,
tika-vin09t0:162_6: yasmā pana ekena pariyāyena methunadhammaṃ paṭisevino honti,
tika-vin09t0:162_8: Na labhati bhikkhūhīti ettha “uposathādibhedaṃ saṃvāsa”nti ettakaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:162_10: Pāḷiyaṃ “saṃvāso nāma ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:162_11: Tividhenāpi saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti paṭikkhittaṃ. “Na,
tika-vin09t0:162_13: gahaṭṭhena nisinnaparisāya pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabba”ntiādi pātimokkhappavāraṇāsu eva āgataṃ,
tika-vin09t0:162_14: aññesu ca evarūpesu ṭhānesu sesaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ natthi paṭikkhepo.
tika-vin09t0:162_18: saṅghādisesena codentassa pācittiyanti bhikkhuno viya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:162_21: tassa paṭiggahaṇañca bhikkhussa vaṭṭatīti ācariyā vadantī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:162_22: “Yathā pure tathā pacchāti ‘ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā’ti evaṃ vuttasaṃvāsassa abhabbatāmattaṃ sandhāya vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:163_1: methunadhammaṃ paṭisevanto atthi koci pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso,
tika-vin09t0:163_2: atthi koci na pārājiko hoti asaṃvāso,
tika-vin09t0:163_3: atthi koci na pārājiko saṃvāso dukkaṭavatthusmiṃ vā thullaccayavatthusmiṃ vā paṭisevanto,
tika-vin09t0:163_4: atthi koci na pārājiko pakkhapaṇḍako apaṇḍakapakkhe upasampanno paṇḍakapakkhe methunadhammaṃ paṭisevanto.
tika-vin09t0:163_5: So āpattiṃ nāpajjatīti na pārājiko nāma.
tika-vin09t0:163_6: Na hi abhikkhussa āpatti nāma atthi.
tika-vin09t0:163_7: So anāpattikattā apaṇḍakapakkhe āgato kiṃ asaṃvāso hoti,
tika-vin09t0:163_11: asaṃvāso”ti vuttattā yo bhikkhubhāvena methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
tika-vin09t0:163_14: “byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo”ti vuttaṭṭhāne yathā abhikkhunā kammavācāya sāvitāyapi kammaṃ ruhati kammavipattiyā asambhavato,
tika-vin09t0:163_18: saṅgho ca tasmiṃ upasampannasaññī eva ce,
tika-vin09t0:164_0: Gahaṭṭho vā titthiyo vā paṇḍako vā kammavācaṃ sāveti,
tika-vin09t0:164_3: upasampanno saṅghenā”ti hi vacanato saṅghena kammavācāya vattabbatāya saṅghapariyāpannena,
tika-vin09t0:164_4: saṅghapariyāpannasaññitena vā ekena vuttāya saṅghena vuttā hotīti veditabbo,
tika-vin09t0:165_0: Tathā atthi methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto koci nāsetabbo,
tika-vin09t0:165_2: ayaṃ nāsetabbo”ti vuttattā tena eva so anupasampannova sahaseyyāpattiṃ vā aññaṃ vā tādisaṃ janeti,
tika-vin09t0:165_10: kevalaṃ asaṃvāsoti katvā gaṇapūrako na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:165_12: samasikkhatāpi saṃvāsoti katvā so tena saddhiṃ natthīti.
tika-vin09t0:165_14: Yathā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ekakammādino saṃvāsassa abhāvā bhikkhunī asaṃvāsā bhikkhussa,
tika-vin09t0:165_17: Tathā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannopi ekecco “yo nāsetabboti vutto”ti iminā nidassanena sakāraṇacchāyā ajjhupekkhitā hotīti na gahaṇaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:165_20: “mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”ti vacanato ca yo saṅghamajjhaṃ pavisitvā anuvijjakena anuvijjiyamāno parājito,
tika-vin09t0:166_1: Atthi hi puggalo sikkhāpaccakkhātako na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno,
tika-vin09t0:166_3: atthi puggalo sikkhāpaccakkhātako ceva sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno ca,
tika-vin09t0:166_4: atthi puggalo neva sikkhāpaccakkhātako na sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno.
tika-vin09t0:166_6: Sā hi yāva na liṅgaṃ pariccajati,
tika-vin09t0:166_7: kāsāvesu saussāhāva samānā sāmaññā cavitukāmā sikkhaṃ paccakkhantīpi bhikkhunī eva sikkhāsājīvasamāpannāva.
tika-vin09t0:166_16: Sāmaññā cavitukāmā kāsāvesu anālayā kāsāvaṃ vā apaneti,
tika-vin09t0:166_21: liṅgeneva vā saddhiṃ titthiyesu pavisitvā kesaluñcanādivataṃ samādiyati,
tika-vin09t0:166_24: Tattha yā saliṅge ṭhitāva titthiyavataṃ samādiyati,
tika-vin09t0:166_25: sā titthiyapakkantabhikkhu viya pacchā pabbajjampi na labhati.
tika-vin09t0:166_31: sā āgatā na upasampādetabbā”ti vacanato yā paṭhamaṃ vibbhamitvā pacchā titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā,
tika-vin09t0:166_32: sā āgatā upasampādetabbāti anuññātaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin09t0:166_33: Saṅgītiācariyehi pana “catuvīsati pārājikānī”ti vuttattā na puna sā upasampādetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:166_37: Imaṃ nayaṃ catūsupi yojetvā yathārahaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:170_0: Aññatra supinantāti svāyaṃ dubbalavatthukattā cetanāya paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asamatthā,
tika-vin09t0:170_2: Pavatte pana aññehi kusalākusalehi upatthambhitā vipākaṃ deti.
tika-vin09t0:170_4: atha kho avisaye uppannattā abbohārikāva supinantacetanāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:170_5: Yaṃ panettha “supine upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittañhi dubbala”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:170_7: na ca ārammaṇadubbalatāya cittappavatti dubbalā atītānāgatārammaṇāya,
tika-vin09t0:170_9: Tasmā dubbalavatthukattāti dubbalahadayavatthukattāti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin09t0:170_12: Bhāvanābalasamappitañhi cittaṃ arūpampi samānaṃ atibhārampi karajakāyaṃ gahetvā ekacittakkhaṇeneva brahmalokampi pāpetvā ṭhapeti,
tika-vin09t0:170_13: tappaṭibhāgaṃ anappitampi kāmāvacaracittaṃ karajakāyaṃ ākāse laṅghanasamatthaṃ karoti.
tika-vin09t0:170_18: kāyoti tidhā sukkassa ṭhānaṃ pakappenti ācariyā.
tika-vin09t0:170_23: rāgavasena upakkamantassa hotīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin09t0:171_3: nimitte upakkamaṃ katvā sukkaṃ ṭhānā cāvetvā puna vippaṭisāravasena dakasotorohaṇaṃ nivāretuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin09t0:171_4: tathāpi adhivāsādhippāyena adhivāsetvā antarā dakasotato uddhaṃ nivāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya “bahi nikkhante vā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:171_5: tasmā ṭhānā cutañhi avassaṃ dakasotaṃ otaratīti aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:172_1: kasmā imasmiṃ sikkhāpade “yo pana bhikkhū”tiādinā kārako na niddiṭṭhoti? Vuccate –
tika-vin09t0:172_2: adhippāyāpekkhāya bhāvato kārako na niddiṭṭho tassa sāpekkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t0:172_3: Kaṇḍuvanādiadhippāyacetanāvasena cetentassa kaṇḍuvanādiupakkamena upakkamantassa methunarāgavasena ūruādīsu dukkaṭavatthūsu,
tika-vin09t0:172_4: vaṇādīsu thullaccayavatthūsu ca upakkamantassa sukkavisaṭṭhiyā satipi na saṅghādiseso “anāpatti bhikkhu na mocanādhippāyassā”ti vacanato.
tika-vin09t0:172_5: Tasmā tadatthadassanatthaṃ idha kārako na niddiṭṭho.
tika-vin09t0:172_6: Aññathā “yo pana bhikkhu sañcetanikaṃ sukkavisaṭṭhiṃ āpajjeyya,
tika-vin09t0:172_7: saṅghādiseso”ti niddiṭṭhe kārake “ceteti na upakkamati muccati,
tika-vin09t0:172_9: Tathā “sañcetanikāya sukkavisaṭṭhiyā aññatra supinantā saṅghādiseso”ti bhumme niddiṭṭhepi so eva virodho hetvatthaniyamasiddhito.
tika-vin09t0:172_10: Tasmā tadubhayampi vacanakkamaṃ avatvā “sañcetanikā sukkavisaṭṭhi aññatra supinantā saṅghādiseso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:172_11: Tattha nimittatthe bhummavacanābhāvato hetvatthaniyamo na kato hoti.
tika-vin09t0:172_12: Tasmiṃ akate sañcetanikā sukkavisaṭṭhi aññatra supinantā saṅghādisesoti,
tika-vin09t0:172_13: upakkame asati anāpattīti ayamattho dīpito hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:173_0: Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade dve āpattisahassāni honti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t0:173_1: Attano hatthādibhede ajjhattarūpe rāgūpatthambhanavasena aṅgajāte kammaniyappatte ārogyatthāya nīlaṃ mocentassa ekā āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:173_2: ajjhattarūpe eva rāgūpatthambhe pītakādīnaṃ mocanavasena navāti dasa.
tika-vin09t0:173_3: Evaṃ “sukhatthāyā”tiādīnaṃ navannaṃ vasenāti rāgūpatthambhe ajjhattarūpavasena sataṃ.
tika-vin09t0:173_4: Evamevaṃ vaccappassāvavātauccāliṅgapāṇakadaṭṭhūpatthambhesu ca sataṃ sataṃ katvā sabbaṃ pañcasataṃ.
tika-vin09t0:173_6: evaṃ bahiddhārūpe vā ajjhattabahiddhārūpe vā ākāse vā kaṭiṃ kampentoti dve sahassāni āpattiyo hontīti.
tika-vin09t0:176_9: “Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti imināssa vāyamato phassappaṭivijānanā dassitā hoti.
tika-vin09t0:176_10: Vāyamitvā phassaṃ paṭivijānanto hi samāpajjati nāma.
tika-vin09t0:176_12: Atha vā otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena yakkhādinā satto viya.
tika-vin09t0:176_14: otiṇṇo vipariṇataṃ cittaṃ kūpādiṃ viya satto.
tika-vin09t0:176_15: Atha vā “rāgato uttiṇṇo bhavissāmī”ti bhikkhubhāvaṃ upagatopi yo pana bhikkhu tato uttiṇṇādhippāyato
tika-vin09t0:176_16: vipariṇatena cittena hetubhūtena tameva rāgaṃ otiṇṇo.
tika-vin09t0:177_0: Hatthaggāhaṃ vāti ettha hatthena sabbopi upādinnako kāyo saṅgahito,
tika-vin09t0:177_2: Veṇiggahaṇena anupādinnako abhinnasantāno kesalomanakhaggadantaggādiko kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhāno gahitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:177_5: parāmasananti ettha anupādinnakānampi sesalomādīnaṃ aṅgabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:177_6: Evaṃ sante “phassaṃ paṭijānantassa saṅghādiseso”ti iminā virujjhatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:177_11: Tasmā eva idha phassappaṭivijānanaṃ aṅgantveva na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:177_12: Tasmiñhi vutte ṭhānametaṃ vijjati “na ca me lomaghaṭṭanena kāyaviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:177_15: tattha ‘veṇiṃ gaṇhissāmī’ti kahāpaṇamālādiṃ eva gaṇhāti, na lomaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:180_0: “Kadā te mātā pasīdissatī”ti āyācanaṃ duṭṭhullavācāya sikhāpattalakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:180_6: kathaṃ ‘animittāsī’tiādīni padāni na saṅghādisesaṃ janentī”ti eke,
tika-vin09t0:180_8: “Methunupasaṃhitāhi saṅghādiseso”ti mātikāyaṃ lakkhaṇassa vuttattā ca methunupasaṃhitāhi obhāsane paṭivijānantiyā saṅghādiseso,
tika-vin09t0:180_17: Tasmā rāgavaseneva pavatto akkoso idha adhippeto.
tika-vin09t0:183_3: tassa aggadānaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ dehī”ti pariyāyavacanepi dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:183_5: yā mādisaṃ sīlavanta”nti ca vuttattāti eke.
tika-vin09t0:183_8: “Imasmiṃ sikkhāpadadvaye kāyasaṃsagge viya yakkhipetīsupi duṭṭhullattakaāmavacane thullaccayanti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:186_4: āpatti saṅghādisesassā”ti vuttattā yassa ekantena saṅghādiseso hoti,
tika-vin09t0:186_5: tassa paṭiggaṇhanavīmaṃsanapayogā ete dukkaṭathullaccayā natthīti vadantīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:186_7: na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā.
tika-vin09t0:186_9: na yakkho na peto na tiracchānagato”ti pāḷi natthi,
tika-vin09t0:186_10: tathāpi kāyasaṃsaggādīsu “mātugāmo nāma manussitthī”ti itthivavatthānassa katattā idhāpi manussitthī evāti paññāyati.
tika-vin09t0:189_2: taṃ kathetuṃ labhati pucchitapaññattā bhikkhācāravatteti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:189_9: so tattha ito ca na sañcarati,
tika-vin09t0:189_11: Akuṭiyā pana vatthudesanākiccaṃ natthi ullittāvalittaṃ kātuṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:189_15: Yasmā mattikāmayabhittiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā upari ullittaṃ vā avalittaṃ vā ubhayaṃ vā bhittiyā ghaṭitaṃ karontassa āpatti eva vināpi bhittilepenā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:189_19: ahampi vasissāmī”ti vā “bhikkhūhi vā sāmaṇerehi vā ekato vasissāmī”ti vā karontassa vaṭṭati eva. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:190_0: Idaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ catutthapārājikaṃ viya nidānāpekkhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:190_1: Na hi vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū sayameva attano asantaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ musāvādalakkhaṇaṃ pāpetvā bhāsiṃsu.
tika-vin09t0:190_4: tattakena pana lesena bhagavā taṃ vatthuṃ nidānaṃ katvā pārājikaṃ paññapesi,
tika-vin09t0:190_6: Na hi nidāne “adesitavatthukāyo sārambhāyo aparikkamanāyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:190_8: Tattha sārambhe aparikkamane saṅghādisesappasaṅgaṃ viya dissamānaṃ “vibhaṅgo taṃniyamako”ti vuttattā vibhaṅge na nivāreti.
tika-vin09t0:191_2: nanu vibhaṅge eva vattabbaṃ siyāti? Evametaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:191_6: Itarañhi “sārambhe ce bhikkhu vatthusmiṃ aparikkamane”ti evaṃ anuppasaṅgavasena āgatattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:191_7: Yasmā vatthu nāma atthi sārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:191_11: tasmā bahuvidhattā vatthu desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:191_17: attadukkhaparadukkhahetubhūto ca sārambhabhāvoti ete vatthudesanāpadesena upāyena parivajjitā honti.
tika-vin09t0:191_18: Na hi bhikkhū akappiyakuṭikaraṇatthaṃ gihīnaṃ vā pīḷānimittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:195_0: Vajjitā honti yaṃ tasmā, sārambhādi jahāpita”nti.
tika-vin09t0:198_4: “Āyasmā channo cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpesī”ti āgatattā idampi nidānāpekkhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:201_1: ‘ghaṭiteyeva sīsaṃ etī’ti vuttattā antimavatthuajjhāpannakaṃ vandituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:201_5: “pacchā upasampannena pure upasampanno vandiyo”ti vuttattā ca,
tika-vin09t0:201_6: tasmā eva imissaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ “upasampannoti saṅkhyupagamana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:201_8: avandanto sāmīcippaṭikkhepasaṅkhātāya codanāya codeti nāmāti dassanatthaṃ vuttanti.
tika-vin09t0:201_9: Tasmā eva “ettāvatā ca codanā nāma hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:201_10: Idha adhippetaṃ āpattiāpajjanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “‘kasmā mama vandanādīni na karosī’tiādi vutta”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:202_11: kārato yāva ayaṃ sabbapacchimo ṭi- kāro,
tika-vin09t0:202_13: Uposathe pana iminānusārena viseso veditabbo “kareyyā”ti re-
tika-vin09t0:205_0: Aññabhāgo vā assa atthīti yathā suvaṇṇassedaṃ sovaṇṇamityatra suvaṇṇavā anena suvaṇṇo ityuccate.
tika-vin09t0:205_11: tasmā “kiñcidesaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāyā”ti padaṃ uddharitvā “dasa lesā jātileso”tiādi padabhājane vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:206_0: Aṭṭhuppattivaseneva āvibhūtanti ettha kiñca bhiyyo aniyamattā.
tika-vin09t0:206_1: Na hi mettiyabhūmajakānaṃ viya aññesaṃ sabbesampi “chagalakamevettha aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:206_3: na ca mettiyabhūmajakā viya sabbepi nāmalesamattameva upādiyanti,
tika-vin09t0:206_6: Kiñca bhiyyo tathāvutte chagalakasseva aññabhāgiyatā sambhavati,
tika-vin09t0:206_11: yena sova dassitoti evaṃ micchāgāhappasaṅgatoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:206_13: saññinopīti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade ca amūlakasikkhāpade cāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:211_1: karotīti ettha “ime cattāro”ti vā “imañca imañcā”ti vā vatvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:214_0: Dukkhena vattabbo dubbaco. Vuccamāno na sahati.
tika-vin09t0:217_3: “ayaṃ kiriyā bhikkhūnaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti jānitvā sace chādeti,
tika-vin09t0:218_0: Vatthu ceva gottañcāti ettha vatthūti vītikkamanaṃ asucimuccanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:218_2: sajātito aññattha gantuṃ adatvā gaṃ buddhiṃ,
tika-vin09t0:218_7: Nāmañceva āpatti cāti ettha āpattīti vītikkamenāpannāpattiyā nāmaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:219_0: Puna āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocentenāti ettha dvinnaṃ ārocentena “āyasmantā dhārentu”tiṇṇaṃ vā atirekānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:219_1: vā ārocentena “āyasmanto dhārentū”ti evaṃ ārocanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:219_2: Vattabhedañca ratticchedañca akatvāti ettha ṭhapetvā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ avasesānaṃ antamaso mūlāyapaṭikassanārahādīnampi abhivādanādisādiyane,
tika-vin09t0:219_5: Dassanasavanavisayesu anārocane ca bhikkhūhi ekacchanne vasane ca ajānantasseva vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ āgantvā gamane cātiādīsu ratticchedo hoti.
tika-vin09t0:219_6: Nānāsaṃvāsakehi vinayakammābhāvato tesaṃ anārocane ratticchedo na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:219_7: “Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”ti vacanato anto na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:219_8: Nikkhittavatteneva hutvā vicarantena yassa santike pubbe samādiyitvā ārocitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:219_9: tassāpi santike pacchā nikkhipanakāle ārocetvāva nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:219_10: Tasmā puna samādānakālepi so ce tato gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:219_11: taṃ divasaṃ agantvā divā ārocetvāpi yadi evaṃ atītadivasaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:219_12: “aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa santike ārocetvā vattaṃ nikkhipitvā vihāraṃ gantabbanti tassa santike ārocetvā vattaṃ nikkhipitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:219_13: Apica “vihāraṃ gantvā yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati,
tika-vin09t0:219_17: “Tassa ārocetvā”ti idaṃ pana pubbe anārocitaṃ sandhāya vattabhedarakkhaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:219_18: Tasmā eva samantapāsādikāyaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ “aññaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ vā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:220_1: parivasanto puna ūnaṃ vā adhikaṃ vā sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:221_3: mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ akatvā pubbe gahitaparivāseneva parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:221_4: Yo pana āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vibbhamitvā puna upasampanno hutvāpi paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin09t0:221_5: yo ca pubbe paṭicchādetvā pacchā na paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin09t0:221_8: “Purimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe vā”ti ca “pacchimasmiṃ āpattikkhandhe vā”ti ca pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā dve bhikkhū visuddhikaṃ āpannā honti,
tika-vin09t0:221_14: “Ubhopi yathādhammaṃ kārāpetabbā”ti vacanato yaṃ kañci āpattiṃ chādetvā dukkaṭaṃ āpajjatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:222_0: Tesu gatesu vā agatesu vā purimanayeneva paṭipajjitabbanti ettha ūne gaṇe caraṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:222_3: sace so pure aruṇameva kenaci karaṇīyena gatoti etthapi mānattepi evaṃ jāte.
tika-vin09t0:222_6: tenassa ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso vā vippavāso vā na hotī”ti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:222_7: Tasmā tena ārocite muhuttampi nisīditvā gatepi vippavāso natthi.
tika-vin09t0:222_9: ukkhittakassa ca pakatattena tasmiṃ vasanaṃ udakapātena vāritaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:223_5: Aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vāti tesaṃ dvidhā bhinnānampi vuṭṭhānakkamabhedābhāvadīpakavacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:223_9: Tena bhikkhunā akāmā parivatthabbanti tena bhikkhunā vasatā akāmā parivatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:223_11: Parivutthaparivāsenāti ādimhi parivutthaparivāseneva parivāsato uttari itivārena ādito bhikkhunāva chārattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:223_16: pakkhamānattañca carantiyā bhikkhuniyā liṅgaṃ parivattātikkame sati ciṇṇamānatto bhikkhu hoti,
tika-vin09t0:223_17: puna bhikkhumānattaṃ gahetvā ciṇṇamānattova bhikkhu abbhetabboti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:224_0: Yattha siyāti yassaṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyampi vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho atthi.
tika-vin09t0:224_1: Ekenapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇoti na yujjati, ūno ce.
tika-vin09t0:224_4: Tasmā “ekenapi ce ūno saṅgho”ti ettakameva vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:224_6: Tasmā vīsativaggo bhikkhusaṅgho ce bhikkhunā ekenapi ūno,
tika-vin09t0:224_8: Keci pana vinaye appakataññuno “yathā atirekacatuvaggopi saṅgho catuvaggakaraṇīye kamme ‘catuvaggo’ti vuccati,
tika-vin09t0:224_14: taṃ ṭhapetvā ekenapi ceti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:224_15: Ayaṃ tattha sāmīcīti vacanaṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ sabbattha “tassa āpattiyā parivāsaṃ deti,
tika-vin09t0:224_20: Tena tesu ayaṃ yathāvuttā sāmīci niyatā icchitabbā,
tika-vin09t0:224_22: Tattha hi kenaci antarāyena taṃ sāmīcimakarontepi anāpattīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:228_2: idaṃ aniyatakaṇḍaṃ nippayojanaṃ tattha apubbābhāvatoti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:228_4: Ettha hi “sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyo mayā…pe…
tika-vin09t0:228_16: Tasmā garukalahukānaṃ majjhe eva uddisitabbataṃ arahati ubhayamissakattā.
tika-vin09t0:228_20: Tasmā garukānaṃ eva anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhantipi eke.
tika-vin09t0:228_24: “Paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye”ti okāsaniyamato hi tabbiparīte okāse idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ na vikappitanti micchāgāho hoti.
tika-vin09t0:228_30: Dvinnaṃ rahonisajjasikkhāpadānaṃ nānāttajānanañca siyā tathā kāyasaṃsaggabhedadīpanato.
tika-vin09t0:228_32: paṭicchannepi vā nisinnāya vātapānakavāṭacchiddādīhi nikkhantakesādiggahaṇena kāyasaṃsaggo labbhatīti evamādayopi nayā vitthārato veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:229_2: Paṭicchannampi hi ekaccaṃ nālaṃkammaniyaṃ vātapānādinā antaritattā,
tika-vin09t0:229_4: Rahobhedadīpanatoti ettha rahabhāvasāmaññepi raho dvidhā paṭicchannāpaṭicchannabhedatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:229_6: duṭṭhullassādavasena nisajjāti tādisassa bhedassa dīpanatoti attho.
tika-vin09t0:229_7: “Idha āgatanayattā bhikkhunipātimokkhe idaṃ kaṇḍaṃ parihīnanti veditabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:229_17: kāyaṃ vā tadatthāya upasaṃhareyyā”ti vacanato sādiyanampi,
tika-vin09t0:229_22: paṭicchanne okāse ajjhokāse ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā”ti vacanato duṭṭhullavācāpi pācittiyavatthukanti
tika-vin09t0:229_23: katvā tāsaṃ aññathā aniyatakaṇḍassa avattabbatāpattito na vuttanti tesaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:230_0: “Desanāvuṭṭhānagāminīnaṃ āpattīnaṃ vasena alajjiādayo lajjīnaṃ codessantī”ti āgatattā lajjipaggahatthāya
tika-vin09t0:230_1: patirūpāyapi upāsikāya vacanena akatvā bhikkhusseva paṭiññāya kātabbanti āpattiyo pana lakkhaṇadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:230_2: paññattaṃ vitthāranayameva gahetvā vattuṃ yuttaṃ “ime kho panāyasmanto dve aniyatā dhammā”ti uddesadassanattāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:230_3: Sotassa rahoti ettha rahoti vacanasāmaññato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:230_5: Tasmā “cakkhusseva pana raho ‘raho’ti idha adhippeto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:230_8: antamaso tadahujātāpi dārikā”ti vuttattā duṭṭhullobhāsanaṃ idha nādhippetanti dīpitamevāti.
tika-vin09t0:230_10: saddena apihitakavāṭassa gabbhassa dvāre nisinnopīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:230_11: Acelakavagge rahopaṭicchannāsanasikkhāpade “yo koci viññū puriso dutiyo hotī”ti imassa anurūpato “itthīnaṃ
tika-vin09t0:230_12: pana satampi anāpattiṃ na karotiyevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:230_13: “Alaṃkammaniyeti sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti vibhaṅge vacanato rahonisajjassādo cettha methunadhammasannissitakileso,
tika-vin09t0:230_15: Tasmā ca paññāyati sotassa raho nādhippetoti.
tika-vin09t0:231_0: Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena vadeyyāti rahonisajjasikkhāpadavasena nisinnassa tassānusārena pācittiyameva
tika-vin09t0:231_2: Puna āpattippaṭijānanaṃ avatvā kasmā “nisajjaṃ bhikkhu paṭijānamāno”ti vatthuppaṭijānanaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate –
tika-vin09t0:231_3: āpattiyā codite vinayadharena “kismiṃ vatthusmi”nti pucchite cuditakena “imasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti vutte
tika-vin09t0:231_4: vinayadharena “īdisaṃ nāma akāsī”ti pucchite so vatthuṃ paṭijānamānova kāretabboti dassanatthaṃ “nisajjaṃ
tika-vin09t0:231_6: Yadi evaṃ nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānopi āpattiyāva kāretabboti?
tika-vin09t0:231_9: tiṇṇampi āpattīnaṃ vatthūni aggahetvā idha sikkhāpadavasena nisajjameva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:231_10: Tasmiṃ gahitepi hi āpatti gahitāva hotīti.
tika-vin09t0:231_12: saddo “tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo vā”ti yojetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:231_17: Rahonisajjasikkhāpadavasena nisajjapaccayā āpattiyā vuttattā sesesupi sesasikkhāpadavasena āpatti gahetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:231_18: “Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamapārājikasadisānevā”ti vuttattā idha duṭṭhullobhāsanassa anadhippetabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:234_5: Ettha ca kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhānaṃ kathanti ce?
tika-vin09t0:247_2: puggalassa atthārā saṅghassa atthataṃ hoti kathina”nti vacanato tesaṃyeva anumodanādidhammānaṃ saṅgaho kathinaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:247_3: Yathāha “kathinaṃ jānitabbanti tesaññeva dhammānaṃ saṅgaho samavāyo nāmaṃ nāmakamma”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:247_4: Tasmā kathinanti idaṃ bahūsu dhammesu nāmamattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:247_8: Yathā cāha “atthāro ekena dhammena saṅgahito vacībhedenā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:247_15: Cīvarasamayo nāma anatthate kathine ayaṃ kattikamāso,
tika-vin09t0:247_16: atthate cattāro hemantikā cāti pañca māsā.
tika-vin09t0:248_1: Tā sabbāpi atthārena ekato uppajjanti nāma.
tika-vin09t0:248_3: Tattha kathinatthārena ekuppādā ekanirodhā antarubbhāro sahubbhāro,
tika-vin09t0:248_9: Tesu hi uddhārabhāvaṃ pattesupi atthāro tiṭṭhati evāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ atthavibhāvanā.
tika-vin09t0:248_10: Sace atthate kathine bhikkhusmiṃ sāpekkhe tamhā āvāsā pakkamante saṅgho antarubbhāraṃ karoti,
