tika-vin09t0:248_11: tassa bhikkhuno paṭhamameva mūlāvāse niṭṭhitacīvarapalibodhābhāvepi sati antarubbhāre palibodho chijjati satipi sāpekkhatāya saussāhattā.
tika-vin09t0:248_12: Iminā pariyāyena pakkamanantiko kathinuddhāro atthārena ekuppādo nānānirodho hoti.
tika-vin09t0:248_13: Tathā antarubbhāre sati suṇantassāpi yāva cīvaraniṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:249_0: Tattha antarubbhārasahubbhārā dve antosīmāyaṃ eva sambhavanti,
tika-vin09t0:250_3: tasmā ubhayapalibodhābhāvadīpanatthaṃ tadeva vattabbanti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:250_5: Kāmañcetaṃ tasmā “ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti kesañci kathinuddhārānaṃ nānānirodhattā,
tika-vin09t0:250_6: saṅghapuggalādhīnānadhīnattā ca antobahiubhayasīmāsu niyamāniyamato ca ubbhatasmiṃ kathine saṅghassa,
tika-vin09t0:251_1: saṅghassa antarubbhārena ubbhatasmiṃ kathine acchinnacīvarapalibodho bahisīmāgato pacchā gantvā attano
tika-vin09t0:251_2: sīmāgato aniṭṭhitacīvaro ānisaṃsaṃ labhati evāti katvā “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:251_3: Tattha āvāsapalibodho nāma vasati vā tasmiṃ āvāse,
tika-vin09t0:251_8: Tattha anatthatakathinānaṃ cīvarakālasamaye niyamato cattāro ānisaṃsā labbhanti,
tika-vin09t0:251_12: “Cīvarakālasamayo nāma anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso”ti vacanato anatthatakathinānaṃ tasmiṃ māse yāvadatthacīvaraṃ siddhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:251_13: tathā tatiyakathinasikkhāpade akālacīvaraṃ nāma piṭṭhisamayato paṭṭhāya taṃ paṭiggahetvā saṅghato labhitabbaṃ ce,
tika-vin09t0:251_16: vassānassa chaṭṭhapakkhassa pañcamito paṭṭhāya yāva cīvarakālasamayaṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ avikappitaṃ vaṭṭati accekacīvarasikkhāpadena anuññātattā,
tika-vin09t0:252_2: Vassānassa hi antonivāraṇatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāya “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:252_5: Tena cīvarakālato pure vā anto vā uppannaṃ cīvarakālato uddhaṃ ekadivasampi parihāraṃ na labhati.
tika-vin09t0:252_11: Vassāvāsikabhāvena saṅghato laddhaṃ vuṭṭhavassattā attano santakabhūtaṃ accekacīvaraṃ cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmayato eva āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:252_13: “Anatthate kathine ekādasamāse uppanna”nti vacanato yo ca tattha cīvaruppādo,
tika-vin09t0:252_17: etaṃ akālacīvara”nti vacanato ādissa dinnacīvaraṃ parihāraṃ na labhati.
tika-vin09t0:253_11: Tattha ādissa dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghikaṃ bhājitabbacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:253_13: Saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbanti vassāvāsikacīvaraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:253_18: Tattha saṅghe pariṇataṃ accekacīvaraṃ vassūpanāyikadivasato paṭṭhāya,
tika-vin09t0:253_19: piṭṭhisamayato paṭṭhāya vā yāva pavāraṇā nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati eva saṅghikattā,
tika-vin09t0:254_2: Yena “virodho”ti vacanaṃ dasseyyāti na vinaye visesahetu pariyesitabbo.
tika-vin09t0:254_4: yadi evaṃ ettha attano santakabhūtampi accekacīvaraṃ saññāṇaṃ katvā nikkhipitabbameva,
tika-vin09t0:254_5: na adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ na vikappetabbaṃ na vissajjetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:254_7: antosamaye adhiṭṭheti vikappeti vissajjetī”tiādivacanavirodho adhivāsetabbo siyā.
tika-vin09t0:254_8: Tathā “vassānassa pacchime māse kathinuddhāre kate tasmiṃ māse atthate kathine kathinuddhāradivasaṃ atikkāmeti,
tika-vin09t0:254_9: nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti vacanato nissaggiyaṃ hotīti ayampi atthavirodho adhivāsetabbo siyā.
tika-vin09t0:254_13: itaraṃ ce anāpattiyevāti imassa atthassa ayaṃ bhagavato visesahetu.
tika-vin09t0:254_14: Tathā atirekadasāhānāgatāyeva kattikapuṇṇamāya saṅghassa vassāvāsikatthaṃ accekacīvaraṃ viya dadamānaṃ na gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:254_17: Tattha “adhiṭṭhitato paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ accekacīvaraṃ na hotī”ti vatvā aññathā nayo dassito.
tika-vin09t0:254_18: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade so ca nayo saṅghikaṃ upādāya vuttattā na virujjhatīti neva so ca paṭikkhitto.
tika-vin09t0:254_19: Yathā anaccekacīvaraṃ chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ atirekadasāhānāgatāyapi paṭiggahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:254_20: paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmayatopi anāpattīti ayampi nayo adhivāsetabbo siyā.
tika-vin09t0:254_24: taṃ dve dasāhe labhatīti ettako visesahetu.
tika-vin09t0:255_0: Antarā anāpattikkhettacīvarakālappaviṭṭhattā adhiṭṭhahitvā paccuddhaṭaṃ viya taṃ punapi dasāhe labhatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:255_1: kālappaveso adhiṭṭhānaṃ viya hotīti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:255_4: tato paraṃ dasāhaṃ avikappentassāpi anāpatti siyā.
tika-vin09t0:255_5: Apica yaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vassikasāṭikā antovasse laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca,
tika-vin09t0:255_12: Ettāvatā yathāvutto atthavikappo pāḷinayeneva patiṭṭhāpito hoti.
tika-vin09t0:256_0: Apicettha yaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbā”ti,
tika-vin09t0:256_3: taṃ accekacīvaraṃ akālacīvaramiva cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbanti siddhametaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:256_6: evaṃ uppannaṃ accekacīvaraṃ accekacīvarameva na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:256_7: Na hi taṃ kālavisesavasena accekacīvarasaṅkhaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:256_8: Vuttañhetaṃ “accekacīvaraṃ nāma senāya vā gantukāmo hoti,
tika-vin09t0:256_17: Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dasāhe appahonte cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:256_18: Apica yadi evaṃ taṃ accekacīvarasikkhāpadameva accekacīvaraṃ cīvarakālaṃ nātikkāmetabbanti imassa pana
tika-vin09t0:257_2: aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapitanti atthavisesadīpanapayojanato.
tika-vin09t0:257_3: Tasmā taṃ tassa atthavisesadassanatthaṃ vuttanti siddhameva.
tika-vin09t0:257_4: Tasmāpi veditabbameva yaṃ kiñci cīvaraṃ cīvarakālasamayaṃ nātikkāmetabbanti.
tika-vin09t0:257_5: Apica yaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “chaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pana uppannaṃ anaccekacīvarampi paccuddhāretvā ṭhapitacīvarampi etaṃ parihāraṃ labhatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:258_2: Evaṃ tāva pakiṇṇakāya adhikathā parato pāṭhato vitthāritā hotīti apakiṇṇakaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:259_3: taṃ idha natthīti dassetuṃ “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:259_5: Kathinatthārārahassāti ettha “aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ –
tika-vin09t0:259_13: ānisaṃsaṃ jānātī”ti vacanato imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgato puggalo kathinatthārāraho nāma.
tika-vin09t0:260_0: “Cīvaraṃ nāma khoma”ntiādinā pāḷivasena jātiñca pamāṇañca dassetvā idāni atirekacīvaraṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ pana vuttaṃ adhiṭṭhitavikappitesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:260_1: Ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā”ti vuttepi yasmiṃ ṭhāne yaṃ ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:260_2: tasmiṃ taṃ pacchā hotu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin09t0:261_0: Antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa bhikkhubhāvapariccāgavasena setavatthanivāsanaṃ vā kāsāvacajanaṃ vā hīnāyāvattanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:262_0: Ekādasame aruṇuggamaneti antimaṃ ṭhapetvā tato purimatarasminti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:262_3: Idha “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā”ti karaṇavacanaṃ nidānānapekkhaṃ nidāne karaṇābhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:262_7: ticīvaraṃ adhiṭṭhātuṃ na vikappetu”ntiādi vacanato ca idha “vikappetī”ti avisesena vuttavacanaṃ viruddhaṃ viya dissati,
tika-vin09t0:262_14: Evañca pana sati yo ticīvare ekena cīvarena vippavasitukāmo hoti,
tika-vin09t0:262_15: tassa ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ paccuddharitvā vippavāsasukhatthaṃ vikappanāya okāso dinno hoti,
tika-vin09t0:262_17: Etena upāyena sabbattha vikappanāya apaṭisiddhabhāvo veditabboti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:263_2: atthate kathine gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya uppannacīvaraṃ sandhāya “niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Etthāha –
tika-vin09t0:263_3: “rajakehi dhovāpetvā setakaṃ kārāpentassāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānamevā”ti vacanato arajitepi adhiṭṭhānaṃ ruhatīti.
tika-vin09t0:263_4: Tena sūcikammaṃ katvā rajitvā kappabinduṃ datvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti niyamo kātabbo,
tika-vin09t0:263_7: Patto viya adhiṭṭhito yathā puna setabhāvaṃ vā tambabhāvaṃ vā patto adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahati,
tika-vin09t0:263_8: na ca pana tādiso yaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ upagacchati,
tika-vin09t0:263_10: “Sve kathinaṃ uddharissatī”ti laddhacīvaraṃ sace ajjeva na adhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin09t0:263_14: kathinato pana pacchā ekadivasampi na labhati.
tika-vin09t0:263_16: yathā atthatakathino saṅgho ticīvaraṃ atthatadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva ubbhārā ānisaṃsaṃ labhati,
tika-vin09t0:263_18: evaṃ atthatadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva ubbhārā labhati,
tika-vin09t0:263_19: uddhate pana kathine ekadivasampi na labhati. Etthāha –
tika-vin09t0:263_20: ubbhatadivasato paṭṭhāya puna dasāhaṃ labhatīti? Na, kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:263_28: Atha vā vassikasāṭikā anatirittappamāṇā nāmaṃ gahetvā vuttanayeneva cattāro vassike māse adhiṭṭhātabbā,
tika-vin09t0:263_30: Ettha “paccuddharitvā”ti vacane uposathadivase eva paccuddharitvā vikappetvā ṭhapitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:263_31: tato paraṃ hemantassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya paccuddharaṇābhāvā.
tika-vin09t0:266_0: “Atthatakathinassa pañca māse baddhasīmāyaṃ yattha katthaci cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā pakkamantassa anāpattī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:266_1: “Abaddhasīmāyapi vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ abaddhasīmāyaṃ kathinatthārañca āraññakasikkhāpadañca sādhetīti likhitaṃ. Idāni –
tika-vin09t0:270_3: na ruhatī”ti vatvā upasampadāpekkhānampi diguṇaṃyeva saṅghāṭiṃ datvā upasampādenti,
tika-vin09t0:270_8: Tato “aññatarassa bhikkhuno ticīvare kariyamāne sabbaṃ chinnakaṃ nappahoti.
tika-vin09t0:270_10: dve achinnakāni ekaṃ chinnakaṃ nappahotī”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “anujānāmi,
tika-vin09t0:270_23: “chinnakaṃ diguṇaṃ nappahotī”ti vacanābhāvato cāti sanniṭṭhānamettha gantabbanti.
tika-vin09t0:271_1: tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānābhāvato “adhiṭṭhitenevā”ti vattabbaṃ hotūti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:271_7: Yasmā pana bhikkhūnaṃ eva bhagavatā adhiṭṭhānavasena nava cīvarāni anuññātāni,
tika-vin09t0:271_10: tasmā nesaṃ cīvaraniyamābhāvā na taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ anuññātaṃ gahaṭṭhānaṃ viya.
tika-vin09t0:271_11: Tasmā tassa samādānavidhāne avacanato ca sanniṭṭhānamettha gantabbanti.
tika-vin09t0:272_0: Sāsaṅkasammatoti kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ sāsaṅkasikkhāpade visuṃ aṅgāni na vuttāni,
tika-vin09t0:272_6: Tasmā aṅgasāmaññato ca sammutisāmaññato ca sāsaṅkasikkhāpadamevidanti idaṃ nippadesaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:272_8: Tattha bahigāmepi gāmasīmaṃ okkamitvā vasitvā pakkamantassa anāpatti,
tika-vin09t0:272_11: tattha sattameti ayaṃ imesaṃ dvinnaṃ viseso.
tika-vin09t0:272_13: idha vuttanayena ca siddhattā na vuttāni.
tika-vin09t0:272_22: Evaṃ santepi tattha yathāvuttaaṅgasampattiyā sati tattha vuttanayeneva nissajjitabbaṃ. Hemante,
tika-vin09t0:272_24: Idha vuttanayenāpi nissajjituṃ vaṭṭatīti ñāpanatthaṃ catutthamaṅgaṃ na visesitanti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin09t0:273_7: Tathā hi “cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamantī”ti evamādīsu ticīvarameva, “na,
tika-vin09t0:273_10: santaruttaraparamaṃ tato cīvaraṃ sāditabba”nti evamādīsu yaṃ kiñci,
tika-vin09t0:273_13: saṅghāṭi dātabbā, handa te, āvuso, saṅghāṭi,
tika-vin09t0:273_18: taṃ sabbaṃ kariyamānaṃ kadā niṭṭhānaṃ gacchissati,
tika-vin09t0:274_1: udositasikkhāpadassa nippayojanabhāvappasaṅgato ticīvaravippavāse tecīvarassa āpattīti eke.
tika-vin09t0:274_2: Tatthetaṃ vuccati na hoti āpatti paccuddhārādisiddhito.
tika-vin09t0:274_5: antoaruṇe vissajjentassa ca yāva añño nādhiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin09t0:274_7: Aññathā sattabbhantarena vippavāsassāti vippavāsato yathārutaṃyeva sati vippavāse vippavāsato,
tika-vin09t0:277_0: Aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānassa dubbijānattā taṃ dassetuṃ “apica bhikkhūna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:277_1: Vihārapariyante niviṭṭhadhuvasannipātaṭṭhānato vā pariyante ṭhitabhojanasālato vā nibaddhavasanakaāvāsato vāti evaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:277_2: Sace vihāre sannipatitabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekābaddhā hutvā yojanasatampi pūretvā nisīdanti,
tika-vin09t0:277_5: tāsaṃ visuṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmattāti ca samānasaṃvāsakaavippavāsasīmānaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:277_6: “Avippavāsasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ pana gāme ṭhitānaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:277_8: “Samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyā”ti dinnaṃ pana yasmiṃ ṭhāne avippavāsasīmā atthi,
tika-vin09t0:277_11: “khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā ‘sīmaṭṭhakasaṅgho gaṇhātū’ti vutte upacārasīmāya eva paricchinditvā dātabba”nti ca,
tika-vin09t0:277_12: “tesaṃ bahisīmaṭṭhānampi pāpuṇāti yāva kathinassubbhārāti attho”ti ca,
tika-vin09t0:277_13: “anatthate pana kathine antohemante sace vihāraṃ pavisitvā ‘vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa dammī’ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:277_19: tāva vassāvāsikaṃ demā’ti vutte kathinaṃ atthataṃ vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:277_24: pacchimavassaṃvuṭṭhā cattāro māse labhantīti vinicchayo”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:278_0: “Yehi mayhaṃ yāgu pītāti yehi nimantitehi mayhaṃ yāgu pītāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:278_3: Aññathā ‘yehi mayhaṃ yāgu pītā’ti vutte nimantitā vā hontu,
tika-vin09t0:278_7: Ettha “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine”ti vadanto ñāpeti etthantare tiṇṇampi akālacīvarānaṃ uppattiabhāvanti.
tika-vin09t0:278_9: idaṃ pana sikkhāpadaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya na vuttaṃ kintu paṭhamasikkhāpade dasāhaparamaṃ anujānitvā tasmiṃ appahonte sace paccāsā atthi,
tika-vin09t0:278_10: tameva vaḍḍhetvā māsamanujānanto imampi atthavisesaṃ dīpeti.
tika-vin09t0:278_12: Taṃ pana “ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabba”nti iminā sikkhāpadena vaḍḍhetvā vuttanti.
tika-vin09t0:279_0: “Khippameva kāretabbanti sīghaṃ antodasāheyeva kāretabba”nti idaṃ pana pahonakabhāve purimasikkhāpadalakkhaṇenāti dīpetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:279_1: Tasmā evaṃ “sīgha”nti vā “lahu”nti vā ādinā avatvāpi “dasāhā”ti vuttanti.
tika-vin09t0:279_3: anatthate pana kathine kathanti vutte anatthatassa paṭikkhepataṃ dassetīti vutto apassanto vighātaṃ āpajjatīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:282_0: “Sākiyāniyo viya suddhabhikkhusaṅghe vā”ti idaṃ “bhikkhunī nāma ubhatosaṅghe upasampannā”ti iminā virujjhatīti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:282_2: Bhikkhūnaṃ santike upasampadāya paṭikkhittattā tadanuppasaṅgabhayā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:283_7: Vuttañhetaṃ “purāṇacīvaraṃ nāma sakiṃ nivatthampi sakiṃ pārutampī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:286_3: bhikkhunā ca tato bhikkhunito aggahitattā ca.
tika-vin09t0:289_0: Ñātakappavārite vā viññāpentassāti ettha ca saṅghavasena pavāritesu pamāṇameva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:292_0: Pakatiyā santaruttarena carati kathinapalibodhavasena vā sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena vā.
tika-vin09t0:292_3: dussavāṇijjaṃ vā”tiādinā ujjhāyantānaṃ sutvā bhagavāpi chabbaggiye bhikkhū “kathañhi nāma tumhe moghapurisā
tika-vin09t0:292_4: na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ cīvaraṃ viññāpessathā”ti vatvā sikkhāpadassa paññattattā ca imissaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:292_6: samantapāsādikāyaṃ “na hi anacchinnacīvarā attano atthāya sākhāpalāsaṃ bhañjituṃ labhanti,
tika-vin09t0:292_7: acchinnacīvarānaṃ pana atthāya labhantī”ti vuttattā ca aññassatthāya pamāṇaṃ viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ce? Na, kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:292_10: Pāḷiyaṃ “aññassatthāyā”ti imissā anāpattipāḷiyā aññassatthāya viññāpento tassa ñātakappavārite eva viññāpeti,
tika-vin09t0:292_12: Tasmā bhagavāpi “bahuṃ cīvaraṃ viññāpessathā”ti vigarahitvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpento “abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyyā”ti vuttanayeneva pamāṇato gahaṇaṃ anujāni,
tika-vin09t0:292_14: Yasmā panimaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ aññassatthāya viññāpanavatthusmiṃyeva paññattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:293_2: Taṃ “anāpatti ñātakānaṃ pavāritāna”nti vuttaanāpattipāḷiyā na sametīti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttattā idhāpi
tika-vin09t0:293_3: vuttanayeneva ñātakappavārite viññāpentassa attano dhanena gaṇhantassa anāpattīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:293_5: tathāpi anantare vuttanayeneva labbhati evāti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:296_0: Paṭhamaupakkhaṭe “pubbe appavārito”ti vacanato tasmiṃ khaṇe pavāritopi appavāritova hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:299_2: kevalaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena pana paññattaṃ bhikkhuniyā rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ viya.
tika-vin09t0:299_3: Evaṃ sante saṅgītikārakehi saṅgītiṃ anāropetabbaṃ bhaveyya vināpi tena tadatthasiddhito,
tika-vin09t0:299_10: Na hi buddhā appayojanaṃ vacanaṃ nicchārenti,
tika-vin09t0:299_18: Tato āha “kevalaṃ tattha ekassa pīḷā katā,
tika-vin09t0:299_21: Iminā atthavisesena ko panañño atirekattho dassitoti?
tika-vin09t0:299_22: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade tāva vuttaṃ “ekasmimpi vatthusmiṃ ubhinnampi pīḷā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ayamatirekattho dassito”ti.
tika-vin09t0:299_23: Tenetaṃ dīpeti “na kevalaṃ paṭiladdhacīvaragaṇanāya eva āpattigaṇanā,
tika-vin09t0:305_0: Apicetaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ taṃjātikesu sikkhāpadesu sabbesupi gahetabbavinicchayassa dassanappayojananti veditabbaṃ. Āha ca –
tika-vin09t0:310_5: bahūnaṃ vā sādhāraṇaṃ ekameva cīvaraṃ aññatra pārivattakā paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:310_9: Tathā aññesupi evarūpesu sikkhāpadesu nayo netabbo.
tika-vin09t0:311_3: Atha ñātikā paṭhamaṃ thokaṃ dhovitvā ṭhitā,
tika-vin09t0:311_14: ñātikāya ca santakaṃ cīvaraṃ ubhohi ekato diyyamānaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:313_1: Yaṃ panettha bhikkhuniyā rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ nippayojanatāya nidassanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:316_1: āgatakāraṇaṃ vināsetī”ti vuttattā puna codanaṃ na labhatīti eke.
tika-vin09t0:316_3: cīvaraṃ na labhissati paṭisanthārassa katattāti eke.
tika-vin09t0:316_4: Codanālakkhaṇaṃ na hotīti katvā vuttanti eke.
tika-vin09t0:316_5: “Dhammadesanādhippāyādinā na paṭisanthāro kātabbo”ti upatissatthero “‘āgatakāraṇaṃ vināsetī’ti codanāṭhānāni bhañjati,
tika-vin09t0:316_13: dhammadesanāsikkhāpade vuttaparicchedāya ekāya vācāya dve ṭhānāni bhañjati.
tika-vin09t0:316_18: sace pana dūto gacchantova “ahaṃ tassa hatthe dassāmī”tiādinā vutto tatiyo,
tika-vin09t0:316_19: “aññaṃ vā pesetvā ārocāpetī”ti vutto catutthoti yathā bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhā cattāro,
tika-vin09t0:316_22: parammukhakappiyakārako ceti etesu aññātakaappavāritesu viya paṭipajjitabbanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:321_0: Kārāpeyyāti attano ca parassa ca ubhinnañca kosiyaṃ ekato gaṇhitvā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:321_1: ubho vā ekato karontīti atthato veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:324_1: tathā idha “ekenapi aññena amissitāna”nti vacanābhāvato aññena missabhāve satipi apaññāyamānarūpakaṃ ce,
tika-vin09t0:327_0: “Tulayitvā”ti vacanato yathā tulādhāraṇāya kāḷakādhikā na honti,
tika-vin09t0:327_1: tathā kāḷakānaṃ dve bhāgā gahetabbā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena.
tika-vin09t0:327_2: “Ekassāpi kāḷakalomassa atirekabhāve nissaggiyanti vacanaṃ tulādhāraṇāya kiñcāpi na sameti,
tika-vin09t0:327_3: acittakattā pana sikkhāpadassa pubbe tulāya dhārayitvā ṭhapitesu ekampi lomaṃ tattha pateyya,
tika-vin09t0:330_0: “Orena ce channaṃ vassāna”nti vuttattā chabbasse paripuṇṇe kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti niṭṭhānadivasato paṭṭhāya channaṃ vassānaṃ paricchedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:330_1: Yāni panettha atirekachabbassavasena vā sammutivasena vā katāni,
tika-vin09t0:330_3: Gilānassa ca ekaṃ nappahotīti anekampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:330_4: Yato paṭṭhāya rogassa mandatāya santhataṃ ādāya gantuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin09t0:330_5: tato paṭṭhāya sammuti vā rogo vā na rakkhatīti eke.
tika-vin09t0:333_0: Kasmā panettha “santhataṃ pana bhikkhunā”ti sikkhāpadaṃ apaññapetvā “nisīdanasanthata”nti paññattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:333_3: cīvarasaññitāya santhatānaṃ ujjhitattā tesaṃ acīvarabhāvadassanatthaṃ tathā paññattaṃ bhagavatāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:333_4: Tasmā te bhikkhū tecīvarikadhutaṅgabhedabhayā santhate catutthacīvarasaññitāya santhatāni ujjhitvā terasa dhutaṅgāni samādayiṃsu,
tika-vin09t0:333_6: Tato tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ hoti “nisīdanacīvarasaṇṭhānampetaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ no bhagavatā anuññātaṃ catutthacīvarabhāvena,
tika-vin09t0:333_8: Tato “santhate tesaṃ cīvarasaññitā na bhavissatī”ti tadatthaṃ bhagavatā “santhata”nti apaññapetvā “nisīdanasanthata”nti paññattanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:333_9: Imesu pana pañcasu santhatesu purimāni tīṇi vinayakammaṃ katvā paṭilabhitvāpi paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭanti akappiyattā,
tika-vin09t0:333_12: “Anāpatti aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjatī”ti vacanatoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:336_0: “Addhānamaggappaṭipannassā”ti iminā pakatiyā dīghamaggaṃ paṭipannassa uppannānipi tiyojanaparamameva haritabbāni,
tika-vin09t0:336_3: addhānaṃ nāma paṭipannassa akāmā vassaṃvuṭṭhabhikkhuniyā maggappaṭipatti viyāti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:336_5: Teneva vāsādhippāyassa paṭippassaddhagamanussāhattā “appaṭipanno”ti saṅkhaṃ gatassa anāpattīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:336_6: Imasmiṃ pana atthavikappe “bhikkhuno paneva eḷakalomāni uppajjeyyuṃ…pe…
tika-vin09t0:336_7: asantepi hārake addhānamaggappaṭipannassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:336_8: Yasmā vā eḷakalomānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya tiyojanaparamatā adhippetā,
tika-vin09t0:336_11: Tena acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvā harato ca anāpattīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:337_0: “Ākaṅkhamānena bhikkhunā paṭiggahetabbānī”ti iminā attanā paṭiggahitānaṃyeva tiyojanātikkame āpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:337_1: Tena anākaṅkhamānena parasantakāni paṭiggahitāni harantassa anāpattīti siddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:338_2: “acchinnaṃ paṭilabhitvā”ti iminā ca dīpito hotīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:338_3: Porāṇagaṇṭhipade ca “aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ harāpento gacchati ce,
tika-vin09t0:338_5: Tasmā dve bhikkhū tiyojanaparamaṃ patvā aññamaññassa bhaṇḍaṃ parivattetvā ce haranti,
tika-vin09t0:339_0: Tiyojanaparamaṃ sahatthā haritabbānīti tiyojanaparamameva attanā haritabbāni,
tika-vin09t0:339_9: bhikkhū uposathaṃ āgacchantā uddissamānepi pātimokkhe āgacchanti,
tika-vin09t0:340_1: Kambalassa upari nisīditvā gacchantassa sace ekampi lomaṃ cīvare laggaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:340_2: tiyojanātikkame āpatti eva kambalato vijaṭitattāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:340_3: Taṃ kambalassa paṭiggahitattā attano atthāya paṭiggahitameva hotīti yuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:349_0: Asante pācittiyaṃ desetabbamevāti ettha kiṃ suddhikaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:352_0: Aṭṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ parena attano atthāya diyyamānassa vā pārivattakabhāvena diyyamānassa vā paṃsukūlassa
tika-vin09t0:353_0: Navamaṃ parassa vā attano vā rūpiyaparivattanaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin09t0:354_1: “Arūpiye arūpiyasaññī pañcannaṃ saha anāpattī”ti ca vacanaṃ itarehi saha āpattīti dīpeti.
tika-vin09t0:354_3: Tasmā tassa parivattane sati nissaggiyanti ekantena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:354_4: Pañcannaṃ saha dukkaṭavatthūnaṃ parivattane anāpattippasaṅgato anāpatti evāti porāṇāti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:355_0: Nissaggiyavatthuto hi muttāmaṇiveḷuriyādi mahagghappahonakampi dukkaṭavatthūti katvā nissaggiyavatthuto muttādi lahukaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:355_1: Lahukepi vatthusmiṃ yatheva dukkaṭavatthuno paṭiggahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:355_2: tatheva tassa vā tena vā cetāpanepi dukkaṭaṃ yuttanti aṭṭhakathācariyā.
tika-vin09t0:356_0: Atha vā yaṃ vuttaṃ “kappiyavatthūnaṃyeva tattha āgatattā”ti,
tika-vin09t0:356_2: na pana pāḷiyaṃ vuttāni anāpattivārappasaṅgabhayāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:356_5: amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca veḷuriyādinā attho”ti bhaṇati,
tika-vin09t0:356_7: Yasmā ca idaṃ kappiyakārakassa ācikkhanādisaṃvohāro ca,
tika-vin09t0:356_10: imināva nayena kiñcāpi dukkaṭavatthupi dasame adhippetaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin09t0:357_1: pañcannaṃ saha tattha anāpattippasaṅgato anāpatti evāti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:357_5: akappiyattā pañcannaṃ sahāpi āpattiyā bhavitabbanti siddho aṭṭhakathāvādo.
tika-vin09t0:358_3: na pana labbhatīti navame eva tāni vattabbāni.
tika-vin09t0:358_4: Tasmā saṃvohāro nāma kayavikkayopi aññathā parivattanaṃ pariyādiyitvā pavatto,
tika-vin09t0:358_6: vaṭṭatī”ti avatvā dasamassa anāpattivāre vuttanayeneva tesaṃ parivattane nissaggiyānumativirodhato aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:358_13: Na hi dānaggahaṇato añño kayavikkayo nāma atthī”ti,
tika-vin09t0:358_14: attano matiyā kayavikkayalakkhaṇasammate dasamassa anāpattivāre vuttanayeneva tesaṃ parivattane nissaggiyānumativirodhato ca.
tika-vin09t0:358_16: dasame avassameva jānitabbānīti tāni kayavikkayānevāti tesaṃ nissaggiyabhāvañca gatānīti evampi siddho aṭṭhakathāvādo.
tika-vin09t0:359_1: “attano santakaṃ rūpiyaṃ parahatthagataṃ karoti ajjhācarati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:359_6: Atha parassa rūpiyaṃ attano hatthagataṃ paṭhamaṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:359_8: Attano santakaṃ rūpiyaṃ parassa hatthagataṃ pacchā karoti,
tika-vin09t0:359_11: pacchā parivattane navamenā”ti hi tattha vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:359_20: nānāppakārakañca rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajji”nti vattabbaṃ bhaveyya “rūpiyaṃ cetāpetī”ti sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇassa vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:360_0: Ettāvatā yaṃ porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ “dukkaṭavatthunā kayavikkayaṃ pariharantena catūsu nissaggiyavatthūsu
tika-vin09t0:360_2: Dukkaṭavatthunā dukkaṭavatthunti “iminā idaṃ dehī”ti gahite teneva nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:360_5: parivattane navamenātiādinā attanā anuggahetvā kappiyavasena nīharitvā pañcahi sahadhammikehi saddhiṃ parivattetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti,
tika-vin09t0:360_7: Aparampi tattha vuttaṃ “nissajjitabbe asati kathaṃ pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:360_8: dunnissaṭṭharūpiyampi ‘na chaḍḍetī’ti vadantassa vissaṭṭho upāsako taṃ gahetvā aññaṃ ce bhikkhuno deti,
tika-vin09t0:360_11: Na hi gahitattā tato aññaṃ vatthu hoti.
tika-vin09t0:360_12: Puna aparañca tattha vuttaṃ “imaṃ ‘gaṇhāhī’ti vadantassa saddhādeyyavinipātadukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:360_15: Tattha hi payogadukkaṭaṃ yuttaṃ viya paññāyati.
tika-vin09t0:365_3: Samaṇasāruppena pakkanti ayopatto pañcahi pākehi pakko hoti,
tika-vin09t0:365_5: “Bhikkhuniyā pattasanniccayassa vāritattā bhikkhussapi taṃ ‘ananurūpa’nti katvā ‘purāṇapattaṃ paccuddharitvā’ti vutta”nti ca likhitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:365_6: taṃ na yuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “sanniccayaṃ kareyyāti anadhiṭṭhito avikappito”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:365_7: So hi kathinakkhandhake niccayasannidhi viya ekopi punadivase “sanniccayo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:365_9: Tasmā dve patte adhiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati.
tika-vin09t0:365_20: Apaccuddharantena vikappetabboti purāṇapattaṃ apaccuddharantena so patto vikappetabboti atthoti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:368_0: Pavāriteti ettha saṅghavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne pañcabandhaneneva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:369_0: Yo ūnapañcabandhanatthaṃ, vuttampi cetaṃ karo so;
tika-vin09t0:373_0: “Paṭisāyanīyāni paṭiggahetvā”ti vadantena pādamakkhanādīnaṃ atthāya paṭiggahetvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatīti dīpitanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:373_1: “Yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti vacanena yesaṃ maṃsaṃ na kappati,
tika-vin09t0:373_2: tesaṃ sappiādi na kappatīti vadantā ajānitvā vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:373_8: Madhu nāma madhukaribhamaramakkhikānaṃ āsayesu niyyāsasadisaṃ mahāmadhu hoti,
tika-vin09t0:380_2: Padabhājane pana “nimantitā bhuñjantī”ti nimantanameva gahetvā vibhattaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:380_3: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vatthuvasena viññattiyā yācanampi vuttanti likhitaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:380_4: Parivāre eva “gaṇabhojanaṃ dvīhākārehi pasavati viññattito vā nimantanato vā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:380_5: Tasmā aṭṭhuppattiyaṃyeva pākaṭattā padabhājane na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:380_6: “‘Ekato gaṇhantī’ti ca gahitabhattāpi aññe yāva gaṇhanti,
tika-vin09t0:380_14: sesānaṃ gaṇapūrakattā āpattikaro hotī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:381_2: atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ “gaṇabhojanaṃ nāma yattha cattāro…pe…
tika-vin09t0:384_0: Aññatra samayāti pana nimantanato pasavanato bhojanāpekkhaṃ pācittiyanti eke.
tika-vin09t0:384_1: Eko bhikkhu piṇḍāya caranto bhattaṃ labhati,
tika-vin09t0:384_4: Sace so bhikkhu piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:384_6: “Paramparabhojanaṃ nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantito taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññataraṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
tika-vin09t0:387_0: Dvattipattapūrā paṭiggahetabbāti tathānītapūvehi atthikena ukkaṭṭhapattappamāṇavasena gahetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:387_1: “Mā kho tvaṃ ettha paṭiggaṇhī”ti apātheyyādiatthāya sajjitasaññāya atirekappaṭiggahaṇena ārocane,
tika-vin09t0:387_2: asaṃvibhāge ca na muccati acittakattā sikkhāpadassa.
tika-vin09t0:387_8: “Na pātheyyādiatthāya sajjitabhāvajānana”nti aṅgesu avuttattā sace sañcicca na vadati,
tika-vin09t0:390_1: Tesu “asanaṃ paññāyattī”ti eteneva “bhuttāvī”ti etassa siddhattā visuṃ atthasiddhi na dissati.
tika-vin09t0:391_2: Samapākabhajjitānaṃ pana ātapasukkhānaṃ vā kuṇḍakaṃ vā ye keci taṇḍulā vāti ettakameva vuttattā samapākabhajjitānaṃ vīhīnaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:391_5: Bhajjitasattuyo piṇḍetvā kato apakkasattumodakopi pavāretīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:392_3: Bhojanasālāya bhuñjanto ce attano apāpuṇanakoṭṭhāsaṃ abhihaṭaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:392_8: Idañhi buddhappaṭikuṭṭhāya anesanāya uppanneyeva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:392_9: Yathā hi saṅghato laddhaṃ piṇḍaṃ dussīlo deti,
tika-vin09t0:392_16: “samaṃsarasaṃ samaccharasa”nti āpajjanato “maṃsarasa”nti vutte pana paṭikkhipato hoti,
tika-vin09t0:392_17: “maṃsassa rasaṃ maṃsarasa”nti ayaṃ viggaho nādhippetoti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:392_24: tatra ce yāgu bahutarā vā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:392_30: Idañca sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttattā na sakkā paṭikkhipituṃ.
tika-vin09t0:392_33: Tatra bhattaṃ bahutaraṃ vā samakaṃ vā appataraṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:392_35: Bhattaṃ vā yāguṃ vā anāmasitvā “missakaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati.
tika-vin09t0:393_0: Phalaṃ vā kandamūlādi vā pañcahi samaṇakappehi kappiyaṃ akatanti ettha kappiyaṃ akārāpitehi kadaliphalādīhi
tika-vin09t0:393_1: saddhiṃ atirittaṃ kārāpetvāpi taṃ kadaliphalādiṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:393_2: Amissakarasattā puna tāni kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā aññasmiṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā kāretvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:394_2: “Apaṭiggahetvā gaṇhato vinayadukkaṭa”nti vuttattā etamaññesampi na vaṭṭatīti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:394_3: “Taṃ pana puna paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa anāpattī”ti etthāpi evameva.
tika-vin09t0:394_4: Imasmiṃ pana “atirittaṃ kataṃ anatirittakataṃ hotī”ti etthāpi evameva.
tika-vin09t0:394_6: anatirittaṃ kataṃ hotī”tiādīhi upaparikkhitvā vinicchayo veditabboti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:404_0: “Duddhoto hotī”tiādinā nayena idha vuttattā, “duddhotaṃ pattaṃ dhovitvā puna
tika-vin09t0:405_1: aṅguliyā vā ghaṃsitvā nisnehabhāvo jānitabbo”ti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttattā ca mattikāpattassa kapālena
tika-vin09t0:405_2: pīto sneho sannidhiṃ karotīti siddhanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:405_3: Sayaṃ paṭiggahetvā apariccattamevāti ettha apariccattaṃ nāma anupasampannānaṃ nirapekkhaapariccattaṃ avijahitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:408_0: “Tesaṃ maṃsañca khīradadhīni ca idha adhippetānī”ti idaṃ pācittiyavatthuparicchedo,
tika-vin09t0:408_2: tasmā yassa kassaci khīrādīni vaṭṭantīti ca,
tika-vin09t0:408_3: “mahānāmasikkhāpadena kāretabbo”ti saṅghavasena pavārite bhesajjatthāya sappiādibhesajjapañcakaṃ viññāpeti ce,
tika-vin09t0:408_4: tattha “na bhesajjakaraṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpetī”ti ettha saṅgahaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:411_5: Sāmaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:430_6: Bhattiyagharanti nimantitassa gharaṃ vā salākābhattādidāyakānaṃ vā gharaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:432_0: Siyā paramparāpatti, pacchābhattaṃ na sā siyā.
tika-vin09t0:443_1: tassattho saṅghavasena pavārite bhesajjatthāya sappiādibhesajjapañcakaṃ viññāpeti ce,
tika-vin09t0:443_2: “nabhesajjena karaṇīyena bhesajjaṃ viññāpetī”ti vacanena pācittiyanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:443_4: amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca attho”ti yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhitvā viññāpetuṃ gilānova labhati,
tika-vin09t0:443_13: Evaṃ santepi “saṅghappavāraṇāya pavāraṇatā”ti pāṭhoti ca likhitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:449_0: Kenaci palibuddhassāti verikena vā issarena vā kenaci ruddhassa.
tika-vin09t0:449_1: Senāparikkhepena vā parikkhepārahaṭṭhānena vā sañcaraṇaṭṭhānapariyantena vā paricchinditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:454_0: “Surā”ti vā “na vaṭṭatī”ti vā jānitvā pivane akusalamevāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:454_1: Akusalacittanti yebhuyyena taṃ sandhāya kira vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:454_2: Atha kasmā vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “akusaleneva pātabbatāyā”ti vuttanti ce?
tika-vin09t0:457_1: upasampanne eva pācittiyanti evaṃ puggalāpekkhaṃ dassetuṃ “aṅgulipatodake pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:457_2: Sati karaṇīyeti ettha purisaṃ sati karaṇīye āmasatoti adhippāyo,
tika-vin09t0:460_0: “Cikkhallaṃ vā”ti vacanato sakkharampi khipanakīḷāya kīḷato dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin09t0:460_2: aññattha dukkaṭanti pācittiyavatthuatthavasena “udake hasadhamme pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:463_0: Ettāvatā kathaṃ kīḷā, iti kīḷāyaṃ evāyaṃ;
tika-vin09t0:469_0: Tassa vacananti “ayaṃ ukkhittako vā vambhito vā garahito vā imassa vacanaṃ akataṃ bhavissatī”ti anādariyaṃ karoti.
tika-vin09t0:469_1: Dhammanti kathāyaṃ dhammo nasseyya vā vinasseyya vā antaradhāyeyya vā,
tika-vin09t0:469_3: “Lokavajjaṃ atikkamitvā ‘idaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyuggaho’ti vadantassa na vaṭṭatī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:488_2: Ettha ekacetanāya bahupāṇakā marantīti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:493_0: Evaṃ ubhinnaṃ nānāttaṃ, ñeyyaṃ ñāṇavatā sadāti.
tika-vin09t0:499_0: Dukkaṭaṃ vihitaṃ yasmā, ācariyassa gaṇassa ca;
tika-vin09t0:506_1: Ticittanti ettha vipākābyākatacittena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyyāti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:506_2: Aññathā sacittakattā sikkhāpadassa kiriyābyākataṃ sandhāya na yujjati.
tika-vin09t0:509_2: saṅghassa ārocetvā saṅghānumatiyā pabbājetabbo”ti porāṇagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:509_7: “Te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti ca diṭṭhi satthari asatthādidiṭṭhi na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:509_11: saṃvare atiṭṭhanto liṅganāsanāya nāsetabboti ācariyassa takko.
tika-vin09t0:514_0: Aṅgesu na mokkhādhippāyatā viya amaraṇādhippāyatā vattabbāti ce?
tika-vin09t0:514_3: so adhippāyena tassa maraṇe payogavirahovāti katvā amaraṇādhikārattā kevalaṃ amaraṇādhippāyo eva soti tā viya tā na vuttā.
tika-vin09t0:517_3: kevalaṃ uccāretukāmatāya uggiraṇamatte kate iminā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:517_9: purimaṃ uggiraṇapaccayā pācittiyanti sadukkaṭaṃ pācittiyaṃ yujjati.
tika-vin09t0:517_12: Na ca pacchimaṃ pahāraṃ nissāya purimaṃ uggiraṇaṃ anāpattivatthukaṃ bhavitumarahatīti no takkoti ācariyo.
tika-vin09t0:520_0: Paro kukkuccaṃ uppādetu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin09t0:524_3: Siyā akiriyaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vadantānaṃ ajānāpanavasena samuṭṭhānato.
tika-vin09t0:527_0: Appamattakavissajjanakena pana cīvaraṃ karontassa senāsanakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttappabhedāni sūciādīni anapaloketvāpi dātabbāni.
tika-vin09t0:527_2: Evaṃ kataṃ pana apalokanaṃ kammalakkhaṇamevāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:527_6: “Saṅghassa santaka”nti sāmaññato avatvā “imasmiṃ vihāre saṅghassa santaka”nti apaloketabbanti ca,
tika-vin09t0:527_8: idaṃ pana dukkhavedana”nti pāṭhoti ca likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:530_0: Sannipātaṃ anāgantvā ce chandaṃ na deti,
tika-vin09t0:533_1: Kappiyamañco sampaṭicchitabboti “saṅghassa demā”ti dinnaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:533_2: tehi pana “vihārassa demā”ti vutte suvaṇṇarajatamayādiakappiyamañcāpi sampaṭicchitabbāti ca,
tika-vin09t0:533_6: “kaṃsalohādibhājanaṃ saṅghassa dinnampi pārihāriyaṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttattā attano hatthena gahetvā paṭisāmituṃ na labhatīti ca,
tika-vin09t0:536_1: tassa dānaṃ nivāretvā aññassa dāpeti, anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:536_3: attano nissitakā itthannāmassa pattaṃ dātukāmā āpucchanti,
tika-vin09t0:536_9: Sabbattha āpucchitvā dātukāmaṃ yathāsukhaṃ vicāretuṃ labhati.
tika-vin09t0:544_0: Sabbopi kathāmaggo bhaṇḍāgārikasīsena nikkhipanaṃ, gopanañca paṭikkhipitvā pavatto.
tika-vin09t0:547_0: “Santaṃ bhikkhu”nti ca “anāpucchā”ti ca “tathārūpā accāyikāti ca imāti ettha tisso”ti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:550_0: Taṃ assāti taṃ bhedanakaṃ assa pācittiyassa atthi paṭhamaṃ bhedanaṃ katvā pacchā desetabbattā.
tika-vin09t0:559_0: Kiñcāpi nisīdanassa jāti na dissati ettha,
tika-vin09t0:559_2: “nava cīvarāni adhiṭṭhātabbānī”ti ettha ca pariyāpannattā cīvarajāti evassa jātīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:559_5: taṃ na yuttaṃ “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti tassa saṇṭhānaniyamanato.
tika-vin09t0:571_0: Ārāme vā ārāmūpacāre vā paṭiggahetvā ajjhoharantassāti ārāme vā ārāmūpacāre vā paṭiggahetvā ārāme vā ārāmūpacāre vā ajjhoharantassāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:572_1: Aṅgesu ca “ajjhārāme vā ārāmūpacāre vā paṭiggahaṇa”nti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:576_0: Sekhiyesu satipi vītikkame anādariyāpekkhasseva āpattīti dassanatthaṃ kārako na vutto.
tika-vin09t0:576_6: Tato paraṃ otārentassa dukkaṭanti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:577_0: Ṭhatvāti ettha gacchantopi parissayābhāvaṃ oloketuṃ labhatiyevāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:577_1: Yathā vāsūpagatassa antaraghare kāyaṃ vivaritvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:577_2: tathā tassa santike gantukāmassapi kāyabandhanaṃ abandhitvā saṅghāṭiṃ apārupitvā gāmappavesanamanārocetvā yathākāmaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:577_3: Tasmā addhānamaggagamanakāle eko bhikkhu gāmappavesanavattaṃ pūretvā gāmaṃ pavisitvā ekaṃ āvasathaṃ puratova
tika-vin09t0:577_4: ṭhitaṃ patvā parikkhāraṃ ṭhapetvā vāsūpagato ce hoti,
tika-vin09t0:577_5: itarehi tassa santikaṃ yathāsukhaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:577_6: Ko pana vādo catūhapañcāhaṃ vāsamadhiṭṭhāya vasitabhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ gantuñca vāsūpagatānaṃ santikaṃ gantuñca vaṭṭatīti.
tika-vin09t0:577_8: Vuttampi cetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anāpatti kāraṇaṃ paṭicca tahaṃ tahaṃ oloketī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:577_9: Tattha kāraṇaṃ nāma āmisapūjāti veditabbāti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:579_0: Yasmā “samatittiko piṇḍapāto paṭiggahetabbo”ti vacanaṃ piṇḍapāto samapuṇṇo paṭiggahetabboti dīpeti,
tika-vin09t0:579_1: tasmā attano hatthagate patte piṇḍapāto diyyamāno thūpīkatopi ce hoti,
tika-vin09t0:579_3: Sūpodanaviññattiyaṃ mukhe pakkhipitvā vippaṭisāre uppanne puna uggiritukāmassāpi sahasā ce pavisati,
tika-vin09t0:579_5: Viññattikatañca akatañca ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ sahasā anupadhāretvā gahetvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin09t0:580_0: Sayaṃ yānagato hutvā, yathā yānagatassa ce;
tika-vin09t0:581_0: Alaṃ vatthuṃ tathā nālaṃ, sachatto chattapāṇino.
tika-vin09t0:588_0: Abhilāpamattamevāti ettha daharavasena “bhante”ti ca vuḍḍhavasena “āvuso”ti ca tattha duvidho abhilāpo,
tika-vin09t0:589_0: Kāyasaṃsagge vuttanayenāti ettha tabbahulanayena kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā vuttā.
tika-vin09t0:589_1: “Kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyyā”ti avatvā pana “sādiyeyyā”ti vuttattā akiriyatopi samuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:589_3: evaṃ heṭṭhā “manussitthiyā tayo magge methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin09t0:589_4: kiriyasamuṭṭhānataṃ vatvā tadanantaraṃ “bhikkhupaccatthikā manussitthiṃ bhikkhussa santikaṃ ānetvā vaccamaggena
tika-vin09t0:589_6: so ce pavesanaṃ sādiyatī”tiādinā nayena akiriyasamuṭṭhānassapi vuttattā paṭhamapārājikāyapi tabbahulanayeneva kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:590_0: Aṅgajātacalanañcettha na sārato daṭṭhabbaṃ “so ce pavesanaṃ na sādiyati,
tika-vin09t0:590_4: āpatti pārājikassā”ti ettha ṭhitanasādiyane pakatiyāpi paripuṇṇacalanattā.
tika-vin09t0:590_5: Sādiyanapaccayā paṭisevanacalanañcettha na dissatevāti tabbahulanayeneva kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā gahetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:591_0: Apica bhikkhuniyāpi paṭhamapārājike tassa sādiyanassa sarūpena vuttattā tadanurūpavasena vibhaṅganayamanoloketvā “kiriyasamuṭṭhāna”micceva vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:591_5: sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti vutte lokavajjapaṇṇattivajjānaṃ niyamalakkhaṇasiddhi hoti,
tika-vin09t0:591_6: tathā taṃ avatvā “yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:591_8: sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti vutte lokavajjavacanaṃ niratthakaṃ siyā vatthuajānanapakkhepi akusaleneva pātabbattā.
tika-vin09t0:591_10: tasmā khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “majjapāne pana bhikkhuno ajānitvāpi bījato paṭṭhāya majjaṃ pivantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:591_13: na vuttaṃ “vatthuajānanapakkhe pāṇātipātādīnaṃ siddhikaraakusalacittuppādasadise cittuppāde satipi sāmaṇero sīlabhedaṃ nāpajjatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:591_15: “Surāmerayime”ti vatthuṃ jānitvā pātabbatādivasena vītikkamantassa akusalassa asambhavo natthi.
tika-vin09t0:592_1: yuttivacanena arahantānaṃ appavisanato sacittakācittakapakkhesu akusalaniyamoti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t0:592_3: Acittakapakkhe akusalaniyamābhāvadassanatthaṃ supantassa mukhe pakkhittajalabindumiva surābinduādayo udāharitabbā.
tika-vin09t0:592_4: Tabbahulanayena hi atthe gahite pubbenāparaṃ aṭṭhakathāya sameti saddhiṃ pāḷiyā cāti.
tika-vin09t0:592_9: Ettha bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca kāyasaṃsaggabhāve sati bhikkhunī kāyaṅgaṃ acopayamānāpi citteneva adhivāseti, āpajjati,
tika-vin09t0:592_12: evameva paṭhamapārājikepi copane sati eva āpajjati, nāsati.
tika-vin09t0:592_13: Pavesanaṃ sādiyatīti ettha pavesanasādiyanaṃ nāma sevanacittuppādanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:592_16: Evaṃ santepi vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbanti vadantīti likhitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:596_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ patvā vuṭṭhānavidhayo sandassanatthaṃ “ayaṃ bhikkhunī…pe…
tika-vin09t0:596_1: āpannā”ti puggalaniyamaṃ katvā pārājikato adhippāyanti “nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesa”nti āpattināmaggahaṇañca kataṃ.
tika-vin09t0:599_0: Katthaci agantvā nisinnaṭṭhāne eva nisīditvā karontiyā vācācittato,
tika-vin09t0:602_1: imasmiṃ pana sikkhāpade samantapāsādikāyaṃ upacārātikkame āpatti vuttā,
tika-vin09t0:602_3: Dvīsupi vuttaṃ atthato ekameva gāmantaragamanasaṅghādisesaṃ upacārassa sandhāya vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:608_0: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjaṃ;
tika-vin09t0:610_1: Tasmā pamādalekhā viya dissatīti gavesitabbo ettha attho.
tika-vin09t0:610_3: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:610_4: idha pana “gāmūpacārato ca bhikkhūnaṃ vihārūpacārato ca dve leḍḍupāte”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:610_5: Tatra bhikkhūnaṃ vuttappakārappadesaṃ atikkamitvā gāmepi taṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:610_8: Apare pana bhikkhūnampi gāme na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:610_9: Bhikkhuvihāro nāma pubbe eva gāmūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā ṭhito,
tika-vin09t0:610_10: tasmā gāmaṃ avatvā vihārūpacārameva heṭṭhā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:610_11: Bhikkhunīnaṃ vihāro gāme eva vaṭṭati, na bahi,
tika-vin09t0:610_13: Tasmā ubhayatthāpi atthato nānāttaṃ natthīti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:613_0: Dutiye idha bhājāpitāya laddhacīvaraṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti, taṃ vinayakammaṃ katvāpi attanā na labbhati.
tika-vin09t0:614_0: Tatiye “samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṃ pana dukkhavedana”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:615_0: Catutthe paṭhamaṃ viññattaṃ alabhitvā aññaṃ tato ūnatarampi labheyya, nissaggiyameva aṅgasampattito.
tika-vin09t0:619_4: Sūpasampākādī vināpi antamaso yāgubhattepi pakkhipituṃ vaṭṭatīti likhitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:620_0: Dutiye ābādhapaccayā bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ āpucchitvā saṃharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:620_1: bhikkhussa ettha ca lasuṇe ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:622_0: Navame kuṭṭo nāma gharakuṭṭo. Pākāro nāma parikkhepapākāro.
tika-vin09t0:624_0: Dasame “sayaṃ tāni vatthūni karontiyā”tiādi idha sikkhāpade natthi. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:624_4: Yadi naccādīni passituṃ vā suṇituṃ vā na labhati,
tika-vin09t0:624_5: pageva attanā kātunti nayato labbhamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:624_8: Samuṭṭhānampi idha vuttameva aggahetvā chasamuṭṭhānavasena gahetabba”nti ācariyā.
tika-vin09t0:624_9: Idha vuttaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma mūlabhūtassa antarā vuttāpattiyā,
tika-vin09t0:627_0: Pañcame upacāro dvādasahattho. “Samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:628_0: Sattame dhuvapaññatteti bhikkhunīnaṃ atthāya. Kulānīti kulagharāni.
tika-vin09t0:633_0: Chaṭṭhe aññasmiṃ parikkhāre dukkaṭanti thālakādīnaṃ vā sappitelādīnaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:639_0: “Cittāgāraṃ nāma yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hotī”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā cittāgārādīni sabbesaṃ atthāya katāni,
tika-vin09t0:643_0: Dasame “samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:646_0: Paṭhamadutiyatatiyesu “gihigatā”ti vā “kumāribhūtā”ti vā na vattabbā. Vadanti ce, kammaṃ kuppati.
tika-vin09t0:647_3: Etassa pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ “vuṭṭhitāya parisāyāti chandaṃ vissajjetvā kāyena vā vācāya vā chandavissajjanamattena vā vuṭṭhitāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:647_4: Idha chandassa pana avissaṭṭhattā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:647_5: Tasmā chandaṃ avissajjetvāva dvādasahatthapāse viharitvā puna sannipātakaraṇañca vaṭṭatīti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:650_0: Tatiye “sesaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ, idaṃ pana akusalacitta”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:652_0: Ekādasame “samuṭṭhānādīni kathinasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:653_0: Dvādasame “samuṭṭhānādīni padasodhammasadisāni, idaṃ pana kiriyākiriya”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:654_1: tassā paṭicchādanatthāyā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā idhāpi “adhakkhakaubbhanābhisaṅkhātassa sarīrassa paṭicchādanattha”nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t0:654_2: Aparikkhepe āpattiparicchedaṃ samantapāsādikavasena aggahetvā idha vuttanayena gahetabbanti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:658_0: Samuṭṭhānānaṃ vinicchaye pana giraggasamajjādīni “acittakāni lokavajjānī”ti vuttattā “nacca”nti vā “gandha”nti vā ajānitvāpi dassanena,
tika-vin09t0:658_4: Corivuṭṭhāpanādīni “corī”tiādinā vatthuṃ jānitvā karaṇeyeva āpajjanattā sacittakāni.
tika-vin09t0:658_6: “Idha sacittakācittakatā paṇṇattijānanājānanatāya aggahetvā vatthujānanājānanatāya gahetabba”nti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:660_0: Vuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ dvidhā idha, sakanāmena aññātaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:664_0: Ekaṃ lomādike matanti, ayaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:665_0: Sesamettha uttānaṃ, anuttānatthe vuttavinicchayattā na uddhaṭanti;
tika-vin09t0:677_0: Bodhitohaṃ sadā vande, taṃ saṅghaṃ kumudākaraṃ.
tika-vin09t0:686_0: Sādhavo taṃ nisāmetha, sakkaccaṃ mama bhāsatoti.
tika-vin09t0:688_1: kattukāmoyamācariyo paṭhamaṃ tāva “buddhaṃ dhamma”ntiādinā ratanattayappaṇāmakaraṇena attano cittasantānaṃ punāti.
tika-vin09t0:688_2: Visuddhacittasantānanissayā hi paññā tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā yathādhippetasaṃvaṇṇanāya pariyosānagamanasamatthā hotīti.
tika-vin09t0:688_3: Apica ratanattayappaṇāmena vidhutasabbakibbise cittasantāne bhavantarūpacitānipi antarāyikakammāni paccayavekallato
tika-vin09t0:689_1: bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā niddesanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:689_3: buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena.
tika-vin09t0:689_4: Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena,
tika-vin09t0:689_5: ñeyyavisesassa ca kammabhāvena aggahaṇato kammavacanicchāya abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso
tika-vin09t0:689_6: labbhatīti buddhavāti buddho yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:689_7: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvitena sayambhuñāṇena sahavāsanāya vigataviddhastaniravasesupakkileso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhārova
tika-vin09t0:690_0: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
tika-vin09t0:692_5: tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāya nibbānañcāti ubhayameva nippariyāyato dhāreti.
tika-vin09t0:692_7: pariyattidhammo ca tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhayampi pariyāyato dhāretīti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:692_11: imañca dhammaṃ vanditvāti buddharatanena saha vandanakiriyāya dhammaratanaṃ samuccinoti.
tika-vin09t0:693_3: Tehi tehi vā maggaphalehi kilesadarathānaṃ samucchedapaṭippassambhanavasena sammadeva ghātitattā saṅgho,
tika-vin09t0:693_4: pothujjanikasaṅghassāpi pubbabhāgappaṭipadāya ṭhitattā purimacetanāya viya dāne ettheva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:693_5: Sopi hi kiñcāpi ariyena diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena asaṃhato,
tika-vin09t0:693_6: niyyānikapakkhiyena pana pothujjanikena saṃhatattā dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātāraho saṅghoyevāti,
tika-vin09t0:694_5: Tattha sadevakena lokena arahatādīhi guṇehi seṭṭhabhāvena kariyamāno paṇāmo vandanā,
tika-vin09t0:694_9: vandanā ca māno ca pūjā ca sakkāro ca vandanāmānapūjāsakkārā,
tika-vin09t0:694_11: Iminā ratanattayassa arahatādīhi guṇehi asamabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:694_12: Tandassanampi takkatassa nipaccakārassa sasantānapavanādivasena yathādhippetāya atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya nipphādanasamatthabhāvadīpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:695_1: visesena vā pasannena manasā saddhiṃ kāyavācāhi karaṇabhūtāhi abhivandiyāti attho,
tika-vin09t0:695_4: Tattha buddhādiguṇārammaṇā kāmāvacarakusalakiriyānaṃ aññataracetanā kāyavacīviññattiyo samuṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin09t0:695_6: ubhayaviññattiyo pana asamuṭṭhāpetvā manodvāravasena uppannā manovandanāti.
tika-vin09t0:696_0: Evaṃ ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni attano nissayabhūtānaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānañca paṇāmaṃ dassento “theravaṃsappadīpāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:696_1: Tattha katañjalī pubbācariyasīhānaṃ namo katvāti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:696_8: paravādimigehi apadhaṃsanīyato ca sīhasadisattā sīhāti pubbācariyasīhā,
tika-vin09t0:696_12: Tattha theravaṃsappadīpānanti thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatāti therā,
tika-vin09t0:696_15: Etena bhinnaladdhikānaṃ sattarasabhedānaṃ mahāsaṅghikādīnaṃ vaṃsaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:696_16: theravaṃsapariyāpannā hutvā pana āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa theravaṃsassa dīpanato theravaṃsappadīpā,
tika-vin09t0:697_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyānampi paṇāmaṃ dassetvā idāni saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammavisesassa abhidhānānisaṃsaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:697_2: Tattha mahesinā yaṃ pātimokkhaṃ pakāsitanti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:697_3: Tattha mahesināti mahante sīlādike pañca dhammakkhandhe esī gavesīti mahesi.
tika-vin09t0:697_4: Mahantehi esitoti vā puthujjanasekhāsekhaisīhi visiṭṭhattā mahanto isīti vā mahesi,
tika-vin09t0:697_12: vajjapaṭipakkhattā anavajjānaṃ samādhipaññāsaṅkhātānaṃ parittamahaggatalokuttarānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ādi patiṭṭhābhūtanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:697_16: Yathā hi sattānaṃ khajjabhojjaleyyapeyyavasena catubbidhopi āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni pharati,
tika-vin09t0:697_17: evaṃ yoginopi cātubhūmakakusalaṃ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ sampādeti.
tika-vin09t0:697_19: Atha vā mukhaṃ dvāraṃ mokkhappavesāya nibbānasacchikiriyāyāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:701_0: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammassa abhidhānādiṃ dassetvā idāni saṃvaṇṇanāya nimittaṃ dassetuṃ “sūratenā”tiādinā catutthagāthamāha.
tika-vin09t0:701_1: Tattha sūratenāti sobhane ratoti sūrato u-
tika-vin09t0:701_7: Sucisallekhavuttināti sucibhūtā kilesasallikhanasamatthā vutti paṭipatti etassāti sucisallekhavutti,
tika-vin09t0:701_11: Atha vā vinayoti cettha pātimokkhasaṃvarādibhedo saṃvaravinayo.
tika-vin09t0:701_17: ācariyassa ca taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya sāmatthiyaṃ ñatvā “pātimokkhassa tayā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā kātabbā.
tika-vin09t0:701_18: Evañhi sāsanassa suciraṭṭhitikatā hotī”ti sānisaṃsagāravena yācanaṃ akāsi.
tika-vin09t0:701_19: Tadassa yācanaṃ attano saṃvaṇṇanāya nidānabhūtaṃ dassento “yācito”ti āha.
tika-vin09t0:702_6: uddhaṭadāṭhasappasamo ca hutvā saṇho sakhilo sukhasambhāso hoti.
tika-vin09t0:702_9: Evamanekaguṇehi tassa abhitthavanaṃ yathāvuttaguṇasamannāgatassa sabrahmacārino ajjhesanaṃ na sakkā paṭibāhitunti
tika-vin09t0:702_10: paramagambhīrassāpi pātimokkhassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pavattāti dassanatthaṃ. Kiñca –
tika-vin09t0:702_11: tādisassa ajjhesanaṃ nissāya kariyamānā atthasaṃvaṇṇanā tassa ajjhesanādhipaccena,
tika-vin09t0:702_12: mamañca ussāhasampattiyā na cirena pariyosānaṃ gacchatīti katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:703_0: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāya nimittaṃ dassetvā idāni tassavane sotujanassādaraṃ janetuṃ tappayojanakaraṇappakāranissayābhidhānādiṃ
tika-vin09t0:703_2: Tattha tatthāti “yaṃ mahesinā pātimokkhaṃ pakāsita”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:704_6: mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathānayaṃ idha nissāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:707_0: Evaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmādisahitaṃ saññādikaṃ dassetvā idāni “pātimokkhassa vaṇṇanaṃ vaṇṇayissāmī”ti vuttattā pātimokkhaṃ tāva vacanatthato,
tika-vin09t0:707_4: uddesaparicchedato ca vavatthapetvā taduddesakkamenāyaṃ vaṇṇanā bhavissatīti dassetuṃ “tattha pātimokkha”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:708_3: Atha vā pa ati mokkhanti padacchedo,
tika-vin09t0:708_5: Evaṃ pabhedato padavaṇṇanaṃ katvā saddatthato vadati “atiseṭṭhaṃ atiuttamanti attho”ti.
tika-vin09t0:708_6: Ettha ca sīlapātimokkhaṃ sabbaguṇānaṃ mūlabhāvato seṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:708_18: paṭiggāhakehi ca sotaviññāṇādivīthiyā paṭipannassa vacanatthassa vacanato.
tika-vin09t0:708_19: Atha vā imināti āsannapaccakkhabhāvakaraṇavacanaṃ yathāvuttassa vacanatthassa abhimukhīkaraṇato.
tika-vin09t0:708_22: Sīlaganthabhedato duvidhaṃ hotīti puna sīlaganthasaṅkhātena pabhedena duvidhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:709_0: Idāni tadubhayassāpi sutte āgatabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:709_2: taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:710_0: Ādimetanti etaṃ sikkhāpadasīlaṃ pubbuppattiatthena ādi. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
tika-vin09t0:712_0: Yathā hi nagaravaḍḍhakī nagaraṃ māpetukāmo paṭhamaṃ nagaraṭṭhānaṃ sodheti,
tika-vin09t0:712_1: tato aparabhāge vīthicatukkasiṅghāṭakādiparicchedena vibhajitvā nagaraṃ māpeti,
tika-vin09t0:712_2: yathā vā pana rajako paṭhamaṃ tīhi khārehi vatthaṃ dhovitvā parisuddhe vatthe yadicchakaṃ raṅgajātaṃ upaneti,
tika-vin09t0:712_3: yathā vā pana cheko cittakāro rūpaṃ likhitukāmo āditova bhittiparikammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:712_5: evameva yogāvacaro āditova sīlaṃ visodhetvā aparabhāge samathavipassanādayo dhamme sacchikaroti.
tika-vin09t0:713_1: dhammato pana sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa,
tika-vin09t0:713_2: vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:713_3: Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “kiṃ sīlanti cetanā sīlaṃ cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ saṃvaro sīlaṃ avītikkamo sīla”nti
tika-vin09t0:713_4: “ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhānī”ti bhikkhubhikkhunīpātimokkhavasena ubhayāni pātimokkhāni,
tika-vin09t0:713_24: Tassa pātimokkhassa jotakattāti tassa sīlapātimokkhassa dīpanattā.
tika-vin09t0:713_25: Ādimhi pana vutto vacanatthoti “atiseṭṭha”ntiādinā ādimhi vutto vacanattho.
tika-vin09t0:713_26: Ubhinnampi sādhāraṇo hoti sīlapātimokkhaṃ sabbaguṇānaṃ mūlabhāvato seṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:714_9: yasmā ganthe vaṇṇite tadavinābhāvato tassattho vaṇṇito hoti,
tika-vin09t0:715_0: Evaṃ sarūpabhedato vavatthapetvā idāni ganthabhedato vavatthapetuṃ “taṃ paneta”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:716_0: Evaṃ ganthabhedato vavatthapetvā idāni uddesavibhāgato vavatthapetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:717_3: Yaṃ panettha nidānuddesaparicchedaṃ dassentena “suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:717_5: āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī”ti idhāgatanidānapāḷiṃ dassetvā tadanantaraṃ uddesakāle vattabbassāpi “uddiṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:717_6: kho āyasmanto nidāna”nti imassa pāṭhassa yojanaṃ akatvā “tatthāyasmante pucchāmī”tiādinā anusāvanādikameva
tika-vin09t0:717_9: khuddakapeyyālavasena vā pākaṭattā tassa ayojanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:717_11: Vakkhati hi “taṃ panetaṃ pārājikādīnaṃ avasāne dissati,
tika-vin09t0:717_14: atha kho uddesakāle ‘āvikatā hissa phāsu hotī’ti vatvā ‘uddiṭṭhaṃ kho āyasmanto nidānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:717_16: Avasese sutena sāviteti avasiṭṭhaṃ pārājikuddesādicatukkaṃ “sutā kho panāyasmantehi cattāro pārājikā dhammā…pe…
tika-vin09t0:718_0: Eteneva nayena sesā tayo pātimokkhuddesaparicchedā veditabbāti dassetuṃ “pārājikuddesādīna”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:718_2: Nidānassa ādito paṭṭhāya pārājikādīni osāpetvāti nidānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:718_5: taṃtikaṃ aniyatañcāti evaṃ yathākkamaṃ uddisitvā pārājikādīni pariyosāpetvā.
tika-vin09t0:718_6: Yojetabbāti “avasese sutena sāvite uddiṭṭho hoti pārājikuddeso”tiādinā yojetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:719_2: pātimokkhuddesā nidānaṃ uddisitvā avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:719_4: Nidānaṃ uddisitvā cattāri pārājikāni uddisitvā avasesaṃ sutena sāvetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:720_2: Antarāyo uppajjatīti dasasu antarāyesu yo koci antarāyo uppajjati.
tika-vin09t0:720_14: Tattha sace bhikkhūsu “uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti nisinnesu rājā āgacchati,
tika-vin09t0:720_36: Manussā ekaṃ vā bahū vā bhikkhū brahmacariyā cāvetukāmā gaṇhanti,
tika-vin09t0:720_38: Iti yaṃ vuttaṃ “antarāyo uppajjatīti dasasu antarāyesu yo koci antarāyo uppajjatī”ti,
tika-vin09t0:721_4: Sutena sāvetabbaṃ nāma natthi uposathassa antarāyova hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:721_6: Tadabhāvo ca “idameva lakkhaṇaṃ tatthāpi anugata”nti katvāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:721_10: Idanti idāni vattabbaṃ buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānaṃ sāmaññena dasseti,
tika-vin09t0:721_11: idaṃ akkharapadaniyamitaganthitaṃ vacanaṃ vuccati kathīyatīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:722_2: Atthanicchayanti abhidheyyatthassa ceva adhippāyatthassa ca nicchayanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:722_4: Imāya hi aṭṭhakathāya tesaṃ abhidheyyattho ceva adhippāyattho ca anekadhā vavatthāpīyati.
tika-vin09t0:722_9: mayā vuccamānaṃ atthañca vinicchayañcāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:722_10: Sīlasampannāti samantato pannaṃ pattaṃ puṇṇanti sampannaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:722_13: Atha vā sammadeva pannā gatā upāgatāti sampannā,
tika-vin09t0:722_18: Suṇantu meti te sabbepi bhikkhavo mama santikā nisāmentu.
tika-vin09t0:722_19: Iminā attano saṃvaṇṇanāya sakkaccaṃ savane niyojeti.
tika-vin09t0:722_21: Ettha ca sīlasampannānaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃyeva bhikkhūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ tadaññesaṃ imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya abhājanabhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:723_1: etesaṃ vā gāthāya saṅgahitānaṃ “suṇātu me”tiādīnaṃ padānamantare.
tika-vin09t0:723_4: tathāpi pātimokkhuddesakena evaṃ vattabbanti bhagavatā vuttattā bhagavato āṇatti,
tika-vin09t0:723_5: na uddesakassāti navakatarenāpi idaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati saṅghagāravena,
tika-vin09t0:723_8: Idañca sabbaṃ kena kattha kadā vuttanti āha “sabbameva ceta”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:724_6: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo ‘suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:725_7: Tasmāti yasmā idaṃ pātimokkhuddesakena vattabbavacanaṃ, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:725_19: Ettha ca kiñcāpi daharassāpi byattassa pātimokkho anuññāto,
tika-vin09t0:725_21: sace therassa pañca vā cattāro vā tayo vā pātimokkhuddesā nāgacchanti,
tika-vin09t0:725_22: dve pana akkhaṇḍā suvisadā vācuggatā honti,
tika-vin09t0:725_24: Sace pana ettakampi visadaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin09t0:726_0: Idāni “saṅgho”ti avisesena vuttattā idhādhippetasaṅghaṃ visesetvā dassetuṃ “saṅghoti iminā pana padenā”tiādimāha kiñcāpīti anuggahatthe nipāto,
tika-vin09t0:726_2: Dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti dakkhiṇā,
tika-vin09t0:726_8: dakkhiṇeyyo ca so saṅgho cāti dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho.
tika-vin09t0:726_15: tattha katamo idhādhippetoti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “so panesā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:726_17: Pañca vidhā pakārā assa sammutisaṅghassāti pañcavidho.
tika-vin09t0:727_0: Idāni yesaṃ kammānaṃ vasenāyaṃ pañcavidho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:727_5: “Tathā”ti iminā “na kiñci saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin09t0:727_6: Yadi evaṃ kimatthaṃ atirekavīsativaggo vuttoti āha “so panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:727_10: Idameva cānena kattabbaṃ kammanti “kammavasena pañcavidho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:727_11: Kammassāniyame kathametaṃ yujjeyyāti īdisī codanā anavakāsāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:728_10: idhāpi divaseyeva vattamāno adhippetoti āha “ajja uposathadivaso”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:728_12: Upavasantīti sīlena vā sabbaso āhārassa abhuñjanasaṅkhātena anasanena vā khīrapānamadhupānādimattena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:729_1: kāratthasahitattā “uposatho”ti etassa “uposatho evā”ti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “etena anuposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:729_3: atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti “uposatho”ti etassa “anuposatho na hotī”ti ayamatthoti
tika-vin09t0:729_5: “Esa nayo pannaraso”ti iminā aññaṃ uposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipatīti etthāpi.
tika-vin09t0:729_8: Pannarasoti iminā aññaṃ uposathadivasaṃ paṭikkhipatī”ti saṃkhittena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “divasavasena hī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:729_12: Hemantagimhavassānānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ utūnanti ettha hemantautu nāma aparakattikassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya phaggunapuṇṇamapariyosānā cattāro māsā,
tika-vin09t0:729_13: gimhautu nāma phaggunassa kālapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya āsāḷhapuṇṇamapariyosānā cattāro māsā,
tika-vin09t0:729_14: vassānautu nāma āsāḷhassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya aparakattikapuṇṇamapariyosānā cattāro māsā.
tika-vin09t0:729_15: Tatiyasattamapakkhesu dve dve katvā cha cātuddasikāti hemantassa utuno tatiye ca sattame ca pakkhe dve cātuddasikā,
tika-vin09t0:738_1: Bahutarāvāsikādipaccaye pana sati aññasmiṃ cātuddasepi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:738_4: Āvāsikānaṃ anuvattitabbanti āvāsikehi “ajjuposatho cātuddaso”ti pubbakicce kariyamāne anuvattitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:738_9: tehi bhikkhūhi dve tayo uposathe cātuddasike kātuṃ,
tika-vin09t0:738_10: kathaṃ mayaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi paṭhamataraṃ pavāreyyāmā”ti vacanañca saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:738_11: Ettha ca paṭhamasuttassa ekekassa utuno tatiyasattamapakkhassa cātuddase vā avasesassa pannarase vā sakiṃ
tika-vin09t0:738_12: pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabbanti pakaticārittavasenapi atthasambhavato “āgantukehī”tiādīni suttāni dassitānīti
tika-vin09t0:738_14: Tathārūpapaccaye satīti aññasmimpi cātuddasike uposathaṃ kātuṃ anurūpe “āvāsikā bahutarā hontī”ti evamādike paccaye sati.
tika-vin09t0:738_15: Aññasmimpi cātuddaseti tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ tatiyasattamapakkhacātuddasato aññasmiṃ cātuddase.
tika-vin09t0:739_0: Na kevalaṃ uposathadivasāva hontīti āha “purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:739_1: Mā iti cando vuccati tassa gatiyā divasassa minitabbato,
tika-vin09t0:739_5: Sā hi pacchimakattikaṃ nivattetuṃ evaṃ vuttā.
tika-vin09t0:739_9: Bhaṇḍanakārakehi anuvādavasena assayujapuṇṇamādiṃ pariccajantā pavāraṇaṃ kāḷapakkhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:739_15: āgame kāḷe pavāreyyāmā”ti “suṇantu me āyasmanto āvāsikā,
tika-vin09t0:739_19: āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti ca evaṃ ñattiyā pavāraṇaṃ ukkaḍḍhantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:740_2: Yaṃ sandhāya “āgame juṇhe pavāreyyāmā”ti ñattiṃ ṭhapayiṃsu,
tika-vin09t0:740_3: tasmiṃ pana āgame juṇhe komudiyā cātumāsiniyā avassaṃ pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:740_4: Na hi taṃ atikkamitvā pavāretuṃ labbhati.
tika-vin09t0:741_2: bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā tampi juṇhaṃ anuvaseyyuṃ, tehi,
tika-vin09t0:741_4: bhikkhūhi sabbeheva āgame juṇhe komudiyā cātumāsiniyā akāmā pavāretabba”nti.
tika-vin09t0:742_11: Osārite tasmiṃ bhikkhusminti ukkhittake bhikkhusmiṃ osārite,
tika-vin09t0:742_12: taṃ gahetvā sīmaṃ gantvā āpattiṃ desāpetvā kammavācāya kammappaṭippassaddhivasena pavesiteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:742_19: Yattha pana pattacīvarādīnaṃ atthāya appamattakena kāraṇena vivadantā uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapenti,
tika-vin09t0:742_20: tattha tasmiṃ adhikaraṇe vinicchite “samaggā jātamhā”ti antarā sāmaggiuposathaṃ kātuṃ na labhanti.
tika-vin09t0:742_21: Karontehi anuposathe uposatho kato nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t0:742_22: Kattikamāsabbhantareti ettha kattikamāso nāma pubbakattikamāsassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva aparakattikapuṇṇamā,
tika-vin09t0:742_25: tato pacchā vā pana pure vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:742_27: Idhāpi kosambakakkhandhake sāmaggiyā sadisāva sāmaggī veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:742_28: Ye pana kismiñcideva appamattake pavāraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā samaggā honti,
tika-vin09t0:743_1: Nāsatīti anvayato vuttameva byatirekato daḷhaṃ karoti.
tika-vin09t0:744_3: na tehi vinā taṃ uposathakammaṃ karīyati,
tika-vin09t0:744_4: na tesaṃ chando vā pārisuddhi vā eti.
tika-vin09t0:744_8: chandapārisuddhiṃ datvā āgacchantu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin09t0:745_1: yattha hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ṭhitā kammappattā nāma hontīti anuyogaṃ sandhāya sīmaṃ dassento vibhāgavantānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:745_10: Saṅghakammaṃ nāmetaṃ vīsativaggakaraṇīyaparamanti āha “yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkontī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:745_11: Yassaṃ sīmāyaṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedena kammārahena saddhiṃ ekavīsati bhikkhū parimaṇḍalākārena nisīdituṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin09t0:746_9: Potthakesu pana katthaci “paṃsupuñjaṃ vā vālukāpuñjaṃ vā aññatara”nti pāṭho dissati,
tika-vin09t0:746_13: Ettha ca yā tīhi nimittehi bajjhamānā animittupagesu tacasārarukkhādīsu aññataraṃ antarā ekaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā,
tika-vin09t0:746_15: Yā pana catupañcanimittādīhi bajjhamānā imesu tacasārarukkhādīsu aññataraṃ antarā ekaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā,
tika-vin09t0:746_16: sā khaṇḍanimittā nāma na hotīti viññāyati nimittupagānaṃ nimittānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sabbhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:746_20: Nimittānaṃ bahi ṭhitena sammatāti tesaṃ bahi ṭhitena vācitakammavācā.
tika-vin09t0:746_21: Nimittāni pana anto ca bahi ca ṭhatvā kittetuṃ vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin09t0:747_0: Evaṃ sammatāpīti nimittāni kittetvā kammavācāya sammatāpi.
tika-vin09t0:747_3: nadī asīmāti yā kāci nadīlakkhaṇappattā nadī nimittāni kittetvā “etaṃ baddhasīmaṃ karomā”ti katāpi asīmā,
tika-vin09t0:747_9: Baddhā hotīti pacchimadisābhāge sīmaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:747_11: Yattha ṭhatvā bhikkhūhi kammaṃ kātuṃ sakkā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:747_13: Yattha pana ṭhitehi kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin09t0:747_14: tādisaṃ padesaṃ anto karitvā bandhantā sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindanti nāma,
tika-vin09t0:747_16: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “sambhindanaṃ paresaṃ sīmāya ekaṃ vā dve vā nimitte kittetvā lekhāmattaṃ gahetvā bandhanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:747_17: Ajjhottharaṇaṃ nāma paresaṃ sīmāya nimitte kittetvā taṃ sakalaṃ vā tassekadesaṃ vā anto karontena tassā
tika-vin09t0:747_18: bahi ekissaṃ dvīsu vā disāsu nimitte kittetvā bandhana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:748_4: Imehi ca pana aṭṭhahi nimittehi asammissehipi aññamaññamissehipi sīmaṃ sammannituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:748_5: Tenāha “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge yathāladdhāni nimittupagāni nimittānī”ti. Ekena,
tika-vin09t0:748_6: pana dvīhi vā nimittehi sammannituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:748_7: tīṇi pana ādiṃ katvā vuttappakārānaṃ nimittānaṃ satenāpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:748_9: bhante”ti vutte puna vinayadhareneva “eso pabbato nimitta”nti evaṃ nimittaṃ kittetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:748_14: hoti bhavissatī”ti evaṃ pana kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:748_16: Tenāha “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimitta”ntiādi. “Pabbato, bhante, udakaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:748_17: bhante”ti evaṃ pana upasampanno vā ācikkhatu,
tika-vin09t0:748_20: Ādisaddena “puratthimāya anudisāya kiṃ nimittaṃ? Pāsāṇo, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:748_27: uttarāya anudisāya kiṃ nimittaṃ? Udakaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:748_29: Ettha pana aṭṭhatvā puna “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ? Pabbato, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:748_30: eso pabbato nimitta”nti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ kittitanimittaṃ kittetvāva ṭhapetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:748_33: animittānaṃ nāmena ca akittetvā yathāvutteneva nayena kittetvā.
tika-vin09t0:748_35: bhante”tiādinā nayena uposathakkhandhake vuttāya parisuddhāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya baddhā.
tika-vin09t0:748_36: Tattha nimittāni sakiṃ kittitānipi kittitāneva honti.
tika-vin09t0:748_37: Andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tikkhattuṃ sīmamaṇḍalaṃ sambandhantena nimittaṃ kittetabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:749_3: Hatthī pana sattaratano vā aḍḍhaṭṭharatano vā.
tika-vin09t0:749_5: Sace catūsu disāsu cattāro vā tīsu vā tayo pabbatā honti, catūhi,
tika-vin09t0:749_14: Tañhi catūsu vā aṭṭhasu vā disāsu kittentenāpi ekameva nimittaṃ kittitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:749_15: Tasmā yo evaṃ cakkasaṇṭhānena vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhito pabbato,
tika-vin09t0:749_16: taṃ ekadisāya kittetvā aññāsu disāsu taṃ bahiddhā katvā anto aññāni nimittāni kittetabbāni.
tika-vin09t0:749_17: Sace pabbatassa tatiyabhāgaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṃ vā antosīmāya kattukāmā honti,
tika-vin09t0:749_18: pabbataṃ akittetvā yattakaṃ padesaṃ anto kattukāmā,
tika-vin09t0:749_19: tassa parato tasmiṃyeva pabbate jātarukkhavammikādīsu aññataraṃ nimittaṃ kittetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:749_20: Sace yojanadviyojanappamāṇaṃ sabbaṃ pabbataṃ anto kattukāmā honti,
tika-vin09t0:749_21: pabbatassa parato bhūmiyaṃ jātarukkhavammikādīni nimittāni kittetabbāni.
tika-vin09t0:750_0: Saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti gaṇanaṃ vohāraṃ gacchatīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:750_7: Bhūmisamo khalamaṇḍalasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇo vā bhūmito khāṇuko viya uṭṭhitapāsāṇo vā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:750_9: “Piṭṭhipāsāṇo pana atimahantopi pāsāṇasaṅkhameva gacchatīti āha “piṭṭhipāsāṇo panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:750_10: Tasmā sace mahato piṭṭhipāsāṇassa ekaṃ padesaṃ antosīmāyaṃ kattukāmā honti,
tika-vin09t0:750_11: taṃ akittetvā tassupari añño pāsāṇo kittetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:750_19: Vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitapiṭṭhipāsāṇo pana ekattha kittetvā aññattha na kittetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:751_0: Vananimitte tiṇavanaṃ vā tacasārarukkhavanaṃ vā na vaṭṭatīti āha “antosārehī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:751_2: Antosāramissakehīti anto sāro yesaṃ te antosārā,
tika-vin09t0:751_14: Ekadesaṃ antosīmāyaṃ kattukāmehipi vanaṃ akittetvā tattha rukkhapāsāṇādayo kittetabbā,
tika-vin09t0:751_15: vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitavanaṃ ekattha kittetvā aññattha na kittetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:752_2: Tato apanetvā pana taṅkhaṇampi bhūmiyaṃ ropetvā koṭṭhakaṃ katvā udakaṃ āsiñcitvā kittetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:752_4: Khandhaṃ chinditvā ropite pana etaṃ yujjati.
tika-vin09t0:752_10: Ekābaddhaṃ pana suppatiṭṭhitanigrodhasadisaṃ rukkhaṃ ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:753_0: Magganimitte araññakhettanadītaḷākamaggādayo na vaṭṭantīti āha “jaṅghamaggo vā hotū”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:753_1: Yo pana jaṅghamaggo sakaṭamaggato okkamitvā puna sakaṭamaggameva otarati,
tika-vin09t0:753_5: Ettha ca sace sakaṭamaggassa antimacakkamaggaṃ nimittaṃ karonti,
tika-vin09t0:753_10: Sacepi dve maggā nikkhamitvā pacchā sakaṭadhuramiva ekībhavanti,
tika-vin09t0:753_11: dvidhā bhinnaṭṭhāne vā sambandhaṭṭhāne vā sakiṃ kittetvā puna na kittetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:754_0: Sace vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā cattāro maggā catūsu disāsu gacchanti,
tika-vin09t0:754_1: majjhe ekaṃ kittetvā aparaṃ kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:754_3: Koṇaṃ vinivijjhitvā gataṃ pana parabhāge kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:754_4: Vihāramajjhena vinivijjhitvā gatamaggo pana na kittetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:754_5: Kittite pana nimittassa upari vihāro hoti.
tika-vin09t0:754_6: Imañca maggaṃ kittentena “maggo pajjo patho”tiādinā vuttesu dasasu nāmesu yena kenaci nāmena kittetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:754_7: Parikhāsaṇṭhānena vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā gatamaggo ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:755_0: Yaṃ pana abaddhasīmālakkhaṇe nadiṃ vakkhāmāti “yassā dhammikānaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle”tiādinā udakukkhepasīmāyaṃ nadiyā vakkhamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:755_1: Yā pana nadī maggo viya sakaṭadhurasaṇṭhānena vā parikhāsaṇṭhānena vā vihāraṃ parikkhipitvā gatā,
tika-vin09t0:755_2: naṃ ekattha kittetvā aññattha kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:755_3: Vihārassa catūsu disāsu aññamaññaṃ vinivijjhitvā gate nadīcatukkepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:755_5: Sace vatiṃ karonto viya rukkhapāde nikhaṇitvā vallipalālādīhi nadīsotaṃ rumbhanti,
tika-vin09t0:755_9: evaṃ setumhi kate appavattamānā nadī nimittaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:756_0: Yā pana dubbuṭṭhikāle vā gimhe vā nirudakabhāvena nappavattati,
tika-vin09t0:756_3: sā kunnadīsadisā hutvā tīṇi sassāni sampādentī niccaṃ pavattati.
tika-vin09t0:756_6: Yā pana mūle mahānadito niggatāpi kālantarena teneva niggatamaggena nadiṃ bhinditvā sayameva gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:756_7: gacchantī ca parato susumārādisamākiṇṇā nāvādīhi sañcaritabbā nadī hoti,
tika-vin09t0:757_2: Vuttaparicchedakālaṃ atiṭṭhantanti “yāva kammavācāpariyosānā saṇṭhamānaka”nti vuttaparicchedakālaṃ atiṭṭhantaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:757_4: Yaṃ pana andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “gambhīresu āvāṭādīsu ukkhepimaṃ udakaṃ nimittaṃ na kātabba”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:757_7: Ṭhitaṃ pana antamaso sūkarakhatāyapi gāmadārakānaṃ kīḷanavāpiyampi sace yāva kammavācāpariyosānaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:757_10: Tasmiṃ pana ṭhāne nimittasaññākaraṇatthaṃ pāsāṇavālikāpaṃsuādirāsi vā pāsāṇatthambho vā dārutthambho vā kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:758_0: Evaṃ nimittasampattiyuttataṃ dassetvā idāni yehi ākārehi baddhā parisāsampattiyuttā nāma hoti,
tika-vin09t0:758_2: Imassa pana kammassa catuvaggakaraṇīyattā “catūhi bhikkhūhī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:758_3: Imañca sīmaṃ bandhitukāmehi sāmantavihāresu bhikkhū tassa tassa vihārassa sīmāparicchedaṃ pucchitvā baddhasīmavihārānaṃ sīmāya sīmantarikaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:758_4: abaddhasīmavihārānaṃ sīmāya upacāraṃ ṭhapetvā disācārikabhikkhūnaṃ nissañcārasamaye sace ekasmiṃ gāmakhette sīmaṃ bandhitukāmā,
tika-vin09t0:758_12: Tasmiṃ gāmakhetteti yasmiṃ gāmakhette ṭhatvā kammavācaṃ vācenti,
tika-vin09t0:758_20: Antonimittagatehi pana bhikkhūhi āgantabba”nti vatvā puna āha “samānasaṃvāsakasīmāsammannanakāle āgamanampi anāgamanampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:759_0: Idāni yehi ākārehi sammatā kammavācāsampattiyuttā nāma hoti,
tika-vin09t0:759_4: saṅgho etehi nimittehi sīmaṃ sammanneyya samānasaṃvāsaṃ ekūposathaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:759_8: saṅgho etehi nimittehi sīmaṃ sammannati samānasaṃvāsaṃ ekūposathaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:759_9: yassāyasmato khamati etehi nimittehi sīmāya sammuti samānasaṃvāsāya ekūposathāya,
tika-vin09t0:759_13: Sammatā sīmā saṅghena etehi nimittehi samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā,
tika-vin09t0:760_3: Imāsu pana tīsu sīmaṃ sammannantehi pabbajjupasampadādīnaṃ saṅghakammānaṃ sukhakaraṇatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ khaṇḍasīmā bandhitabbā.
tika-vin09t0:760_5: Sace hi bodhicetiyabhattasālādīni sabbavatthūni patiṭṭhāpetvā katavihāre bandhanti,
tika-vin09t0:760_6: vihāramajjhe bahūnaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhāne abandhitvā vihārapaccante vivittokāse bandhitabbā.
tika-vin09t0:760_7: Akatavihāre bandhantehi bodhicetiyādīnaṃ sabbavatthūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ sallakkhetvā yathā patiṭṭhitesu vatthūsu vihārapaccante vivittokāse hoti,
tika-vin09t0:760_9: Sā heṭṭhimaparicchedena sace ekavīsatibhikkhū gaṇhāti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:760_12: Taṃ bandhantehi sīmāmāḷakassa samantā nimittupagā pāsāṇā ṭhapetabbā,
tika-vin09t0:761_1: samantā “eso pāsāṇo nimitta”nti evaṃ nimittāni kittetvā kammavācāya sīmā sammannitabbā.
tika-vin09t0:761_2: Atha tassā eva daḷhīkammatthaṃ avippavāsakammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin09t0:761_3: Evañhi “sīmaṃ samūhanissāmā”ti āgatā samūhanituṃ na sakkhissanti.
tika-vin09t0:762_0: Evaṃ khaṇḍasīmaṃ sammannitvā mahāsīmāsammutikāle khaṇḍasīmato nikkhamitvā mahāsīmāyaṃ ṭhatvā samantā anupariyāyantehi sīmantarikapāsāṇā kittetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:762_1: Tato avasesanimitte kittetvā hatthapāsaṃ avijahantehi kammavācāya samānasaṃvāsakasīmaṃ sammannitvā tassā
tika-vin09t0:762_3: Evañhi “sīmaṃ samūhanissāmā”ti āgatā samūhanituṃ na sakkhissanti.
tika-vin09t0:762_4: Sace pana khaṇḍasīmāya nimittāni kittetvā tato sīmantarikāya nimittāni kittetvā mahāsīmāya nimittāni kittenti,
tika-vin09t0:762_5: evaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu nimittāni kittetvā yaṃ sīmaṃ icchanti,
tika-vin09t0:762_7: Evaṃ santepi yathāvuttanayena khaṇḍasīmatova paṭṭhāya bandhitabbā.
tika-vin09t0:762_8: Evaṃ baddhāsu pana sīmāsu khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ ṭhitā bhikkhū mahāsīmāyaṃ kammaṃ karontānaṃ na kopenti,
tika-vin09t0:762_10: Sīmantarikāya pana ṭhitā ubhinnampi na kopanti.
tika-vin09t0:762_11: Gāmakhette ṭhatvā kammaṃ karontānaṃ pana sīmantarikāya ṭhitā kopenti.
tika-vin09t0:762_13: Avippavāsasīmāsammannane kate sati sā ca avippavāsasīmā nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t0:763_1: “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti vacanato avippavāsasīmā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca na otarati,
tika-vin09t0:763_6: Na hi tassā visuṃ nimittakittanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin09t0:763_7: Tattha sace avippavāsāya sammutikāle gāmo atthi,
tika-vin09t0:763_9: Sace pana sammatāya sīmāya pacchā gāmo nivisati,
tika-vin09t0:763_12: evaṃ paṭhamaṃ niviṭṭhassa pacchā vaḍḍhitappadesopi sīmāsaṅkhameva gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:763_16: porāṇagāmaṃ vā sagehameva chaḍḍetvā aññattha gatā,
tika-vin09t0:763_19: Sace pana ekampi kulaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ vā agataṃ vā atthi, gāmoyeva,
tika-vin09t0:764_0: Evaṃ baddhasīmaṃ dassetvā idāni abaddhasīmaṃ dassento “abaddhasīmā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:764_3: Yattake padese tassa gāmassa gāmabhojakā baliṃ labhanti,
tika-vin09t0:764_7: Yampi ekasmiṃyeva gāmakhette ekaṃ padesaṃ “ayaṃ visuṃ gāmo hotū”ti paricchinditvā rājā kassaci deti,
tika-vin09t0:764_9: Tasmā sā ca itarā ca pakatigāmasīmā baddhasīmāsadisāva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:765_5: Yattha tadaheva gantvā tadaheva paccāgantuṃ na sakkā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:765_7: Tesaṃ gamanapariyantassa orato pana gāmasīmāsaṅkhaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:765_8: Tattha gāmasīmaṃ asodhetvā kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:765_9: Majjhe ṭhitānaṃ sabbadisāsu sattabbhantarāti majjhe ṭhitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhitokāsato sabbadisāsu sattabbhantarā.
tika-vin09t0:765_16: Ettha ca uposathassa visuṃ gahitattā avasesakammavasena samānasaṃvāsatā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:765_24: Titthena vā atitthena vā otaritvāti pāṭhaseso.
tika-vin09t0:765_28: Bhikkhunīvibhaṅge bhikkhuniyā vasena nadīlakkhaṇassa pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā “bhikkhuniyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:766_0: Kenaci khaṇitvā akatoti antamaso tiracchānenapi khaṇitvā akato.
tika-vin09t0:766_1: Nadiṃ vā samuddaṃ vā bhinditvāti nadīkūlaṃ vā samuddavelaṃ vā bhinditvā.
tika-vin09t0:766_2: Etaṃ lakkhaṇanti “yattha nadiyaṃ vuttappakāre vassakāle udakaṃ santiṭṭhatī”ti vuttappakāralakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:766_4: Yattha pana vuttappakāre vassakāle vasse pacchinnamatte pivituṃ vā hatthapāde dhovituṃ vā udakaṃ na hoti sukkhati,
tika-vin09t0:767_3: Ayaṃ udakukkhepo nāmāti ayaṃ udakukkhepena paricchinnā sīmā nāmāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:767_8: pabhavato paṭṭhāya yāva mukhadvāraṃ sabbattha saṅgho nisīdati,
tika-vin09t0:768_4: Antonadiyaṃ jātassare jātapiṭṭhipāsāṇadīpakesupi ayameva vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:768_5: Sace pana nadī paripuṇṇā hoti samatitthikā,
tika-vin09t0:768_9: Gacchantiyā pana nāvāya kātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:768_16: antonadiyaṃ jātarukkhe vā bandhitvā kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:768_17: Antonadiyaṃ baddhaaṭṭakepi antonadiyaṃ jātarukkhepi ṭhitehi kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:769_0: Sace pana rukkhassa sākhā vā tato nikkhantapāroho vā bahinadītīre vihārasīmāya vā gāmasīmāya vā patiṭṭhito,
tika-vin09t0:769_3: Bahinadītīre jātarukkhassa antonadiyaṃ paviṭṭhasākhāya vā pārohe vā nāvaṃ bandhitvā kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:769_5: sākhaṃ chinditvā vā tassa bahipatiṭṭhitabhāgo nāsetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:769_6: Nadītīre pana khāṇukaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha bandhanāvāya na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:770_1: sace antonadiyaṃyeva setu vā setupādā vā,
tika-vin09t0:770_3: Sace pana setu vā setupādā vā bahitīre patiṭṭhitā,
tika-vin09t0:770_7: setu pana ubhinnampi tīrānaṃ upariākāse ṭhito, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:771_0: “Yasmiṃ padese pakativīciyo ottharitvā saṇṭhahantī”ti etena yaṃ padesaṃ uddhaṃ vaḍḍhanakaudakaṃ vā pakativīciyo vā vegena āgantvā ottharanti,
tika-vin09t0:771_1: tattha kammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:771_3: nāvāya vā aṭṭake vā ṭhatvā kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:771_5: Sace pana samuddo gāmasīmaṃ vā nigamasīmaṃ vā ottharitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:771_8: Tato paṭṭhāya kappiyabhūmīti ottharitvā saṇṭhitaudakantato paṭṭhāya anto nadījātassarasamuddo nāmāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:771_12: evaṃ āvāṭapokkharaṇīādīnaṃ khaṇanepi gāmakhettaṃ hotiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:771_13: Vappaṃ vā karontīti lābutipusakādivappaṃ vā karonti.
tika-vin09t0:771_17: Sace pana jātassaraṃ pūretvā thalaṃ karonti,
tika-vin09t0:771_18: ekasmiṃ disābhāge pāḷiṃ bandhitvā sabbameva naṃ mahātaḷākaṃ vā karonti,
tika-vin09t0:772_4: Upari pavattanaṭṭhāne chaḍḍitaṃ udakaṃ nadiṃ ottharitvā sandanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:772_5: Kāci nadī kālantarena uppatitvā gāmanigamasīmaṃ ottharitvā pavattati,
tika-vin09t0:772_10: Samantā udakukkhepaparicchedo kātabboti pahonakaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:773_1: añño eko udakukkhepo ca upacāratthāya ṭhapetabboti āha “ayaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:773_3: yasmā ayaṃ sattabbhantarasīmā ca udakukkhepasīmā ca bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhitokāsato paṭṭhāya labbhati,
tika-vin09t0:773_4: te ca bhikkhū na sabbadā ekasadisā,
tika-vin09t0:773_10: añño eko udakukkhepo ca upacāratthāya ṭhapetabboti.
tika-vin09t0:773_14: na pana tattha katassa kammassa kuppattāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:773_15: Paricchedato bahi aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopīti attano sattabbhantarena,
tika-vin09t0:773_18: tato bahi aññaṃ tattakaṃyeva paricchedaṃ anatikkamitvā ṭhitopīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:777_4: Lahukāpattinti lahukena vinayakammena visujjhanato lahukā thullaccayapācittiyapāṭidesanīyadukkaṭadubbhāsitasaṅkhātā pañcāpattiyo.
tika-vin09t0:777_5: Vatthusabhāgāya saṅghādisesāpattiyāpi sati uposathakammaṃ pattakallaṃ na hotiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:777_6: Yathāha “sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvi kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:778_4: Iccetaṃ kusalanti iti etaṃ sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:778_6: No ce labhethāti vihārānaṃ dūratāya vā magge paripanthādinā vā yadi na labhetha.
tika-vin09t0:778_7: “Tassa santike paṭikarissatī”ti iminā vacanena sabhāgāpatti āvi kātumpi na labbhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:778_10: Yadi pana sabbo saṅgho sabhāgaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ āpanno hoti,
tika-vin09t0:778_11: ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:778_27: Vuttanayenevāti “pārisuddhiṃ āyasmanto ārocethā”tiādinā nayena sāpattikassa uposathakaraṇe paññattaṃ dukkaṭaṃ āpajjantīti vuttanayeneva.
tika-vin09t0:778_29: Visabhāgāpattīsu vijjamānāsupi pattakallaṃ hotiyevāti visabhāgāsu pana vijjamānāsu tesaṃyeva puggalānaṃ āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:779_0: Antimavatthuajjhāpannako nāma catunnaṃ pārājikānaṃ aññataraṃ ajjhāpannako.
tika-vin09t0:779_1: Paṇḍakādīnaṃ vinicchayo parato pārājikuddese āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin09t0:779_2: Tiracchānagatoti antamaso sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya yo koci nāgamāṇavakādiko amanussajātiko veditabbo,
tika-vin09t0:779_9: na upasampādetabbo”ti yassa nāgasupaṇṇādino tiracchānagatassa upasampadā paṭikkhittā,
tika-vin09t0:779_11: Tattha hi antamaso deve upādāya nāgamāṇavakādiko yo koci amanussajātiko “tiracchānagato”ti adhippeto.
tika-vin09t0:779_13: bhikkhaveti ettha nāgo vā hotu supaṇṇamāṇavakādīnaṃ vā aññataro,
tika-vin09t0:779_14: antamaso sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ upādāya yo koci amanussajātiyo,
tika-vin09t0:780_6: “Imasmiṃ vītikkame ayaṃ nāma āpattī”ti evaṃ āpattivasena āṇāpanaṃ paññāpanaṃ āṇā,
tika-vin09t0:781_0: Khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā…pe… vuttā tisso gāthāyo nāma –
tika-vin09t0:790_0: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. –
tika-vin09t0:792_0: Tattha khantī paramaṃ tapoti adhivāsanakhanti nāma paramaṃ tapo.
tika-vin09t0:792_3: Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadantīti sabbākārena pana nibbānaṃ “parama”nti vadanti buddhā.
tika-vin09t0:792_4: Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātīti yo adhivāsanakhantivirahitattā paraṃ upaghāteti bādhati vihiṃsati,
tika-vin09t0:792_7: “Na hi pabbajito”ti etassa hi “nasamaṇo hotī”ti vevacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:792_11: Yo ca samaṇo paraṃ yaṃ kañci sattaṃ viheṭhayanto parūpaghātī hoti,
