tika-vin09t0:792_13: so pabbajito nāma na hotīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:792_14: Atha vā yo adhivāsanakhantiyā abhāvā parūpaghātī hoti,
tika-vin09t0:792_15: paraṃ antamaso ḍaṃsamakasampi sañcicca jīvitā voropeti,
tika-vin09t0:792_21: Yopi na heva kho upaghāteti na māreti,
tika-vin09t0:792_23: so paraṃ viheṭhayanto samaṇo na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:793_4: Sacittapariyodapananti attano cittassa vodāpanaṃ pabhassarabhāvakaraṇaṃ sabbaso parisodhanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:793_6: Iti sīlasaṃvarena sabbapāpaṃ pahāya lokiyalokuttarāhi samathavipassanāhi kusalaṃ sampādetvā arahattaphalena
tika-vin09t0:793_7: cittaṃ pariyodāpetabbanti etaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhi.
tika-vin09t0:794_2: Pātimokkheti yaṃ taṃ pātimokkhaṃ paatimokkhaṃ atipamokkhaṃ uttamaṃ sīlaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:794_12: Ettha ca dvihiyeva paccayehi catupaccayasantoso dīpitoti veditabbo paccayasantosasāmaññena itaradvayassāpi lakkhaṇahāranayena jotitattā.
tika-vin09t0:794_15: tasmiṃ yathāvutte adhicitte āyogo ca anuyogo cāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:794_16: Etaṃ buddhāna sāsananti etaṃ parassa anupavadanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:794_20: aṭṭhasamāpattivasibhāvāya vivittasenāsanasevanañca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhīti.
tika-vin09t0:794_21: Imā pana tisso gāthā sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthāyo hontīti veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:795_4: na ca tattha pariyāpannāti āha “taṃ sāvakā eva uddisanti,
tika-vin09t0:796_3: Sā hi catunnaṃ māsānaṃ pāripūribhūtāti cātumāsī,
tika-vin09t0:797_1: sace purimikāya pañca bhikkhū vassaṃ upagatā,
tika-vin09t0:797_3: purimehi ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā pavārite pacchimehi tesaṃ santike pārisuddhiuposatho kātabbo,
tika-vin09t0:797_4: na ekasmiṃ uposathagge dve ñattiyo ṭhapetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:797_5: Sacepi pacchimikāya upagatā cattāro, tayo, dve,
tika-vin09t0:797_9: pacchimikāyapi cattāro, tayo, dve, eko vā,
tika-vin09t0:797_15: sace purimikāya upagatehi pacchimikāya upagatā thokatarā ceva honti samasamā ca,
tika-vin09t0:797_21: catunnaṃ saṅghañattiṃ ṭhapetvā pavāretuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:797_23: tasmā gaṇavasena ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā purimehi pavāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:797_32: Sace purimavassūpagatehi pacchimavassūpagatā ekenapi adhikatarā honti,
tika-vin09t0:797_33: paṭhamaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā pacchā thokatarehi tesaṃ santike pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:797_34: Kattikacātumāsinipavāraṇāya pana sace paṭhamaṃ vassūpagatehi mahāpavāraṇāya pavāritehi pacchā upagatā adhikatarā vā samasamā vā honti,
tika-vin09t0:797_36: Tehi pavārite pacchā itarehi pārisuddhiuposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:797_38: pacchā vassūpagatā thokā vā eko vā,
tika-vin09t0:797_39: pātimokkhe uddiṭṭhe pacchā tesaṃ santike tena pavāretabbanti.
tika-vin09t0:798_0: Ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvāti ekasmiṃ aṃse sādhukaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:798_3: saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā tattheva nisinnena attano pāḷiyā pārisuddhiuposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:798_4: Pātimokkhe uddisiyamāne pana pāḷiyā anisīditvā pāḷiṃ vihāya hatthapāsaṃ amuñcantena nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:799_1: Yathā ca sabbo saṅgho sabhāgāpattiṃ āpajjitvā “suṇātu me, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:799_3: paṭikarissatī”ti ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ labhati,
tika-vin09t0:799_4: evametthāpi tīhi “suṇantu me āyasmantā ime bhikkhū sabhāgaṃ āpattiṃ āpannā,
tika-vin09t0:799_5: yadā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ suddhaṃ anāpattikaṃ passissanti,
tika-vin09t0:799_6: tadā tassa santike taṃ āpattiṃ paṭikarissantī”ti gaṇañattiṃ ṭhapetvā,
tika-vin09t0:799_7: dvīhipi “aññaṃ suddhaṃ passitvā paṭikarissāmā”ti vatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:799_8: Ekenāpi “parisuddhaṃ labhitvā paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:799_12: Anāvāso nāma navakammasālādiko yo koci padeso.
tika-vin09t0:799_14: Aññatra antarāyāti pubbe vuttaṃ dasavidhamantarāyaṃ vinā.
tika-vin09t0:799_15: Sabbantimena pana paricchedena attacatutthena antarāye vā sati gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:799_23: Āraññakenāpi bhikkhunā uposathadivase gāme piṇḍāya caritvā attano vihārameva āgantabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:799_27: Yaṃ jaññā “ajjeva tattha gantuṃ sakkomī”ti evarūpo pana āvāso gantabbo.
tika-vin09t0:799_28: Tattha bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karontenāpi hi iminā neva uposathantarāyo kato bhavissatīti.
tika-vin09t0:800_0: Udakaṃ āsanena cāti āsanena saha pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ udakañcāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:800_2: Pubbakaraṇato pacchā kattabbampi uposathakammato paṭhamaṃ kattabbattā pubbakiccaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:800_3: Ubhayampi cetaṃ uposathakammato paṭhamaṃ kattabbattā “pubbakicca”micceva ettha vuttanti āha “evaṃ dvīhi nāmehi navavidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ dassita”nti.
tika-vin09t0:800_4: Kiṃ taṃ katanti pucchatīti āha “na hī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:800_5: Taṃ akatvā uposathaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati “na,
tika-vin09t0:801_0: Sace pana āṇatto sammajjaniṃ tāvakālikampi na labhati,
tika-vin09t0:801_3: Pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbanti āgantukānaṃ atthāya pānīyaparibhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:801_7: Āsanesu asati kaṭasārakepi taṭṭikāyopi paññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:801_8: Taṭṭikāsupi asati sākhābhaṅgāni kappiyaṃ kāretvā paññāpetabbāni.
tika-vin09t0:801_12: Āṇāpentena pana “asukasmiṃ nāma okāse telaṃ vā vaṭṭi vā kapallikā vā atthi,
tika-vin09t0:801_18: Āṇāpentena ca kiñci kammaṃ karonto vā sadākālameva eko vā bhāranittharaṇako vā sarabhāṇakadhammakathikādīsu aññataro vā na āṇāpetabbo,
tika-vin09t0:802_0: Bahi uposathaṃ katvā āgatenāti nadiyā vā sīmāya vā yattha katthaci uposathaṃ katvā āgatena chando dātabbo,
tika-vin09t0:802_1: “kato mayā uposatho”ti acchituṃ na labhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:802_3: Sace gilāno chandapārisuddhiṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin09t0:802_4: mañcena vā pīṭhena vā saṅghamajjhaṃ ānetvā uposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:802_5: Sace gilānupaṭṭhākānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ hoti “sace kho mayaṃ imaṃ gilānaṃ ṭhānā cāvessāma,
tika-vin09t0:802_8: na tveva so gilāno ṭhānā cāvetabbo,
tika-vin09t0:802_10: na tveva vaggena saṅghena uposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:802_14: saṅghena paṭipāṭiyā ṭhatvā sabbe hatthapāse kātabbā.
tika-vin09t0:802_18: na tveva vaggena saṅghena uposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:802_22: santi saṅghassa karaṇīya”nti vuttattā bhagavato āṇaṃ karontena “chandaṃ dammī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:802_26: aññassa dātabbo chando”tiādivacanato puna attano chandadānaparissamavinodanatthaṃ “chandaṃ me harā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:802_29: dinne chande saṅghappatto sañcicca na āroceti,
tika-vin09t0:802_31: chandahārakassa āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vuttattā dukkaṭato taṃ mocetuṃ “chandaṃ me ārocehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:803_0: Kāyena vā vācāya vā ubhayena vā viññāpetabboti manasā cintetvā kāyappayogaṃ karontena yena kenaci aṅgapaccaṅgena vā,
tika-vin09t0:803_1: vācaṃ pana nicchāretuṃ sakkontena tatheva vācāya vā,
tika-vin09t0:803_4: “Ayaṃ attho”ti vacanato pana yāya kāyacipi bhāsāya viññāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:803_6: Taṃ pana dentena paṭhamaṃ santī āpatti desetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:803_10: “Santi saṅghassa karaṇīyānī”ti vattabbe vacanavipallāsena “santi saṅghassa karaṇīya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:803_11: Tesañca attano ca chandapārisuddhiṃ detīti ettha chando ca chandapārisuddhi ca chandapārisuddhi,
tika-vin09t0:803_14: Biḷālasaṅkhalikā chandapārisuddhīti ettha biḷālasaṅkhalikā nāma biḷālabandhanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:803_15: Tattha hi saṅkhalikāya paṭhamavalayaṃ dutiyavalayaṃyeva pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin09t0:803_20: Biḷālasaṅkhalikaggahaṇañcettha yāsaṃ kāsañci saṅkhalikānaṃ upalakkhaṇamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:804_0: Utukkhānanti taṃ taṃ kiriyaṃ arati vattetīti utu,
tika-vin09t0:804_7: Sve uposathoti āgantvāti “sve uposatho hotī”ti vutte ajjeva āgantvā pannarasike uposathe pakkhassa cātuddasiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:804_9: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “pakkhassa terasiyaṃyeva āgantvā ‘ayaṃ uposatho cātuddasiko vā pannarasiko vā’ti pucchitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:804_10: Evaṃ pucchitena ca bhikkhunā sace cātuddasiyaṃ uposathaṃ karonti,
tika-vin09t0:804_18: ṭhapetvā gamikaṃ avasesehi ovādaṃ gahetu”nti vuttattā “taṃ ṭhapetvā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:804_20: Cātuddasikapannarasikesu uposathesu vā pāṭipade vā gantukāmo gamiyo,
tika-vin09t0:804_21: dutiyapakkhadivasato pana paṭṭhāya tato uddhaṃ gacchanto idha gamiyo nāma na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:804_25: vihāre na vasāmī”ti appaṭiggahituṃ na labhati.
tika-vin09t0:804_38: Tasmā āraññikena bhikkhunā sace bhikkhunīnaṃ vasanagāme bhikkhā labbhati,
tika-vin09t0:804_39: tattheva caritvā bhikkhuniyo disvā ārocetvā gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:804_40: No cassa tattha bhikkhā sulabhā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:804_41: sāmantagāme caritvā bhikkhunīnaṃ gāmaṃ āgamma tatheva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:804_43: saṅketo kātabbo “ahaṃ asukaṃ nāma tumhākaṃ gāmadvāre sabhaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā rukkhamūlaṃ vā upasaṅkamissāmi,
tika-vin09t0:805_2: aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
tika-vin09t0:805_4: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti,
tika-vin09t0:805_9: Ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso.
tika-vin09t0:805_13: Na kho panetaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajitāya kāsāyavatthavasanāya garudhammaṃ ajjhāpannapubbo hoti.
tika-vin09t0:806_3: Yadā pana tāhi bhikkhunīhi pātimokkhuddesakaṃyeva disvā ovādo yācito,
tika-vin09t0:806_4: tadā uposathagge sannipatitehi bhikkhusaṅghehi pubbakiccavasena “atthi kāci bhikkhuniyo ovādaṃ yācamānā”ti
tika-vin09t0:806_5: pucchite “evaṃ vadehī”ti attanā vattabbavacanaṃ aññena kathāpetvā “atthi koci bhikkhu bhikkhunovādako
tika-vin09t0:806_6: sammato”tiādiṃ sayaṃ vatvā puna sayameva gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:806_7: Aññena vā bhikkhunā tasmiṃ divase pātimokkhaṃ uddisāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:807_0: Ñattiṭṭhapakena vāti yattha tiṇṇaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne pātimokkhuddeso natthi,
tika-vin09t0:807_2: Itarena vāti yattha dve bhikkhū vasanti, eko vā,
tika-vin09t0:807_3: tattha itarena vā bhikkhunā sace sayameva sammato,
tika-vin09t0:807_10: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato ovādaṃ gahetvā uposathagge anārocetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:808_2: Ettha siyāti “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti etasmiṃ pade ayamanuyogo bhaveyya. Kiṃ taṃ,
tika-vin09t0:808_4: Pubbenāparaṃ sandhiyatīti pubbavacanena aparaṃ vacanaṃ sandhānaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:808_7: Saṅghassa uddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti saṅghena uddiṭṭhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:809_0: Therā ca navā ca majjhimā cāti ettha dasavassā,
tika-vin09t0:809_5: Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti attānaṃ tena pātimokkhena atthikaṃ katvā,
tika-vin09t0:809_6: taṃ vā pātimokkhaṃ “idaṃ mayhaṃ pātimokkha”nti atthiṃ katvā.
tika-vin09t0:809_9: Sabbacetasā samannāharāmāti cittassa thokampi bahi gantuṃ adentā sabbena cittena āvajjema,
tika-vin09t0:809_13: So ca kho manasikāro na ettha ārammaṇappaṭipādanalakkhaṇo,
tika-vin09t0:809_14: atha kho vīthippaṭipādanajavanappaṭipādanamanasikārapubbakacitte ṭhapanalakkhaṇoti āha “ekaggacittā hutvā citte ṭhapeyyāmā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:810_0: Idāni taṃ dassetunti sambandho. Āyasmantoti sannipatitānaṃ piyavacanena ālapanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:812_2: Parigūhatīti nigūhati na deseti na vuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin09t0:812_4: “kiṃ iminā”ti anādariyena parigūhanto alajjī hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:812_5: Agatigamanañca gacchatīti bhaṇḍabhājanīyaṭṭhānādīsu chandāgatiādibhedaṃ agatigamanañca gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:812_7: Ettha ca “sañciccā”ti iminā anādariyavaseneva āpattiṃ āpajjanto,
tika-vin09t0:812_9: bhaṇḍabhājanīyaṭṭhānādīsu agatigamanaṃ gacchanto ca alajjī hoti,
tika-vin09t0:813_5: Kappiyaṃ ce kattabbaṃ siyāti vinayadharaṃ pucchitvā tena vatthuṃ oloketvā mātikaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:813_9: mā ettha kaṅkhī”ti vutte kattabbaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin09t0:814_0: Sahaseyyacīvaravippavāsādīnīti ettha sahaseyyā nāma anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyāpatti,
tika-vin09t0:815_0: Desetu vā pakāsetu vāti saṅghamajjhe vā gaṇamajjhe vā ekapuggale vā desetu vā pakāsetu vā.
tika-vin09t0:815_1: Ettha ca pārājikāpattidesanā nāma bhikkhubhāvassa pariccāgo.
tika-vin09t0:816_0: Evaṃ anāpannā vāti evaṃ channaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarena anāpannā vā.
tika-vin09t0:816_3: Ārocento ca “tuyhaṃ santike ekaṃ āpattiṃ āvikaromī”ti vā “ācikkhāmī”ti vā “ārocemī”ti vā “mama ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpannabhāvaṃ jānāhī”ti vā vadatu,
tika-vin09t0:816_4: “ekaṃ garukaṃ āpattiṃ āvikaromī”ti vā ādinā nayena vadatu,
tika-vin09t0:816_6: Sace pana garukāpattiṃ āvikaronto “lahukāpattiṃ āvikaromī”tiādinā nayena vadati,
tika-vin09t0:816_15: atha kho tuṇhībhāvenāpīti apisaddassa attho veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:817_1: kathañcetaṃ yāvatatiyānusāvitaṃ hotīti vicāraṇāyaṃ ācariyānaṃ matibhedamukhena tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hotīti etthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:817_8: atthassa ca byañjanassa ca visadisattāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:818_10: Dhātvatthasambandho kālantaravihitopi paccayo kālantare sādhu hotīti vikappesuṃ.
tika-vin09t0:818_13: Atthayuttīnaṃ abhāvatoti anāgatatthassa ca kāraṇassa ca abhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:818_17: Anusāvitaṃ hessatīti vadeyyāti anuppayogaṃ anāgatakālaṃ katvā “anusāvitaṃ hessatī”ti buddho vadeyya.
tika-vin09t0:818_22: so ca anuppayogassa samānatthabhāve sati uppajjati,
tika-vin09t0:818_28: Yadi evaṃ “yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hotī”ti kimidanti āha “yāvatatiya”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:819_3: Imameva ca atthanti imaṃ amhehi vuttamevatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:819_4: Yadi hi “yassa siyā āpattī”tiādivacanattayaṃ yāvatatiyānusāvanaṃ siyā,
tika-vin09t0:819_7: Nanu cāyaṃ vinicchayo aṭṭhakathāsu na āgato,
tika-vin09t0:819_9: Vinayaṭṭhānesu kataparicayānaṃ ācariyānaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpentī paveṇi ācariyaparamparā,
tika-vin09t0:820_1: atha kathaṃ dukkaṭāpatti hotīti āha “sā ca kho na musāvādalakkhaṇenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:820_2: Sampajānamusāvāde kiṃ hotīti yvāyaṃ “sampajānamusāvādo assa hotī”ti vutto,
tika-vin09t0:820_6: Vacīdvāre akiriyasamuṭṭhānāpatti hotīti assa hi bhikkhuno adhammikāya paṭiññāya tuṇhībhūtassa nisinnassa manodvāre āpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin09t0:820_8: tenassa vacīdvāre akiriyato ayaṃ āpatti samuṭṭhātīti veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:820_10: Etaṃ upālittherena parivāre sedamocanagāthāsu vuttampi cāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:821_0: Anālapanto manujena kenaci vācāti kenaci manujena vācāya anālapanto.
tika-vin09t0:821_1: Giraṃ no ca pare bhaṇeyyāti “iti ime sossantī”ti parapuggale sandhāya saddampi na nicchāreyya.
tika-vin09t0:821_2: Āpajjeyya vācasikanti vācato samuṭṭhitaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-vin09t0:821_3: Pañhāmesā kusalehi cintitāti ettha pañhāmesāti liṅgabyattayena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:821_5: Ayaṃ pañho imameva musāvādaṃ sandhāya vutto.
tika-vin09t0:822_0: Taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo,
tika-vin09t0:822_6: Tattha vippaṭisāravatthutāyāti vippaṭisāro nāma pacchānutāpavasena cittavippaṭisāro,
tika-vin09t0:822_13: Paṭhamajjhānādīnanti etthādisaddena pana “dutiyassa jhānassa adhigamāya antarāyiko,
tika-vin09t0:822_22: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhigamāya antarāyiko”ti vuttadutiyajjhānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:822_23: “Tasmā”ti vutte yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ abyabhicāritasambandhatāya “yasmā”ti ayamattho upaṭṭhitoyeva hotīti āha “tasmāti yasmā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:822_28: Sā ca visuddhi idha vuṭṭhānādīti āha “vuṭṭhātukāmena visujjhitukāmenā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:822_31: Saṅghamajjhe vā gaṇamajjhe vā ekapuggale vāti uposathagge saṅghassa ārocanavasena saṅghamajjhe vā tattheva
tika-vin09t0:822_32: ubhato nisinnānaṃ ārocanavasena gaṇamajjhe vā anantarassa ārocanavasena ekapuggale vā pakāsetabbā.
tika-vin09t0:822_36: Tasmā tassa avatvā “ito vuṭṭhahitvā paṭikarissāmī”ti ābhogaṃ katvā uposatho kātabboti andhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:823_3: Paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamāya phāsu hotīti adhigamatthaṃ tassa bhikkhuno phāsu hoti sukhaṃ hoti saṃvarassa avippaṭisārahetuttā.
tika-vin09t0:823_6: so mūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ yesaṃ te avippaṭisāramūlā,
tika-vin09t0:831_0: Idāni nidānuddesānantaraṃ vuttassa pārājikuddesassa atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “idānī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:833_0: Yo panāti ettha yasmā panāti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:833_3: Tasmā tassa atthaṃ dassento “yo kocī”ti āha.
tika-vin09t0:833_14: liṅgavasena yādiso vā tādiso vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:833_15: dīgho vā rasso vā kāḷo vā odāto vā maṅguracchavi vā kiso vā thūlo vā.
tika-vin09t0:833_16: Yogavasena yena vā tena vā yutto hotu,
tika-vin09t0:833_17: navakammayutto vā uddesayutto vā vāsadhurayutto vā.
tika-vin09t0:833_18: Jātivasena yaṃjacco vā taṃjacco vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:833_19: khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddho vā.
tika-vin09t0:833_20: Nāmavasena yathānāmo vā tathānāmo vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:833_21: buddharakkhito vā dhammarakkhito vā saṅgharakkhito vā.
tika-vin09t0:833_22: Gottavasena yathāgotto vā tathāgotto vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:833_23: kaccāyano vā vāsiṭṭho vā kosiyo vā.
tika-vin09t0:833_24: Sīlesu yathāsīlo vā tathāsīlo vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:833_25: navakammasīlo vā uddesasīlo vā vāsadhurasīlo vā.
tika-vin09t0:833_26: Vihāresupi yathāvihārī vā tathāvihārī vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:833_27: navakammavihārī vā uddesavihārī vā vāsadhuravihārī vā.
tika-vin09t0:833_28: Gocaresupi yathāgocaro vā tathāgocaro vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:833_29: navakammagocaro vā uddesagocaro vā vāsadhuragocaro vā.
tika-vin09t0:833_30: Vayesupi yo vā so vā hotu thero vā navo vā majjhimo vā,
tika-vin09t0:833_31: atha kho sabbova imasmiṃ atthe “yo”ti vuccatīti.
tika-vin09t0:834_1: Tattha “ehi bhikkhū”ti bhagavato vacanamattena bhikkhubhāvo ehibhikkhūpasampadā.
tika-vin09t0:834_2: “Buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”tiādinā nayena tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ bhinditvā vuttehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi upasampadā saraṇagamanūpasampadā.
tika-vin09t0:835_1: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘tibbaṃ me hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavissati theresu navesu majjhimesū’ti,
tika-vin09t0:835_4: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘yaṃ kiñci dhammaṃ suṇissāmi kusalūpasaṃhitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:835_5: sabbaṃ taṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karitvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇissāmī’ti,
tika-vin09t0:835_9: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatāsati na vijahissatī’ti,
tika-vin09t0:837_1: Bhagavā kira pubbārāme anucaṅkamantaṃ sopākasāmaṇeraṃ “‘uddhumātakasaññā’ti vā sopāka ‘rūpasaññā’ti vā ime dhammā nānatthā nānābyañjanā,
tika-vin09t0:837_2: udāhu ekatthā byañjanameva nāna”nti dasa asubhanissite pañhe pucchi.
tika-vin09t0:837_7: tvaṃ mama sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā pañhe byākāsī”ti āraddhacitto upasampadaṃ anujāni,
tika-vin09t0:840_1: bhikkhusaṅghato ñatticatutthenāti imehi dvīhi kammehi upasampadā.
tika-vin09t0:841_4: tissannaṃ pana anussāvanānaṃ atthabyañjanabhedābhāvato atthabyañjanabhinnaṃ ñattiṃ tāsaṃ catutthanti katvā “ñatticatuttha”nti vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:841_12: Kasmā panettha imināva upasampanno idha gahito,
tika-vin09t0:841_17: na ca te bhabbā pārājikādilokavajjaṃ āpajjituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:841_20: tasmā ñatticatuttheneva upasampadākammena upasampanno idha gahito,
tika-vin09t0:841_22: Paṇṇattivajjesu pana sikkhāpadesu aññepi ehibhikkhūpasampadāya upasampannādayo saṅgayhanti.
tika-vin09t0:841_23: Vakkhati hi “paṇṇattivajjesu pana aññepi saṅgahaṃ gacchantī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:841_24: Idāni “akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampanno”ti saṃkhittena vuttamatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “tassa panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:842_4: Ūnāni aparipuṇṇāni vīsati vassāni assāti ūnavīsativasso.
tika-vin09t0:842_13: Tesu āsittapaṇḍakassa ca usūyapaṇḍakassa ca pabbajjā na vāritā,
tika-vin09t0:842_15: Tesupi pakkhapaṇḍakassa yasmiṃ pakkhe paṇḍako hoti,
tika-vin09t0:842_19: Tattha yassa paresaṃ aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gahetvā asucinā āsittassa pariḷāho vūpasammati,
tika-vin09t0:842_21: Yassa paresaṃ ajjhācāraṃ passato usūyāya uppannāya pariḷāho vūpasammati,
tika-vin09t0:842_27: Ekacco pana akusalavipākānubhāvena kāḷapakkhe paṇḍako hoti,
tika-vin09t0:843_1: So ca na saṃvāsamattasseva thenako idhādhippeto,
tika-vin09t0:843_3: tadubhayassa ca thenakopīti āha “theyyasaṃvāsako pana tividho”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:843_4: Na bhikkhuvassāni gaṇetīti “ahaṃ dasavasso vā vīsativasso vā”ti musā vatvā bhikkhuvassāni na gaṇeti.
tika-vin09t0:843_5: Na yathāvuḍḍhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vā sāmaṇerānaṃ vā vandanaṃ sādiyatīti attanā musāvādaṃ katvā dassitavassānurūpena yathāvuḍḍhaṃ vandanaṃ nādhivāseti.
tika-vin09t0:843_8: Na uposathādīsu sandissatīti uposathappavāraṇādīsu na sandissati.
tika-vin09t0:843_12: Sace pana kāsāye dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā naggo vā odātavatthanivattho vā methunasevanādīhi assamaṇo hutvā kāsāyāni nivāseti,
tika-vin09t0:843_14: Sace gihibhāvaṃ patthayamāno kāsāyaṃ ovaṭṭikaṃ katvā,
tika-vin09t0:843_15: aññena vā ākārena gihinivāsanena nivāseti “sobhati nu kho me gihiliṅgaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:843_21: Sacepi nivatthakāsāvassa upari odātaṃ nivāsetvā vīmaṃsati vā sampaṭicchati vā,
tika-vin09t0:844_0: Antimavatthuajjhāpannakepi eseva nayoti pārājikaṃ āpannake bhikkhumhipi eseva nayoti attho.
tika-vin09t0:844_2: sace koci bhikkhu kāsāye saussāhova odātaṃ nivāsetvā methunaṃ paṭisevitvā puna kāsāyāni nivāsetvā vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ sabbaṃ vidhiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin09t0:844_3: ayaṃ bhikkhūhi dinnaliṅgassa apariccattattā na liṅgatthenako,
tika-vin09t0:844_10: Sace koci vuḍḍhapabbajito bhikkhuvassāni gaṇetvā mahāpeḷādīsu diyyamānabhattaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:844_12: Sayaṃ sāmaṇerova sāmaṇerappaṭipāṭiyā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā gaṇhanto theyyasaṃvāsako na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:844_13: Bhikkhu pana bhikkhupaṭipāṭiyā kūṭavassāni gaṇetvā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo.
tika-vin09t0:845_0: Nanu saṃvāso nāma ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti āha “bhikkhuvassagaṇanādiko hī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:845_1: Iminā na kevalaṃ ekakammādikova kiriyabhedo saṃvāsoti idhādhippeto,
tika-vin09t0:845_6: sace koci bhikkhu sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya liṅgaṃ anapanetvā dussīlakammaṃ katvā vā akatvā vā “na maṃ koci
tika-vin09t0:845_7: jānātī”ti puna sabbaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ vassagaṇanādibhedaṃ vidhiṃ paṭipajjati,
tika-vin09t0:846_0: Sace pana kassaci rājā kuddho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:846_1: so “evaṃ me sotthi bhavissatī”ti sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā palāyati.
tika-vin09t0:846_4: na taṃ labbhā kiñci kātu”nti tasmiṃ kodhaṃ paṭivineti.
tika-vin09t0:846_5: So “vūpasantaṃ me rājabhaya”nti saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgato pabbājetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:846_7: handa dāni ahaṃ pabbajāmī”ti uppannasaṃvego teneva liṅgena āgantvā āgantukavattaṃ na sādiyati,
tika-vin09t0:846_8: bhikkhūhi puṭṭho vā apuṭṭho vā yathābhūtamattānaṃ āvikatvāva pabbajjaṃ yācati,
tika-vin09t0:847_0: Idha panekacco dubbhikkhe jīvituṃ asakkonto sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni bhuñjanto
tika-vin09t0:847_1: dubbhikkhe vītivatte saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgatoti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
tika-vin09t0:848_2: So “evaṃ maṃ satthavāho gahetvā gamissatī”ti sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā satthavāhena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharitvā
tika-vin09t0:848_3: khemantaṃ patvā saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgatoti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
tika-vin09t0:849_0: Aparo rogabhaye uppanne jīvituṃ asakkonto sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā sabbapāsaṇḍiyabhattāni bhuñjanto rogabhaye
tika-vin09t0:849_1: vūpasante saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgatoti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
tika-vin09t0:850_2: So “evaṃ me sotthi bhavissatī”ti sayameva liṅgaṃ gahetvā palāyati.
tika-vin09t0:850_3: Veriko “kuhiṃ so”ti pariyesanto “pabbajitvā palāto”ti sutvā “sace pabbajito,
tika-vin09t0:850_4: na taṃ labbhā kiñci kātu”nti tasmiṃ kodhaṃ paṭivineti.
tika-vin09t0:850_5: So “vūpasantaṃ me veribhaya”nti saṅghamajjhaṃ anosaritvāva gihiliṅgaṃ gahetvā āgatoti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
tika-vin09t0:851_0: Aparo ñātikulaṃ gantvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya gihī hutvā “imāni cīvarāni idha vinassissanti,
tika-vin09t0:851_3: yaṃnūnāhaṃ kāyaparihāriyāni katvā gaccheyya”nti cīvarāharaṇatthaṃ nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca vihāraṃ gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:851_4: Taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā sāmaṇerā ca daharā ca abbhuggacchanti,
tika-vin09t0:851_8: Sace bhikkhū “na dāni mayaṃ taṃ muñcissāmā”ti balakkārena pabbājetukāmā honti,
tika-vin09t0:851_10: Sace pana “na ime mama hīnāyāvattabhāvaṃ jānantī”ti taṃyeva bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānitvā sabbaṃ pubbe vuttavassagaṇanādibhedaṃ vidhiṃ paṭipajjati,
tika-vin09t0:851_19: yāva so suddhamānasoti bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya abhāvato yo suddhamānaso yāva saṃvāsaṃ nādhivāseti,
tika-vin09t0:851_20: tāva esa “gihī maṃ ‘samaṇo’ti jānantū”ti vañcanacitte satipi bhikkhūnaṃ vañcetukāmatāya abhāvato doso
tika-vin09t0:851_21: natthīti theyyasaṃvāsako nāmāti na vuccatīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:852_1: So ca na kevalaṃ tattha paviṭṭhamatteneva titthiyapakkantako hoti,
tika-vin09t0:852_4: “Upasampanno”ti iminā anupasampanno titthiyapakkantako na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:852_5: Vuttañhetaṃ kurundiaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayañca titthiyapakkantako nāma upasampannabhikkhunā kathito,
tika-vin09t0:852_6: tasmā sāmaṇero saliṅgena titthāyatanaṃ gatopi puna pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:852_8: Sacepi “ayaṃ pabbajjā seṭṭhā”ti seṭṭhabhāvaṃ vā upagacchati,
tika-vin09t0:852_12: Sace pana “sobhati nu kho me titthiyapabbajjā,
tika-vin09t0:852_13: nanu kho sobhatī”ti vīmaṃsanatthaṃ kusacīrādīni nivāseti,
tika-vin09t0:852_20: rājabhayādīhi vā titthiyaliṅgaṃ gaṇhanto laddhiyā abhāvena neva titthiyapakkantako hoti.
tika-vin09t0:853_0: Avaseso sabbopīti nāgasupaṇṇayakkhagandhabbādiko. Yañhettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-vin09t0:854_4: so ca kho pariyāyatoti nippariyāyasiddhataṃ dassetuṃ “janettī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:854_9: evaṃ manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva akusaladhammānampi tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpattīti āha “manussabhūtenevā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:854_11: Ayaṃ mātughātako nāmāti ayaṃ ānantariyena mātughātakakammena mātughātako nāma.
tika-vin09t0:854_12: Yena pana manussitthibhūtāpi ajanikā posāvanikamātā vā mahāmātā vā cūḷamātā vā janikāpi vā amanussitthibhūtā mātā ghātitā,
tika-vin09t0:854_15: Yena sayaṃ tiracchānabhūtena manussitthibhūtā mātā ghātitā,
tika-vin09t0:855_0: Yena manussabhūto janako pitā sayampi manussajātikeneva satā sañcicca jīvitā voropito,
tika-vin09t0:855_1: ayaṃ ānantariyena pitughātakakammena pitughātako nāmāti imamatthaṃ atidisanto “pitughātakepi eseva nayo”ti āha.
tika-vin09t0:856_3: “Eḷakaṃ māremī”ti abhisandhināpi hi eḷakaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā mārento ānantariyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:856_6: pana mātāpitiabhisandhinā vā eḷakaṃ mārento ānantariyaṃ na phusati ānantariyavatthuabhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:857_0: Arahantaghātakopi manussaarahantavaseneva veditabboti āha “yena antamaso gihiliṅge ṭhitopī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:857_2: manussajātikaṃ vā avasesaṃ ariyapuggalaṃ ghātetvā ānantariko na hoti,
tika-vin09t0:857_5: Tiracchāno manussaarahantampi ghātetvā ānantariko na hoti,
tika-vin09t0:858_0: Pakatattaṃ bhikkhuninti parisuddhasīlaṃ ubhatosaṅghe upasampannaṃ bhikkhuniṃ.
tika-vin09t0:858_2: tassa pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca na vāritā.
tika-vin09t0:858_3: Balakkārena odātavatthavasanaṃ katvā anicchamānaṃyeva dūsentopi bhikkhunidūsakoyeva,
tika-vin09t0:858_4: balakkārena pana odātavatthavasanaṃ katvā icchamānaṃ dūsento bhikkhunidūsako na hoti. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:858_5: Yasmā gihibhāve sampaṭicchitamatteyeva sā abhikkhunī hoti.
tika-vin09t0:858_6: Sakiṃ sīlavipannaṃ pana pacchā dūsento sikkhamānasāmaṇerīsu ca vippaṭipajjanto neva bhikkhunidūsako hoti,
tika-vin09t0:859_3: Imesañhi aññataraṃ saṅghakammaṃ ekasīmāyaṃ visuṃ visuṃ karontena saṅgho bhinno nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t0:859_4: Tena vuttaṃ “catunnaṃ kammānaṃ aññataravasena saṅghaṃ bhindatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:860_1: Vadhakacetanāya hi dūsitaṃ cittaṃ idha duṭṭhacittaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:860_4: Na hi tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya parūpakkamena dhammaṃ bhinditvā lohitaṃ paggharati,
tika-vin09t0:860_5: sarīrassa pana antoyeva ekasmiṃ ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati,
tika-vin09t0:860_8: Yo pana rogavūpasamanatthaṃ jīvako viya satthena phāletvā pūtimaṃsañca lohitañca nīharitvā phāsukaṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:861_10: Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa itthīsu purisattaṃ karontassa itthinimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:861_12: Purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisānaṃ itthibhāvaṃ upagacchantassa purisanimittaṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:862_1: “Ayaṃ itthannāmo”ti upasampadāpekkhassa akittananti yassa upasampadā karīyati,
tika-vin09t0:862_4: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “ayaṃ dhammarakkhito”ti avacananti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:862_5: “Itthannāmassa upasampadāpekkho”ti upajjhāyassa akittananti “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin09t0:862_6: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin09t0:862_7: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito upasampadāpekkho”ti vatvā “āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti avacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:862_8: Sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiyā anuccāraṇanti ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā catukkhattuṃ kammavācāya eva anussāvanakammassa karaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:863_1: Yopi ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā sakiṃyeva vā dvikkhattuṃ vā anussāvanaṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:863_3: Duruccāraṇaṃ nāma aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññassa vacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:868_2: Ettha hi sithilaṃ nāma pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamatatiyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:868_4: Dīghanti dīghena kālena vattabbaṃ ā- kārādi.
tika-vin09t0:868_5: Rassanti tato upaḍḍhakālena vattabbaṃ a- kārādi.
tika-vin09t0:868_7: yaṃ vā “āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassa yassa nakkhamatī”ti evaṃ saṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:868_9: yaṃ vā “āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassa yassa na khamatī”ti evaṃ asaṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:868_10: Niggahītanti yaṃ karaṇāni niggahetvā avissajjetvā avivaṭena mukhena sānunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:868_11: Sambandhanti yaṃ parapadena sambandhitvā “tuṇhissā”ti vā “tuṇhassā”ti vā vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:868_12: Vavatthitanti yaṃ parapadena sambandhaṃ akatvā vicchinditvā “tuṇhī assā”ti vā “tuṇha assā”ti vā vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:868_13: Vimuttanti yaṃ karaṇāni aniggahetvā vissajjetvā vivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ akatvā vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:869_2: kāraṃ katvā “suṇāthu me”ti vacanaṃ sithilassa dhanitakaraṇaṃ nāma,
tika-vin09t0:869_3: tathā “pattakallaṃ esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “patthakallaṃ esā ñattī”tiādivacanañca. “Bhante,
tika-vin09t0:869_6: kāre katvā “bante saṃgo”ti vacanaṃ dhanitassa sithilakaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:869_7: “Suṇātu me”ti vivaṭena mukhena vattabbe “suṇaṃtu me”ti vā “esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “esaṃ ñattī”ti vā avivaṭena
tika-vin09t0:869_8: mukhena anunāsikaṃ katvā vacanaṃ vimuttassa niggahitavacanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:869_9: “Pattakalla”nti avivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbe “pattakallā”ti vivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ
tika-vin09t0:869_14: niggahite kattabbe vimuttanti imāni cattāri byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ dūsenti.
tika-vin09t0:869_15: Evaṃ vadanto hi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññaṃ vadati,
tika-vin09t0:870_0: Itaresu pana dīgharassādīsu chasu byañjanesu dīghaṭṭhāne dīghameva.
tika-vin09t0:870_1: Rassaṭṭhāne ca rassamevāti evaṃ yathāṭhāne taṃ tadeva akkharaṃ bhāsantena anukkamāgataṃ paveṇiṃ avināsentena kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin09t0:870_2: Sace pana evaṃ akatvā dīghe vattabbe rassaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:870_9: Imāni hi cha byañjanāni kammaṃ na kopenti.
tika-vin09t0:871_10: Tasmā vinayadharena neva da- kāro ta-
tika-vin09t0:871_11: kāro kātabbo…pe… na ka- kāro ya- kāro.
tika-vin09t0:871_12: Yathāpāḷiyā niruttiṃ sodhetvā dasavidhāya byañjananiruttiyā vuttadose pariharantena kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin09t0:872_0: Yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattāti yattakā bhikkhū tassa upasampadākammassa pattā yuttā anurūpā.
tika-vin09t0:872_1: Te ca kho sabbantimena pariyāyena hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā ekasīmaṭṭhā pañca pakatattā bhikkhū.
tika-vin09t0:872_2: Na hi tehi vinā taṃ kammaṃ karīyati,
tika-vin09t0:872_7: chandaṃ datvā āgacchantu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin09t0:872_10: Tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:872_11: Idha pana upasampadākammakaraṇassa kāraṇattā upasampadākammavācāsaṅkhātaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:872_14: tathākaraṇaṃ upasampadākammassa kāraṇaṃ hotīti ṭhānārahaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:872_20: evaṃ sabbatthāpi lokavajjasikkhāpadesu ayameva adhippetoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:872_23: Kathametaṃ viññāyati paṇṇattivajjesu sikkhāpadesu aññepi saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti?
tika-vin09t0:872_25: Tathā hi “dve puggalā abhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca,
tika-vin09t0:872_26: dve puggalā bhabbā āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo cā”ti sāmaññato vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:872_27: Ehibhikkhūpasampannādayopi asañcicca assatiyā acittakaṃ sahaseyyāpattiādibhedaṃ paṇṇattivajjaṃ āpajjantīti atthato āpannaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:873_0: Idāni “bhikkhūna”nti imaṃ padaṃ visesatthābhāvato visuṃ avaṇṇetvāva yaṃ sikkhañca sājīvañca samāpannattā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno hoti,
tika-vin09t0:873_9: Ettha ca “sikkhā”ti sājīvasahacariyato adhisīlasikkhāva adhippetāti āha “adhisīlasaṅkhātā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:874_6: sineru viya ca pabbatānaṃ sabbalokiyasīlānaṃ adhikañceva uttamañca,
tika-vin09t0:874_9: Na hi taṃ paññattiṃ uddharitvā añño satto paññāpetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin09t0:874_10: buddhāyeva panassa sabbaso kāyavacīdvārajjhācārasotaṃ chinditvā tassa tassa vītikkamassa anucchavikaṃ taṃ taṃ sīlasaṃvaraṃ paññāpenti.
tika-vin09t0:874_13: Na hi taṃ samāpanno methunadhammaṃ paṭisevati.
tika-vin09t0:875_5: Vuttampi cetaṃ “sikkhāpadanti yo tattha nāmakāyo padakāyo niruttikāyo byañjanakāyo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:875_7: Sikkhaṃ paripūrentoti akattabbaparivajjanakattabbakaraṇavasena vārittacārittasaṅkhātaṃ duvidhaṃ sīlaṃ paripūrentoti attho,
tika-vin09t0:875_9: cārittasīlavasena virativippayuttacetanañca attani pavattentoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:875_12: sājīvānatikkamanañcāti idameva dvayaṃ idha samāpajjanaṃ nāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:875_14: Tassānatikkamanato hi yāva maggā sikkhā paripūrati.
tika-vin09t0:875_15: Apicettha “sikkhaṃ paripūrento”ti iminā viraticetanāsaṅkhātassa sīlasaṃvarassa visesato santāne pavattanakālova gahito,
tika-vin09t0:875_17: Sikkhañhi paripūraṇavasena attani pavattentopi niddādivasena appavattentopi vītikkamābhāvā sikkhanavasena samāpannoti vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:876_0: Yasmā sikkhāpaccakkhānassa ekaccaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ attho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:876_1: tasmā taṃ sandhāya “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti padassa atthaṃ vivaranto “dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti āhāti dassetuṃ
tika-vin09t0:876_5: tasmā “dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvā”ti paṭhamaṃ vatvā tassa atthaniyamanatthaṃ “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti vattabbanti? Taṃ na, kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:876_10: tattha dubbalyaṃ anāvikatvāti vuccamāne anukkameneva attho vutto hoti,
tika-vin09t0:877_4: Yo hi aññaṃ bhaṇitukāmo sahasā “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti bhaṇati,
tika-vin09t0:877_7: Yo hi aññaṃ bhaṇitukāmo virujjhitvā “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti bhaṇati,
tika-vin09t0:877_11: idaṃ pana mandattā momūhattā pakkhalantassa “aññaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti aññabhaṇanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:877_12: “Akkharasamayānabhiññātatāya vā karaṇasampattiyā abhāvato vā kathetabbaṃ kathetumasakkonto hutvā aññaṃ kathento ravā bhaṇati nāmā”ti eke.
tika-vin09t0:878_13: Yathā hi loke sassānaṃ viruhanaṭṭhānaṃ “khetta”nti vuccati,
tika-vin09t0:878_14: evamimānipi buddhādīni padāni sikkhāpaccakkhānassa viruhanaṭṭhānatthā “khetta”nti vuccantīti āha “imesaṃ dvāvīsatiyā khettapadāna”nti.
tika-vin09t0:878_24: aññāni ca guṇato labbhamānāni nāmāni “buddhavevacanānī”ti veditabbāni.
tika-vin09t0:879_0: Tesu yaṃ kiñci vattukāmassa yaṃ kiñci vadato sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hotīti tesu dvāvīsatiyā khettapadesu
tika-vin09t0:879_1: yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ padaṃ vattukāmassa tato aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci padampi vacībhedaṃ katvā vadato khettapadantogadhattā
tika-vin09t0:879_4: sace panāyaṃ “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vattukāmo padapaccābhaṭṭhaṃ katvā “paccakkhāmi buddha”nti vā vadeyya,
tika-vin09t0:879_6: “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vattukāmo uppaṭipāṭiyā “dhammaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vā “sabrahmacāriṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vā vadeyya,
tika-vin09t0:879_7: seyyathāpi uttarimanussadhammavibhaṅge “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjāmī”ti vattukāmo “dutiyaṃ jhāna”nti vadati.
tika-vin09t0:879_9: so ayaṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ cajitukāmo etamatthaṃ vadatī”ti ettakamattampi jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:879_13: Sakkattā vā brahmattā vā cutasatto viya cutova hoti sāsanāti.
tika-vin09t0:880_2: Kiṃ nu meti kiṃ mayhaṃ kiccaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:880_7: Purimehi cuddasahi padehīti buddhādīhi sabrahmacāripariyantehi purimehi cuddasahi padehi.
tika-vin09t0:880_12: Ādisaddena “paccakkhi”nti vā “paccakkhissāmī”ti vā “bhavissāmī”ti vā “homī”ti vā “jātomhī”ti vā “amhī”ti vā evaṃbhūtānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:880_13: Sace pana “ajja paṭṭhāya ‘gihī’ti maṃ dhārehī”ti vā “jānāhī”ti vā “sañjānāhī”ti vā “manasi karohī”ti vā vadati,
tika-vin09t0:881_2: hatthasaddo cettha tadekadesesu aṅgulīsu daṭṭhabbo “na bhuñjamāno sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin09t0:881_3: Tasmā adhippāyaviññāpakassa aṅgulisaṅkocanādino hatthavikārassa dassanaṃ hatthamuddādidassananti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:882_6: Manussajātiko hotīti sabhāgo vā visabhāgo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā viññū yokoci manusso hoti.
tika-vin09t0:882_8: Tatra ummattakakhittacittavedanāṭṭatiracchānagatānaṃ santike paccakkhātāpi ajānanabhāvena apaccakkhātāva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:882_10: Devatā nāma mahāpaññā tihetukappaṭisandhikā atikhippaṃ jānanti,
tika-vin09t0:882_12: tasmā “cittalahukassa puggalassa cittavaseneva mā atikhippaṃ vināso ahosī”ti devatāya santike sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ paṭikkhipi.
tika-vin09t0:882_14: Dūtena vāti “mama sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ kathehī”ti mukhasāsanavasena dūtena vā.
tika-vin09t0:882_15: Paṇṇena vāti paṇṇe likhitvā pahiṇavasena paṇṇena vā.
tika-vin09t0:883_2: Iminā taṃ khaṇaṃyeva pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ dujjānanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:883_6: Ukkaṇṭhitoti anabhiratiyā imasmiṃ sāsane kicchajīvikaṃ patto.
tika-vin09t0:883_7: Atha vā “ajja yāmi, sve yāmi, ito yāmi,
tika-vin09t0:883_8: ettha yāmī”ti uddhaṃ kaṇṭhaṃ katvā viharamāno vikkhitto,
tika-vin09t0:883_12: jānantīti sace te“ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā “gihibhāvaṃ patthetī”ti vā “anabhirato”ti vā “sāmaññā cavitukāmo”ti
tika-vin09t0:883_13: vā yena kenaci ākārena sikkhāpaccakkhānabhāvaṃ jānanti.
tika-vin09t0:883_16: “Kiṃ ayaṃ bhaṇatī”ti kaṅkhatā cirena ñāte sīsaṃ na enti.
tika-vin09t0:883_18: Atha dvinnaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne dvinnampi niyametvā “etesaṃ ārocemī”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:883_19: tesu ekasmiṃ jānantepi dvīsu jānantesupi paccakkhātāva hoti sikkhā.
tika-vin09t0:883_22: Yo koci manussajātikoti antamaso navakammikaṃ upādāya yo koci manusso.
tika-vin09t0:884_0: “Sace pana anabhiratiyā pīḷito sabhāge bhikkhū parisaṅkamāno ‘yo koci jānātū’ti uccāsaddaṃ karonto ‘buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī’ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:884_1: tañca avidūre ṭhito navakammiko vā añño vā samayaññū puriso sutvā ‘ukkaṇṭhito ayaṃ samaṇo gihibhāvaṃ pattheti,
tika-vin09t0:885_0: Sace vacanatthaṃ ñatvāpi “ayaṃ ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā “gihibhāvaṃ patthetī”ti vā na jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:885_2: Sace pana vacanatthaṃ ajānitvāpi “ukkaṇṭhito”ti vā “gihibhāvaṃ patthetī”ti vā jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:885_5: Cittādīnaṃ vā vasenāti cittādīnaṃ vā chaḷaṅgānaṃ vasena.
tika-vin09t0:886_0: “Cittaṃ khettañca kālo ca, payogo puggalo tathā;
tika-vin09t0:888_0: Sabbaso vā pana apaccakkhānenāti “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādīsu yena yena pariyāyena sikkhāpaccakkhānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:888_3: sikkhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti evaṃ pavattacittuppādassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:888_7: Atthabhūtaṃ ekaccaṃ dubbalyanti “buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”ti vadati viññāpeti, evampi,
tika-vin09t0:888_10: sikkhā ca paccakkhātā”tiādinā vuttehi yehi vacanehi sikkhāpaccakkhānañceva hoti dubbalyāvikammañca,
tika-vin09t0:888_12: “Buddhaṃ paccakkhāmī”tiādimhi pana vutte sikkhāparipūraṇe dubbalabhāvassāpi gamyamānattā sikkhāpaccakkhānassa
tika-vin09t0:888_14: Ettha ca “atthabhūta”nti iminā “yannūnāhaṃ buddhaṃ paccakkheyya”ntiādikaṃ dubbalyāvikammaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin09t0:889_0: Rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisabhāvāpattiyā mithunānaṃ ayanti “methuno”ti dhammova vuccatīti āha “rāgapariyuṭṭhānenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:889_4: “Palambate vilambate”tiādīsu viya upasaggassa koci atthaviseso natthīti āha “seveyyā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:889_10: Pārājikāya vatthubhūtā eva cettha tiracchānagatitthī “tiracchānagatā”ti gahetabbā, na sabbā.
tika-vin09t0:892_0: Tattha ahiggahaṇena sabbāpi ajagaragonasādibhedā dīghajāti saṅgahitā.
tika-vin09t0:892_1: Tasmā dīghajātīsu yattha tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ sakkā tilaphalamattampi pavesetuṃ,
tika-vin09t0:892_5: Tatrāpi dīghajātiyaṃ vuttanayeneva pārājikavatthu ca dukkaṭavatthu ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:892_14: Tatrāpi vuttanayeneva pārājikavatthu ca dukkaṭavatthu ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:892_16: Tatrāpi vuttanayeneva pārājikavatthu ca dukkaṭavatthu ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:893_0: Pārājiko hotīti parājito hoti parājayaṃ apanno.
tika-vin09t0:893_4: yaṃ tathāgato vajjīnaṃ vā vajjiputtakānaṃ vā kāraṇā sāvakānaṃ pārājikaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ samūhaneyyā”ti evaṃ sikkhāpade vattamāno veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:893_5: “Āpattiṃ tvaṃ bhikkhu āpanno pārājika”nti evaṃ āpattiyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:893_8: so pārājiko”ti evaṃ puggale vattamāno veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:893_9: “Pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃseyyā”tiādīsu pana dhamme vattatīti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:893_21: Idha pana puggalo veditabboti āha “pārājiko hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:894_0: Apalokanādi catubbidhampi saṅghakammaṃ sīmāparicchinnehi pakatattehi bhikkhūhi ekato kattabbattā ekakammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:894_2: Tattha pañcavidhopi pātimokkhuddeso ekato uddisitabbattā ekuddeso nāma.
tika-vin09t0:894_3: Nahāpitapubbakādīnaṃ viya odissa anuññātaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ sabbampi sikkhāpadaṃ sabbehipi lajjipuggalehi samaṃ sikkhitabbabhāvato samasikkhatā nāma.
tika-vin09t0:894_4: Yasmā sabbepi lajjino etesu ekakammādīsu saha vasanti,
tika-vin09t0:894_6: tasmā tāni sabbānipi gahetvā ekakammādiko tividhopi saṃvāso nāmāti āha “so ca vuttappakāro saṃvāso tena puggalena saddhiṃ natthi,
tika-vin09t0:894_7: tena kāraṇena so pārājiko puggalo ‘asaṃvāso’ti vuccatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:895_0: Idāni yasmā na kevalaṃ manussitthiyā eva nimittaṃ pārājikavatthu,
tika-vin09t0:895_5: tesañca yaṃ yaṃ nimittaṃ vatthu hoti,
tika-vin09t0:895_7: tattha ca yathā paṭisevanto pārājiko hoti,
tika-vin09t0:895_8: tañca sabbaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:895_12: Santhatassa vāti yena kenaci vatthena vā paṇṇena vā vākapaṭṭena vā cammena vā tipusīsādīnaṃ paṭṭena vā paliveṭhetvā,
tika-vin09t0:895_15: Yebhuyyena akkhāyitassāti yāva upaḍḍhakkhāyito nāma na hoti,
tika-vin09t0:895_18: Santhatanti tesaṃyeva vatthādīnaṃ yena kenaci paṭicchannaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:895_22: atha kho upādinnakena vā anupādinnakaṃ ghaṭṭiyatu,
tika-vin09t0:895_26: Sace yattake paviṭṭhe pārājikaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:896_0: Evaṃ sevanacitteneva pavesentassa āpattiṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā taṃ pavesanaṃ nāma na kevalaṃ attūpakkameneva,
tika-vin09t0:896_4: Tattha parenāti bhikkhupaccatthikādinā yena kenaci aññena.
tika-vin09t0:896_5: Pavesanapaviṭṭhaṭṭhitauddharaṇesūti ettha aggato yāva mūlā pavesanaṃ pavesanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:896_8: Evaṃ paviṭṭhassa uddharaṇārambhato antarā ṭhitakālo ṭhitaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:896_9: Samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana mātugāmassa sukkavisaṭṭhiṃ patvā sabbathā vāyāmato oramitvā ṭhitakālaṃ sandhāya “sukkavisaṭṭhisamaye”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:896_12: Asādhāraṇavinicchayoti adinnādānādīhi sabbehi sikkhāpadehi asādhāraṇo vinicchayo.
tika-vin09t0:897_3: Nidadāti desanaṃ desavasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:897_5: tassā pakāro paññattividhi aṅgeti gameti ñāpetīti aṅgaṃ, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:898_2: Puggaloti ettha ādikammikoyeva adhippetoti āha “puggalo nāma yaṃ yaṃ ārabbha taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññatta”nti,
tika-vin09t0:906_0: Caṇḍakāḷī sambahulā, dve ca bhikkhuniyo parā;
tika-vin09t0:907_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu satteva, honti tā ādikammikā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:908_0: Tassa tassa puggalassāti yaṃ yaṃ sudinnādikaṃ puggalaṃ ārabbha sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:908_5: Sabbattha majjhimadese ceva paccantimesu janapadesu cāti sabbesu padesesu ṭhapitā paññatti sabbatthapaññatti.
tika-vin09t0:908_15: Etesaṃ vasena catubbidhā padesapaññatti nāmāti etesaṃ vasena catubbidhā paññatti majjhimadeseyeva paññattāti padesapaññatti nāma.
tika-vin09t0:908_21: Ettha ca mattasaddena aññāni tīṇi sikkhāpadāni paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin09t0:908_24: sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampada”ntiādinā cammakkhandhake āgatāni.
tika-vin09t0:908_27: Tasmāti yasmā anuppannapaññatti aṭṭhagarudhammavasena bhikkhunīnaṃyeva āgatā,
tika-vin09t0:908_28: yasmā ca dhuvanhānaṃ paṭikkhepamattaṃ ṭhapetvā pātimokkhe sabbāni sikkhāpadāni sabbatthapaññattiyeva honti,
tika-vin09t0:908_29: yasmā ca sādhāraṇapaññattidukañca ekatopaññattidukañca byañjanamattaṃ nānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:908_32: Āpattibhedo hettha uttarapadalopena “āpattī”ti vuttoti āha “āpattīti pubbappayogādivasena āpattibhedo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:908_33: Sīlaācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattīnanti ettha paṭhamā dve āpattikkhandhā sīlavipatti nāma,
tika-vin09t0:908_35: micchādiṭṭhi ca antaggāhikādiṭṭhi ca diṭṭhivipatti nāma,
tika-vin09t0:908_36: ājīvahetu paññattāni cha sikkhāpadāni ājīvavipatti nāma,
tika-vin09t0:909_0: Na kevalaṃ yathāvuttanayeneva vuccantīti āha “yāni sikkhāpadasamuṭṭhānānītipi vuccantī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:911_1: pare āṇāpetvā khaṇāpane vācāya ca āpattisambhavato “pathavikhaṇanādīsu viyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:911_3: Paṭhamakathināpatti kāyavācato kattabbaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vā vikappanaṃ vā akarontassa hoti,
tika-vin09t0:911_5: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvarappaṭiggahaṇāpatti tassā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa,
tika-vin09t0:911_6: parivattakaṃ adentassa ca hotīti kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin09t0:911_7: “Siyā karontassā”tiādīsu siyāti “siyā kho pana te brāhmaṇa evamassā”tiādīsu viya “kadācī”ti iminā samānattho nipāto.
tika-vin09t0:911_9: siyā akiriyā paṭikkhepassa akaraṇatoti āha “rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇāpatti viyā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:911_10: Kuṭikārāpatti vatthuṃ desāpetvā pamāṇātikkantakaraṇe karontassa siyā,
tika-vin09t0:911_11: adesāpetvā pana pamāṇātikkantakaraṇe pamāṇayuttaṃ vā karontassa ca akarontassa ca siyāti āha “kuṭikārāpatti viyā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:912_0: Saññāya abhāvena vimokkho assāti saññāvimokkhoti majjhepadalopasamāso daṭṭhabboti āha “yato vītikkamasaññāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:912_1: Itarā nāma yato vītikkamasaññāya abhāvena na muccati,
tika-vin09t0:912_3: Yā acittakena vā sacittakamissakena vā samuṭṭhātīti yā āpatti kadāci acittakena vā kadāci sacittakamissakena vā samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin09t0:913_0: Yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hotīti yassā sacittakāya āpattiyā cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:913_1: yassā ca sacittakācittakasaṅkhātāya surāpānādiacittakāya āpattiyā vatthuvijānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:913_3: “Sacittakapakkhe”ti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ sacittakācittakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:913_4: Na hi ekaṃsato sacittakassa “sacittakapakkhe”ti visesane payojanaṃ atthīti.
tika-vin09t0:913_5: Yaṃ panettha gaṇṭhipade “surāpānasmiñhi ‘surā’ti vā ‘na vaṭṭatī’ti vā jānitvā pivane akusalamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:913_6: Tattha “na vaṭṭatīti vā jānitvā”ti vuttavacanaṃ na yujjati paṇṇattivajjassāpi lokavajjabhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-vin09t0:913_7: Yassā pana “sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalamevā”ti niyamo natthi,
tika-vin09t0:913_8: sā paṇṇattivajjāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:913_9: Tathā hi tassā vatthuvijānanacittena sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ siyā kusalaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:913_15: “Manodvāre āpatti nāma natthī”ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ upanikkhittasādiyanādīsu āpattisambhavatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:914_3: mātugāmassa dhammaṃ desentoti evarūpaṃ āpattiṃ kusalacitto āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:915_0: Dukkhavedanāsamaṅgī vāti duṭṭhadosādibhedaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanto dukkhavedanāsamaṅgī āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:915_3: taṃyeva majjhatto hutvā āpajjanto adukkhamasukhavedanāsamaṅgī āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:915_6: Nipajjitvā nirodhasamāpanno hi acittako avedano sahaseyyāpattiṃ āpajjatīti.
tika-vin09t0:915_8: viseso panettha atthīti dassetuṃ “evaṃ santepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:915_10: Sabbesaṃ vasena tīṇi cittānīti kusalākusalābyākatānaṃ vasena padasodhammādīsu tīṇi cittāni.
tika-vin09t0:916_0: Idāni taṃ yathāvuttanidānādivedanāttikapariyosānaṃ sattarasappakāraṃ imasmiṃ sikkhāpade yojetuṃ “idha panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:916_3: Tañhi nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ pākāraparikkhepavaḍḍhanena visālībhūtattā “vesālī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:916_4: Idampi ca nagaraṃ sabbaññutaṃ sampatteyeva sammāsambuddhe sabbākāravepullattaṃ pattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:916_5: “Sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti ca “antamaso tiracchānagatāyapī”ti ca dve anupaññattiyoti makkaṭivajjiputtakavatthūnaṃ vasena vuttā.
tika-vin09t0:916_6: “Antamaso tiracchānagatāyā”ti ca “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti ca imā dve anupaññattiyo.
tika-vin09t0:916_7: Āpattikarā ca hotīti paṭhamapaññattito visuṃyevāpattikarā ca hoti.
tika-vin09t0:916_10: Ettha hi aññavādakādito visuṃyeva vihesakādīsupi pācittiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:916_11: Yathāha “ropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṃ vā āpattiyā vā anayuñjiyamāno taṃ nakathetukāmo taṃ naugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṃ viheseti,
tika-vin09t0:916_13: Supinante vijjamānāpi mocanassādacetanā abbohārikattā anāpattikarāti āha “aññatra supinantātiādikā viyā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:916_14: Tathā hi thinamiddhena abhibhūtattā supine cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:916_19: tasmā “aññatra supinantā”ti ayaṃ anupaññatti anāpattikarā jātā.
tika-vin09t0:916_21: Adinnādānādīsu viyāti adinnādānādīsu “araññā vā”tiādikā viyāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:916_24: no araññe”tiādinā nayena lesaṃ oḍḍentānaṃ lesapidahanatthaṃ “araññā vā”tiādikā anupaññatti vuttāti upatthambhakarāva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:917_2: Tacādīni anavasesetvāti nimittappadese bahi ṭhitāni chavicammāni anavasesetvā.
tika-vin09t0:917_3: Nimittasaṇṭhānamattaṃ paññāyatīti nimittamaṃsassa pana abbhantare chavicammassa ca vijjamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:917_13: yebhuyyena akkhāyite ca pārājikāpattivacanato pana naṭṭhakāyappasādepi itthinimitte pavesentassa pārājikāpattiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:917_14: Nimittasaṇṭhānamattampi anavasesetvāti nimittākārena ṭhitaṃ yathāvuttanimittamaṃsādimpi anavasesetvā.
tika-vin09t0:917_17: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti imassa suttassa vasena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:917_18: Tasmiñhi sutte dvīsu sambhinnavaṇesu ekena vaṇena pavesetvā dutiyena nīharantassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:917_19: Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “imassa sattassa anulomavasena sabbattha vaṇasaṅkhepe thullaccayaṃ veditabba”nti.
tika-vin09t0:917_20: Manussānaṃ pana akkhiādayopi vaṇasaṅgahaṃ gacchantīti vaṇena ekaparicchedaṃ katvā dassento “tathā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:918_0: Evaṃ jīvamānakasarīre labbhamānaṃ āpattivisesaṃ dassetvā idāni matasarīre labbhamānaṃ āpattivisesaṃ dassetuṃ “matasarīre”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:918_1: Vaccamaggapassāvamaggamukhamaggānaṃ catūsu koṭṭhāsesu dve koṭṭhāse ṭhapetvā yadā apare dve koṭṭhāsā khāditā,
tika-vin09t0:918_3: Na kuthitaṃ hotīti uddhumātakādibhāvena kuthitaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin09t0:918_5: Yadā pana sarīraṃ uddhumātakaṃ hoti kuthitaṃ nīlamakkhikasamākiṇṇaṃ kimikulasamākulaṃ navahi vaṇamukhehi
tika-vin09t0:918_10: Īdise hi sarīre yattha katthaci upakkamato dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:918_11: Tathā vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassāti vivaṭṭe mukhe cattāri passāni,
tika-vin09t0:918_12: tālukañca apphusantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa dukkaṭanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:918_13: Sace pana heṭṭhā vā upari vā ubhayapassehi vā chupantaṃ paveseti,
tika-vin09t0:918_15: Catūhi passehi acchupantaṃ pavesetvā abbhantare tālukaṃ chupati,
tika-vin09t0:918_17: Bahi nikkhantajivhāya vā dantesu vā aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa thullaccayanti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:918_19: Yadi pana bahi jivhāya paliveṭhetvā antomukhaṃ paveseti,
tika-vin09t0:918_24: tattha vātena asamphuṭṭhaṃ allokāsaṃ tilaphalamattampi pavesentassa pārājikameva.
tika-vin09t0:918_25: Uppāṭite pana oṭṭhamaṃse dantesuyeva upakkamantassa thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:919_1: Ummattakoti cettha pittummattako adhippetoti āha “yo pittavasenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:919_3: Tasmiñhi baddhapitte pittakosato calitvā bahi nikkhamante sattā ummattakā honti,
tika-vin09t0:919_12: Khittacitto nāma vissaṭṭhacitto yakkhummattako vuccatīti āha “yakkhehi katacittavikkhepo khittacitto”ti.
tika-vin09t0:919_13: Yakkhā kira bheravāni ārammaṇāni dassetvā mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā,
tika-vin09t0:919_14: hadayarūpaṃ vā maddantā satte vikkhittacitte vipallatthasaññe karonti,
tika-vin09t0:919_22: yo sabbaso muṭṭhassati kiñci na jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:919_23: aggimpi suvaṇṇampi gūthampi candanampi ekasadisaṃ maddantova vicarati,
tika-vin09t0:919_25: Antarantarā pakatisaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā ñatvā karontassa pana āpattiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:920_3: so tasmiṃ kamme ādibhūto hotīti āha “yo”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:920_9: Idaṃ pana yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ methunadhamme parūpakkame sati sādiyantassa akiriyasamuṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:920_10: Methunappaṭisaṃyuttāya hi kāmasaññāya abhāvena muccanato saññāvimokkhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:920_20: Sukhasamaṅgī vā upekkhāsamaṅgī vā āpajjatīti dvivedanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:920_23: atha kasmā sikkhāpadassa samuṭṭhānādīni vuttānīti āha “imāni ca samuṭṭhānādīni nāmā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:921_0: Munanato anumunanato muti, ñāṇaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti mutimā, ñāṇavāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:924_2: Tattha ekakuṭikādibhedoti yasmiṃ gāme ekā eva kuṭi ekaṃ gehaṃ seyyathāpi malayajanapade,
tika-vin09t0:924_7: Abhinavaniviṭṭho ekakuṭikādigāmo pana yāva manussā pavisitvā vāsaṃ na kappenti,
tika-vin09t0:924_10: Tattha parikkhitto nāma iṭṭhakapākāraṃ ādiṃ katvā antamaso kaṇṭakasākhāhipi parikkhitto.
tika-vin09t0:924_12: Amanusso nāma yo sabbaso vā manussānaṃ abhāvena yakkhapariggahabhūto,
tika-vin09t0:924_13: yato vā manussā kenaci karaṇīyena punapi āgantukāmā eva apakkantā,
tika-vin09t0:924_17: Yo koci satthopīti jaṅghasatthasakaṭasatthādīsu yo koci satthopi.
tika-vin09t0:924_18: Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade nigamanagarāni viya gāmaggahaṇeneva gāmūpacāropi saṅgahitoti āha “ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañcā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:924_19: Aññathā pana mātikāya anavasesato avahāraṭṭhānapariggaho kato nāma na hoti,
tika-vin09t0:924_20: na ca buddhā sāvasesaṃ pārājikaṃ paññāpenti.
tika-vin09t0:925_6: atha kho samantato tattakova paricchedo gharūpacāro nāmāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:925_11: “Yathā taruṇamanussā”tiādinā yathā mātugāmo kāke uḍḍāpento ujukameva hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā leḍḍuṃ khipati,
tika-vin09t0:925_16: Tassa sace dve indakhīlā hontīti tassa parikkhittassa gāmassa sace anurādhapurasseva dve ummārā honti.
tika-vin09t0:925_18: tassa gāmadvārabāhānaṃ vemajjhe ṭhitassa leḍḍupātabbhantaraṃ gāmūpacāro nāma.
tika-vin09t0:925_22: tattha ubhosu passesu vatiyā vā pākārassa vā koṭivemajjhaṃva indakhīlaṭṭhāniyattā indakhīloti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:925_23: Yo pana gāmo pubbe mahā hutvā pacchā kulesu naṭṭhesu appako hoti,
tika-vin09t0:925_26: Nanu cetaṃ aparikkhittassa upacāradassanaṃ padabhājanena viruddhamiva dissati.
tika-vin09t0:925_27: Tattha hi “gāmūpacāro nāma parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti
tika-vin09t0:925_28: vatvā “aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:925_29: na pana taṃ leḍḍupātaṃ gāmasaṅkhepaṃ katvā tato paraṃ gāmūpacāroti vuttoti āha “padabhājanepi hi imināva nayena attho veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin09t0:926_1: idha gāmo nāma duvidho hoti parikkhitto ca aparikkhitto ca.
tika-vin09t0:926_3: Tasmā tassa visuṃ paricchedaṃ avatvā “gāmūpacāro nāma parikkhittassa gāmassa indakhīle ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:926_5: Tasmā tassa gāmassa gāmaparicchedadassanatthaṃ “aparikkhittassa gāmassa gharūpacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:926_6: Gāmaparicchede ca dassite gāmūpacāralakkhaṇaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva sakkā ñātunti puna “tattha ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa leḍḍupāto”ti na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:926_8: Yo pana gharūpacāre ṭhitassa leḍḍupātaṃyeva “gāmūpacāro”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:926_13: Tasmā pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca saṃsanditvā vuttanayenevettha gāmo,
tika-vin09t0:927_2: Vikāle gāmappavesanādīsūti ettha ādisaddena asaṃkaccikāgāmappavesanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:927_3: Yo pana parikkhittassa gāmassa upacāro vutto,
tika-vin09t0:927_4: so na katthaci vinayapiṭake upayogaṃ gato.
tika-vin09t0:927_5: Kevalaṃ aparikkhittassa parikkhepokāsato aparo eko leḍḍupāto gāmūpacāro nāmāti ñāpanatthaṃ vutto.
tika-vin09t0:927_6: Evaṃ vutte hi ñāyati “parikkhittassāpi ce gāmassa eko leḍḍupāto kappiyabhūmi samāno upacāroti vutto,
tika-vin09t0:927_8: Imesaṃ paricchedadassanatthanti imesaṃ gāmāraññānaṃ paricchedadassanatthaṃ vuttā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:928_0: Adinnanti dantaponasikkhāpade attano santakampi appaṭiggahitakaṃ kappiyaṃ ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ vuccati,
tika-vin09t0:928_1: idha pana yaṃ kiñci parapariggahitaṃ sasāmikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:928_2: tadetaṃ tehi sāmikehi kāyena vā vācāya vā na dinnanti adinnaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:928_3: Avahārappahonakameva pana dassetuṃ “aññassa manussajātikassa santaka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:928_5: kārena vaḍḍhetvā vuttattā “saṅkhā saṅkhātanti atthato eka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:928_8: Koṭṭhāsassetaṃ nāmaṃ bhāgato saṅkhāyati upaṭṭhātīti katvā.
tika-vin09t0:928_9: Papañcasaṅkhāti sattānaṃ saṃsāre papañcenti cirāyantīti papañcā,
tika-vin09t0:928_12: taṃ “ratto”ti vā “matto”ti vā “micchādiṭṭhiniviṭṭho”ti vā papañcenti byañjentīti papañcā,
tika-vin09t0:928_20: Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā etassa vibhaṅge “theyyacitto avaharaṇacitto”ti vuttanti āha “yo cā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:928_21: Byañjanaṃ anādiyitvāti byañjane ādaraṃ akatvāti attho,
tika-vin09t0:929_0: Te pana avahārāti te pañcavīsati avahārā.
tika-vin09t0:929_1: Saviññāṇakāviññāṇakavasena nānāvidho bhaṇḍo etassa pañcakassāti nānābhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:929_8: Ādipadavasena cetaṃ nāmaṃ kusalādittikassa kusalattikavohāro viya.
tika-vin09t0:929_12: Imesaṃ padānaṃ vasenāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ padānaṃ vasena.
tika-vin09t0:929_14: dutiyapadaṃ aññesaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ harantassa gacchato vasena,
tika-vin09t0:930_4: Abhiyuñjatīti parasantakaṃ “mama santakova aya”nti musā bhaṇitvā abhiyuñjati codeti,
tika-vin09t0:930_6: Sampajānamusāvādepi adinnādānassa pubbapayogattā dukkaṭanti āha “āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti,
tika-vin09t0:930_8: Atha vā dukkaṭasaññitassa vītikkamassa āpajjananti attho.
tika-vin09t0:930_11: balavanissitādibhāvena vā ārāmasāmikassa saṃsayaṃ janeti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t0:930_12: Tañhi tathā vinicchayappasutaṃ disvā sāmiko cinteti “sakkhissāmi nu kho ahaṃ imaṃ ārāmaṃ attano kātuṃ,
tika-vin09t0:930_14: Evaṃ tassa vimati uppajjamānā tena uppāditā hoti.
tika-vin09t0:930_15: Dhuraṃ nikkhipatīti yadā pana sāmiko “ayaṃ thaddho kakkhaḷo jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyampi me kareyya,
tika-vin09t0:930_16: alaṃ dāni mayhaṃ iminā ārāmenā”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:930_19: Āpatti pārājikassa sace sayampi katadhuranikkhepo cāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:930_20: Atha pana sāmikena dhure nikkhittepi abhiyuñjako dhuraṃ anikkhipitvāva “imaṃ suṭṭhu pīḷetvā mama āṇāpavattiṃ
tika-vin09t0:930_21: dassetvā kiṅkārappaṭissāvibhāve ṭhapetvā dassāmī”ti dātabbabhāve saussāho,
tika-vin09t0:930_23: Athāpi abhiyuñjako acchinditvā “na dāni imaṃ imassa dassāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:930_31: “sāmikopi na lacchāmī”ti evaṃ ubho dhuraṃ nikkhipanti,
tika-vin09t0:931_0: Aññassa bhaṇḍaṃ harantoti vetanena vā mittabhāvena vā aññassa bhaṇḍaṃ haranto.
tika-vin09t0:931_4: galasseva ubhosu passesu kesañci kesā oruyha jāyanti,
tika-vin09t0:931_6: tesaṃ adhobhāgo cāti ayaṃ heṭṭhimako paricchedo,
tika-vin09t0:931_9: Khandhaṃ oropetīti ubhosu passesu kaṇṇacūḷikāhi paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā,
tika-vin09t0:931_11: piṭṭhigalāvaṭṭato ca galavāṭakato ca paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā,
tika-vin09t0:932_1: yo bhikkhu “idaṃ gahetvā ettha yāhī”ti sāmikehi anāṇatto sayameva “mayhaṃ idaṃ nāma detha,
tika-vin09t0:932_2: ahaṃ vo bhaṇḍaṃ vahāmī”ti tesaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sīsena ādāya gacchanto theyyacittena taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āmasati, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:932_3: Yathāvuttasīsaparicchedaṃ anatikkamantova ito cito ca ghaṃsanto sāretipi paccāsāretipi,
tika-vin09t0:932_5: Khandhaṃ oropitamatte kiñcāpi sāmikānaṃ “vahatū”ti cittaṃ atthi,
tika-vin09t0:932_7: Khandhaṃ pana anoropetvāpi sīsato kesaggamattampi cāventassa pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:932_8: Yamakabhārassa pana eko bhāgo sīse patiṭṭhāti,
tika-vin09t0:932_10: tattha dvinnaṃ ṭhānānaṃ vasena vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:933_0: Upanikkhittaṃ bhaṇḍanti saṅgopanatthāya attano hatthe parehi ṭhapitabhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:933_8: Sāmikassa vimatiṃ uppādetīti “raho mayā etassa hatthe ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:933_12: Dhuraṃ nikkhipatīti tassa pharusādibhāvaṃ disvā ussāhaṃ ṭhapeti.
tika-vin09t0:933_13: Tatra sacāyaṃ bhikkhu “kilametvā naṃ dassāmī”ti dāne saussāho,
tika-vin09t0:933_18: Yadi pana so tasmiṃ dāne nirussāho,
tika-vin09t0:934_1: Paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmetīti bhaṇḍahārakaṃ tajjetvā tassa gamanapathaṃ vāretvā attanā rucitamaggaṃ ekapādaṃ atikkāmeti.
tika-vin09t0:934_3: bhūmitale vā pāsāṇapabbatatalādīsu vā yattha katthaci paṭicchanne vā appaṭicchanne vā ṭhapitanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:934_8: phandāpane thullaccayañca visuṃ visuṃ theyyacittena āmasanaphandāpanapayoge karontasseva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:934_16: Sace garukaṃ hoti bhārabaddhaṃ lohapiṇḍitelamadhughaṭādi vā,
tika-vin09t0:934_19: Pattharitvā ṭhapitaṃ pana pāvārattharaṇakaṭasārakādiṃ ujukaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhati,
tika-vin09t0:934_23: Vāmato vā dakkhiṇato vā apanāmentassa vāmantena vā dakkhiṇantena vā phuṭṭhokāsaṃ dakkhiṇante vā vāmante vā atikkante pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:935_7: parikappitokāse ca ṭhatvā bhaṇḍassa bahi nipātanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:935_9: Kiriyāsiddhito puretarameva pārājikāpattisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ sādhetīti atthasādhako.
tika-vin09t0:935_10: Dhurassa ālayasaṅkhātassa bhārassa nikkhipanaṃ pariccajanaṃ nirussāhabhāvāpajjanaṃ dhuranikkhepo.
tika-vin09t0:935_11: Idāni byañjane ādaraṃ akatvā tesaṃ atthamattameva dassento “tattha sāhatthiko nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:935_14: “Asukassa bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpetīti etthāpi āṇattikkhaṇe eva āpatti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin09t0:935_17: Taṃ khaṇaṃ eva gahaṇe niyuñjanaṃ āṇattikapayogo,
tika-vin09t0:935_18: kālantarena gahaṇatthaṃ niyogo atthasādhakoti ayametesaṃ visesoti.
tika-vin09t0:936_0: Suṅkaghātaparikappitokāsānanti suṅkaghātañca parikappitokāso ca suṅkaghātaparikappitokāsā, tesaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:936_1: Tattha suṅkaghātanti rukkhapabbatādisaññāṇena niyamitassa suṅkaṭṭhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:936_2: Tañhi yasmā tato rājadeyyabhāgaṃ suṅkaṃ adatvā nīharantā rañño suṅkaṃ hananti vināsenti,
tika-vin09t0:937_0: Koci parapariveṇādīni paviṭṭho kiñci lobhaneyyabhaṇḍaṃ disvā dvārappamukhādivasena yaṃ ṭhānaṃ “sace maṃ etthantare passissanti,
tika-vin09t0:937_6: Sacepi avahārako saṭṭhivassātikkamenapi taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin09t0:937_12: Pādagghanakatelanti ettha pādo nāma kahāpaṇassa catuttho bhāgo,
tika-vin09t0:937_15: Upāhanā ādi yesaṃ vatthūnaṃ tāni upāhanādīni.
tika-vin09t0:937_18: Tenāha “hatthato muttamatteyeva pārājika”nti sace pana attanopi kumbhiyaṃ añño sappiṃ vā telaṃ vā ākirati,
tika-vin09t0:937_19: tatra cāyaṃ theyyacittena telapivanakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ pakkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:938_0: Kāyena vā vācāya vā payuñjanaṃ āṇāpanaṃ payogo,
tika-vin09t0:938_2: iti pubbo ca so payogo cāti pubbapayogo.
tika-vin09t0:938_4: Samaṃ ekī hutvā vidahitvā mantetvā avaharaṇaṃ saṃvidhāvahāro,
tika-vin09t0:938_11: Khilādīni saṅkāmetvā khettādiggahaṇavasenāti khilaṃ, rajjuṃ, vatiṃ,
tika-vin09t0:938_12: mariyādaṃ vā pākāraṃ vā saṅkāmetvā khettaggahaṇavasena, khilaṃ, rajjuṃ, vatiṃ,
tika-vin09t0:938_13: mariyādaṃ vā pākāraṃ vā saṅkāmetvā vatthuggahaṇavasena.
tika-vin09t0:938_14: Sace pana dvīhi khilehi gahetabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:938_21: Evaṃ bahukesupi avasāne dve ṭhapetvā purimehi dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:938_25: Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ “tañca kho sāmikānaṃ dhuranikkhepenā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:938_28: adhikāre vuttattā abhiyogavasena gahaṇaṃ sandhāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:938_31: Imasmiṃ avahāre asammohatthaṃ “evaṃ saṃvidahitvā gatesu hī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:939_0: Ettha ca “purebhattaṃ avaharā”ti vutte ajja vā purebhattaṃ avaharatu, sve vā,
tika-vin09t0:939_4: Sace pana “ajja purebhattaṃ avaharā”ti vutte sve avaharati.
tika-vin09t0:939_5: “Ajjā”ti niyamitaṃ saṅketaṃ atikkamma pacchā avahaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:939_6: Sace “sve purebhattaṃ avaharā”ti vutte ajja purebhattaṃ avaharati,
tika-vin09t0:939_7: “sve”ti niyamitaṃ taṃ saṅketaṃ apatvā pure avahaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:939_11: sve pacchābhattaṃ vā avaharantopi taṃsaṅketato pure ca pacchā ca avaharati.
tika-vin09t0:939_13: ayaṃ saṅketato apure apacchā taṃ avaharatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:940_8: Kūṭamānakūṭakahāpaṇādīhīti ettha kūṭamānaṃ nāma hadayabhedasikhābhedarajjubhedavasena tividhaṃ mānakūṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:940_12: Tāni hi gaṇhanto heṭṭhāchiddena mānena “saṇikaṃ āsiñcā”ti vatvā antobhājane bahuṃ paggharāpetvā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:940_13: dadanto ca chiddaṃ pidhāya sīghaṃ pūretvā deti.
tika-vin09t0:941_1: Tāni hi gaṇhanto saṇikaṃ sikhaṃ ussāpetvā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:941_2: dadanto vegena pūretvā sikhaṃ chindanto deti.
tika-vin09t0:942_1: Khettādiṃ minantā hi amahantampi mahantaṃ katvā minanti,
tika-vin09t0:943_6: Tattha rūpakūṭaṃ nāma dve tulā samarūpā katvā gaṇhanto mahatiyā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:943_8: Aṅgakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto pacchābhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati,
tika-vin09t0:943_10: Gahaṇakūṭaṃ nāma gaṇhanto mūle rajjuṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:943_12: Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ nāma tulaṃ susiraṃ katvā anto ayacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā gaṇhanto taṃ pacchābhāge karoti,
tika-vin09t0:944_2: Ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ katvā aññā dve tisso lohapātiyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti.
tika-vin09t0:944_3: Tato janapadaṃ gantvā kiñcideva aḍḍhaṃ kulaṃ pavisitvā “suvaṇṇabhājanāni kiṇāthā”ti vatvā agghe pucchite samagghataraṃ dātukāmā honti.
tika-vin09t0:944_4: Tato tehi “kathaṃ imesaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvo jānitabbo”ti vutte “vīmaṃsitvā gaṇhathā”ti suvaṇṇapātiṃ pāsāṇe ghaṃsitvā sabbā pātiyo datvā gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:945_0: Vañcanaṃ nāma tehi tehi upāyehi paresaṃ vañcanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:945_2: eko kira luddako migañca migapotakañca gahetvā āgacchati,
tika-vin09t0:945_6: migapotako eka”nti vutte ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā nivattento “na me bho migapotakena attho,
tika-vin09t0:945_9: So āha “nanu bho mayā paṭhamaṃ eko kahāpaṇo dinno”ti.
tika-vin09t0:945_13: ayañca kahāpaṇagghanako migapotakoti dve kahāpaṇā bhavissantīti.
tika-vin09t0:945_14: So “kāraṇaṃ vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā migapotakaṃ gahetvā migaṃ adāsīti.
tika-vin09t0:946_8: Padavārena kāretabboti bhūmiyaṃ anikkhipitvāva vīmaṃsitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:946_10: tassa mūlaṃ vā tadeva vā bhaṇḍaṃ dātabbanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:947_0: Tassāti yo evaṃ parikappeti, tassa. Imassa “avahāro hotī”ti iminā sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:948_2: “Pacchā gaṇhissāmī”ti paṃsunā vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetīti “sace idāneva onamitvā gaṇhissāmi,
tika-vin09t0:948_3: ‘kiṃ samaṇo gaṇhātī’ti maṃ jānitvā viheṭheyyuṃ pacchā gaṇhissāmī”ti paṃsunā vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādeti.
tika-vin09t0:948_10: heṭṭhimantena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ kesaggamattampi uparimantena atikkāmento pavesetīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:949_3: Uddhāre rakkhati attano koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya uddhaṭattā.
tika-vin09t0:949_5: “Uddhāreyeva rakkhatī”ti imināva pātane na rakkhatīti atthe siddhepi atthasādhakavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ uddharitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:949_6: Sace pana dvīsupi koṭṭhāsesu patitadaṇḍake adassanaṃ gameti,
tika-vin09t0:949_14: Tasmiṃ vivaditvā vā avivaditvā vā taṃ gaṇhitvā gate itaro tassa bhāgaṃ uddharati,
tika-vin09t0:949_16: Sacepi tena “ahaṃ mama bhāgaṃ tuyhaṃ na demi,
tika-vin09t0:949_17: tvaṃ pana attano bhāgaṃ ñatvā gaṇhā”ti vuttepi “nāyaṃ mamā”ti jānantopi tasseva bhāgaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:949_20: ayaṃ mayhaṃ bhāgoti kiṃ iminā vivādenā”ti cintetvā “mayhaṃ vā patto hotu,
tika-vin09t0:949_26: Sace so vivādabhīruko bhikkhu “yaṃ tuyhaṃ ruccati,
tika-vin09t0:949_27: taṃ gaṇhā”ti vutto attano pattaṃ varabhāgaṃ ṭhapetvā lāmakaṃyeva gahetvā gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:949_28: tato itarassa vicinitāvasesaṃ gaṇhantassāpi avahāro nattheva.
tika-vin09t0:949_29: Evamimāni pañca pañcakāni samodhānetvā ime pañcavīsati avahārā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:950_1: aparādhānurūpaṃ pana chejjabhejjānusāsako pamāṇabhūtova idhādhippetoti āha “rājānoti idaṃ bimbisāraṃyeva sandhāya vutta”nti.
tika-vin09t0:950_6: Hananaṃ nāma pothanañceva chedanañcāti āha “hatthādīhi vā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:950_11: thenosīti ettha “paribhāseyyu”nti padaṃ ajjhāharitabbaṃ ūnattā padappayogassa.
tika-vin09t0:950_13: Yathārūpaṃ pana yasmā pādato paṭṭhāya hoti,
tika-vin09t0:950_18: Ettha ca pādena kahāpaṇassa catutthabhāgaṃ akappiyabhaṇḍameva dasseti,
tika-vin09t0:950_20: Ettāvatā heṭṭhimantadassanena sabbākārena dutiyapārājikappahonakavatthu dassitaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:950_21: Porāṇakassāti porāṇasatthānurūpaṃ uppāditassa lakkhaṇasampannassa nīlakahāpaṇasadisassa kahāpaṇassa.
tika-vin09t0:951_0: Evaṃ asādhāraṇavinicchayaṃ dassetvā idāni sādhāraṇavinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “rājagahe”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:951_2: Māsako nāma porāṇakassa kahāpaṇassa vīsatimo bhāgo.
tika-vin09t0:951_4: Idāni imasmiṃ adinnādāne vinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:951_9: idañhi adinnādānaṃ vinicchinantena otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ sahasā avinicchinitvā pañca ṭhānāni oloketabbāni.
tika-vin09t0:954_1: Avahārakena hi “mayā idaṃ nāma avahaṭa”nti vuttepi āpattiṃ anāropetvāva taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sasāmikaṃ vā asāmikaṃ vāti upaparikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:954_2: Sasāmikepi sāmikānaṃ sālayabhāvo vā nirālayabhāvo vā upaparikkhitabbo.
tika-vin09t0:954_7: Bhaṇḍasāmikesu pana bhaṇḍaṃ āharāpentesu bhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:955_1: Tadeva hi bhaṇḍaṃ kadāci samagghaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:955_3: Tasmā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yasmiṃ kāle avahaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:957_3: Yathā navadhoto patto aṭṭha vā dasa vā agghati,
tika-vin09t0:957_4: so pacchā bhinno vā chiddo vā āṇigaṇṭhikāhato vā appaggho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:957_5: tasmā na sabbadā bhaṇḍaṃ pakatiaggheneva kātabbanti.
tika-vin09t0:958_3: sace koci kassaci pādagghanakaṃ vāsiṃ harati,
tika-vin09t0:958_4: tatra vāsisāmiko pucchitabbo “tayā ayaṃ vāsi kittakena kītā”ti. “Pādena,
tika-vin09t0:958_8: Sace vadati “ekadivasaṃ me dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā rajanachalli vā pattapacanadāru vā chinnaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:958_12: evaṃ añjaniyā vā añjanisalākāya vā kuñcikāya vā palālena vā thusehi vā iṭṭhakacuṇṇena vā ekavāraṃ ghaṃsitvā dhovanamattenāpi aggho bhassati.
tika-vin09t0:958_15: paribhogasīsena aṃse vā sīse vā ṭhapanamattenāpi,
tika-vin09t0:958_16: taṇḍulādīnaṃ papphoṭanenāpi tato ekaṃ vā dve vā apanayanenapi,
tika-vin09t0:958_19: antamaso tato makkhikaṃ vā kipillikaṃ vā uddharitvā chaḍḍitamattenapi,
tika-vin09t0:958_20: guḷapiṇḍakassa madhurabhāvajānanatthaṃ nakhena vijjhitvā aṇumattaṃ gahitamattenapi aggho bhassati.
tika-vin09t0:958_21: Tasmā yaṃ kiñci pādagghanakaṃ vuttanayeneva sāmikena paribhogena ūnaṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:958_22: na taṃ avahārako bhikkhu pārājikena kāretabboti.
tika-vin09t0:959_0: Evaṃ imāni tulayitvā pañca ṭhānāni dhāreyya atthaṃ vicakkhaṇo āpattiṃ vā anāpattiṃ vā garukaṃ vā lahukaṃ vā āpattiṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapeyyāti.
tika-vin09t0:960_0: Evaṃ tattha vinicchayaṃ dassetvā idāni anāpattiṃ dassento “sakasaññissā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:960_1: Tattha sakasaññissāti “mayhaṃ santakaṃ idaṃ bhaṇḍa”nti evaṃ sakasaññissa parabhaṇḍampi gaṇhato gahaṇe anāpatti,
tika-vin09t0:961_4: sambhatto ca ālapito ca jīvati ca jānāti ca ‘gahite me attamano”’ti.
tika-vin09t0:962_5: Jīvatīti anuṭṭhānaseyyāya sayitopi yāva jīvitindriyupacchedaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin09t0:962_7: Evarūpassa santakaṃ “gahite me attamano bhavissatī”ti jānantena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:962_9: Vissāsaggāho pana tīhi aṅgehi ruhati. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin09t0:963_2: tassa santakaṃ vissāsabhāvena gahitampi puna dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:963_3: Dadantena ca matakadhanaṃ tāva ye tassa dhane issarā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā,
tika-vin09t0:963_6: Yo pana paṭhamaṃyeva “suṭṭhu kataṃ tayā mama santakaṃ gaṇhantenā”ti vacībhedena vā cittuppādamattena vā anumoditvā pacchā kenaci kāraṇena kupito,
tika-vin09t0:963_12: Yo pana “mayā tumhākaṃ santakaṃ gahita”nti vā “paribhutta”nti vā vutto gahitaṃ vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:964_0: Tāvakāliketi “paṭidassāmi paṭikarissāmī”ti evaṃ gaṇhantassa tāvakālikepi gahaṇe anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:964_1: Gahitaṃ pana sace bhaṇḍasāmiko puggalo vā gaṇo vā “tuyhevetaṃ hotū”ti anujānāti,
tika-vin09t0:965_4: Devatāya pana uddissa balikammaṃ karontehi rukkhādīsu laggitasāṭake vattabbameva natthi.
tika-vin09t0:966_1: Sacepi hi devo vā nāgasupaṇṇo vā manussarūpena āpaṇaṃ pasāreti,
tika-vin09t0:966_2: tato cassa santakaṃ koci dibbacakkhuko bhikkhu taṃ ñatvā gahetvā gacchati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:967_0: Paṃsukūlasaññissāti “asāmikaṃ idaṃ paṃsukūla”nti evasaññissāpi gahaṇe anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:968_0: Sacittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi idaṃ samuṭṭhātīti āha “adinnādānasamuṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-vin09t0:968_6: ahaṃ ekapassa”nti saṃvidhāya ubhayesaṃ payogena ekassa vatthuno ṭhānācāvane labbhati.
tika-vin09t0:968_7: “Kāyavacīkamma”nti avacanaṃ pana kāyavācānaṃ īdise ṭhāne aṅgamattattā.
tika-vin09t0:968_8: Yāya pana cetanāya samuṭṭhāpito payogo sāhatthiko vā āṇattiko vā padhānabhāvena ṭhānācāvanaṃ sādheti,
tika-vin09t0:968_10: Aññathā sāhatthikaṃ vā āṇattikassa aṅgaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin09t0:968_16: Tuṭṭho vā bhīto vā majjhatto vā naṃ āpajjatīti tivedanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:971_4: Idāni “saddhiṃ cetetvā”ti iminā saṅkhepena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “pāṇo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:971_5: Tattha “pāṇo”ti saññāya saddhiṃyevāti “pāṇo”ti saññaṃ avijahitvā eva,
tika-vin09t0:971_7: Evañca katvā kathaṃ ekakkhaṇe ekassa cittassa ubhayārammaṇabhāvoti edisī codanā anavakāsāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:971_8: Keci pana “ñātapariññāya diṭṭhasabhāvesu dhammesu tīraṇapariññāya tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā ‘rūpaṃ anicca’ntiādinā
tika-vin09t0:971_9: sabhāvena saddhiṃ ekakkhaṇe aniccādilakkhaṇajānanaṃ viya ‘pāṇo’ti saññāya saddhiṃyeva ‘vadhāmi na’nti
tika-vin09t0:971_11: Apare pana ācariyā tatthāpi evaṃ na kathenti.
tika-vin09t0:971_12: Ettha ca manussaviggaho”ti avatvā “pāṇo”ti vacanaṃ “manusso aya”nti ajānitvā kevalaṃ sattasaññāya ghātentassāpi pārājikabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:972_1: Tattha kalalato paṭṭhāyāti paṭisandhiviññāṇena saddhiṃ uppannakalalarūpato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin09t0:972_2: Kalalarūpaṃ nāma itthipurisānaṃ kāyavatthubhāvadasakavasena samatiṃsa rūpāni,
tika-vin09t0:972_4: Tattha itthipurisānaṃ kalalarūpaṃ jātiuṇṇāya ekena aṃsunā uddhaṭatelabindumattaṃ hoti acchaṃ vippasannaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:975_0: Evaṃ parittakaṃ vatthuṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva maraṇakālā etthantare anupubbena vuḍḍhippatto attabhāvo manussaviggaho nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:975_4: Tattha hi santativasena pavattamānaṃ kalalasaṅkhātaṃ attabhāvaṃ jīvitā voropetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin09t0:975_6: Paṭisandhicittena hi saddhiṃ tiṃsa kammajarūpāni nibbattanti.
tika-vin09t0:975_7: Tesu pana ṭhitesuyeva soḷasa bhavaṅgacittāni uppajjitvā nirujjhanti.
tika-vin09t0:975_8: Etasmiṃ antare gahitapaṭisandhikassa dārakassa vā mātuyā vā panassa antarāyo natthi.
tika-vin09t0:976_0: Imassa panatthassāti “sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeyyā”ti imassa atthassa.
tika-vin09t0:976_7: Rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya vinassatīti.
tika-vin09t0:976_8: Yāya cetanāyāti tasmiṃ pāṇe pāṇasaññino kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattāya yāya cetanāya.
tika-vin09t0:976_9: Manodvāre pana pavattāya vadhakacetanāya pāṇātipātabhāvo natthi.
tika-vin09t0:976_10: Sā cetanāti sā jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā.
tika-vin09t0:976_12: yāya cetanāya pavattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetu taṃmahābhūtapaccayā uppajjanakamahābhūtā nuppajjissanti,
tika-vin09t0:976_14: Laddhūpakkamāni hi mahābhūtāni itarabhūtāni viya na visadānīti samānajātikānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na hontīti.
tika-vin09t0:978_0: Idāni yathāvutteyeva cha payoge vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:978_2: Sāhatthikoti ettha hattho upalakkhaṇabhāvena gahitoti āha “kāyena vā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:978_3: Tattha kāyenāti hatthena vā pādena vā muṭṭhinā vā jāṇunā vā yena kenaci aṅgapaccaṅgena.
tika-vin09t0:978_4: Kāyekadeso hettha hatthādikāyo avayave samudāyopacāro yathā “gāmo daḍḍho”ti.
tika-vin09t0:978_8: kāyappaṭibaddhena vā usuyantapāsāṇādīnaṃ nissajjananti yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:978_10: Uddissānuddissabhedatoti uddisitvā ca anuddisitvā ca pavattibhedena.
tika-vin09t0:978_12: so etassa atthīti uddisako, payogo, tasmiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:978_22: Pacchā vā teneva rogena maratūti yojanā.
tika-vin09t0:978_25: Sace pana maraṇādhippāyena pahāraṃ datvā tena amatassa puna aññena cittena pahāre dinne pacchāpi paṭhamappahāreneva marati,
tika-vin09t0:978_31: Esa nayo bahūhipi ekassa pahāre dinne.
tika-vin09t0:979_0: Idāni imasmiṃ āṇattikapayoge saṅketavisaṅketabhāvajānanatthaṃ chabbidhaṃ niyamaṃ dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:980_5: vatthuvisesena panettha kammaviseso ca āpattiviseso ca hotīti.
tika-vin09t0:980_6: “Purebhattaṃ mārehī”ti āṇatto purebhattameva māretīti “ajja sve”ti aniyametvā “purebhattaṃ mārehī”ti āṇatto yadā kadāci purebhattaṃ māreti.
tika-vin09t0:980_7: Yo pana “ajja pubbaṇhe”ti vutto majjhanhe vā sāyanhe vā sve vā pubbaṇhe māreti,
tika-vin09t0:980_10: Pubbaṇhe māretuṃ vāyamantassa majjhanhe jātepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:981_0: Evaṃ vatthukālesu saṅketavisaṅketataṃ dassetvā idāni okāsādīsu saṅketavisaṅketataṃ atidisanto “iminā nayenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:981_1: Tattha okāsoti gāmo vā vanaṃ vā gehadvāraṃ vāti evamādiko.
tika-vin09t0:981_2: Āvudhanti asi vā usu vā satti vāti evamādi.
tika-vin09t0:981_3: Iriyāpathoti māretabbassa gamanaṃ vā nisajjā vāti evamādi.
tika-vin09t0:981_4: Kiriyāvisesoti vijjhanaṃ vā chedanaṃ vā bhedanaṃ vā saṅkhamuṇḍakaṃ vāti evamādi.
tika-vin09t0:984_3: evaṃ ghātehī”ti vuttāya pāḷiyā labbhatīti ñātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:985_3: Niccaparibhogo mañco vā pīṭhaṃ vā apassenaphalakaṃ vā divāṭṭhāne nisīdantassa apassenakatthambho vā tatthajātakarukkho
tika-vin09t0:985_4: vā caṅkame apassāya tiṭṭhantassa ālambanarukkho vā ālambanaphalakaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t0:985_6: tasmiṃ apassene yathā apassayantaṃ vijjhati vā chindati vā,
tika-vin09t0:985_7: tathā katvā vāsipharasusattiārakaṇṭakādīsu aññatarassa satthassa ṭhapananti attho.
tika-vin09t0:986_1: Manāpassa vā amanāpassa vā rūpassa upaharaṇaṃ samīpe ṭhapanaṃ rūpūpahāro,
tika-vin09t0:986_6: yato tatthapi pubbe vuttanayeneva kammabaddho hoti.
tika-vin09t0:986_8: mūlaṭṭhena opātādīsu paresaṃ mūlena vā mudhā vā dinnesupi yadi tappaccayā koci marati,
tika-vin09t0:986_11: aññena vā tatra opāte vināsetvā bhūmisame katepi paṃsuhārakā vā paṃsuṃ gaṇhantā,
tika-vin09t0:986_12: mūlakhaṇakā vā mūlāni khaṇantā āvāṭaṃ karonti,
tika-vin09t0:986_14: tattha ca koci otaritvā vā laggitvā vā marati,
tika-vin09t0:986_17: so vā añño vā vitthatataraṃ vā gambhīrataraṃ vā karoti,
tika-vin09t0:987_2: Kammavipākajāya iddhiyāti sātisayakammanibbattāya kammavipākena sahajātāya iddhiyā,
tika-vin09t0:987_6: dāṭhāvudhādīnaṃ dāṭhākoṭanādīnamiva māraṇatthaṃ kammavipākajiddhivikārakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:988_0: Kammasādhano vāyaṃ hārakasaddo bahulaṃvidhānena tatthāpi ṇvupaccayassa sijjhanatoti āha “atha vā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:988_2: upanikkhipitabbaṃ vā satthameva hārakanti vikappadvayena vuttanti āha “satthañca taṃ hārakañcāti satthahāraka”nti.
tika-vin09t0:988_3: “Hārakasattha”nti vattabbe visesanassa paranipātaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:988_8: Itarathā hi “pariyeseyyā”ti imassa “upanikkhipeyyā”ti ayamattho adhippeto na siyā.
tika-vin09t0:988_10: Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā pāḷiyaṃ “satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyāti asiṃ vā sattiṃ vā bheṇḍiṃ vā laguḷaṃ
tika-vin09t0:988_11: vā pāsāṇaṃ vā satthaṃ vā visaṃ vā rajjuṃ vā”ti vuttanti āha “padabhājane panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:988_13: Byañjanānurūpato paripuṇṇaṃ katvā atthassa avuttattā “byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:988_18: Satthanti vuttāvasesaṃ yaṃ kiñci samukhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:989_0: Yo evaṃ maratīti yo satthaṃ vā āharitvā,
tika-vin09t0:989_5: “So dhanaṃ vā labhatī”tiādinā nayenāti so dhanaṃ vā labhati,
tika-vin09t0:989_10: Tattha etenāti “maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti etena vacanena.
tika-vin09t0:989_11: Nayidha evanti idha manussaviggahapārājike na evaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:990_0: “Satthaṃ vā āharā”tiādināti ettha ādisaddena “visaṃ vā khāda,
tika-vin09t0:990_2: sobbhe vā narake vā papāte vā papatā”tiādiṃ sabbaṃ maraṇūpāyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:990_3: Ettha ca narako nāma tattha tattha phalantiyā bhūmiyā sayameva nibbattā mahādarī,
tika-vin09t0:990_6: Papātoti pabbatantare vā thalantare vā ekato chinno.
tika-vin09t0:990_9: Mataṃ te jīvitā seyyāti tava maraṇaṃ jīvitā sundarataraṃ.
tika-vin09t0:990_15: ayaṃ dutiyo anto”tiādīsu viya nidassane daṭṭhabbo yathāvuttassa buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānassa maraṇassa nidassanato.
tika-vin09t0:991_2: Cittassa atthadīpanatthaṃ vuttanti nāyaṃ cittasaddo “cittasaṅkappo”tiādīsu viya vicittādiattho,
tika-vin09t0:991_3: atha kho viññāṇavacanoti tassa atthadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:991_14: Etthāpi itisaddo āharitabboti “cittasaṅkappo”ti imasmiṃ padepi adhikāravasena itisaddo āharitabbo.
