tika-vin09t0:991_15: Idañhi “iti cittasaṅkappo”ti evaṃ avuttampi adhikārato vuttameva hotīti.
tika-vin09t0:991_16: Saṅkappoti cettha “takko vitakko saṅkappo”tiādīsu viya na vitakkasseva nāmaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:991_17: atha kho tassa ca aññesañcāti dassetuṃ “saṅkappoti cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:991_21: Iminā saṃvidahanaṃ nāmettha na vidhānanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:992_1: Tattha maraṇavaṇṇasaṃvaṇṇane tāva jīvite ādīnavadassanavasena avacākāratā,
tika-vin09t0:992_4: ekato bhuñjantassa nakhe visaṃ pakkhipitvā maraṇādisamādapanavasena avacākāratā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:993_0: Evaṃ asādhāraṇavinicchayaṃ vatvā idāni sādhāraṇavinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “vesāliya”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:993_1: Opātakkhaṇanādīsu dukkaṭanti ettha sacepi jātapathaviṃ khaṇati,
tika-vin09t0:993_4: yakkho ca peto ca tiracchānagatamanussaviggaho ca yakkhapetatiracchānagatamanussaviggahā, tesaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:994_1: Ettha ca “asañciccā”ti idaṃ maraṇasaṃvattanikaupakkamassa asallakkhaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:995_0: Musalussāpanavatthusmiṃ viyāti “tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu bhattagge antaraghare āsanaṃ paññapento musale ussite ekaṃ musalaṃ aggahesi.
tika-vin09t0:995_1: Dutiyo musalo paripatitvā aññatarassa dārakassa matthake avatthāsi.
tika-vin09t0:995_6: Anāpatti bhikkhu asañciccā”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ viya.
tika-vin09t0:996_0: Visagatapiṇḍapātavatthusmiṃ viyāti “tena kho pana samayena aññataro piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu visagataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
tika-vin09t0:996_1: labhitvā paṭikkamanaṃ haritvā bhikkhūnaṃ aggakārikaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin09t0:996_6: Anāpatti bhikkhu ajānantassā”ti imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ viya.
tika-vin09t0:997_0: Bhesajjavatthusmiṃ viyāti “tena kho pana samayena aññatarā vañjhā itthī kulūpakaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca “iṅghāyya bhesajjaṃ jānāhi,
tika-vin09t0:998_6: Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “sacepi hi sirisayanaṃ āruḷho rajjasampattisukhamanubhavanto rājā ‘coro
tika-vin09t0:998_7: deva ānīto’ti vutte ‘gacchatha naṃ mārethā’ti hasamāno bhaṇati,
tika-vin09t0:1001_7: Manussadhammo nāma vinā bhāvanāmanasikārena pakatiyā manussehi nibbattetabbo dasakusalakammapathadhammo.
tika-vin09t0:1001_8: So hi manussānaṃ cittādhiṭṭhānamattena ijjhanato tesaṃ so bhāvitadhammo viya ṭhitoti tathā vutto,
tika-vin09t0:1002_1: idha pana mahaggatalokuttarāva veditabbāti āha “mahaggatalokuttarapaññā jānanaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1002_2: Kilesehi ārakattā parisuddhaṭṭhena ariyanti āha “ariyaṃ visuddhaṃ uttama”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1002_20: so bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī”tiādinā nayena aññāpadesaṃ vināti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1003_7: katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī’ti kenaci vuccamāno”ti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1004_0: “Bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā abhabbo jhānādīni adhigantu”nti sikkhāpadātikkamassa antarāyakarattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1004_1: Bhikkhubhāvo hissa saggantarāyo ceva hoti maggantarāyo ca.
tika-vin09t0:1004_6: Bhikkhubhāvoti pārājikaṃ āpajjitvā “samaṇo aha”nti paṭijānanato vohāramattasiddho bhikkhubhāvo.
tika-vin09t0:1005_4: Vacanatthavirahatoti “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji”nti ādivacanassa atthabhūtena jhānādinā vajjitattā tucchaṃ udakādisuññaṃ bhājanaṃ viya.
tika-vin09t0:1005_13: itaraṃ pana hotu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin09t0:1006_12: suparisuddhasīlassa pana kammaṭṭhāne appamattassa nāmarūpaṃ vavatthapetvā paccayapariggahena vitiṇṇakaṅkhassa
tika-vin09t0:1006_13: tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasantassa āraddhavipassakassa uppajjati.
tika-vin09t0:1006_15: Tattha tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvāti kalāpasammasanavasena aniccādilakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1006_20: Pattasaññitāsaṅkhātoti “patto mayā uttarimanussadhammo”ti evaṃsaññitāsaṅkhāto adhimāno uppajjati.
tika-vin09t0:1006_21: Uppanno ca suddhasamathalābhiṃ vā suddhavipassanālābhiṃ vā antarā ṭhapeti.
tika-vin09t0:1006_22: So hi dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi vassāni kilesasamudācāraṃ apassanto “ahaṃ sotāpanno”ti vā “sakadāgāmī”ti vā “anāgāmī”ti vā maññati.
tika-vin09t0:1006_30: So evaṃ dīgharattaṃ kilesasamudācāraṃ apassanto antarā aṭṭhatvāva “arahā aha”nti maññatīti.
tika-vin09t0:1006_31: “Taṃ adhimānaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti iminā “aññatrā”ti padaṃ apekkhitvā “adhimānā”ti upayogatthe nissakkavacananti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1007_3: Yā sā “idhekacco dussīlova samāno ‘sīlavā’ti maṃ jano jānātū”tiādinā nayena vuttā,
tika-vin09t0:1007_5: Iminā pana mandattā momūhattā samudācarantassa anāpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1007_7: saddena na kevalaṃ purimā tayovāti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1008_9: Yassa ārocetīti vācāya vā hatthavikārādīhi vā aṅgapaccaṅgacopanehi viññattipathe ṭhitassa yassa puggalassa āroceti.
tika-vin09t0:1008_10: Viññattipathaṃ pana atikkamitvā ṭhito koci ce dibbena cakkhunā,
tika-vin09t0:1008_11: dibbāya ca sotadhātuyā disvā ca sutvā ca jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:1008_13: Yopi “kiṃ ayaṃ bhaṇatī”ti saṃsayaṃ vā āpajjati,
tika-vin09t0:1008_16: Yo pana jhānādīni attano adhigamavasena vā uggahaparipucchādivasena vā na jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:1008_17: kevalaṃ “jhāna”nti vā “vimokkho”ti vā vacanamattameva sutaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1008_18: sopi tena vutte “jhānaṃ kira samāpajjī”ti esa vadatīti yadi ettakamattampi jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:1008_21: Seso pana ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā bahūnaṃ vā niyamitāniyamitavasena viseso sabbo sikkhāpaccakkhānakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1008_22: Pariyāyabhāsane pana “aha”nti avuttattā paṭivijānantassa vuttepi thullaccayaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1008_23: Visaṃvādanādhippāyena musāvādapayogassa katattā appaṭivijānantassāpi dukkaṭanti āha “yo te vihāre vasati…pe…
tika-vin09t0:1011_4: Tattha samodhānetvāti tattha tattha āgatāni ettheva samodahitvā,
tika-vin09t0:1011_10: aṭṭhavatthukāti imāni bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūhi asādhāraṇāni cattāri.
tika-vin09t0:1011_11: Paṇḍakādīnañhi ekādasannaṃ abhabbabhāvo pārājikāpattisadisattā pārājikoti āha “ekādasanna”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1011_26: saṅghabhedakoti ime aṭṭha attano kiriyāya vipannattā abhabbaṭṭhānaṃ pattāti pārājikāva.
tika-vin09t0:1011_33: Yadā bhikkhunī vibbhamitukāmā hutvā kāsāvameva vā gihivatthaṃ vā gihinivāsanākārena nivāseti,
tika-vin09t0:1011_34: tadā pārājikamāpannā nāma hotīti āha “gihibhāvaṃ patthayamānāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1011_35: Sā hi ajjhācāravītikkamaṃ akatvāpi ettāvatā assamaṇī nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1012_2: atha kho yadā anabhiratiyā pīḷito attano aṅgajātaṃ mukhe vā vaccamagge vā paveseti,
tika-vin09t0:1012_6: Sopi yadā anabhiratiyā pīḷito attano aṅgajātaṃ attano mukhamaggavaccamaggesu aññataraṃ paveseti,
tika-vin09t0:1012_8: Parassa aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gaṇhātīti yo anabhiratiyā pīḷito parassa suttassa vā pamattassa vā aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:1012_9: Parassa aṅgajāte abhinisīdatīti yo anabhiratiyā pīḷito parassa aṅgajātaṃ kammaniyaṃ disvā attano vaccamaggena tassūpari nisīdati,
tika-vin09t0:1012_11: Etāni hi cattāri yasmā ubhinnaṃ rāgavasena sadisabhāvūpagatānaṃ dhammo “methunadhammo”ti vuccati,
tika-vin09t0:1012_12: tasmā ekena pariyāyena methunadhammaṃ appaṭisevitvāyeva kevalaṃ maggena maggappavesanavasena āpajjitabbattā
tika-vin09t0:1013_3: lambiādayo cattāro ca paṭhamapārājikaṃ āpannā evāti katvā kuto catuvīsatīti ? Vuccate –
tika-vin09t0:1013_4: mātughātakādayo hi cattāro idha anupasampannā eva adhippetā,
tika-vin09t0:1013_6: yasmā pana ekena pariyāyena methunadhammaṃ appaṭisevino honti,
tika-vin09t0:1013_8: Dutiyavikappe kaccitthāti ettha kacci atthāti padacchedo kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1018_2: Sādhavo hi pare “bhonto”ti vā “devānaṃpiyā”ti vā “bhadrabhava”nti vā “āyasmanto”ti vā samālapanti.
tika-vin09t0:1020_6: saddassa visuṃ attho natthīti āha “sañcetanāva sañcetanikā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1021_4: taṃ sabbaṃ saṅkhepato vibhāvetvā sarūpato taṃ visaṭṭhiṃ dassetuṃ “rāgūpatthambhādīsū”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1021_17: taṃ ādi yesaṃ te ajjhattarūpādayo, tesu.
tika-vin09t0:1021_23: Iminā muccanassādo muttassādo methunassādo phassassādo kaṇḍuvanassādo dassanassādo nisajjassādo vācassādo
tika-vin09t0:1021_24: gehasitapemaṃ vanabhaṅgiyanti imehi sampayuttā cetanāyo paṭikkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:1021_27: Tena hi satipi mocanassāde nimitte upakkamābhāvato muttepi anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1021_28: Vuttañhetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ “sā ca kho nimitte upakkamantasseva,
tika-vin09t0:1022_4: Sukkassa hi vatthisīsaṃ kaṭi kāyoti tidhā ṭhānaṃ pakappenti.
tika-vin09t0:1022_11: thaddhasukkhacammāni ca vajjetvā avaseso chavimaṃsalohitānugato sabbopi kāyo kāyappasādabhāvajīvitindriyābaddhapittānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1022_13: Tathā hi rāgapariyuṭṭhānenābhibhūtānaṃ hatthīnaṃ ubhohi kaṇṇacūḷikāhi sambhavo nikkhamati.
tika-vin09t0:1023_4: Na hi vinā rāgūpatthambhādīhi pubbaṇhādayo kālabhedā mocane nimittaṃ honti.
tika-vin09t0:1023_14: Nīlādivasenā”tiādīhi pana dasahi navamassa adhippāyassa vatthu dassitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1023_17: “Ṭhānā cāvanā”ti iminā pana atthato vissaṭṭhi dassitā.
tika-vin09t0:1023_19: Sā cāyaṃ tassa sukkassa ṭhānā cāvanā rāgavasena.
tika-vin09t0:1023_29: pana avayave samūhavohārena vā “nikāyo”ti vutto “eko vedanākkhandho,
tika-vin09t0:1024_1: Nanu ca ayuttoyaṃ niddeso “saṅgho ādimhi ceva sese ca icchitabbo assā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1024_2: Na hi āpattinikāyassa ādimhi ceva sese ca saṅgho icchito,
tika-vin09t0:1024_3: kiñcarahi vuṭṭhānassāti imaṃ codanaṃ manasi nidhāya yathā na virujjhati,
tika-vin09t0:1024_5: Āpattito vuṭṭhānassa ādimhi ceva sese ca icchito saṅgho āpattiyāva icchito nāma hotīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1025_2: Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “dakasotaṃ otiṇṇamatte”ti vuttanti āha “ṭhānato pana cuta”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1025_3: Avassameva dakasotaṃ otarati adhivāsetvā antarā nivāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-vin09t0:1025_4: Dakasotorohanato paṭṭhāya pana upādinnato vinimuttattā sambhavarūpaṃ utusamuṭṭhānameva avasissati,
tika-vin09t0:1025_6: Tasmāti yasmā ṭhānato cutaṃ dakasotaṃ otarati, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:1026_0: Amocanādhippāyassāti bhesajjena nimittaṃ ālimpantassa uccārādīni vā karontassa.
tika-vin09t0:1026_1: Supinaṃ passantassāti dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato vā devatopasaṃhārato vā pubbanimittato vāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi supinaṃ passantassa.
tika-vin09t0:1026_10: taṃ rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ vā rāgādisampayuttaṃ vā na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1026_11: Supinaṃ passantassa ca īdisāni cittāni uppajjanti.
tika-vin09t0:1026_16: Sabbohārikacittena ca kate vītikkame anāpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin09t0:1026_17: Supinaṃ passantena pana katepi vītikkame ekantaṃ anāpatti eva.
tika-vin09t0:1026_18: Atha neva sutto na paṭibuddho passati,
tika-vin09t0:1026_25: Yathā hi makkaṭassa niddā lahuparivattā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1026_26: evaṃ yā niddā punappunaṃ kusalādicittavokiṇṇattā lahuparivattā,
tika-vin09t0:1026_27: yassā pavattiyaṃ punappunaṃ bhavaṅgato uttaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1026_29: Yassa ca evaṃ passantassa supine methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa viya,
tika-vin09t0:1026_30: kāyasaṃsaggādīni āpajjantassa viya ca supinanteneva kāraṇena asuci muccati,
tika-vin09t0:1026_32: Supine pana uppannāya assādacetanāya sacassa visayo hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1026_35: Kāsāvapaccattharaṇarakkhaṇatthaṃ pana hatthapuṭena gahetvā jagganatthāya udakaṭṭhānaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1029_1: kattusādhanaṃ vā hotīti tadubhayavasena atthaṃ dassento “yakkhādīhi viya sattā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1029_3: yathā te ratijanakā rūpādayo visayā aniccadukkhāsubhānattākārena avaṭṭhitā,
tika-vin09t0:1029_8: Tadahujātāyapīti tasmiṃ ahani jātaṃ jananaṃ etissāti tadahujātā,
tika-vin09t0:1029_9: tasmiṃ ahani jātāti vā tadahujātā, tāya,
tika-vin09t0:1030_1: Idāni hatthādīnaṃ vibhāgadassanatthaṃ “tattha hattho nāma kapparato paṭṭhāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1030_3: Aññattha pana maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya yāva agganakhā hattho.
tika-vin09t0:1030_4: Vinandhitvā vā avinandhitvā vā katakesakalāpassetaṃ adhivacananti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1030_7: Hatthañca veṇiñca ṭhapetvā avasesasarīraṃ aṅganti āha “avasesassa sarīrassā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1031_0: Yo hi sevanādhippāyopi niccalena kāyena kevalaṃ phassaṃ paṭivijānāti sādiyati anubhoti,
tika-vin09t0:1031_1: tassa cittuppādamatte āpattiyā abhāvato anāpattīti āha “kāyena avāyamitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1031_4: Evañhi acetetvā pattappaṭiggahaṇādīsu mātugāmassa aṅge phuṭṭhepi anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1031_8: Ajānantassāti dārakavesena ṭhitaṃ dārikaṃ “itthī”ti ajānanto kenacideva karaṇīyena phusati,
tika-vin09t0:1031_10: Asādiyantassāti kāyasaṃsaggaṃ asādiyantassa bāhāparamparāya nītabhikkhussa viya anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1034_7: Vaṇṇo nāma dve magge uddissa “itthilakkhaṇena subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatāsī”tiādinā thomanā.
tika-vin09t0:1034_8: Avaṇṇo nāma dve magge uddissa vuttavipariyāyena garahanā,
tika-vin09t0:1034_15: kadā te sukhaṇo sulayo sumuhutto bhavissati,
tika-vin09t0:1034_16: kadā te methunaṃ dhammaṃ labhissāmī”ti vacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1034_19: Paṭipucchanaṃ nāma “evaṃ kira tvaṃ sāmikassa deti,
tika-vin09t0:1034_38: Yasmā methunupasaṃhitāya vācāya adhikaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin09t0:1035_0: Ettha ca vaṇṇabhaṇane tāva “itthilakkhaṇena subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatāsī”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1035_2: “Tava vaccamaggo ca passāvamaggo ca subho subhasaṇṭhāno dassanīyo,
tika-vin09t0:1035_3: īdisena nāma itthilakkhaṇena subhalakkhaṇena samannāgatāsī”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1036_0: Avaṇṇabhaṇane pana “animittāsī”tiādīhi ekādasahi padehi avaṇṇe aghaṭite sīsaṃ na eti,
tika-vin09t0:1036_1: ghaṭitepi tesu “sikharaṇīsi sambhinnāsi ubhatobyañjanakāsī”ti imehi tīhi ghaṭiteyeva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t0:1037_0: Yācanāyapi “dehi me”ti ettakeneva sīsaṃ na eti,
tika-vin09t0:1037_1: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ methunadhammena ghaṭite eva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t0:1038_0: “Kadā te mātā pasīdissatī”tiādīsu āyācanavacanesupi ettakeneva sīsaṃ na eti,
tika-vin09t0:1038_2: kadā te methunaṃ dhammaṃ labhissāmī”ti vā “tava mātari pasannāya vā methunaṃ dhammaṃ labhissāmī”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1039_0: “Kathaṃ tvaṃ sāmikassa desī”tiādīsu pucchāvacanesupi “methunaṃ dhamma”nti vutteyeva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t0:1039_1: “Evaṃ kira tvaṃ sāmikassa desī”ti paṭipucchāvacanesupi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:1040_4: evaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ dadamānā upanayamānā sāmikassa piyā hotī”tiādinā pana nayena methunadhammena ghaṭiteyeva saṅghādiseso.
tika-vin09t0:1041_0: Akkosavacanesu pana ekādasasu “sikharaṇīsi sambhinnāsi ubhatobyañjanakāsī”ti imāni tīṇiyeva padāni suddhāni sīsaṃ enti,
tika-vin09t0:1041_2: purimāni ca vaccamaggapassāvamaggamethunadhammapadāni tīṇīti cha padāni suddhāni āpattikarāni,
tika-vin09t0:1041_3: sesāni “animittāsī”tiādīni animitte “methunaṃ dhammaṃ me dehī”ti vā “animittāsi,
tika-vin09t0:1041_4: methunaṃ dhammaṃ me dehī”ti vā ādinā nayena methunadhammena ghaṭitāneva āpattikarāni hontīti veditabbāni.
tika-vin09t0:1042_4: pana jāṇumaṇḍalañca ettheva dukkaṭakhette saṅgahaṃ gacchati bhikkhuniyā kāyasaṃsagge viya.
tika-vin09t0:1042_5: Na hi buddhā garukāpattiṃ sāvasesaṃ paññāpentīti.
tika-vin09t0:1042_6: Kāyappaṭibaddhanti vatthaṃ vā pupphaṃ vā ābharaṇaṃ vā.
tika-vin09t0:1043_1: aṭṭhakathaṃ vā sajjhāyaṃ karonto atthapurekkhāro nāma,
tika-vin09t0:1043_7: yathā āyatimpi evarūpā mā hohisī”ti bhaṇanto anusāsanipurekkhāro nāma.
tika-vin09t0:1043_8: Iti atthañca dhammañca anusāsaniñca purakkhitvā bhaṇantānaṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1043_9: Yo pana bhikkhunīnaṃ pāḷiṃ vācento pakativācanāmaggaṃ pahāya hasanto hasanto “sikharaṇīsi,
tika-vin09t0:1043_15: Nanu “sikharaṇī”tiādīhi akkosantassa paṭighacittaṃ uppajjatīti dukkhavedanāyapi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1046_1: Idhāpi duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullajānanasamatthāva itthī adhippetāti āha “duṭṭhullobhāsena vuttappakārāya itthiyā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1046_14: attakāmā ca sā pāricariyā cāti attakāmapāricariyā,
tika-vin09t0:1046_17: Ettha ca paṭhamena atthavikappena kāmahetupāricariyāsaṅkhātaṃ atthattayaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin09t0:1046_19: Byañjane pana ādaraṃ akatvā atthamattameva dassetuṃ “attano kāmaṃ attano hetuṃ attano adhippāyaṃ attano pāricariya”nti padabhājanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1046_20: “Attano kāmaṃ attano hetuṃ attano pāricariya”nti hi vutte jānissanti paṇḍitā “ettāvatā attano atthāya kāmapāricariyā vuttā”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1046_21: “attano adhippāyaṃ attano pāricariya”nti vuttepi jānissanti “ettāvatā attanā icchitakāmitaṭṭhena attakāmapāricariyā vuttā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1048_1: Ubhatobyañjanako pana paṇḍakagatikattā visuṃ na vutto.
tika-vin09t0:1048_2: “Imasmiṃ sikkhāpadadvaye kāyasaṃsagge viya yakkhipetīsupi duṭṭhullattakāmavacane thullaccaya”nti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1048_3: Tasmiṃyevāti paṇḍakeyeva itthisaññino attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇabhaṇanepi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1048_5: tassa aggadānaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ dehī”ti pariyāyavacanepi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1048_6: “Attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya yā mādisaṃ ‘sīlavanta’nti vuttattā”ti eke.
tika-vin09t0:1051_5: Tañca parato “itthiyā vā purisamati”ntiādivacanato itthipurisānaṃ vemajjheti āha “itthipurisānaṃ antare sañcaraṇabhāva”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1051_6: Paṭiggaṇhanavīmaṃsanapaccāharaṇānīti ettha paṭiggaṇhanaṃ nāma purisena vā itthiyā vā ubhinnaṃ mātādīhi vā “bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1051_7: itthannāmaṃ itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā evaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti vutte tesaṃ vacanaṃ “sādhū”ti vā “hotū”ti vā “bhaṇāmī”ti vā yena kenaci ākārena vacībhedaṃ katvā,
tika-vin09t0:1051_9: Vīmaṃsanaṃ nāma vuttappakārena sāsanaṃ gahetvā tassā itthiyā vā purisassa vā tesaṃ avassaṃ ārocanakānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1051_10: mātāpitubhātābhaginiādīnaṃ vā santikaṃ gantvā tassa sāsanassa ārocanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1051_11: Paccāharaṇaṃ nāma tena gantvā ārocite sā itthī vā puriso vā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchatu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin09t0:1051_13: puna āgantvā tassā itthiyā vā purisassa vā tassā pavattiyā ārocanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1052_0: Itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ purisassa vā itthimatinti ettha “āroceyyā”ti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1052_9: “Jāyattane vā jārattane vā”ti hi idaṃ yadatthaṃ taṃ tesaṃ matiṃ āroceti,
tika-vin09t0:1052_11: Idāni pana padabhājaniyaṃ vuttanayenāpi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1052_13: “jāyattane vā jārattane vā”ti pana niddesassa ubhayaliṅgasādhāraṇattā purisaliṅgavasenāpi yojetvā vattabbanti āha “eteneva upāyenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1053_0: Aññatra nālaṃvacanīyāyāti desacārittavasena paṇṇadānādinā apariccattaṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1053_1: Sañcarittavasena bhikkhunā vacanīyā na hotīti nālaṃvacanīyā,
tika-vin09t0:1053_3: Appena vā bahunā vā dhanena kītā dhanakkītā.
tika-vin09t0:1053_4: Yasmā pana sā na kītamattāyeva bhariyā,
tika-vin09t0:1053_7: Chandavāsinīti chandena attano ruciyā vasatīti chandavāsinī.
tika-vin09t0:1053_8: Yasmā pana sā na attano chandamatteneva bhariyā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1053_19: Yathā ca “chandavāsinī”tiādīsu aññataravasena vadato visaṅketo natthi,
tika-vin09t0:1053_20: evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ avuttesupi “hohi kira itthannāmassa bhariyā, jāyā, pajāpati,
tika-vin09t0:1053_25: paricārikā”ti evamādīsu saṃvāsaparidīpakesu vacanesu aññataravasena vadantassāpi visaṅketo natthi,
tika-vin09t0:1054_0: Māturakkhitaṃ brūhīti ettha māturakkhitā nāma mātarā rakkhitā,
tika-vin09t0:1054_1: yathā purisena saha saṃvāsaṃ na kappeti,
tika-vin09t0:1055_0: Saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā gilānassa vā kiccena gacchantassāti ettha bhikkhusaṅghassa uposathāgāraṃ vā kiñci vā vippakataṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1055_1: Tattha kārukānaṃ bhattavetanatthāya upāsako vā upāsikāya santikaṃ bhikkhuṃ pahiṇeyya,
tika-vin09t0:1055_5: Gilānassa bhesajjatthāyapi upāsakena vā upāsikāya santikaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1055_6: upāsikāya vā upāsakassa santikaṃ pahitassa gacchato anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1056_1: na yakkhī na petī na tiracchānagatā.
tika-vin09t0:1056_4: tathāpi manussajātikāva itthipurisā idha adhippetāti āha “tesaṃ manussajātikatā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1057_3: Tatheva vīmaṃsitvā tatheva paccāharantassāti hatthamuddādinā kāyavikārena vīmaṃsitvā puna āgantvā tatheva ārocentassa.
tika-vin09t0:1057_5: Kenaci vutteti āsanasālādīsu nisinnassa kenaci purisena vutte.
tika-vin09t0:1057_6: Sace hi khīṇāsavassa mātāpitaro kujjhitvā alaṃvacanīyā honti,
tika-vin09t0:1057_7: tañca bhikkhuṃ gharaṃ upagataṃ pitā vadati “mātā te, tāta,
tika-vin09t0:1057_10: So ce gantvā taṃ vatvā puna pituno tassā āgamanaṃ vā anāgamanaṃ vā āroceti,
tika-vin09t0:1057_21: Yaṃ pana paṇṇattiṃ jānitvā eteheva tīhi nayehi sañcarittaṃ samāpajjato kāyacittato,
tika-vin09t0:1057_26: Na hi paṇṇattiṃ jānitvāpi “nālaṃvacanīyā”ti maññamānassa sacittakehi samuṭṭhānehi āpatti samuṭṭhātīti vattuṃ yujjati vītikkamacetanāya asambhavato.
tika-vin09t0:1060_0: Saññācikāya panāti ettha santi attavācako tatiyatthe nipāto,
tika-vin09t0:1060_7: Nanu na sakkā yācanāyeva kuṭiṃ kātunti anuyogaṃ sandhāya tassādhippāyatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sayaṃ yācitakehī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1060_11: Parena bhaṇḍasāmikena “mama ida”nti apariccāgārakkhaṇagopanavasena pariggahitaṃ parapariggahitakaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1060_14: parasantakabhāvato mocetvā attano santakaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1060_16: Tāvakālikaṃ pana vaṭṭatīti tāvakālikaṃ katvā yācituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1060_20: bhante”ti bhikkhuṃ uyyojetvā migepi māretvā āhareyyuṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1060_24: avalittā vā ullittāvalittā vā”ti padabhājane vuttattā “kuṭinti ullittādīsu aññatara”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1060_31: “Sudhāya vā mattikāya vā”ti etena ṭhapetvā ime dve lepe avaseso bhasmāgomayādibhedo alepoti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1061_0: Yasmā pana saññācikāya kuṭiṃ karontenāpi idha vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1061_1: tasmā “sayaṃ vā karontena āṇattiyā vā kārāpentenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1061_2: Ettha ca “sayaṃ vā karontenā”ti iminā sāmatthiyato labbhamānamatthamāha,
tika-vin09t0:1061_5: Evañca katvā yadi pana “karontena vā kārāpentena vā”ti vadeyya,
tika-vin09t0:1061_7: Na hi kārāpento karonto nāma hotīti edisī codanā anavakāsāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1061_11: Anissaratā cettha kārāpanenāti āha “kāretā dāyakena virahita”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1062_10: “Tiriyaṃ sattantarā”ti ukkaṃsato pamāṇassa vuttattā “heṭṭhimakoṭiyā catuhatthavitthārā na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1063_1: Padabhājane vuttanayena saṅghaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācitvāti “saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā
tika-vin09t0:1063_2: vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo ‘ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1063_3: saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1063_4: saṅghaṃ kuṭivatthuolokanaṃ yācāmī”’ti padabhājane vuttanayena tikkhattuṃ yācitvā.
tika-vin09t0:1063_5: Saṅghena vā sammatāti padabhājaniyaṃ vuttena ñattidutiyakammena,
tika-vin09t0:1064_0: Kipillikādīnanti ettha kipillikā nāma rattakāḷapiṅgalādibhedā yā kāci,
tika-vin09t0:1064_1: tā ādi yesaṃ tāni kipillikādīni, tesaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1064_4: so ādi yesaṃ te āsayādayo, tehi.
tika-vin09t0:1064_7: upacikānaṃ vā undūrānaṃ vā ahīnaṃ vā vicchikānaṃ vā satapadīnaṃ vā hatthīnaṃ vā assānaṃ vā sīhānaṃ vā
tika-vin09t0:1064_8: byagghānaṃ vā dīpīnaṃ vā acchānaṃ vā taracchānaṃ vā yesaṃ kesañci tiracchānagatānaṃ pāṇānaṃ vā āsayo hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1064_11: vā hotī”ti evaṃ vuttehi soḷasahi upaddavehi.
tika-vin09t0:1065_2: Yācitehīti “ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo ‘ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1065_3: saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1066_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1066_7: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kattukāmo asāmikaṃ attuddesaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1066_10: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kuṭivatthussa desanā,
tika-vin09t0:1067_4: Lepe ghaṭiteti antolepe vā antolepena saddhiṃ bhittiñca chadanañca ekābaddhaṃ katvā ghaṭite,
tika-vin09t0:1067_7: Ubhayavipannāti ubhayehi desanāpamāṇehi vipannā virahitā ubhayavipannā,
tika-vin09t0:1067_10: Lepo na ghaṭiyatīti pubbe dinnalepo dvārabandhena vā vātapānena vā saddhiṃ na ghaṭiyati,
tika-vin09t0:1067_11: ekābaddhaṃ hutvā na tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1067_12: Tanti dvārabandhaṃ vā vātapānaṃ vā parāmasati.
tika-vin09t0:1067_13: Paṭhamamevāti lepakiccassa niṭṭhitattā dvārabandhavātapānānaṃ ṭhapanato pubbeyeva,
tika-vin09t0:1067_15: “Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ pamāṇikaṃ sārambhaṃ saparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1067_17: Bhikkhu kuṭiṃ karoti desitavatthukaṃ pamāṇikaṃ anārambhaṃ aparikkamanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1067_18: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti padabhājaniyaṃ vuttattā “kevalaṃ sārambhāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1067_20: Aññassa dadato cāti aññassa puggalassa vā saṅghassa vā dadato ca.
tika-vin09t0:1067_21: Guhā nāma iṭṭhakaguhā vā silāguhā vā dāruguhā vā bhūmiguhā vā.
tika-vin09t0:1067_22: Tiṇakuṭi nāma sattabhūmikopi pāsādo tiṇacchadano “tiṇakuṭikā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:1067_23: Aññassāti ācariyassa vā upajjhāyassa vā saṅghassa vā.
tika-vin09t0:1067_24: Vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvāti attano vasanatthāya vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1070_3: so tassa atthīti āha “mahantabhāvo etassa atthīti mahallako”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1070_7: Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā “mahallako nāma vihāro sasāmiko vuccatī”ti ettakameva padabhājane vuttanti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1070_9: Mātikāyaṃ bhikkhū vā anabhineyyāti ettha vā-
tika-vin09t0:1070_10: saddo “ayaṃ vā so mahānāgo”tiādīsu viya avadhāraṇattho.
tika-vin09t0:1071_1: Tassa kira nagarassa ārāmapokkharaṇiādīsu tesu tesu ṭhānesu kosambarukkhāva ussannā ahesuṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1071_3: “Kusumbassa nāma isino assamato avidūre māpitattā”ti eke.
tika-vin09t0:1071_4: Channattheraṃ ārabbhāti yo abhinikkhamanakāle saddhiṃ nikkhanto,
tika-vin09t0:1071_5: yassa ca satthārā parinibbānakāle brahmadaṇḍo āṇatto,
tika-vin09t0:1071_10: Vatthuno adesanāya āpajjanato “akiriyamattato samuṭṭhānabhāvo”ti vuttaṃ. Matta-
tika-vin09t0:1071_13: kuṭikaraṇena ca samuṭṭhānato kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhātī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1074_3: Idāni “dūsito ceva dūsako cā”ti iminā saṅkhepena vuttamevatthaṃ vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “uppanne hi dose”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1074_6: Ākāranānāttenāti dūsitākārassa ceva dūsakākārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ ākārānaṃ nānābhāvena.
tika-vin09t0:1074_10: so tehi vajjito nāma hotīti āha “pītisukhādīhi vivajjito”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1074_12: na so tehi abhisaṭo nāma hotīti āha “na abhisaṭo”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1074_15: Taṃ pana amūlakattaṃ yasmā codakavasena adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1075_0: Idāni attanā vuttameva diṭṭhādiṃ vivarituṃ “ettha cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1075_1: Tathevāti “pasādasotena vā dibbasotena vā”ti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-vin09t0:1075_5: Tattha bhikkhuñca mātugāmañca tathārūpe ṭhāne disvā “addhā imehi kata”nti vā “karissantī”ti vā parisaṅkitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1075_7: Andhakāre vā paṭicchannokāse vā bhikkhussa ca mātugāmassa ca vacanaṃ sutvā dutiyassa atthibhāvaṃ ajānato pubbe vuttanayena parisaṅkitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1075_9: Dhuttehi itthīhi saddhiṃ paccantavihāre maṇḍape vā sālādīsu vā pupphagandhamaṃsasurādīni anubhavitvā
tika-vin09t0:1075_10: gataṭṭhānaṃ disvā “kena nu kho idaṃ kata”nti vīmaṃsantena tatra kenaci bhikkhunā gandhādīhi pūjā katā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1075_12: so tassa gandhaṃ ghāyitvā “ayaṃ so bhavissatī”ti parisaṅkitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1075_16: Tañca panetaṃ diṭṭhādikaṃ na kevalaṃ attano vāti āha “attano vā parassa vā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1075_19: Yadi evaṃ atha kasmā padabhājane “pārājikena dhammenāti catunnaṃ aññatarenā”ti vuttanti āha “padabhājane panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1075_23: “Tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”tiādinā nayena pavattāti “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevi,
tika-vin09t0:1075_27: Ettha ca “assamaṇosī’ti avandanakāraṇassa avuttattā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpanno na vanditabbo”ti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:1075_28: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ avandiyesu antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa avuttattā,
tika-vin09t0:1075_29: “pacchā upasampannena pure upasampanno vandiyo”ti vuttattā ca.
tika-vin09t0:1075_30: Idaṃ pana attanā vattabbaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1076_1: Sikkhāpaccakkhānameva hi hatthamuddāya sīsaṃ na eti,
tika-vin09t0:1076_5: Brahmacariyāti brahmaṃ seṭṭhaṃ pasatthaṃ cariyanti brahmacariyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1076_11: “Tajjanīyakammādisattavidhampi kammaṃ karissāmā”ti āpattiyā codentassa adhippāyo kammādhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1076_15: Anuvijjakenāti saṅghamajjhe otiṇṇaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchinituṃ nisinnena vinayadharena.
tika-vin09t0:1076_16: Kiṃ te diṭṭhanti tayā kiṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1076_18: dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ pārājikaṃ āpajjanto diṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1076_21: kattha te diṭṭha”nti imaṃ nayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:1077_1: Yathā hi samanavasena samathānaṃ vivādādīsu adhikatabhāvo,
tika-vin09t0:1077_5: Adhikaraṇanti vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ kiccādhikaraṇanti catubbidhaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1077_12: Adhikaraṇaṃ samenti vūpasamentītipi samathāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1077_13: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā sesādhikaraṇehi codanāya abhāvato “idaṃ pana pārājikasaṅkhātaṃ āpattādhikaraṇameva adhippeta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1078_5: samayena āvajjitvā ñāte pana ñātameva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1078_9: Yasmā pana parammukhā sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi vadato dukkaṭameva,
tika-vin09t0:1078_10: tasmā “parammukhā codentassa pana sīsaṃ na etī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1078_13: Vadantassāti sattahipi āpattikkhandhehi upasampannaṃ sammukhā vadantassa.
tika-vin09t0:1078_15: Okāsaṃ kāretvā upasampannaṃ sammukhā vadantassa vācāya vācāya pācittiyanti āha “okāsaṃ kāretvā vadantassa pācittiyamevā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1079_0: Uposathaṃ vā pavāraṇaṃ vā ṭhapentassa ca okāsakammaṃ natthīti ettha uposathato pure vā pacchā vā ṭhapitopi aṭṭhapito hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1079_5: saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyyā”ti ettha yāva re-
tika-vin09t0:1079_9: kāre pana vutte ṭhapentena pacchā ṭhapito nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1079_10: “Suṇātu me”ti anāraddhe ṭhapentena pure ṭhapito hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1079_18: etthantare ekapadepi ṭhapentena ṭhapitā hoti pavāraṇā. Yya-
tika-vin09t0:1079_20: tasmā tato paṭṭhāya ṭhapentena aṭṭhapitā hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1079_23: tatiyampi bhante saṅghaṃ pavāremi diṭṭhena vā…pe…
tika-vin09t0:1079_25: kārato yāva ayaṃ sabbapacchimo ṭi- kāro,
tika-vin09t0:1079_27: etthantare ekapadepi ṭhapentena ṭhapitā hoti pavāraṇā.
tika-vin09t0:1079_29: tasmā “karissāmī”ti etasmiṃ pade sampatte ṭhapitāpi aṭṭhapitā hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1079_34: Osaṭe vatthusminti codakena attanā vattabbe saṅghamajjhe udāhaṭe.
tika-vin09t0:1082_2: tassa jātiādito aññassa tiracchānajātiādikoṭṭhāsassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1082_7: Aññabhāgo vāti tiracchānajātiādibhedo añño koṭṭhāso vā.
tika-vin09t0:1082_12: Ṭhapetvā pana tiracchānajātiādikaṃ paramatthato visuṃ chagalakādike asatipi “paṭimāya sarīra”ntiādīsu
tika-vin09t0:1082_14: aññabhāgo vā assa atthī”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1083_0: Idāni “aññabhāgassa ida”ntiādinā saṅkhepena vuttamevatthaṃ kevalaṃ nayadassanatthaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ āgatameva gahetvā vibhajanto “yo hi so”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1083_1: Tena nanu anāgate evaṃ codentānaṃ pāpabhikkhūnaṃ lesokāsapidahanatthaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1083_5: Na pana “yo hi so aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ dabbo mallaputto”tiādinā visesenāti edisī codanā anavakāsāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1083_16: chagalakabhāvassa cāti “tiracchānajātiyā ceva chagalakabhāvassa cā”ti saṅkhātassa aññassa bhāgassa koṭṭhāsassa,
tika-vin09t0:1084_2: Tattha manussajāti ceva bhikkhubhāvo cāti yo ayaṃ bhāgo koṭṭhāso pakkhoti sambandho,
tika-vin09t0:1084_3: “manussajāti ceva bhikkhubhāvo cā”ti saṅkhāto yo ayaṃ bhāgo koṭṭhāso pakkhoti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1084_5: So vā aññabhāgoti yathāvuttatiracchānajātichagalakabhāvasaṅkhāto so aññabhāgo vā.
tika-vin09t0:1084_9: yasmā ca so vā aññabhāgo assa atthi, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:1084_10: Aññabhāgiyasaṅkhyaṃ labhatīti ettha “so yvāya”nti idha so-
tika-vin09t0:1084_11: saddameva ānetvā so aññabhāgiyasaṅkhaṃ labhatīti yojetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1084_17: Imaṃ mayaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomāti chagalakaṃ ajikāya vippaṭipajjantaṃ disvā “mayaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin09t0:1084_18: imaṃ chagalakaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ nāma karomā”ti vadantānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1084_20: Etthāpi “yo so”tiādikaṃ ānetvā tassā nāmakaraṇasaññāya yo so aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ “dabbo mallaputto nāmā”ti chagalako vutto,
tika-vin09t0:1084_21: so yasmā ādhāro vatthu adhiṭṭhānanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1085_0: Idāni kathametaṃ viññāyati “adhikaraṇa”nti cettha ādhāro veditabbo,
tika-vin09t0:1085_1: na vivādādhikaraṇādīsu aññataranti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “tañhi sandhāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1085_2: Tattha tanti tassā nāmakaraṇasaññāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ chagalakaṃ paccāmasati.
tika-vin09t0:1085_3: Vivādādhikaraṇādīsu aññataraṃ sandhāya na vuttanti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1085_6: Idāni tameva asambhavaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1085_10: yenevaṃ vuttanti āha “na ca catunnaṃ adhikaraṇāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1088_0: Āpattileso nāma lahukaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanto diṭṭho hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1088_3: āpatti vācāya vācāya saṅghādisesassāti evaṃ āpattilesampi puggalasmiṃyeva āropetvā vuttattā “puggalānaṃyeva lesā vuttā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1088_4: Tañca “dabbo mallaputto”ti nāmanti mettiyabhūmajakehi chagalakassa kataṃ taṃ “dabbo mallaputto”ti nāmañca.
tika-vin09t0:1088_5: Evaṃ asambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni imināva pasaṅgena desalesasaddānaṃ atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1088_14: “Īsakaṃ allīyatī”ti iminā “leso”ti lisa allībhāveti imassa rūpanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1088_15: Kiñcāpi desalesānaṃ vuttanayena byañjanato nānākaraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-vin09t0:1088_16: atthato pana natthīti āha “jātiādīnaṃyeva aññatarakoṭṭhāsassetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1089_0: Yadi pana nāmakaraṇasaññāya ādhārabhūtaṃ chagalakaṃ sandhāya “aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1089_1: atha kasmā padabhājane taṃ avibhajitvā “aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassāti āpattaññabhāgiyaṃ vā hoti adhikaraṇaññabhāgiyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1089_6: Nanu ca “atthamattaṃ pati saddā abhinivisantī”ti na ekena saddena anekatthā abhidhīyantīti?
tika-vin09t0:1089_8: tesaṃ tesaṃ pana atthānaṃ adhikaraṇasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññaṃ upādāya vuccamāno ayaṃ vicāro adhikaraṇasaddassa atthuddhāroti vutto.
tika-vin09t0:1089_9: Tenevāha “adhikaraṇanti vacanasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena pavattāni cattāri adhikaraṇānī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1089_13: Avasāne āpattaññabhāgiyena codanañcāti “bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1089_16: Ekamekañhi adhikaraṇaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ aññapakkhiyaṃ aññakoṭṭhāsiyaṃ hoti vatthuvisabhāgattā.
tika-vin09t0:1089_17: Ādisaddena “kathaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ adhikaraṇassa aññabhāgiya”ntiādiko padavibhāgo saṅgahito.
tika-vin09t0:1090_0: Kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāyāti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1090_1: tassāpi asambhavadassanappasaṅgena heṭṭhā vuttattā “sesā vinicchayakathā aṭṭhame vuttasadisāyevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1090_2: Tattha sesā vinicchayakathāti “pārājikenāti bhikkhuno anurūpesu ekūnavisatiyā aññatarenā”tiādikā vinicchayakathā.
tika-vin09t0:1090_3: Vuttasadisāyevāti ettha imasmiṃ sikkhāpade yā vattabbā,
tika-vin09t0:1090_4: tena sikkhāpadena sādhāraṇabhūtā sā vuttasadisāyevāti adhippetā,
tika-vin09t0:1090_7: Purimasmiṃ sikkhāpadepi tathāsaññino anāpattikattā “idha cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1090_10: Tena kenaci bhikkhunā añño koci khattiyajātiko pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1090_11: atha so aññaṃ attano veriṃ khattiyajātikaṃ bhikkhuṃ passitvā taṃ khattiyajātilesaṃ gahetvā evaṃ codeti
tika-vin09t0:1090_14: atha vā tvaṃ kho khattiyo, na añño,
tika-vin09t0:1090_18: natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1090_20: Ettha ca tesaṃ khattiyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asadisassa tassa tassa dīghādino vā diṭṭhādino vā vasena aññabhāgiyatā,
tika-vin09t0:1091_0: Āpattilese pana kenaci bhikkhunā koci bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjanto diṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1091_3: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ aññabhāgiyaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ hotīti?
tika-vin09t0:1091_6: tassa pana aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa leso nāma.
tika-vin09t0:1091_7: Yo so sabbakhattiyānaṃ sādhāraṇo khattiyabhāvo viya sabbāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇo āpattibhāvo.
tika-vin09t0:1091_8: Eteneva upāyena “kenaci bhikkhunā koci bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hotī”tiādikaṃ visesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:1096_1: Tenāha “cittena ca sarīrena ca aviyuttassāti attho”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1096_3: Samānasaṃvāsakoti samāno ekūposathādibhedo saṃvāso assāti samānasaṃvāsako,
tika-vin09t0:1096_7: tesu tesu saṅghakammesu hatthapāsūpagamanatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1096_8: Kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ bhijjeyyāti ayaṃ saṅgho kena nu kho upāyena vaggo bhaveyya.
tika-vin09t0:1097_4: Abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpenti,
tika-vin09t0:1097_5: bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatena ‘abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenā’ti dīpenti.
tika-vin09t0:1098_0: Evaṃ kammakkhandhake vuttānaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ bhedakaraṇānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1098_1: Kāraṇañhi tadāyattavuttitāya phalaṃ ettha vasatīti “vatthū”ti vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:1103_4: tiṭṭhatā ca taṃ dīpitañceva avinissaṭṭhañca hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1103_6: Kīva dūre sutvā gantvā avadantānaṃ dukkaṭanti āha “sabbantimena paricchedenā”tiādi. Pi-
tika-vin09t0:1103_9: Tattha “aḍḍhayojanamatta”nti iminā ekavihāre vattabbameva natthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin09t0:1103_10: “Gantvā”ti iminā dūtaṃ vā paṇṇaṃ vā pesetvā vadatopi āpattimokkho natthi,
tika-vin09t0:1104_1: Ekībhāvo ca samānaladdhivasena hotīti āha “ekaladdhiko hotū”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1104_7: bahisīmāyaṃ vā anupariveṇiyaṃ vāti na ekuddeso.
tika-vin09t0:1104_9: Appaṭinissajjato dukkaṭanti visuṃ visuṃ vadantānaṃ gaṇanāya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1104_12: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkamatī”tiādinā padabhājane vuttāhi ñatticatutthāhi
tika-vin09t0:1104_13: tīhi samanubhāsanakammavācāhi kammaṃ kātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1104_14: “Bhedāya parakkameyyā”ti visuṃ vuttattā bhedanasaṃvattanikassa adhikaraṇassa samādāya paggaṇhanato pubbepi
tika-vin09t0:1104_15: pakkhapariyesanādivasena saṅghabhedāya parakkamantassa samanubhāsanakammaṃ kātabbanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1105_3: dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā ca paṭippassambhantīti āha “samanubhāsanakamme”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1105_4: Tañca dukkaṭaṃ te ca thullaccayā paṭippassambhantīti yañca ñattipariyosāne dukkaṭaṃ āpanno,
tika-vin09t0:1105_6: tā tissopi āpattiyo liṅgaparivattena asādhāraṇāpattiyo viya paṭippassambhanti.
tika-vin09t0:1105_12: bhedāya parakkamati ceva bhedanasaṃvattanikaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samādāya paggayha tiṭṭhati ca,
tika-vin09t0:1105_17: Paṭinissajjantassāpi ñattito pubbe vā ñattikkhaṇe vā ñattipariyosāne vā paṭhamāya vā anussāvanāya dutiyāya vā tatiyāya vā yāva yya-
tika-vin09t0:1106_0: Ettha pana “devadatto samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami,
tika-vin09t0:1106_1: tasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti parivāre āgatattā devadatto ādikammiko,
tika-vin09t0:1106_4: Na hi tassa taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1106_6: Tathā hi “ariṭṭho bhikkhu gaddhabādhipubbo pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajji,
tika-vin09t0:1106_7: tasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti parivāre āgatattā ariṭṭhassa kammaṃ katanti paññāyati,
tika-vin09t0:1106_9: Athāpissa katena bhavitabbanti koci attano rucimattena vadeyya,
tika-vin09t0:1106_10: tathāpi appaṭinissajjane ādikammikassa anāpatti nāma natthi.
tika-vin09t0:1106_11: Na hi paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamantassa aññatra odissa anuññātato anāpatti nāma dissati.
tika-vin09t0:1106_12: Yampi ariṭṭhasikkhāpadassa padabhājane anāpattiyaṃ “ādikammikassā”ti potthakesu likhitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1106_14: pamādalikhitabhāvo ca tassa “paṭhamaṃ ariṭṭho bhikkhu codetabbo,
tika-vin09t0:1106_16: sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetabbo”ti evaṃ kammakkhandhake āpattiropanato veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1107_0: Idha bhedāya parakkamane ādikammikassa devadattassa yasmā taṃ kammaṃ na kataṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1107_2: Sikkhāpadaṃ pana taṃ ārabbha paññattanti katvā “ādikammiko”ti vutto.
tika-vin09t0:1107_5: Yasmā pana asamanubhāsiyamāno nāma yassa kevalaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ na karonti,
tika-vin09t0:1107_10: Eteneva upāyena ṭhapetvā ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ sabbasamanubhāsanāsu vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1107_12: “Paṭinissajjāmī”ti kāyavikāraṃ vā vacībhedaṃ vā akarontasseva pana āpajjanato akiriyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1110_3: Yaṃ vacanaṃ samaggepi vagge avayavabhūte karoti bhindati,
tika-vin09t0:1110_4: taṃ kalahakārakavacanaṃ idha “vagga”nti vuccatīti āha “vaggaṃ asāmaggipakkhiyavacanaṃ vadantī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1110_9: “Na hi saṅgho saṅghassa kammaṃ karotī”ti idaṃ niggahavasena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1110_13: Jānāti noti etthāpi “chandañca ruciñcā”ti idaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1110_17: “Eta”nti iminā tassa kammaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti āha “yaṃ so karotī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1113_0: Dukkhena vattabbo anusāsituṃ asakkuṇeyyo sabhāvo assāti dubbacajātiko,
tika-vin09t0:1113_3: Vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti kismiñci vuccamāne asahanato ovadituṃ asakkuṇeyyo.
tika-vin09t0:1113_9: Atha sabbāneva sikkhāpadāni kathaṃ pātimokkhuddesapariyāpannānīti āha “yassa siyā āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:1113_11: “Yassa siyā āpattī”ti iminā sabbāpi āpattiyo nidānuddese saṅgahitā eva honti.
tika-vin09t0:1113_13: So pana pākaṭoyevāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na vutto.
tika-vin09t0:1113_16: Tathā hi tehi yathāsakaṃ sikkhā sikkhīyati, na sabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1113_19: Atha vā sahadhammikena sakāraṇena vuccamānoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1113_20: Vacanāyāti nissakke sampadānavacananti āha “tato mama vacanato”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1116_0: Nagarassāpi gāmavisesattā idha gāmaggahaṇeneva nagarampi gahitanti āha “nagarampi gāme antogadhamevā”ti, vā-
tika-vin09t0:1116_1: saddena vā anuttavikappatthena gahaṇanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1116_4: taṃtaṃviparīto gāmoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1116_5: Kulāni dūsetīti khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddavasena cattāri kulāni vikāraṃ āpādeti.
tika-vin09t0:1116_7: atha kho attano duppaṭipattiyā tesaṃ pasādaṃ vināseti.
tika-vin09t0:1116_9: Tattha haritvā vā harāpetvā vā pakkositvā vā pakkosāpetvā vā sayaṃ vā upagatānaṃ yassa kassaci attano
tika-vin09t0:1116_14: Saddhaṃ vināsentoti tathā akarontesu aññesu pesalesu bhikkhūsu appasādaṃ adassanaṃ gamento.
tika-vin09t0:1116_15: Pupphadānādīhi ca tehi katasaṅgahehi aññe pesale tathā akaronte te manussā issanti na allīyantīti so tesaṃ pasādaṃ vināseti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1116_17: Te pana yasmā kulasaṅgahatthaṃ mālāvaccharopanādayo idha adhippetā,
tika-vin09t0:1117_5: Alaṃ te idha vāsenāti tava idha vāsena alaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1117_6: mā idha tava vāso hotūti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1117_8: Pabbājanīyakammakatoti codetvā sāretvā āpattiṃ āropetvā “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin09t0:1117_9: ime assajipunabbasukā”tiādinā padabhājane vuttāya ñatticatutthakammavācāya katapabbājanīyakammo.
tika-vin09t0:1117_12: carituṃ labhatīti sacepi gāmo vā nigamo vā dvādasayojanaparamo hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1117_14: neva tasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā piṇḍāya carituṃ labhati,
tika-vin09t0:1117_16: Tasmiṃ vihāre vasantena sāmantagāmepi piṇḍāya na caritabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1117_17: sāmantavihārepi vasantena tasmiṃ gāme piṇḍāya na caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1117_18: Sāmantavihāre vasantena pana sāmantagāme carituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1117_19: Āpajjitabbā āpattiyoti kulasaṅgahatthaṃ attano santakadāne dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1120_0: Paṭhamāpattikāti avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsatthoti āha “paṭhamaṃ āpatti etesanti paṭhamāpattikā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1121_2: Nāmamattavasena vā ayaṃ itthannāmā āpattīti “ayaṃ saṅghādiseso nāma āpattī”ti evaṃ vinā vatthuṃ nāmavasena vā.
tika-vin09t0:1121_5: taṃ na sundaraṃ “ayaṃ itthannāmā āpattī”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:1121_6: Idāni naṃ kassaci na ārocessāmīti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1121_8: Na kevalaṃ vatthunāmavaseneva āpattisaññī hutvā chādentasseva,
tika-vin09t0:1121_9: atha kho yopi evaṃ ajānanto kevalaṃ “āpattiṃ chādemī”ti āpattisaññāya chādeti,
tika-vin09t0:1121_12: aññāpattikkhandhasaññī vā vematiko vā hutvā “na dāni naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”ti evaṃ chādetukāmova dhuraṃ nikkhipitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin09t0:1121_14: Anāpatti pana āpattisaññāyapi anāpattisaññāyapi chādentena acchāditāva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1122_3: Vuttanayenevāti “na dāni naṃ kassaci ārocessāmī”tiādinā vuttaneva nayena.
tika-vin09t0:1122_4: Atha “mayhaṃ saṅghena kammaṃ kata”nti apakatattasaññī hutvā chādeti,
tika-vin09t0:1122_6: Apakatattena pana pakatattasaññinā vā pakatattena apakatattasaññinā vā chāditāpi acchannāva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1125_0: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjaṃ;
tika-vin09t0:1128_2: Sace pana yo bhīrukajātikatāya andhakāre amanussacaṇḍamigabhayena antarāyikasaññī hutvā chādeti,
tika-vin09t0:1128_4: Yassapi pabbatavihāre vasantassa kandaraṃ vā nadiṃ vā atikkamitvā ārocetabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1128_8: etasmiṃ satiyeva antarāye antarāyikasaññī hutvā chādeti,
tika-vin09t0:1128_10: Antarāyikassa pana antarāyikasaññāya vā anantarāyikasaññāya vā chādayato acchannāva.
tika-vin09t0:1129_1: Sacassa mukhe appamattako gaṇḍo vā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1129_5: tāvatakena pana neva vattuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin09t0:1129_10: Appahunā pana vattuṃ vā gantuṃ vā asamatthena pahusaññinā vā appahusaññinā vā chāditāpi acchāditāva.
tika-vin09t0:1130_1: Sace pana “chādessāmī”ti dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā purebhatte vā pacchābhatte vā paṭhamayāmādīsu vā lajjidhammaṃ okkamati,
tika-vin09t0:1131_0: Yassa pana abhikkhuke ṭhāne vasantassa āpattiṃ āpajjitvā sabhāgassa bhikkhuno āgamanaṃ āgamentassa vā,
tika-vin09t0:1131_1: sabhāgassa santikaṃ vā gacchantassa aḍḍhamāsopi māsopi atikkamati,
tika-vin09t0:1132_0: Yo pana āpannamattova aggiṃ akkantapuriso viya sahasā apakkamitvā sabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā āvi karoti,
tika-vin09t0:1132_4: Yo pana visabhāgo hoti sutvā pakāsetukāmo,
tika-vin09t0:1132_7: pacchābhattaṃ vā divā vā rattiṃ vā,
tika-vin09t0:1133_0: Akāmā parivatthabbanti appaṭikammakatāya āpattiyā saggamokkhāvaraṇabhāvato anicchantenāpi parivasitabbanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1133_7: tathāpi appaṭicchannaparivāso idha na adhippetoti āha “tattha paṭicchanna…pe…
tika-vin09t0:1133_10: Paṭicchannāya āpattiyā sati dātabbo parivāso paṭicchannavisayatāya paṭicchannaparivāso.
tika-vin09t0:1134_0: Idāni te tividheyeva parivāse sarūpato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1134_5: iti evarūpā visūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu viya ādiattho.
tika-vin09t0:1134_7: saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavisaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmī”ti imaṃ pāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:1134_8: Evaṃ parivāsaṃ yācāpetvāti evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1134_14: Māsappaṭicchannanti sattānaṃ āyuṃ minanto viya siyati antaṃ karotīti māso,
tika-vin09t0:1134_18: dhammappavattiñca saṅgamma vadanto viya sarati pavattatīti saṃvaccharo,
tika-vin09t0:1135_0: Vatthukittanavasena vāti nāmena saha vatthukittanavasena vāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1135_1: Teneva hi upari “nāmamattavasena vā”ti mattaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1135_2: Nāmamattavasenāti vatthukittanaṃ vinā kevalaṃ nāmasseva vasena.
tika-vin09t0:1135_3: Tasmāti yasmā duvidhe nāme “āpattī”ti sabbasādhāraṇaṃ nāmaṃ, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:1135_7: Vatthu ceva gottañcāti vītikkamattā vatthu ceva anaññasādhāraṇattā gottañca.
tika-vin09t0:1135_9: sajātito aññattha kāyasaṃsaggādīsu gantuṃ adatvā buddhiṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1135_14: sajātisādhāraṇanāmattā nāmañceva tena tena vītikkamenāpajjitabbattā āpatti cāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1136_0: Tayidaṃ kammavācāya kena vacanena gahitanti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1136_2: vītikkamena āpajjitabbattā ca nāmañceva āpatti ca hotīti āha “āpattiyoti vacanenāpī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1136_9: Vattaṃ samādātabbanti yathāvuttesu dvīsu padesu ekenapi samādātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1138_1: ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1138_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1138_3: tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā ekāhappaṭicchannāya ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin09t0:1139_1: Imañca panatthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci bhāsāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1139_2: “Puna āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocentenā”ti idaṃ āgantukaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1139_3: Ettha ca ekassa ārocentena avasāne “vedayatīti maṃ āyasmā dhāretu”,
tika-vin09t0:1139_8: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sāditabbaṃ pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccupaṭṭhāna”ntiādinā pārivāsikakkhandhake yāni catunavuti vattāni vuttāni,
tika-vin09t0:1139_11: pārivāsikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedā sahavāso vippavāso anārocanā”ti ratticchedo vutto,
tika-vin09t0:1140_1: sace āgantukā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā vā avissamitvā eva vā vihāramajjhena gacchanti,
tika-vin09t0:1140_8: Yepi antovihāraṃ appavisitvā upacārasīmaṃ okkamitvā gacchanti,
tika-vin09t0:1140_9: ayañca nesaṃ chattasaddaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddaṃ vā khipitasaddaṃ vā sutvāva āgantukabhāvaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:1141_0: Nadiādīsu nāvāya gacchantampi paratīre ṭhitampi ākāse gacchantampi pabbatatalaaraññādīsu dūre ṭhitampi
tika-vin09t0:1141_3: mahāsaddaṃ katvā vā vegena anubandhitvā vā ārocetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1141_5: Sace vāyamantopi sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
tika-vin09t0:1142_0: Aññaṃ kañci vihāraṃ gatenapi bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbameva.
tika-vin09t0:1142_3: Atha rukkhamūlādīsu visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitā honti,
tika-vin09t0:1142_10: Sañcicca anārocentassa pana ratticchedo ceva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1143_1: Māḷakato pana bhikkhūsu nikkhantesu ekassapi santike nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1143_2: Māḷakato nikkhamitvā satiṃ paṭilabhantena saha gacchantassa santike nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1143_8: Dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvāti bhikkhūnaṃ sajjhāyanasaddasavanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1143_10: Gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāneti dassanūpacāravijahanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1143_11: Vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetabbanti vuttanayeneva vattaṃ samādiyitvā parivāso ārocetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1143_17: Sace añño koci bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati.
tika-vin09t0:1143_24: Atha dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1143_28: Yaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ bhikkhunti vihārato nikkhamantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ vā sabbapaṭhamaṃ yaṃ aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ passati.
tika-vin09t0:1143_29: Tassa ārocetvā nikkhipitabbanti anārocentassa dukkaṭaṃ siyā,
tika-vin09t0:1143_33: Yāva rattiyo pūrentīti yattakā rattiyo āpatti paṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1143_36: Samantapāsādikāyaṃ pana “evaṃ yattakāni divasāni āpatti paṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1143_38: tato adhikatarāni vā kukkuccavinodanatthāya parivasitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1144_3: Cūḷasuddhanto mahāsuddhantoti ettha yo upasampadato paṭṭhāya anulomakkamena vā ārocitadivasato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin09t0:1144_4: paṭilomakkamena vā “asukañca asukañca divasaṃ vā pakkhaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ vā tava suddhabhāvaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1144_6: ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ ahaṃ suddho”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1145_0: Taṃ gahetvā parivasantena yattakaṃ kālaṃ attano suddhabhāvaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:1145_1: tattakaṃ apanetvā avasesaṃ māsaṃ vā dvemāsaṃ vā parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1145_3: parivasanto ca puna aññaṃ māsaṃ sarati,
tika-vin09t0:1146_0: Yo pana yathāvuttena anulomappaṭilomavasena pucchiyamānopi rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti nassarati,
tika-vin09t0:1146_7: Tasmā sace parivasanto rattiparicchede sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti “māso vā saṃvaccharo vā mayhaṃ āpannassā”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1146_9: Ettha ca kiñcāpi “ettakaṃ kālaṃ ahaṃ suddho”ti vadantassa cūḷasuddhanto dīyati,
tika-vin09t0:1146_12: Tassa dānavidhi khandhake āgatoti tassa duvidhassāpi suddhantassa dānavidhi “tena,
tika-vin09t0:1146_17: Esa nayo vinicchayakathā pana vitthārato samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttāti etthāpi.
tika-vin09t0:1147_3: Idāni taṃ tividhampi samodhānaparivāsaṃ saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1147_4: Antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādentassāti yo parivāsaṃ gahetvā anikkhittavatto hutvā parivasanto apariniṭṭhiteyeva
tika-vin09t0:1147_5: parivāse antarā vemajjhe saṅghādisesāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādeti, tassa.
tika-vin09t0:1147_8: Makkhetvāti ñatticatutthena kammena mūlāya paṭikassanavasena makkhetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1147_14: yo paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ gahetvā parivasanto vā mānattāraho vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho
tika-vin09t0:1147_15: vā anikkhittavatto aññaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā purimāpattiyā samā vā ūnatarā vā rattiyo paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin09t0:1147_16: tassa mūlāya paṭikassanena te parivutthadivase ca mānattaciṇṇadivase ca sabbe odhunitvā adivase katvā
tika-vin09t0:1147_17: pacchā āpannāpattiṃ mūlāpattiyaṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabboti.
tika-vin09t0:1148_0: Sace pana antarāpatti mūlāpattito atirekappaṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1148_1: taṃ mūlāpattiṃ katvā tattha itaraṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1148_3: mūlāya paṭikassanaṃ akatvā pubbe gahitaparivāseneva parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1149_1: sabbacirappaṭicchannāyoti yā ekā vā āpatti sabbacirappaṭicchannā,
tika-vin09t0:1149_2: yā dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā āpattiyo sabbacirappaṭicchannāyoti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1150_2: aparampi sataṃ āpattiyo dasāhapaṭicchannāti evaṃ dasakkhattuṃ katvā āpattisahassaṃ divasasatapaṭicchannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1150_5: Evaṃ ekeneva dasāhena divasasatampi parivasitameva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1154_0: Idāni missakasamodhānaṃ niddisituṃ “missakasamodhāno nāmā”tiādimāha. Tatrāyaṃ nayo –
tika-vin09t0:1155_1: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1156_0: Tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā tadanurūpāya kammavācāya parivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1156_1: Ettha ca “saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukāyo”tipi “saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji”ntipi evaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1156_2: pubbe vuttanayena vatthuvasenapi gottavasenapi nāmavasenapi āpattivasenapi yojetvā kammavācaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭhatiyevāti.
tika-vin09t0:1156_6: vinicchayādīnaṃ vā anāmaṭṭhattā “ayaṃ tividhepi samodhānaparivāse saṅkhepakathā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1156_7: Mahāvisayattā samodhānavicāraṇāya sā niravasesā kuto laddhabbāti āha “vitthāro”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1157_0: Chārattanti rā saddo tīyati chijjati etthāti ratti,
tika-vin09t0:1157_5: avayavabyatirekena samudāyassābhāvato cha rattiyoti attho vutto.
tika-vin09t0:1158_0: Parivāsaṃ adatvā mānattameva dātabbanti yasmā āpatti appaṭicchannā,
tika-vin09t0:1158_2: tasmā parivāsaṃ adatvā kevalaṃ mānattameva dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1158_4: idaṃ paṭicchannamānattaṃ nāmāti āha “yassa paṭicchannā hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1158_7: Kathaṃ pana tesaṃ dvinnaṃ mānattānaṃ dānavidhi ca vinicchayakathā ca veditabbāti āha “ubhinnampi panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1159_1: Parivāse vuttappakāraṃ padesanti parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepato,
tika-vin09t0:1159_2: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1160_1: ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ appaṭicchannaṃ, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1160_2: saṅghaṃ ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1160_3: tassa me saṅgho ekissā āpattiyā sañcetanikāya sukkavissaṭṭhiyā appaṭicchannāya chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin09t0:1161_1: Imañca pana atthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci bhāsāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1161_2: Ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya ca ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā sesehi sati karaṇīye gantumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1161_3: Aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa bhikkhussa santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1161_4: Sace sopi kenaci kammena pure aruṇeyeva gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1161_5: aññaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ vā yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati,
tika-vin09t0:1161_9: tenassa ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso vā vippavāso vā na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1161_13: Tenāha “tato tesu gatesu vā agatesu vā purimanayena paṭipajjitabba”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1162_0: Yattha siyāti yassaṃ samānasaṃvāsakasīmāyaṃ vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho atthi.
tika-vin09t0:1162_7: pakatattassa ca abbhānaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1162_10: Tenāpi vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetvā abbhānaṃ yācitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1162_12: So hi chārattātikkameneva abbhānāraho hotī”tiādinā vinicchayavasena.
tika-vin09t0:1162_13: Taṃ panetaṃ sabbaṃ parivāsādikammaṃ pāḷivasena ca aṭṭhakathāvasena ca suviññeyyattā ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha,
tika-vin09t0:1162_15: Imassa pana kammassa vīsativaggakaraṇīyattā tato ūnatarena kataṃ kuppati.
tika-vin09t0:1168_0: “Mātugāmenā”ti vatvā puna “ekāyā”ti vuttattā “mātugāmasaṅkhātāya ekāya itthiyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1168_6: Cakkhussa raho nāma na sakkā hoti akkhiṃ vā nikhaṇiyamāne,
tika-vin09t0:1168_9: Sotassa raho nāma na sakkā hoti pakatikathā sotu”nti padabhājanapāḷiyaṃ sotassa rahoti āgataṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1168_10: atha kasmā taṃ avatvā “cakkhussa raho”ti ettakameva vuttanti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1168_11: Iminā pāḷiyaṃ “sotassa raho”ti idaṃ atthuddhāravasena vuttanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1168_12: Atha kathametaṃ viññāyati “cakkhusseva raho idha adhippeto”ti?
tika-vin09t0:1168_13: “Paṭicchanne āsane”ti vacanato “sakkā hoti methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitu”nti ca vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:1168_16: Apihitakavāṭassa pana dvāre nisinno anāpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:1168_17: na kevalaṃ apihitakavāṭassa gabbhassa dvāre nisinnova anāpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:1168_20: Yasmā nisīditvā niddāyanto kapimiddhapareto kañci kālaṃ cakkhūni ummīleti,
tika-vin09t0:1168_24: Nipajjitvā niddāyanto pana tādiso na hotīti āha “nipajjitvā niddāyantopi na karotī”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1168_28: Teneva vesāliyaṃ mahāvane dvāraṃ vivaritvā nipanne bhikkhumhi sambahulā itthiyo yāvadatthaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
tika-vin09t0:1168_32: tasmā nipajjanampi antokatvā “nisajjaṃ kappeyyā”ti vuttanti dassetuṃ “ettha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1168_33: Tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena kāretabboti nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānassa tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarasamāyogo hotiyevāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1168_35: pana saṅghādisesena ca pācittiyena ca tenākārena nisajjaṃ paṭijānamānova kāretabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1168_36: Na appaṭijānamānoti nisajjaṃ appaṭijānamāno tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena na kāretabboti.
tika-vin09t0:1168_39: tāva “neva suddho”ti vā “na asuddho”ti vā vattabbo,
tika-vin09t0:1169_0: “Paṭiññā lajjīsu katā, alajjīsu evaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin09t0:1171_0: Na kevalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ aññatarena codanāyameva evaṃ paṭiññāya kāretabbo,
tika-vin09t0:1171_1: atha kho nisajjādinā ākārena saddhiṃ codanāyapīti dassetuṃ “yena vā sā saddheyyavacasā upāsikā vadeyya,
tika-vin09t0:1171_4: Ettha ca “paṭijānamāno”ti avuttepi adhikārattā “paṭijānamānova tena so bhikkhu kāretabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1171_5: Tathārūpāya upāsikāya vacane aññathattābhāvato diṭṭhaṃ nāma tathāpi hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1172_0: Rahonisajjassādena mātugāmassa santikaṃ gantukāmo akkhiṃ añjeti, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1172_9: Ettha ca rahonisajjassādassa asatipi methunarāgabhāve tappaṭibaddhakilesattā vuttaṃ “methunadhammasannissitakilesasaṅkhātenā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1172_11: Rahassādenāti “itthannāmāya saddhiṃ raho nisīditvā hasitalapitādikaṃ kareyya”nti uppannaassādahetu.
tika-vin09t0:1172_12: Nisajjāya pācittiyaṃ asati upacāragate nipajjitvā aniddāyante anandhe viññupuriseti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1172_13: Sace sā itthī kenaci karaṇīyena uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya punappunaṃ nisīdati,
tika-vin09t0:1172_23: Aniyametvā “diṭṭhadiṭṭhāya saddhiṃ rahassādaṃ kappissāmī”ti gantvā nisinnassāpi āgatāgatānaṃ vasena,
tika-vin09t0:1172_24: punappunaṃ nisajjāya vasena ca vuttanayeneva āpattiyo veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1172_27: Sace suddhacittena gantvā nisinnassa santikaṃ āgantvā nisinnāya itthiyā rahassādo uppajjati,
tika-vin09t0:1175_0: Naheva kho pana paṭicchannanti ettha pana yampi bahi parikkhittaṃ anto vivaṭaṃ pariveṇaṅgaṇādi,
tika-vin09t0:1175_4: Teneva hi padabhājane “sā ce evaṃ vadeyya ‘ayyo,
tika-vin09t0:1175_5: mayā diṭṭho nisinno mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanto”’tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1175_7: Duṭṭhullavācañca sutvā taṃ mātugāmopi na paṭicchādeti.
tika-vin09t0:1175_8: Tathā hi duṭṭhullavācāsikkhāpade yā pana tā itthiyo hirimanā,
tika-vin09t0:1175_10: tasmā idha itthīpi anāpattiṃ karotīti āha “itthīpī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1175_11: Atha vā idha appaṭicchannattā itthīpi anāpattiṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:1175_12: paṭhame pana paṭicchannattā itthisatampi anāpattiṃ na karotīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1175_13: Anandho abadhiroti ettha kāyasaṃsaggavasena anandho vutto,
tika-vin09t0:1176_10: Ettha ca kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjanto duṭṭhullampi bhaṇati,
tika-vin09t0:1176_11: duṭṭhullaṃ bhaṇanto nisīdati cāti “kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1178_0: “Aniyatuddeso cāyaṃ diṭṭhādisamūlakacodanāya vatthuṃ paṭijānamānova āpattiyā kāretabbo,
tika-vin09t0:1185_3: Yasmā pana taṃ cīvaraṃ karaṇenapi niṭṭhitaṃ hoti nāsanādīhipi,
tika-vin09t0:1185_5: Tattha yaṃ kiñci sūciyā kattabbaṃ pāsakapaṭṭagaṇṭhikapaṭṭapariyosānakammaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1185_11: Cīvarāsā vā upacchinnāti “asukasmiṃ nāma kule cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti yā cīvarāsā uppannā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1185_18: Pañcānisaṃse aññattha gantuṃ adatvā saṅgaṇhanaṭṭhena kathinaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1185_23: Tāva kathinānisaṃsaṃ labhatīti ettha yo atthatakathino bhikkhūti ajjhāharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1185_26: “Atthatakathinassa bhikkhuno”ti idaṃ vā “atthatakathino bhikkhū”ti vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1185_29: Tesu ekapalibodhepi sati yasmā anāmantacārādikaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ labhati, nāsati. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:1185_30: “Niṭṭhitacīvarasmi”nti etassa cīvarassa karaṇapalibodhe upacchinneti ayamattho viññāyatīti.
tika-vin09t0:1186_4: vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kathinaṃ attharitu”nti kathinakkhandhake bhagavatā kathinassa anuññātattā “ayañhi kathinatthāro nāma…pe…
tika-vin09t0:1186_6: Tattha purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānanti vassacchedaṃ akatvā purimavassaṃvuṭṭhānanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1186_7: Etena vuṭṭhavassavasena tāva purimikāya vassaṃ upagatāyeva kathinatthāraṃ labhanti,
tika-vin09t0:1186_13: Pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatīti pacchimakoṭiyā cattāro kathinadussassa dāyakā,
tika-vin09t0:1186_15: Keci pana “pañcavaggakaraṇīyattā ‘pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭatī’ti vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:1186_18: yvāyaṃ catuvaggo bhikkhusaṅgho ṭhapetvā tīṇi kammāni upasampadaṃ pavāraṇaṃ abbhāna”nti campeyyakkhandhake vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:1186_20: yasmā ca sabbantimena paricchedena pañcannaṃ janānaṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:1186_23: Atha pana cattāro bhikkhū vassaṃ upagatā,
tika-vin09t0:1186_24: eko paripuṇṇavasso sāmaṇero sace pacchimikāya upasampajjati,
tika-vin09t0:1188_3: saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyya kathinaṃ attharituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1188_7: saṅgho imaṃ kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno deti kathinaṃ attharituṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1188_8: Yassāyasmato khamati imassa kathinadussassa itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dānaṃ kathinaṃ attharituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1188_12: Dinnaṃ idaṃ saṅghena kathinadussaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno kathinaṃ attharituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1189_2: So ca kho pubbakaraṇajānanādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatoti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1190_1: Katamehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharituṃ?
tika-vin09t0:1190_10: imehi aṭṭhahaṅgehi samannāgato puggalo bhabbo kathinaṃ attharitu”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1191_5: Palibodho nāma āvāsapalibodho cīvarapalibodhoti dve palibodhā.
tika-vin09t0:1192_0: Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ “kathinaṃ pana kena attharitabbaṃ?
tika-vin09t0:1192_6: Vuḍḍhesupi yo mahāpariso tadaheva cīvaraṃ katvā attharituṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin09t0:1192_11: Apica saṅghena mahātherassa saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1192_15: Dentena pana tīsu cīvaresu yaṃ yaṃ jiṇṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1192_21: “Ahaṃ alabhanto ekapaṭṭaṃ pārupāmī”ti vadantassāpi dupaṭṭaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1192_24: Tenāpi kathinaṃ attharitvā pacchā sibbetvā “dve cīvarāni karissāmī”ti na gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1193_2: Pañca vā atirekāni vā khaṇḍāni chinditvāti yathā pañcakhaṇḍikādīnaṃ saṅghāṭiādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññatarappahonakāni
tika-vin09t0:1193_3: mahāmaṇḍalaaḍḍhamaṇḍalādivasena pañca khaṇḍāni vā atirekāni vā sattādikhaṇḍāni honti,
tika-vin09t0:1193_5: Tasmiñca kathinacīvare kariyamāne “ahaṃ thero”ti vā “bahussuto”ti vā ekenāpi akātuṃ na labbhati.
tika-vin09t0:1193_10: Sabbantimena paricchedena antaravāsakopi chinditvāva kātabbo aññathā atthāravipattito. Yathāha –
tika-vin09t0:1194_4: na aññatra pañcakena vā atirekapañcakena vā tadaheva sañchinnenā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1198_0: Evaṃ atthārakena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni anumodakehi paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “tehipī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1198_8: Vuttañhetaṃ parivāre “dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthataṃ hoti kathinaṃ atthārakassa ca anumodakassa cā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1198_12: atha kho aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ aññatarena vā antarubbhārena vā yāva kathinassubbhārā pañcānisaṃse labhanti,
tika-vin09t0:1199_1: Tattha anāmantacāro nāma pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena nimantitassa santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā kulesu cārittāpajjanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1199_3: nāmenādhiṭṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānamaññataraṃ cīvaraṃ yattha katthaci nikkhipitvā aññattha aruṇuṭṭhāpananti attho,
tika-vin09t0:1199_9: Gaṇoti cettha cattāro vā tatuttari vā bhikkhū.
tika-vin09t0:1199_10: Tesaṃ viññattito vā nimantanato vā laddhassa odanādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ aññatarabhojanassa saha gahaṇanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1199_11: Yo ca tattha cīvaruppādoti tattha kathinatthatasīmāya matakacīvaraṃ vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:1199_12: saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnaṃ vā saṅghikena tatruppādena ābhataṃ vā yena kenaci ākārena yaṃ saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin09t0:1200_0: “Yaṃ pana tattha saṅghassa uppannaṃ pattādi vā aññaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t0:1200_2: Yaṃ pana tatruppādena taṇḍulādinā vatthaṃ cetāpitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1200_4: Vatthehi pana taṇḍulādīsu cetāpitesu sabbesaṃ tāni pāpuṇantī”ti gaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1200_5: tampi cetāpitakālato paṭṭhāya cīvaruppādo na hotīti suvuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1200_6: Anatthatakathinā pana imesu pañcasu ānisaṃsesu cīvaramāse asamādānacāraṃ ṭhapetvā sesānisaṃse labhanti.
tika-vin09t0:1200_8: pāveyyakā bhikkhū vassaṃvuṭṭhā okapuṇṇehi cīvarehi na bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkameyyuṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1200_10: tasmā cīvaramāsepi cīvaraṃ samādāya eva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
tika-vin09t0:1201_0: Evaṃ kathinatthāraṃ dassetvā idāni ubbhāraṃ dassento “taṃ panetaṃ kathina”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1201_6: Tattha yo bhikkhu atthatakathino kathinacīvaraṃ ādāya tasmiṃ āvāse nirapekkho “na paccessa”nti pakkamati,
tika-vin09t0:1201_7: tassevaṃ pakkamato kathinuddhāro atikkantamattāya sīmāya hotīti pakkamanantiko kathinuddhāroti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1202_2: na puna taṃ vihāraṃ gacchissāmī”ti tasmiṃ āvāse nirapekkho hutvā taṃ cīvaraṃ kāreti,
tika-vin09t0:1203_0: Yadi pana ānisaṃsamūlacīvaraṃ ādāya bahisīmāgato “nevimaṃ cīvaraṃ karissāmi,
tika-vin09t0:1203_1: na ca taṃ āvāsaṃ gacchissāmī”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti,
tika-vin09t0:1204_0: Tadeva ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ laddhā taṃ ādāya bahisīmaṃ gantvā “idhevimaṃ cīvaraṃ karissāmi,
tika-vin09t0:1204_1: na gacchissāmī”ti karontassa sace taṃ cīvaraṃ nassati vinassati ḍayhati,
tika-vin09t0:1205_0: Sace pana ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ laddhā tasmiṃ vihāre sāpekkhova bahisīmāgato “vihāre bhikkhūhi antarubbhāraṃ kata”nti suṇāti,
tika-vin09t0:1206_1: Yo pana yena kenaci “tuyhaṃ cīvaraṃ dassāmī”ti vutto tasmiṃ cīvare āsāya vihāre apekkhaṃ pahāya bahisīmāgato
tika-vin09t0:1206_2: puna tena “na sakkomi dātu”nti vutte āsaṃ chindati,
tika-vin09t0:1207_0: Yo pana vassaṃvuṭṭhavihārato aññaṃ vihāraṃ sāpekkhova gantvā āgacchanto antarāmaggeyeva kathinuddhāraṃ vītināmeti,
tika-vin09t0:1208_1: Ānisaṃsacīvaraṃ ādāya sāpekkhova bahi gantvā kathinuddhāraṃ sambhuṇantassa kathinuddhāro sahubbhāroti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1209_0: “Etasmiṃ pana pakkamanantike kathinuddhāre paṭhamaṃ cīvarapalibodho chijjatī”tiādinā cīvarapalibodhupacchedādikassa
tika-vin09t0:1209_2: Atthārubbhārānaṃyeva vā vitthāravinicchayassa tatthāgatattā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1210_1: Dasāhaparamanti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacananti āha “taṃ dasāhaparamaṃ kāla”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1210_6: Kambalaṃ nāma manussalomavāḷalome ṭhapetvā sesalomehi vāyitvā katavatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1210_8: Bhaṅgaṃ nāma khomasuttādīhi pañcahi missetvā katavatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1210_10: Tadanulomānaṃ vāti dukūlaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭṭaṃ cīnapaṭṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti tesaṃ khomādīnaṃyeva anulomānaṃ channaṃ cīvarānaṃ vā,
tika-vin09t0:1210_15: Imāni tīṇipi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā.
tika-vin09t0:1210_17: Taṃ pana khomādīnamaññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃyeva anulomaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1210_19: taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1210_20: tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:1211_2: Aṭṭhaṅgulaṃ sugataṅgulenāti ettha sugataṅgulaṃ nāma idāni majjhimassa purimassa tīṇi aṅgulāni,
tika-vin09t0:1211_5: Yesaṃ pana adhiṭṭhānavikappanānaṃ abhāvato adhiṭṭhitavikappitesu apariyāpannattā idaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1212_0: Taṃ adhiṭṭhānavikappanaṃ kenākārena jānitabbanti anuyogaṃ sandhāya taṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ pana vutta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1212_1: Tattha yaṃ pana vuttanti atirekacīvaraṃ dassetuṃ “adhiṭṭhitavikappitesu apariyāpannattā”ti amhehi yaṃ vuttanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1212_3: Na vikappetunti saṅghāṭiādināmena vikappetuṃ na anujānāmīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1212_5: Sāmaññavacanaṃ pana ticīvarassa kaṇḍupaṭicchādivassikasāṭikānaṃ viya kālavasena visesābhāvā cassa vikappetabbatāti dassanatthaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1212_7: Tathā hi purāṇacīvaraṃ paccuddharitvā navassa adhiṭṭhānavacanato,
tika-vin09t0:1212_8: “anāpatti adhiṭṭheti vikappetī”tiādivacanato ca ticīvarassapi vikappanāya okāso dinno.
tika-vin09t0:1212_10: Ticīvarādīni hi adhiṭṭhahantena “imaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”tiādinā taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ vatvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1212_11: Vikappentena pana “imaṃ saṅghāṭi”ntiādinā tassa tassa cīvarassa nāmaṃ aggahetvā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vikappetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1212_13: yadi taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā vikappeti,
tika-vin09t0:1212_16: Tato paraṃ vikappetunti catumāsato paraṃ “imaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappemī”ti vikappetuṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1212_18: Keci pana “tato paraṃ vikappetvā yāva āgāmisaṃvacchare vassānaṃ catumāsaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1212_21: “Imāsañca pana vassikasāṭikakaṇḍupaṭicchādīnaṃ tato paraṃ vikappetvā paribhogassa anuññātattā tathāvikappitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1212_23: Adhiṭṭhātabbavikappetabbatā jānitabbāti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ vikappetabbanti evaṃ adhiṭṭhānavikappanā jānitabbāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1213_3: Pārupanenapi sakkā nābhiṃ paṭicchādetunti āha “dvihatthopi vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1213_10: “Imaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghāṭiṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti evampi vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1213_13: Idañhi adhiṭṭhānaṃ yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena aphusantassa na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1213_17: Sāmantavihāreti yattha tadaheva gantvā nivattetuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin09t0:1213_22: Na hi ṭhapitaṭṭhānamattasallakkhaṇena kiñci payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-vin09t0:1214_1: Adhiṭṭhānato pubbe saṅghāṭiādivohārassa abhāvato “imaṃ paccuddharāmī”ti paccattharaṇādīnaṃ visuṃ paccuddharaṇavidhiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1214_2: Paccattharaṇādināmena pana adhiṭṭhātabbattā “imaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ paccuddharāmī”tiādinā vuttepi nevatthi doso.
tika-vin09t0:1214_4: Parikkhāracoḷakassa pana parikkhāracoḷavasena adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitavatthehipi saṅghāṭiādimhi kate paccuddharitvā puna adhiṭṭhātabbanti natthi.
tika-vin09t0:1214_6: Adhiṭṭhitena pana tena saddhiṃ mahantatarameva dutiyaṃ paṭṭaṃ vā khaṇḍaṃ vā saṃsibbantena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1214_7: same vā khuddake vā adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin09t0:1214_8: Sukhaparibhogatthanti vippavāsadosābhāvato yattha katthaci ṭhapetvā dhammassavanādinā kiccena aññattha
tika-vin09t0:1214_9: aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā āgantvā nissajjanaṃ vināva paribhuñjituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya sukhaparibhogatthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1215_3: hemantassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya antodasāhe vassikasāṭikāvassikasāṭikabhāvato apanetvā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1215_4: tuyhaṃ vikappemī”tiādinā nayena vikappetabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1215_6: kaṇḍupaṭicchādi ābādhavūpasamenāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatī”ti vakkhamānattā vassānamāsato paraṃ asati adhiṭṭhāne
tika-vin09t0:1216_0: Keci pana “yathā kathinamāsabbhantare uppannacīvaraṃ kathinamāsātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1216_2: Tasmā kattikapuṇṇamadivase paccuddharitvā tato paraṃ hemantassa paṭhamadivase vikappetabbāti evamattho gahetabbo,
tika-vin09t0:1216_3: paccuddharitvā tato paraṃ vikappetabbāti padayojanā veditabbā”ti ca vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:1216_5: Kathinamāse uppannañhi cīvaraṃ atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitattā avasānadivase anadhiṭṭhitaṃ kathinamāsātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1216_6: Ayaṃ pana vassikasāṭikā adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitattā na tena sadisāti vassānātikkame kathaṃ nissaggiyaṃ hoti
tika-vin09t0:1216_7: anadhiṭṭhitaavikappitameva hi taṃ kālātikkame nissaggiyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1216_9: Evaṃ kaṇḍupaṭicchādipi adhiṭṭhānavijahanato paraṃ dasāhaparihāraṃ labhati.
tika-vin09t0:1216_11: Nahānatthāya anuññātattā vaṇṇabhedamattarattāpi cesā vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1216_12: “Dve pana na vaṭṭantī”ti dvinnaṃ adhiṭṭhānābhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1217_1: vitthārato diyaḍḍhaṃ dasā vidatthī”ti iminā pamāṇena yuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1217_11: Bhagavatā hi yaṃ yaṃ bhikkhū labhanti,
tika-vin09t0:1217_12: taṃ taṃ iminā vidhānena adhiṭṭhahitvā puna “yena yena parissāvanādinā attho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1217_13: taṃ taṃ katvā gaṇhantū”ti anukampāya anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1217_15: Ādisaddena “etāni cīvarāni parikkhāracoḷāni adhiṭṭhāmī”ti asammukhādhiṭṭhānaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:1217_16: “Senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinnapaccattharaṇe cā”ti iminā attano santakaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin09t0:1217_18: apārupitvā ca kevalaṃ pañcapīṭhesuyeva attharitvā paribhuñjiyamānaṃ paccattharaṇaṃ attano santakampi anadhiṭṭhitaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:1217_19: taṃ ayuttaṃ senāsanaparikkhāratthāya dinna”nti paccattharaṇassa visesitattā.
tika-vin09t0:1218_0: Adhiṭṭhitañca panetaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjato kathaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahatīti āha “sabbañca paneta”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1218_1: Tattha acchinditvā gahaṇenāti corādīhi acchinditvā gahaṇena.
tika-vin09t0:1218_4: “sīlavantova hutvā gihī bhavissāmī”ti setavatthanivāsanenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1218_5: “Antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannassa setavatthanivāso vā kāsāyacajanaṃ vā hīnāyāvattana”nti keci.
tika-vin09t0:1218_6: “‘Hīnāyāvattanenā’ti iminā bhikkhuniyā eva adhiṭṭhānavijahanaṃ gahitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1218_9: Bhikkhu pana vibbhamantopi yāva sikkhaṃ na paccakkhāti,
tika-vin09t0:1218_10: tāva bhikkhuyevāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ na vijahatī”ti apare.
tika-vin09t0:1218_12: Yo hi bhikkhuliṅge ṭhitova sikkhaṃ paccakkhāti,
tika-vin09t0:1219_2: Yo pana dubbalaṭṭhāne paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā pacchā dubbalaṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā apaneti,
tika-vin09t0:1219_5: Dupaṭṭassa pana ekasmiṃ paṭale chidde vā jāte,
tika-vin09t0:1219_10: Ubho koṭiyo majjhe karonto sace pana paṭhamaṃ chinditvā pacchā ghaṭeti,
tika-vin09t0:1219_14: Rajakehi dhovāpetvā setaṃ karontassāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānameva.
tika-vin09t0:1219_17: Tena na kevalaṃ pubbe vuttena dānādinā aṭṭhavidheneva kāraṇena vassikasāṭikā adhiṭṭhānaṃ vijahati,
tika-vin09t0:1219_18: atha kho vassānamāsātikkamenapīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1220_3: Tassa yo aruṇoti tassa cīvaruppādadivasassa yo atikkanto aruṇo.
tika-vin09t0:1220_9: Tatrāyaṃ nayoti tasmiṃ nissajjane ayaṃ vidhi.
tika-vin09t0:1220_20: Iminā ca attano āyatiṃ saṃvare patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Dvīsu,
tika-vin09t0:1220_21: pana sambahulāsu vāti dvīsu vā sambahulāsu vā āpattīsu purimanayeneva vacanabhedo kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1220_22: Ñattiyaṃ āpattiṃ sarati vivaratīti ettha “dve āpattiyo”ti vā “sambahulā āpattiyo”ti vā vacanabhedo kātabbo. Dvīsu,
tika-vin09t0:1220_23: bahūsu vā vacanabhedo kātabboti “saṅgho imāni cīvarānī”ti vatthuvasena vacanabhedo kātabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1221_0: Evaṃ saṅghassa nissajjanavidhiṃ dassetvā gaṇassa nissajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “gaṇassa pana nissajjantenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1221_2: vuttavacanabhedaṃ vinā avasesaṃ saṅghassa nissajjanādīsu vuttasadisamevāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1222_0: Idāni puggalassa nissajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “puggalassa panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1222_3: tīsu vā āpattīsu ceva dātabbacīvaresu ca.
tika-vin09t0:1222_12: byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena te bhikkhū ñāpetabbā”tiādinā nayena tiṇṇaṃ pārisuddhiuposathaṃ vatvā “anujānāmi,
tika-vin09t0:1222_18: therena bhikkhunā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅga”ntiādinā nayena visuṃyeva dvinnaṃ pārisuddhiuposatho vutto,
tika-vin09t0:1222_21: tasmā avatvāva gatoti gaṇassa vuttā pāḷiyevettha pāḷi.
tika-vin09t0:1222_23: yathā gaṇassa nissajjitvā āpattiyā desiyamānāya āpattippaṭiggāhako bhikkhu ñattiṃ ṭhapeti,
tika-vin09t0:1222_24: evaṃ aṭṭhapetvā dvīsu aññatarena yathā ekapuggalo paṭiggaṇhāti,
tika-vin09t0:1222_29: Nissaṭṭhacīvaradānepi yathā “imaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato dammī”ti eko vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1222_30: evaṃ “mayaṃ imaṃ cīvaraṃ āyasmato demā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1222_31: Ito garukatarānipi hi ñattidutiyakammāni apaloketvā kātabbānīti vuttāni atthi,
tika-vin09t0:1222_37: Na taṃ tena saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā dinnameva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1223_0: Anissajjitvā paribhuñjantassa dukkaṭanti sakiṃ nivatthaṃ vā sakiṃ pārutaṃ vā kāyato amocetvā divasampi carati,
tika-vin09t0:1223_4: Dunnivatthaṃ vā duppārutaṃ vā saṇṭhāpentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1223_8: vematikassa ca dukkaṭanti etthāpi “paribhuñjantassā”ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1223_9: Atikkante anatikkantasaññinopīti dasāhaṃ atikkante cīvare “anatikkantaṃ ida”nti evaṃ saññino,
tika-vin09t0:1223_10: dasāhe vā atikkante “anatikkanto dasāho”ti evaṃ saññino.
tika-vin09t0:1224_1: Tathāti yathā dasāhaṃ atikkante saññābhedena tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1224_2: tathā anadhiṭṭhitādīsu sattasu vikappesu adhiṭṭhitādisaññābhedatoti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1224_3: Tattha avissajjite vissajjitasaññinoti kassaci adinne apariccatte “dinnaṃ pariccattaṃ mayā”ti evaṃ saññino.
tika-vin09t0:1224_4: Anaṭṭhe naṭṭhasaññinoti attano cīvarena saddhiṃ bahūni aññesaṃ cīvarāni ekato ṭhapitāni,
tika-vin09t0:1224_6: tatresa attano cīvare anaṭṭhe naṭṭhasaññī hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1224_9: Avilutteti ettha pana gabbhaṃ bhinditvā pasayhāvahāravasena avilutteti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1225_14: tava santakaṃ karissasī”ti vutte “mama santakaṃ karomi,
tika-vin09t0:1225_21: Sace pana “tava santakaṃ karohī”ti vutte “sādhu, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1225_38: evaṃ me kappiyaṃ hotī”ti vatvā vuttanayeneva nissajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1225_39: Na hi evaṃ jānāpetvā vinayakammaṃ karontassa musāvādo hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1226_1: evaṃ ito parānipīti yathā idaṃ atirekacīvaradhāraṇasikkhāpadaṃ ācāravipatti,
tika-vin09t0:1226_2: evaṃ ito parānipi sikkhāpadāni ācāravipattiyevāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1226_4: Ājīvavipattipaccayā pana ṭhapetvā dubbhāsitaṃ cha āpattikkhandhā paññattāti –
tika-vin09t0:1227_0: “Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati,
tika-vin09t0:1227_7: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin09t0:1227_9: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhunī paṇītabhojanāni agilānā attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin09t0:1227_11: Ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā bhikkhu sūpaṃ vā odanaṃ vā agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjati,
tika-vin09t0:1228_0: Evaṃ pārājikādivasena ṭhapetvā dubbhāsitaṃ ājīvavipattipaccayā cha āpattikkhandhā paññattā.
tika-vin09t0:1228_1: Diṭṭhivipattipaccayā pācittiyadukkaṭavasena dve āpattikkhandhā paññattāti samanubhāsanāya pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissajjane ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1228_2: kammavācāpariyosāne pācittiyanti evaṃ diṭṭhivipattipaccayā pācittiyadukkaṭavasena dve āpattikkhandhā paññattā.
tika-vin09t0:1229_1: Aññehi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa demā”ti parahatthe dinnampi “na tāva taṃ gaṇanupagaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1229_2: yāva na hatthaṃ gacchatī”ti cammakkhandhake vuttattā yāva āharitvā vā na dinnaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1229_14: citte pana sati kāyavācācittato ca samuṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1229_17: Kāyadvāre ca vacīdvāre ca kattabbākaraṇato kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1232_3: Atha kasmā karaṇavaseneva karaṇavacanassa atthaṃ aggahetvā sāmivasena attho veditabboti āha “karaṇavasena hī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1232_11: Ekena vippavutthopi hi ticīvarena vippavuttho nāma hoti paṭisiddhapariyāpannena vippavutthattā,
tika-vin09t0:1233_1: Tattha nivesananti udositādīnaṃ vasena akatāya patissayavikatiyā adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1233_4: Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi kato bahalabhittiko catupañcabhūmiko patissayaviseso.
tika-vin09t0:1233_6: yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi eva chadanaṃ hotī”ti apare.
tika-vin09t0:1233_21: Vihāroti saparikkhitto vā aparikkhitto vā sakalo āvāso.
tika-vin09t0:1233_23: Nivesanādīni cettha gāmato bahi niviṭṭhāni gahitāni.
tika-vin09t0:1233_24: Antogāme ṭhitānaṃ pana gāmaggahaṇeneva gahitattā gāmaparihāroyevāti.
tika-vin09t0:1233_26: Hatthapāsātikkameti ettha hatthapāso nāma aḍḍhateyyaratanappamāṇo padeso,
tika-vin09t0:1233_30: Taṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā sacepi iddhimā bhikkhu ākāse aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin09t0:1234_1: sace gāmo ekassa rañño vā bhojakassa vā vasena ekakulassa hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1234_3: evarūpe gāme cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā tasmiṃ gāmabbhantare yathārucitaṭṭhāne vasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1234_7: tassa gharassa samantato hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
