tika-vin09t0:1235_0: Sace gāmo vesālikusinārādayo viya nānārājūnaṃ vā bhojakānaṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1235_2: evarūpe gāme yasmiṃ ghare cīvaraṃ nikkhittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1235_4: tassa gharassa hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1235_6: tassā vīthiyā tassa gharassa sammukhāṭṭhāne sabhāyaṃ vā gharadvāre vā vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1235_7: tesaṃ sabhādvārānaṃ hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1236_2: tattha vā tassa hatthapāse vā vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1236_3: Nivesane pana sace ekakulassa nivesanaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1236_9: tassa gabbhassa hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1237_4: sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇadvāramūle vā tesaṃ gabbhadvāramūlānaṃ hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1237_8: tassa gabbhassa hatthapāsā vā na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1238_3: satthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā purato vā pacchato vā sattabbhantarā na vijahitabbā,
tika-vin09t0:1238_5: Sace sattho gacchanto gāmaṃ vā nadiṃ vā pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1238_6: antopaviṭṭhena saddhiṃ ekābaddho hutvā orañca pārañca pharitvā ṭhito hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1238_8: Atha gāme vā nadiyā vā pariyāpanno hoti antopaviṭṭho,
tika-vin09t0:1239_7: antokhette cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā khettadvāramūle vā vatthabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1240_0: Rukkhamūle pana yaṃ majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati,
tika-vin09t0:1240_1: tasmiṃ ṭhāne aviraḷe padese tassa chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsassa antoyeva nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1240_2: Sace viraḷasākhassa rukkhassa ātapena phuṭṭhokāse ṭhapeti,
tika-vin09t0:1240_3: aruṇuggamane ca so bhikkhu tassa hatthapāse na hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1241_0: Ajjhokāse pana viñjhāṭaviādīsu araññesupi samuddamajjhe macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathadīpakesupi cīvaraṃ
tika-vin09t0:1241_1: ṭhapetvā tato samantā sattabbhantare padese yattha katthaci vasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1241_2: ito aññattha vasanto vippavuttho nāma hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1242_4: Ettha pana pāḷiyaṃ “gāmo ekūpacāro nānūpacāro”tiādinā avisesena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvāpi gāmanivesanaudositakhettadhaññakaraṇaārāmavihārānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1242_5: ekūpacāranānūpacāratā “gāmo ekūpacāro nāma ekakulassa gāmo hoti parikkhitto ca aparikkhitto cā”tiādinā
tika-vin09t0:1242_8: nānākulassa aṭṭo hotī”tiādinā nayena ekakulanānākulavasena ca ante “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro nāma agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā ekūpacāro,
tika-vin09t0:1242_9: tato paraṃ nānūpacāroti ca evaṃ ekūpacāranānūpacāratā vibhattā.
tika-vin09t0:1242_18: “ajjhokāso ekūpacāro”ti ettha samantā sattabbhantarasaṅkhātaṃ pamāṇanti apare.
tika-vin09t0:1243_0: Aññatra bhikkhusammutiyāti bhikkhuno saṅghena dinnā sammuti bhikkhusammuti,
tika-vin09t0:1244_5: Antoaruṇe paccuddhaṭeti nivattitvā sampāpuṇitumasakkontena tattheva ṭhatvā anto aruṇe paccuddhaṭe.
tika-vin09t0:1244_8: Yato paṭṭhāya hi satthaṃ vā pariyesati,
tika-vin09t0:1244_11: “Na dāni gamissāmī”ti evaṃ pana dhuranikkhepaṃ karontena paccuddharitabbaṃ “atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhassatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1244_13: Soti yassa sammuti dinnā, so rogo.
tika-vin09t0:1245_1: Vippavāso nāma yadi baddhasīmāyaṃ cīvaraṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1245_5: Baddhasīmāyaṃ pana yattha katthaci cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā antosīmāyameva yattha katthaci vasituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1248_0: Purimasikkhāpade viya etthāpi bhikkhunāti sāmiatthe karaṇavacananti āha “niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1248_4: etaṃ akālacīvaraṃ nāmā”ti padabhājaniyaṃ vuttattā “yvāyaṃ anatthate kathine”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1248_8: Tasmiñhi anatthatepi kathine uppannaṃ cīvaraṃ anadhiṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1249_0: “Kāle saṅghassa idaṃ akālacīvara”nti dinnaṃ pana akālacīvarasāmaññato atthuddhāravasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1249_2: sesehi ca sammukhībhūtehi bhājetuṃ labbhatīti akālacīvaraṃ nāma jātaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1249_4: Yadi evaṃ “puggalassa vā idaṃ tuyhaṃ ‘dammī’tiādinā nayena dinna”nti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1249_5: na hi puggalassa ādissa dinnaṃ kenaci bhājanīyaṃ hotīti?
tika-vin09t0:1249_7: ādissa dānasāmaññato labbhamānamatthaṃ dassetuṃ tathā vuttanti.
tika-vin09t0:1249_8: Attano vā dhanenāti attano kappāsasuttādinā dhanena.
tika-vin09t0:1249_11: Ettha pana sīmāya dānaṃ ekā mātikā,
tika-vin09t0:1250_0: “Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānenā”ti iminā aparikkhittassa vihārassa dhuvasannipātaṭṭhānādito paṭhamaleḍḍupātassa anto upacārasīmāti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1250_1: Idāni dutiyaleḍḍupātassapi anto upacārasīmāyevāti dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1250_3: Āvāse vaḍḍhante vaḍḍhatīti sace upacārato abahibhūto hutvā āvāso vaḍḍhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1250_5: “Sace vihāre sannipatitabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekābaddhā hutvā yojanasatampi pūretvā nisīdanti,
tika-vin09t0:1250_10: Tathā hi āgantukāya bhikkhuniyā ārāmapavesanaṃ āpucchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1250_13: gamikassa pana bhikkhussāpi imissāyeva sīmāya vasena senāsanāpucchanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1251_6: lābhaggāho āgantukavattaṃ pūretvā ārāmapavesananti evamādikaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:1251_7: Imissāva sīmāya vasenāti upacārasīmāyevāti yathāsambhavaṃ anto,
tika-vin09t0:1251_8: bahi ca imassa sabbassa labbhanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1252_1: sā ca kho neva sammāsambuddhena anuññātā,
tika-vin09t0:1252_8: Ekassa rañño āṇāpavattiṭṭhānanti coḷabhogo keraḷabhogoti evaṃ ekekassa rañño āṇāpavattiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1253_1: Khaṇḍasīmāya demāti dinnanti khaṇḍasīmāya kenaci kammena sannipatitaṃ saṅghaṃ disvā “khaṇḍasīmāyaṃ saṅghassa demā”ti dinnaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1253_2: Khaṇḍasīmāya ṭhite rukkhe vā pabbate vā ṭhitopi heṭṭhā vā pathavivemajjhagatopi khaṇḍasīmāyeva ṭhitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1253_5: Khaṇḍasīmā sīmantarikaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti tattha samānasaṃvāsasīmāya abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1253_7: “avippavāsasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ gāmaṭṭhānaṃ na pāpuṇāti. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:1253_9: “Samānasaṃvāsasīmāya dammī”ti dinnaṃ pana gāme ṭhitānampi pāpuṇātīti.
tika-vin09t0:1253_10: Abbhantarasīmāudakukkhepasīmāsu dinnanti tattha uposathādiatthāya sannipatite disvā “imissā abbhantarasīmāya demā”tiādinā dinnaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1253_12: Ekopi gantvā sabbesaṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ labhatīti ekopi gantvā idha vassaggena bhājetvā gahetvā āgantuṃ labhatīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1254_0: Evaṃ tāva yo sīmaṃ parāmasitvā deti,
tika-vin09t0:1254_1: tassa dāne vinicchayaṃ vatvā idāni yo “asukasīmāyā”ti vattuṃ na jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:1254_2: kevalaṃ “sīmā”ti vacanamattameva jānanto vihāraṃ āgantvā “sīmāya dammī”ti vā “sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghassa dammī”ti vā bhaṇati,
tika-vin09t0:1254_3: tattha vinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “yo pana vihāraṃ pavisitvā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1254_5: Ahametaṃ bhedaṃ na jānāmīti ahaṃ “asukā sīmā”ti etaṃ vibhāgaṃ na jānāmi.
tika-vin09t0:1254_6: Upacārasīmaṭṭhehi bhājetabbaṃ lābhassa upacārasīmāya paricchinnattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1255_0: Yattha mayhaṃ dhuvakārā karīyantīti ettha yasmiṃ vihāre tassa cīvaradāyakassa santakaṃ saṅghassa pākavattaṃ vā vattati.
tika-vin09t0:1255_1: Yasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū attano bhāraṃ katvā sadā gehe bhojeti,
tika-vin09t0:1255_2: yattha vā anena āvāso vā kārito,
tika-vin09t0:1255_13: Mātikaṃ āropetvāti ekasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū bahutarā,
tika-vin09t0:1255_18: yadi pana mañco vā pīṭhaṃ vā ekameva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1255_20: ekavihārepi vā yassa senāsanassa so vicāreti,
tika-vin09t0:1255_23: Atha “mayhaṃ dhuvakāre dethā”ti vatvā avicāretvāva gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1255_30: Sace eko bhikkhu “mayhaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne senāsanaparibhogabhaṇḍaṃ natthī”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1256_0: Saṅghassa dammīti dinnanti “imāni cīvarāni saṅghassa dammī”ti evaṃ dinnaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1256_3: Ekābaddhānañca pāpuṇāti parisāvasena vaḍḍhitā sīmā hotīti katvāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1256_5: yasmā ca tato bahiddhāpi upacārasīmokkantehi ekābaddhānaṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:1256_9: Asampattānampīti upacārasīmāyaṃ ṭhitehi ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā kālaṃ ghosetvā lābhabhājanaṭṭhānaṃ asampattānampi upacārasīmāya paviṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1256_10: tehi vā saddhiṃ ekābaddhānaṃ hutvā attano vihāradvāre vā antovihāreyeva vā ṭhitānañcāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1256_12: Dutiyabhāge pana therāsanaṃ āruḷhe āgatānaṃ paṭhamabhāgo na pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin09t0:1257_3: therāsanato paṭṭhāya vatthesu dīyamānesu alasajātikā mahātherā pacchā āgacchanti, “bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1257_6: Ṭhitikaṃ ṭhapetvā tesaṃ datvā pacchā ṭhitikāya dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1258_0: “Asukavihāre kira bahucīvaraṃ uppanna”nti sutvā yojanantarikavihāratopi bhikkhū āgacchanti,
tika-vin09t0:1258_3: Vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāya cīvarakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1259_0: Evaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā “imāni cīvarāni saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnesu vinicchayaṃ vatvā idāni bahiupacārasīmāyaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1259_1: bhikkhuṃ disvā “saṅghassa dammī”ti dinnesu vinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1259_2: Ekābaddhaparisāya pāpuṇātīti sace yojanaṃ pharitvā parisā ṭhitā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1260_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunisaṅghassa ca dammī”ti vuttepi ubhatosaṅghassa dinnameva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1260_5: upaḍḍhaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ dātabbanti dve bhāge same katvā eko bhāgo bhikkhūnaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1260_11: Na koci visesoti āha “idha pana cetiyassā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1261_0: “Ubhatosaṅghassa ca tuyhañca cetiyassa cā”ti vutte pana dvāvīsatikoṭṭhāse katvā dasa bhikkhūnaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1261_4: Tattha puggalo saṅghatopi attano vassaggena puna gahetuṃ labhati,
tika-vin09t0:1261_6: Ayaṃ pana vāro yathāvutteneva nayena ñāyatīti katvā idha na vutto.
tika-vin09t0:1262_0: Na majjhe bhinditvā dātabbaṃ “bhikkhunīna”nti puggalikavasena vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:1262_1: Puggalo visuṃ na labhatīti pubbe viya visuṃ puggalikakoṭṭhāsaṃ na labhati.
tika-vin09t0:1262_2: Pāpuṇanaṭṭhānato ekameva labhatīti attano vassaggena pattabbaṭṭhānato ekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ labhati. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:1262_4: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi cetiyassa ekapuggalapaṭivīso labbhati,
tika-vin09t0:1262_6: Tasmā ekaṃ cetiyassa datvā avasesaṃ bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gaṇetvā bhājetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1263_0: Tehi saddhiṃ puggalacetiyaparāmasanaṃ anantaranayasadisamevāti tehi bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ puggalassa
tika-vin09t0:1263_1: ca cetiyassa ca gahaṇaṃ anantaranayasadisamevāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1263_4: bhikkhūnañca bhikkhunīnañca tuyhañca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi cetiyassa ekapaṭivīso labbhati,
tika-vin09t0:1263_6: bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gaṇetvāva bhājetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1263_7: Puggalassa visuṃ na labbhatīti puggalassa visuṃ paṭivīso na labbhati,
tika-vin09t0:1263_9: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca cetiyassa cā”ti vutte pana cetiyassa visuṃ paṭivīso labbhatīti āha “cetiyassa pana labbhatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1263_10: “Bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tuyhañca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi cetiyasseva visuṃ labbhati,
tika-vin09t0:1263_12: Cetiyassa pana labbhatiyevāti “bhikkhūnañca cetiyassa cā”ti vutte pana cetiyassa visuṃ paṭivīso labbhatīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1263_13: “Bhikkhūnañca tuyhañca cetiyassa cā”ti vuttepi cetiyasseva visuṃ labbhati,
tika-vin09t0:1264_1: yaṃ panetarahi paṇḍitamanussā sadhātukaṃ paṭimaṃ vā cetiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvā buddhappamukhassa ubhatosaṅghassa dānaṃ denti,
tika-vin09t0:1264_2: paṭimāya vā cetiyassa vā purato ādhārake pattaṃ ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā “buddhānaṃ demā”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1264_3: tattha yaṃ paṭhamaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ denti,
tika-vin09t0:1264_4: vihāraṃ vā āharitvā “idaṃ cetiyassa demā”ti piṇḍapātañca mālāgandhādīni ca denti,
tika-vin09t0:1264_9: piṇḍapātamadhuphāṇitādīni pana yo nibaddhacetiyajaggako hoti pabbajito vā gahaṭṭho vā,
tika-vin09t0:1264_11: Nibaddhajaggake asati āhaṭabhattaṃ ṭhapetvā vattaṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1264_12: Upakaṭṭhe kāle bhuñjitvā pacchāpi vattaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1265_0: Mālāgandhādīsu ca yaṃ kiñci “idaṃ haritvā cetiyapūjaṃ karothā”ti vutte dūrampi haritvā pūjetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1265_7: Atha pana “bhikkhusaṅghassa dassāmī”ti harantassa gacchato antarāva kālo upakaṭṭho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1266_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa dammīti vadatīti “vassaṃvuṭṭhasaṅghassa imāni cīvarāni dammī”ti vadati.
tika-vin09t0:1266_1: Tesaṃ bahisīmaṭṭhānampi pāpuṇātīti atthate kathine bahisīmaṭṭhānampi yāva kathinassa ubbhārā pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin09t0:1266_4: evañca pana vatvā dinnaṃ pacchimavassaṃvuṭṭhānampi pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin09t0:1266_7: Tatra sammukhībhūtānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti piṭṭhisamaye uppannattā.
tika-vin09t0:1266_11: Cīvaramāse pana “vassaṃ vasantānaṃ dammī”ti vutte pacchimikāya vassūpagatānaṃyeva pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin09t0:1267_0: Cīvaramāsato paṭṭhāya yāva hemantassa pacchimo divaso,
tika-vin09t0:1267_1: tāva “vassāvāsikaṃ demā”ti vutte kathinaṃ atthataṃ vā hotu,
tika-vin09t0:1267_4: Gimhānaṃ paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāya vutte pana mātikā āropetabbā “atītavassāvāsassa pañca māsā atikkantā,
tika-vin09t0:1268_5: gaṇhitvā vā āhiṇḍitu”nti vutte “sampattānaṃ dammī”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1269_0: Yehi nimantitehi yāgu pītāti nimantitehi yehi bhikkhūhi yāgu pītā,
tika-vin09t0:1269_1: yehi pana bhikkhācāravattena gharadvārena gacchantehi vā gharaṃ paviṭṭhehi vā yāgu laddhā,
tika-vin09t0:1269_2: yesaṃ vā āsanasālato pattaṃ āharitvā manussehi nītā,
tika-vin09t0:1269_5: Sace pana nimantitabhikkhūhi saddhiṃ aññepi bahū āgantvā antogehañca bahigehañca pūretvā nisinnā,
tika-vin09t0:1269_6: dāyako ca evaṃ vadati “nimantitā vā hontu,
tika-vin09t0:1269_11: Yehi pana therānaṃ hatthato yāgu laddhā,
tika-vin09t0:1270_2: Sace pana “idaṃ tumhākañceva tumhākaṃ antevāsikānañca dammī”ti evaṃ vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1270_7: Tumhehi saddhiṃ nibaddhacārikabhikkhūnaṃ dammī”ti vutte uddesantevāsikānaṃ vattaṃ katvā uddesaparipucchādīni gahetvā vicarantānaṃ sabbesaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin09t0:1270_10: vitthāro pana kathaṃ ñātabboti āha “samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1271_2: te ābhate cīvare dassantī”ti evaṃ ñātito vā mittato vā paccāsā hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1271_5: Aññaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ labhitvā eva kālabbhantare kāretabbanti aññaṃ mūlacīvarasadisaṃ paccāsācīvaraṃ labhitvāyeva māsabbhantare kāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1271_7: asatiyā pana paccāsāya mūlacīvaraṃ dasāhaṃ ce sampattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1271_10: Paccāsācīvarampi parikkhāracoḷaṃ adhiṭṭhātabbanti paṭhamataraṃ uppannaṃ thūlapaccāsācīvarampi sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pi-
tika-vin09t0:1274_5: Mātito vā pitito vāti mātipakkhato vā pitipakkhato vā.
tika-vin09t0:1274_6: Yāva sattamaṃ yuganti yāva sattamassa purisassa,
tika-vin09t0:1274_8: yāva pitāmahayugaṃ pitāmahiyugaṃ mātāmahayugaṃ mātāmahiyuganti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1274_9: Atha vā yāva sattamaṃ yuganti yāva sattamadvandanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1274_10: Yugasaddo cettha ekasesanayena daṭṭhabbo “yugo ca yugo ca yugā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1274_11: Evañhi tattha tattha dvandaṃ gahitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1274_12: Kenaci ākārena asambaddhāyāti bhātubhaginibhāgineyyaputtapaputtādīsu yena kenaci ākārena asambaddhāya. Pitā, pitupitā,
tika-vin09t0:1274_14: tassāpi pitāti evaṃ yāva sattamā yugā, pitā, pitumātā,
tika-vin09t0:1274_15: tassā pitā ca mātā ca bhātā ca bhaginī ca, puttā ca,
tika-vin09t0:1274_16: dhītaro cāti evampi uddhañca adho ca yāva sattamā yugā, pitā,
tika-vin09t0:1274_21: tesampi puttadhītuparamparāti evampi yāva sattamā yugā, mātā, mātumātā,
tika-vin09t0:1274_23: tassāpi mātāti evaṃ yāva sattamā yugā, mātā, mātupitā,
tika-vin09t0:1274_24: tassa pitā ca mātā ca bhātā ca bhaginī ca puttā ca dhītaro cāti evampi uddhañca adho ca yāva sattamā yugā, mātā,
tika-vin09t0:1274_29: tesampi puttadhītuparamparāti evampi yāva sattamā yugā,
tika-vin09t0:1275_2: tasmā bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā parivattaliṅgā bhikkhuniyopi idha suddhabhikkhusaṅghe “upasampannā” icceva veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1275_5: Purāṇacīvaranti ettha cīvaranti nivāsanapārupanupagameva adhippetanti āha “rajitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1275_7: “Iminā adinnakappaṃ pācittiyavatthu na hotīti dassetī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1275_11: Sace pana paccattharaṇassa heṭṭhā katvā nipajjati,
tika-vin09t0:1275_12: hatthehi vā ukkhipitvā ākāse vitānaṃ katvā sīsena asamphusanto gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1276_0: Kāyavikāraṃ vā karotīti yathā sā “dhovāpetukāmo aya”nti jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:1276_2: “Antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhatvā upari vā khipatī”ti iminā upacāraṃ muñcitvā orato khipantassa anāpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1276_3: Aññassa vā hatthe pesetīti antodvādasahatthe okāse ṭhatvā sikkhamānasāmaṇerasāmaṇeriupāsakaitthiyādīsu yassa kassaci aññassa hatthe vā peseti.
tika-vin09t0:1276_5: Upasampajjitvā dhovatīti ettha upāsako liṅge parivatte bhikkhunīsu pabbajitvā upasampajjitvā dhovati,
tika-vin09t0:1276_6: sāmaṇero liṅge parivatte bhikkhunīsu upasampajjitvā dhovatīti yathāyogaṃ attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1276_7: Sace pana bhikkhuniyā hatthe dinnaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1277_0: Ettha ca ekassa tikkhattuṃ nissajjanābhāvato tīṇipi kārentassa ekena nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1277_5: “Ekena vatthunā”ti paṭhamaṃ katvā niṭṭhāpitaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1277_6: Sace pana “imaṃ cīvaraṃ rajitvā dhovitvā ānehī”ti vutte sā bhikkhunī paṭhamaṃ dhovitvā pacchā rajati,
tika-vin09t0:1277_9: Sace pana “dhovitvā ānehī”ti vuttā dhovati ceva rajati ca,
tika-vin09t0:1277_14: Bhikkhūnaṃ vasena ekato upasampannāya dhovāpentassa yathāvatthukamevāti āha “bhikkhunisaṅghavasenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1278_0: Aññassa vā santakanti aññassa santakaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpentassāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1278_1: Nisīdanapaccattharaṇanti aññassa vā attano vā santakaṃ nisīdanañceva paccattharaṇañca.
tika-vin09t0:1278_2: Nivāsanapārupanupagasseva ca idha “purāṇacīvara”nti adhippetattā attano santakampi nisīdanapaccattharaṇaṃ dhovāpentassa dukkaṭameva hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1278_4: Avuttā vā dhovatīti uddesāya vā ovādāya vā āgatā kiliṭṭhacīvaraṃ disvā ṭhapitaṭṭhānato vā gahetvā,
tika-vin09t0:1278_6: dhovissāmī”ti āharāpetvā vā dhovati ceva rajati ca ākoṭeti ca,
tika-vin09t0:1278_8: Yāpi “imaṃ cīvaraṃ dhovā”ti daharaṃ vā sāmaṇeraṃ vā āṇāpentassa bhikkhuno vacanaṃ sutvā “āharathayya,
tika-vin09t0:1278_10: tāvakālikaṃ vā gahetvā dhovitvā rajitvā deti,
tika-vin09t0:1282_2: saddena dhammakathaṃ kathentassa catasso parisā cīvarāni ca nānāvirāgavatthāni ca āharitvā pādamūle ṭhapenti,
tika-vin09t0:1282_6: Khipatūti divā vā rattibhāge vā khipatu.
tika-vin09t0:1282_10: Yassa kassaci pana anupasampannassāti sikkhamānasāmaṇerasāmaṇeriupāsakaupāsikādīsu yassa kassaci anupasampannassa.
tika-vin09t0:1282_14: Iminā “amhākamatthāya ṭhapita”ntiādikāya saññāya gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1282_22: tampi yathāvuttavidhānaṃ akatvā gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1283_1: Tikapācittiyanti tīṇi parimāṇāni assāti tikaṃ,tikañca taṃ pācittiyañcāti tikapācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1283_2: aññātikāya ñātikasaññivematikaaññātikasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyānīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1283_4: Tāya hi hatthato aññatra pārivattakā cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1283_7: Sā hi mahantāpi senāsanasaṅgahitattā cīvarasaṅkhaṃ na gacchatīti neva adhiṭṭhānupagā,
tika-vin09t0:1283_11: “Hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti vacanato pana aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā pesitaggahaṇepi anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1286_2: idha pana apabbajito yo koci manusso adhippeto.
tika-vin09t0:1286_5: “Viññāpeyyā”ti idaṃ suddhakattuatthe ca hetukattuatthe ca vattatīti āha “yāceyya vā yācāpeyya vā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1286_7: Evañca pana katvā “anāṇattika”nti idaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1286_12: dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1286_13: karaṇaṃ viya ca kappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyati,
tika-vin09t0:1286_16: Tattha rājādīsu yehi kehici acchinnaṃ cīvaraṃ etassāti acchinnacīvaro.
tika-vin09t0:1286_17: Yathāha “acchinnacīvaro nāma bhikkhussa cīvaraṃ acchinnaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1286_18: rājūhi vā corehi vā dhuttehi vā yehi kehici vā acchinnaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1286_19: Aggiādīsu yena kenaci naṭṭhaṃ cīvarametassāti naṭṭhacīvaro.
tika-vin09t0:1286_20: Yathāha “naṭṭhacīvaro nāma bhikkhussa cīvaraṃ agginā vā daḍḍhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1286_22: undūrehi vā upacikāhi vā khāyitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1286_24: Samayāti aññatrasaddāpekkhāya upayogatthe nissakkavacananti āha “taṃ samaya”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1287_0: Tikapācittiyanti aññātake aññātakasaññivematikaññātakasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1287_1: Samayeti yathāvutte acchinnacīvarakāle ca naṭṭhacīvarakāle ca.
tika-vin09t0:1287_4: Ettha ca saṅghavasena pavārite pamāṇameva yācituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1287_5: puggalikavasena pavārite pana yaṃ yaṃ pavārenti,
tika-vin09t0:1287_7: Yo hi catūhi paccayehi pavāretvā sayameva sallakkhetvā kālānukālaṃ cīvarādīni divase divase yāgubhattādīni deti,
tika-vin09t0:1287_11: Yo pana pavāretvā bālatāya vā satisammosena vā na deti,
tika-vin09t0:1287_14: tassa gehaṃ gantvā yathāsukhaṃ nisīditabbaṃ nipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1287_20: Gehe pana nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā na labbhati.
tika-vin09t0:1287_21: Tassevatthāyāti “aññassā”ti laddhavohārassa tasseva buddharakkhitassa vā dhammarakkhitassa vā atthāya.
tika-vin09t0:1287_22: Attano dhanena gaṇhantassāti attano kappiyabhaṇḍena kappiyavohāreneva gaṇhantassa cetāpentassa,
tika-vin09t0:1290_16: Kāyena vā vācāya vā abhiharitvā nimanteyyāti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1290_19: taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ “upanetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ saantaranti antaravāsakasahitaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1290_22: Assa cīvarassāti assa samudāyabhūtassa haritabbassa cīvarassa.
tika-vin09t0:1290_23: Tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo hi ayaṃ bāhiratthasamāso yathā “lambakaṇṇo”ti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1290_25: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena hi sabbe taṃparamaṃyeva gahetuṃ labhanti.
tika-vin09t0:1291_0: Yasmā acchinnasabbacīvarena ticīvaramattakeneva bhikkhunā evaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1291_2: tasmā taṃ vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tatrāyaṃ vinicchayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1291_3: Adhiṭṭhitacīvarassāti ticīvarādhiṭṭhānanayena vā parikkhāracoḷavasena vā yena kenaci adhiṭṭhitacīvarassa,
tika-vin09t0:1291_4: idañca yebhuyyena adhiṭṭhahitvā cīvaraṃ paribhuñjato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1291_5: na pana anadhiṭṭhitacīvarassa cīvare acchinne ayaṃ vidhi na sambhavatīti.
tika-vin09t0:1291_6: Yassa vā ticīvarato adhikampi cīvaraṃ aññattha atthi,
tika-vin09t0:1291_8: tenāpi tadā tattha abhāvato dve sādituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1291_9: Pakatiyāva santaruttarena caratīti atthatakathinattā vā sāsaṅkasikkhāpadavasena vā avippavāsasammutivasena vā tatiyassa alābhena vā carati.
tika-vin09t0:1291_11: Ekaṃ sādiyanteneva samo bhavissatīti tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ dvīsu naṭṭhena ekaṃ sādiyantena samo bhavissati ubhinnampi santaruttaraparamatāya avaṭṭhānato.
tika-vin09t0:1291_12: Yassa ekaṃyeva hoti aññena kenaci kāraṇena vinaṭṭhasesacīvarattā.
tika-vin09t0:1292_0: Pañcasu naṭṭhesūti ticīvaraṃ udakasāṭikā saṃkaccikāti imesu pañcasu cīvaresu naṭṭhesu.
tika-vin09t0:1293_0: Sesakaṃ āharissāmīti dve cīvarāni katvā “sesakaṃ puna āharissāmī”ti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1293_1: Sesakaṃ tuyhaṃyeva hotūti vuttassāti dānasamaye evaṃ vuttassa.
tika-vin09t0:1293_2: Sace pana “sesakaṃ āharissāmī”ti vatvā gahetvā gamanasamayepi “sesakaṃ tuyhaṃyeva hotū”ti vadanti,
tika-vin09t0:1293_6: samaye ca aññassa vā ñātakappavārite tassevatthāya viññāpentassa”ti vuttanayena.
tika-vin09t0:1296_0: Bhikkhuṃ paneva uddissāti ettha panāti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1296_7: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana idaṃ suviññeyyanti na vicāritaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1296_12: Taṃ pana yasmā hiraññādīsu aññataraṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1296_17: Taṃ upakkharaṇaṃ tesaṃ tathā sajjitanti āha “upakkhaṭaṃ hotīti sajjitaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1296_20: katassa kiṇananti āha “kāretvā vā kiṇitvā vāti attho”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1297_0: “Tatra ce so bhikkhū”tiādīsu ko padasambandhoti āha “yatra so gahapati vā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1297_4: kīdisaṃ te cīvaraṃ cetāpemī”ti pubbe avutto.
tika-vin09t0:1297_8: Yebhuyyena hi gharasāmikaṃ daṭṭhukāmā tassa gharaṃ gacchantīti tatheva bahulavohāro.
tika-vin09t0:1297_14: Yathā pana tamāpajjatīti yenākārena taṃ vikappaṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:1298_2: bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane dissati,
tika-vin09t0:1301_4: idhāpi āyācaneyeva daṭṭhabboti āha “sādhūti āyācane nipāto”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1301_10: Yasmā pana na imassa āpajjanamatteneva āpatti sīsaṃ eti,
tika-vin09t0:1302_0: Mahagghaṃ cetāpetukāmaṃ appagghanti vīsatiagghanakaṃ cīvaraṃ cetāpetukāmaṃ “alaṃ mayhaṃ tena,
tika-vin09t0:1302_1: dasaagghanakaṃ vā aṭṭhagghanakaṃ vā dehī”ti vadantassāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1305_0: Kasmā iminā nayena attho veditabboti āha “idañhī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1308_3: Iminātiādīti “iminā cīvaracetāpannena cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ cīvarena acchādehī”ti idaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1308_5: Yadi hi iminā kappiyanīhārena apesetvā “idaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dehī”ti peseyya,
tika-vin09t0:1308_6: sopi dūto taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyya “idaṃ kho, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1308_9: tadā paṭikkhipitvāpi kappiyakārakaṃ puṭṭhena taṃ niddisituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1308_12: Īdisena dūtavacanenāti “paṭiggaṇhātu āyasmā cīvaracetāpanna”nti evarūpena dūtavacanena.
tika-vin09t0:1308_13: Tasmāti yasmā sampaṭicchituṃ akappiyaṃ hoti, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:1308_16: Kahāpaṇenāti suvaṇṇamayo vā rūpiyamayo vā pākatiko vā kahāpaṇo.
tika-vin09t0:1308_20: yo yo yattha yattha janapade yadā yadā vohāraṃ gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1308_21: antamaso aṭṭhimayopi cammamayopi rukkhaphalabījamayopi samuṭṭhāpitarūpopi asamuṭṭhāpitarūpopi sabbo idha māsakoti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1309_10: Yasmā pana bahulaṃ sāmuddikāva muttā loke dissanti,
tika-vin09t0:1309_14: Maṇīti ṭhapetvā veḷuriyādike antamaso jātiphalikaṃ upādāya sabbopi nīlapītādivaṇṇabhedo maṇīti veditabbo,
tika-vin09t0:1309_15: pacitvā kato pana kācamaṇiyeveko pattādibhaṇḍamūlatthaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1309_22: Ratanena pana amissā satthakanisānādiatthāya paṭiggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1309_23: Ettha ca “ratanasaṃyuttāti suvaṇṇena saddhiṃ yojetvā pacitvā katā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1310_0: Satta dhaññānīti sānulomāni sāliādīni satta dhaññāni.
tika-vin09t0:1310_12: Na kevalañca attanoyevatthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1310_13: sacepi koci jātarūparajataṃ ānetvā “idaṃ saṅghassa dammi,
tika-vin09t0:1310_15: cetiyaṃ vā bhojanasālādīnaṃ vā aññatara”nti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1310_17: “Yassa kassaci hi aññassa atthāya sampaṭicchantassa dukkaṭaṃ hotī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1310_18: Tenāha “cetiyasaṅghagaṇapuggalānaṃ vā atthāya sampaṭicchituṃ na vaṭṭantī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1311_0: Sace pana saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā anāmasitvā “idaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ cetiyassa dema,
tika-vin09t0:1311_5: “Cetiyādīnaṃ atthāya tumhe gahetvā ṭhapethā”ti vutte pana “amhākaṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti paṭikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1312_1: Idha pana sabbo kiccakarova “veyyāvaccakaro”ti adhippetoti āha “kappiyakārako”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1312_2: Eso khoti “asukavīthiyaṃ asukaghare asukanāmo”ti parammukhaṃ vadati.
tika-vin09t0:1312_9: Etassa vā attho yāya kāyaci bhāsāya vattabboti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1312_13: cetāpehi me cīvara”nti etāni pana vacanāni etesaṃ vā attho yāya kāyaci bhāsāya na vattabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1312_16: Iccetaṃ kusalanti evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ codanena tassa cīvarassa yadetaṃ abhinipphādanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1313_4: etaṃ bhāve ṭhātabbanti vuttadhātvatthamatte sādhetabbe napuṃsakaliṅgavacananti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1313_7: Na āmisaṃ paṭiggahetabbanti yāgukhajjakādibhedaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ “gaṇhatha,
tika-vin09t0:1313_9: Na dhammo bhāsitabboti “maṅgalaṃ vā anumodanaṃ vā bhāsathā”ti yāciyamānenāpi na kiñci bhāsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1313_11: Ṭhatvā cīvaraṃ gahetuṃ āgatena hi taṃ uddissa tuṇhībhūtena ṭhātabbameva,
tika-vin09t0:1313_13: Iminā pana taṃ katanti ṭhānaṃ vināsitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1313_16: tasmā ‘na kātabba’nti vāritassa katattā nisajjādīsu katesu chasu ṭhānesu ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ bhañjatī”ti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1313_18: “Na aññaṃ kiñci kātabba”nti hi idaṃ ṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1313_22: Ettha ca “nisīdanādimhi kate puna cīvaraṃ gahetuṃ na labhatī”ti keci.
tika-vin09t0:1314_0: “Tatra tatra ṭhāne tiṭṭhatī”ti idaṃ codakassa ṭhitaṭṭhitaṭṭhānato apakkamma tatra tatra cīvaraṃ uddissa ṭhānaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1315_2: Ayañhi kappiyakārako nāma saṅkhepato duvidho niddiṭṭho ca aniddiṭṭho ca.
tika-vin09t0:1315_3: Tattha ca niddiṭṭho duvidho bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho,
tika-vin09t0:1315_7: Tesu bhikkhunā niddiṭṭho sammukhāsammukhavasena catubbidho hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1316_1: Idhekacco bhikkhussa cīvaratthāya dūtena akappiyavatthuṃ pahiṇati,
tika-vin09t0:1316_2: dūto ca taṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1316_8: puññatthikehi ca upāsakehi “bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karothā”ti āṇattā vā bhikkhūnaṃ vā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā keci veyyāvaccakarā honti,
tika-vin09t0:1316_9: tesaṃ aññataro tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhussa santike nisinno hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1316_11: Dūto tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dehī”ti gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1317_0: No ce bhikkhussa santike nisinno hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1317_1: apica kho bhikkhu niddisati “asukasmiṃ nāma gāme itthannāmo bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccakaro”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1317_2: So gantvā tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ kiṇitvā dadeyyāsī”ti āgantvā bhikkhussa ārocetvā gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1318_0: Na heva kho so dūto attanā āgantvā āroceti,
tika-vin09t0:1318_1: apica kho aññaṃ pahiṇati “dinnaṃ mayā, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1319_1: apica kho gacchantova bhikkhuṃ vadati “ahaṃ tassa hatthe cīvaracetāpannaṃ dassāmi,
tika-vin09t0:1319_3: ayaṃ tatiyo bhikkhunā asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro bhikkhunā niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā nāma.
tika-vin09t0:1320_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito natthitāya vā avicāretukāmatāya vā “natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1320_2: dūto tassa hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “imassa hatthato cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1321_0: Aparo dūto gāmaṃ pavisitvā attanā abhirucitassa kassaci hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā purimanayeneva āgantvā vā āroceti,
tika-vin09t0:1321_3: tumhe cīvaraṃ gaṇheyyāthā”ti vatvā vā gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1321_4: ayaṃ tatiyo dūtena asammukhāniddiṭṭhoti evaṃ eko sammukhāniddiṭṭho,
tika-vin09t0:1321_5: tayo asammukhāniddiṭṭhāti ime cattāro dūtena niddiṭṭhaveyyāvaccakarā nāma.
tika-vin09t0:1323_3: te kappiyakārakānaṃ hatthe hiraññaṃ upanikkhipanti ‘iminā ayyassa yaṃ kappiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1323_11: kenaci pariyāyena jātarūparajataṃ sāditabbaṃ pariyesitabbanti vadāmī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1324_1: Mūlaṃ asādiyantena sahassakkhattumpi codanāya vā ṭhānena vā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1325_0: Aparo bhikkhu purimanayeneva dūtena pucchito “natthamhākaṃ kappiyakārako”ti vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1325_2: ahaṃ ayyassa cīvaraṃ cetāpetvā dassāmī”ti vadati.
tika-vin09t0:1325_4: dadeyyāsī”ti tassa hatthe datvā bhikkhussa anārocetvāva gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1326_0: Aparo bhikkhuno upaṭṭhākassa vā aññassa vā hatthe akappiyavatthuṃ datvā “therassa cīvaraṃ dadeyyāsī”ti ettova pakkamati,
tika-vin09t0:1326_1: ayaṃ parammukhakappiyakārakoti ime dve aniddiṭṭhakappiyakārakā nāma.
tika-vin09t0:1327_5: “Dāyako sayamevā”ti iminā bhikkhuṃ paṭikkhipati, na dūtaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1327_6: Tasmā dūtena niddiṭṭhopi yathāruci codetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1327_7: Mukhaṃ vivaritvā sayameva kappiyakārakattaṃ upagatoti mukhavevaṭikakappiyakārako.
tika-vin09t0:1328_2: Tatthāti ettha kathamayamattho labbhatīti āha “samīpatthe hi idaṃ bhummavacana”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1328_5: kūpe gaggakūla”ntiādīsu viya yasmā samīpādhāre idaṃ sattamīvibhattivacanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1329_4: Tikapācittiyanti atirekesu codanāṭṭhānesu atirekasaññivematikaūnakasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1329_6: ūnakatikkhattuṃ codanāya ūnakacchakkhattuṃ ṭhānena laddhepi anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1334_0: Kosiyamissakanti “kosakārakā”ti laddhavohārānaṃ pāṇakānaṃ kosato nibbattaṃ aṃsu kosiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1334_2: Tena pana kosiyena appakenāpi missitaṃ kosiyamissakameva,
tika-vin09t0:1334_9: Imasseva vacanassa anusārenāti imasseva paṭhamasanthatassa nissajjanavidhānavacanānusārena.
tika-vin09t0:1335_0: Aññassatthāya kārāpane dukkaṭattā attano atthāya kārāpanavasena “sāṇattika”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1338_0: Kāḷakānanti sabhāvena vā rajanena vā kāḷakānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1338_1: Yathāha “kāḷakaṃ nāma dve kāḷakāni jātiyā kāḷakaṃ vā rajanakāḷakaṃ vā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1338_4: tathā idhāpi ‘ekenāpi aññena amissetvā’ti avuttattā aññena pana missakabhogepi apaññāyamānarūpakaṃ ce ‘suddhakāḷaka’micceva vuccatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1342_0: Gahetabbāti yathā kāḷakā adhikā na honti,
tika-vin09t0:1342_2: Ṭhapetvā cettha kāḷakaodāte avasesā gocariyesuyeva saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1342_3: Ettha ca dve bhāgāti ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo kāḷakānaṃ adhikaggahaṇassa paṭikkhepavasena sikkhāpadassa paññattattā.
tika-vin09t0:1342_4: Tasmā kāḷakānaṃ bhāgadvayato adhikaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1342_7: Ekassāpi kāḷakalomassa atirekabhāveti tulāya dhārayitvā ṭhapitesu antamaso vātavegenapi pahitassa ekassāpi kāḷakalomassa adhikabhāve satīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1342_9: catutthaṃ gocariyāna”nti idaṃ pana heṭṭhimaparicchedo tesaṃ adhikaggahaṇe paṭikkhepābhāvato.
tika-vin09t0:1343_1: santhataṃ anādiyitvā dve tule suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1343_3: tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1343_4: Ādāya ca vuttaparicchedena anādāya ca karaṇato kiriyākiriyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1343_7: tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karaṇe,
tika-vin09t0:1343_8: bahutaraṃ odātānaṃ bahutaraṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karaṇe,
tika-vin09t0:1343_9: suddhaṃ odātānaṃ suddhaṃ gocariyānaṃ ādiyitvā karaṇe ca anāpattīti.
tika-vin09t0:1344_0: Aṅgesu pana paṭhamaṅgaṃ kāḷakānaṃ dvebhāgato atirekabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1344_1: Imāni tīṇi na kevalaṃ anissaṭṭhāneva paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭantīti āha “imāni panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1347_1: Gilānassa bhikkhunoti yassa vinā santhatā na phāsu hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1347_2: na sakkoti ca santhataṃ ādāya pakkamituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1347_5: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu gilāno na sakkoti santhataṃ ādāya pakkamitu”ntiādinā padabhājane vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya santhatasammutiṃ deti.
tika-vin09t0:1348_1: Vūpasanto vā puna kuppatīti vūpasanto vā so ābādho puna kuppati,
tika-vin09t0:1348_5: atha kho aññasmiṃ roge kuppitepi gatagataṭṭhāne anuvassaṃ kātuṃ labhati.
tika-vin09t0:1348_6: Teneva hi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “sace arogo hutvā puna mūlabyādhināva gilāno hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1348_9: Upatissatthero pana so vā byādhi paṭikuppatu, añño vā,
tika-vin09t0:1348_11: puna ‘sammutikiccaṃ natthī’ti āhā”ti upatissattheravādo pacchā vutto.
tika-vin09t0:1349_1: santhataṃ ūnakachabbassāni kārāpitaṃ aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1349_2: “Sesaṃ paṭhamasadisamevā”ti iminā “attanā kataṃ parehi pariyosāpetī”tiādikaṃ atidiṭṭhaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1349_4: paripuṇṇe chabbasse vā atirekachabbasse vā anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1352_0: Nisīdanasanthatanti “nisīdanaṃ nāma sadasaṃ vuccatī”ti ettha padabhājaniyaṃ vuttattā sadasaṃ santhataṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1352_2: yato te bhikkhū kambalacīvarasaññāya santhataṃ chaḍḍetvā dhutaṅgāni samādiyiṃsu.
tika-vin09t0:1352_6: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo cāyaṃ “anāpatti alabhanto thokataraṃ ādiyitvā karotī”ti padabhājane vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:1353_1: nisīdanasanthataṃ anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1353_2: Santhatavissajjanavatthusmiṃ paññattanti bhagavatā santhatāni vippakiṇṇāni disvā “saddhādeyyavinipātane kāraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-vin09t0:1353_9: sabbathā alabhantassa anādāya karaṇe ca anāpattīti.
tika-vin09t0:1353_10: Aṅgesu panettha paṭhamaṅgapurāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthianādiyanāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1356_4: Addhānagamanasamayassa vibhaṅge “addhayojanaṃ gacchissāmīti bhuñjitabba”ntiādivacanato addhayojanampi addhānamaggo hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1356_5: Eḷakalomāni cetāni addhānamaggato aññattha uppannāni paṭiggahetuṃ na vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin09t0:1356_7: Tattha sabbañcetanti “bhikkhuno paneva addhānamaggappaṭipannassa eḷakalomāni uppajjeyyu”ntiādikaṃ etaṃ sabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1356_8: Vatthumattadīpanamevāti “tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchantassa
tika-vin09t0:1356_10: Yattha katthacīti addhānato aññatthāpi yattha katthaci ṭhānesu.
tika-vin09t0:1356_13: tasmā yena kenaci sarīrāvayavenāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1356_15: Asante hāraketi ettha padānaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇato avadhāraṇattho labbhatīti āha “asanteyevā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1357_1: eḷakalomāni tiyojanaṃ atikkāmitāni nissaggiyānī”tiādinā nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1357_2: Tikapācittiyanti atirekatiyojane atirekatiyojanasaññivematikaūnakasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1357_3: Vāsādhippāyena gantvā tato paraṃ haraṇeti yattha gato,
tika-vin09t0:1357_4: tattha uddesaparipucchādīnaṃ vā paccayādīnaṃ vā alābhena tato paraṃ aññattha haraṇe,
tika-vin09t0:1357_5: tatopi aññatthāti evaṃ yojanasatampi haraṇe anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1357_6: Acchinnaṃ vā nissaṭṭhaṃ vāti corehi acchinnaṃ vā vinayakammakataṃ vā.
tika-vin09t0:1357_7: Katabhaṇḍanti kataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kambalakojavasanthatādi yaṃ kiñci antamaso suttakena baddhamattampi.
tika-vin09t0:1357_9: Yo pana tanukapattatthavikantare vā āyogaaṃsabaddhakakāyabandhanādīnaṃ antaresu vā pipphalikādīnaṃ malarakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1357_10: sipāṭikāyaṃ vā antamaso vātābādhiko kaṇṇacchiddepi lomāni pakkhipitvā gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1357_12: Suttakena pana bandhitvā pakkhittaṃ katabhaṇḍaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1358_2: Aññassa ajānantassa yāne pakkhipitvāti gacchante rathādike vā hatthipiṭṭhiādīsu vā sāmikassa ajānantasseva “harissatī”ti pakkhipitvā.
tika-vin09t0:1358_4: Sace pana agacchante rathādimhi vā hatthipiṭṭhiādīsu vā ṭhapetvā ārohitvā sāreti,
tika-vin09t0:1358_8: Ettha ca “ajānantassa yāne”ti iminā jānantassa ce yāne pakkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:1361_1: bho kumārā”ti udānaṃ paṭicca “sakyā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhisaddena “sakkā”ti vuccati,
tika-vin09t0:1364_1: atha kho yaṃ kiñci vohāragamanīyaṃ kahāpaṇādi ca etaṃ adhippetanti āha “apicā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1364_2: Tattha kahāpaṇoti suvaṇṇamayo vā rūpiyamayo vā pākatiko vā.
tika-vin09t0:1364_4: Dārumāsako nāma sāradārunā vā veḷupesikāya vā antamaso tālapaṇṇenapi rūpaṃ chinditvā katamāsako.
tika-vin09t0:1364_5: Jatumāsako nāma lākhāya vā niyyāsena vā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā katamāsako.
tika-vin09t0:1364_6: “Ye vohāraṃ gacchantī”ti iminā pana padena yo yo yattha yattha janapade yadā yadā vohāraṃ gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1364_7: antamaso aṭṭhimayopi cammamayopi rukkhaphalabījamayopi samuṭṭhāpitarūpopi asamuṭṭhāpitarūpopi sabbo saṅgahito.
tika-vin09t0:1365_1: Na kevalaṃ kāyavācāhi paṭikkhittameva paṭikkhittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1365_2: atha kho manasāpi paṭikkhittaṃ paṭikkhittameva hotīti āha “kāyavācāhī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1365_3: Sace pana kāyavācāhi appaṭikkhipitvā cittena adhivāseti,
tika-vin09t0:1365_4: kāyavācāhi kattabbassa paṭikkhepassa akaraṇato akiriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ kāyavacīdvāre āpattiṃ āpajjati.
tika-vin09t0:1366_0: Eko sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā pādamūle ṭhapeti “tuyhidaṃ hotū”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1366_3: añño tattha āgantvā pucchati “kiṃ, bhante, ida”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1366_4: Yaṃ tena ca attanā ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1366_10: Ettāvatā kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1366_12: Sace kiñci vikkāyikabhaṇḍaṃ pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā āgacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1366_22: Evañca kappiyañca akappiyañca nissāya ṭhitameva hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1366_23: So cetaṃ gahetvā tassa kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ deti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1367_0: Saṅghamajjheyeva nissajjitabbanti ettha yasmā rūpiyaṃ nāma akappiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1367_1: tasmā “nissajjitabbaṃ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1367_4: tasmā upāyena paribhogadassanatthaṃ “saṅghamajjheyeva nissajjitabba”nti vuttaṃ. Ādi-
tika-vin09t0:1367_6: Soti yo gahaṭṭho “sappi vā telaṃ vā vaṭṭati upāsakā”tiādinā nayena vutto, so.
tika-vin09t0:1367_7: Aññena labhitvāti bhikkhunā vā ārāmikena vā attano vassaggena labhitvā.
tika-vin09t0:1367_8: Tato nibbattarukkhacchāyāpīti nissaggiyavatthunā āhaṭabījato nibbattarukkhaparicchedena ṭhitacchāyāpi,
tika-vin09t0:1367_10: No ce chaḍḍetīti atha neva gahetvā gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1367_20: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ rūpiyachaḍḍakaṃ sammanneyyā”tiādinā padabhājane vuttāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya sammannitabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1368_0: Animittaṃ katvā gūthaṃ viya chaḍḍetabbanti patitaṭṭhānaṃ sallakkhaṇavasena nimittaṃ akatvā gūthaṃ viya chaḍḍetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1368_1: akkhīni nimīletvāva nadiyā vā papāte vā vanagahane vā gūthaṃ viya anapekkhena patitokāsaṃ asamannāharantena pātetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1368_5: Ratanasikkhāpadanayenāti “ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā”ti ettha vuttavidhinā.
tika-vin09t0:1371_1: Suvaṇṇādicatubbidhampi nissaggiyavatthu idha rūpiyaggahaṇena gahitanti āha “jātarūparajataparivattana”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1372_0: Rūpiyasaṃvohāravatthusminti paṭiggahaṇasseva paṭikkhittattā paṭiggahitaparivattane dosaṃ adisvā rūpiyaparivattane.
tika-vin09t0:1372_3: Attano vā hi arūpiyena parassa rūpiyaṃ cetāpeyya,
tika-vin09t0:1375_0: Rūpiyasaṃvohārassa pana heṭṭhāsikkhāpadena gahitattā kappiyabhaṇḍānamevettha gahaṇanti āha “cīvarādīna”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1375_1: Tattha cīvarādīnaṃ kappiyabhaṇḍānanti antamaso dasikasuttaṃ upādāya cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayānaṃ yesaṃ kesañci kappiyabhaṇḍānaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1375_11: Nanu cettha cīvaradhovane vā kesacchedane vā bhūmisodhanādinavakamme vā parabhaṇḍaṃ attano hatthagataṃ nissajjitabbaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-vin09t0:1375_12: tattha kiṃ kātabbanti āha “asante pācittiyaṃ desetabbamevā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1375_13: Yathā nissaggiyavatthumhi paribhutte vā naṭṭhe vā pācittiyaṃ deseti,
tika-vin09t0:1376_0: Idaṃ amhākaṃ atthīti idaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ telaṃ vā sappi vā amhākaṃ saṃvijjati.
tika-vin09t0:1376_1: Amhākañca iminā ca iminā ca atthoti amhākañca tadaññena iminā ca iminā ca appaṭiggahitakena attho.
tika-vin09t0:1376_2: “Rūpiyasaṃvohāre vuttanayamevā”ti iminā “tikapācittiyaṃ akayavikkaye kayavikkayasaññino ca vematikassa ca dukkaṭa”nti imaṃ nayamatidisati.
tika-vin09t0:1381_0: Avikappitoti “imaṃ pattaṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī”tiādinā nayena avikappito.
tika-vin09t0:1381_1: Aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṃ gaṇhātīti magadhanāḷiyā dvinnaṃ taṇḍulanāḷīnaṃ odanaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:1381_6: tāya magadhanāḷiyā diyaḍḍhanāḷi ekā sīhaḷanāḷi hotī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1382_0: Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhapattaṃ dassetvā idāni majjhimomakāni dassetuṃ “ukkaṭṭhato”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1382_2: sace nāḷikodanādi sabbampi pakkhittaṃ vuttanayeneva heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1382_4: Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1382_9: Sace pattodanādi sabbampi pakkhittaṃ heṭṭhimarājisamaṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1382_11: Sace taṃ rājiṃ atikkamma thūpīkataṃ tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1383_7: itare pana satta adhiṭṭhahitvā vā vikappetvā vā paribhuñjitabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1384_0: Tasmāti yasmā satta pattā pamāṇayuttā, tasmā.
tika-vin09t0:1384_1: Samaṇasāruppena pakkanti ettha ayopatto pañcahi pākehi pakko samaṇasāruppena pakko hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1384_12: Sacepi pattasāmiko vadati “yadā tumhākaṃ mūlaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin09t0:1384_16: Pākassa hi ūnattā pattasaṅkhaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin09t0:1384_17: Mūlassa sakalassa vā ekadesassa vā adinnattā sakabhāvaṃ na upeti,
tika-vin09t0:1384_19: Tasmā pāke ca mūle ca niṭṭhiteyeva adhiṭṭhānupago hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1384_23: Apaccuddharantena vikappetabboti purāṇapattaṃ apaccuddharantena navo patto vikappetabboti attho,
tika-vin09t0:1384_25: Kaṅgusitthanti sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ lāmakadhaññasitthanti āha “kaṅgusitthanikkhamanamattena chiddenā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1387_1: Tena ūnapañcabandhanenāti tena ūnapañcabandhanena pattena upalakkhito hutvāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1387_2: Ūnapañcabandhano hi patto ettha lakkhaṇabhāvena gahito.
tika-vin09t0:1387_9: Tathā hi ūnapañcabandhanena pattenāti ettha bhikkhubhāvasāmaññassa ūnapañcabandhanapattabhāvo pakāro,
tika-vin09t0:1387_12: Yadi aparipuṇṇapañcabandhano patto ūnapañcabandhano nāma hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1387_13: atha kasmā imassa padabhājaniyaṃ abandhanopi vuttoti āha “tatthā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1387_15: Bandhanokāse sati vā asati vā bandhanavirahito patto abandhano,
tika-vin09t0:1387_17: Apattoti patto nāma na hotīti attho,
tika-vin09t0:1388_0: Bandhanañca nāmetaṃ yasmā bandhanokāse sati hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1388_4: Mukhavaṭṭisamīpe pana pattavedhakena vijjhiyamāne kapālassa bahalattā bhijjati,
tika-vin09t0:1388_7: Sukhumaṃ vā chiddaṃ katvā bandhitabboti sukhume chidde tipupaṭṭādīhi payojanaṃ natthi,
tika-vin09t0:1388_10: Phāṇitaṃ jhāpetvā pāsāṇacuṇṇenāti pāsāṇacuṇṇena saddhiṃ phāṇitaṃ pacitvā tathāpakkena pāsāṇacuṇṇenāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1389_6: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno pattaggāhāpakassa sammuti,
tika-vin09t0:1390_2: patto pamāṇayutto sundaro therānurūpo”tiādinā vijjamānānisaṃsaṃ vatvā.
tika-vin09t0:1390_9: Antarāmagge pana byādhimhi uppanne aññasmiṃ bhājane asati mattikāya limpitvā yāguṃ pacituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1390_12: Sace pana saddhivihāriko vā antevāsiko vā aññaṃ varapattaṃ ṭhapetvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ sāruppo,
tika-vin09t0:1390_14: Añño vā taṃ gahetvā attano pattaṃ deti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1391_0: Ñātakappavāriteti ettha saṅghavasena pavāritaṭṭhāne pañcabandhaneneva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1394_2: Sattāhātikkamepi anāpattikatā cettha anajjhoharaṇīyataṃ āpannattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1394_3: Kasmā etena idaṃ dassitaṃ hotīti āha “tāni hī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1394_8: Idāni sattāhakālikaṃ nissaggiyavatthubhūtaṃ sappinavanītaṃ dassetuṃ “sappi nāma gavādīna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1394_10: “Yesaṃ maṃsaṃ kappatī”ti iminā pākaṭehi goajikādīhi aññānipi migarohitādīni saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin09t0:1394_16: Makkhikāmadhumevāti khuddakabhamaramadhukarīhi tīhi makkhikāhi kataṃ madhumeva.
tika-vin09t0:1394_18: “Agilānassa guḷodaka”nti pana uddissa anuññātattā udakasambhinno agilānassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1394_19: “Avatthukapakkā vā”ti iminā savatthukapakkā na vaṭṭatīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1394_21: no vaṭṭatīti pucchaṃ katvā ucchuphāṇitaṃ pacchābhattaṃ novaṭṭanakaṃ nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1394_25: saddassa tena pakatānaṃ bhesajjānaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1394_27: Na tesaṃ vatthūnīti tesaṃ sappiādīnaṃ kāraṇāni khīrādīni appaṭiggahetvāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1395_2: vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ sūkaravasaṃ gadrabhavasa”nti evaṃ anuññātavasānaṃ telaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1395_6: vasāni bhesajjāni acchavasaṃ macchavasaṃ susukāvasaṃ sūkaravasaṃ gadrabhavasaṃ kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle
tika-vin09t0:1395_7: nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ telaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti evaṃ telatthaṃ vasāpaṭiggahaṇassa anuññātattā
tika-vin09t0:1395_12: “Acchavasa”nti vacanena ṭhapetvā manussavasaṃ sabbesaṃ akappiyamaṃsānaṃ vasāya anuññātattā “ṭhapetvā manussavasa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1396_8: Pacchābhattaṃ pana paṭiggahetuṃ vā kātuṃ vā na vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1396_22: “Sattāhaṃ nirāmisaparibhogena vaṭṭatī”ti iminā pana “kāle paṭiggahitaṃ kāle nippakkaṃ kāle saṃsaṭṭhaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1396_23: telaparibhogena paribhuñjitu”nti idaṃ nirāmisaparibhogaṃ sandhāya vuttanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1397_0: Yaṃ panettha sukhumarajasadisaṃ maṃsaṃ vā nhāru vā aṭṭhi vā lohitaṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1397_2: Sace pana anupasampanno tāya paṭiggahitavasāya telaṃ katvā deti,
tika-vin09t0:1397_5: Pacchābhattato paṭṭhāya pana sattāhaṃ nirāmisameva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1397_7: Yāvakālikavatthūnaṃ aññesaṃ vatthuṃ pacituṃ na vaṭṭatīti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1397_8: Tattha yāvakālikavatthūnanti yāvakālikaṃ vatthu etesanti yāvakālikavatthūni, tesaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1398_1: Yathā tattha dadhigataṃ vā takkagataṃ vā khayaṃ gamissati,
tika-vin09t0:1398_3: Navanītaṃ vāti takkabindūnipi dadhiguḷikāyopi apanetvā sudhotanavanītaṃ pacituṃ vaṭṭati sāmaṃpakkābhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1398_5: taṃ āmisaṃ sayaṃpacitasattāhakālikena missitaṃ attano yāvakālikabhāvaṃ sattāhakālikena gaṇhāpeti.
tika-vin09t0:1398_6: Tathā ca yāvakālikaṃ apakkampi sayaṃpakkabhāvaṃ upagacchatīti “taṃ pana tadahupurebhattampi sāmisaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1398_8: sayaṃbhajjitasāsapādiyāvajīvikavatthūnaṃ telañca sāmisaṃ tadahupurebhattampi na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1403_6: Pacchābhattaṃ paṭiggahitakehi kataṃ pana abbhañjanādīsu upanetabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1403_12: idaṃ sappi ca telañca vasā ca muddhanitelatthaṃ vā abbhañjanatthaṃ vā bhavissati,
tika-vin09t0:1403_13: madhu arumakkhanatthaṃ vā phāṇitaṃ gharadhūpanatthaṃ vā bhavissatī”ti evaṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā.
tika-vin09t0:1404_1: Yāva aruṇassa uggamanā tiṭṭhatīti sattamadivase katatelaṃ sace yāva aruṇuggamanā tiṭṭhatīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1404_2: Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasappiādīnanti ettha tāva migarohitādīnaṃ sappi pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasappi,
tika-vin09t0:1404_7: Sītudakena katanti madhukapupphāni sītudake pakkhipitvā amadditvā puppharase udakagate sati taṃ udakaṃ gahetvā pacitvā kataṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1404_11: Vuttampi cetaṃ samantapāsādikāyaṃ sītudakena kataṃ madhukapupphaphāṇitaṃ purebhattaṃ sāmisaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1404_18: ambajambupanasakadalikhajjuriciñcādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ yāvakālikaphalānaṃ phāṇitaṃ yāvakālikamevāti āha “ambaphāṇitādīni yāvakālikānī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1405_0: Kāyikaparibhogaṃ vaṭṭatīti kāyassa vā kāye aruno vā makkhanaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1405_5: Evañhi dinnaṃ bhesajjaṃ sace so sāmaṇero abhisaṅkharitvā vā anabhisaṅkharitvā vā tassa bhikkhuno dadeyya,
tika-vin09t0:1406_1: Sattāhaṃ anatikkantepi atikkantasaññino ceva vematikassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1409_0: Pacchimamāsassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāyāti jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin09t0:1409_5: aññepi manussā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ dentī”ti imesaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1409_6: Detha me vassikasāṭikacīvarantiādikāyāti ettha ādisaddena pana “āharatha me vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1409_9: Attano aññātakaappavāritesu tadubhayaṃ karontassa kiṃ hotīti āha “aññātakaappavāritaṭṭhāne”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1409_10: “Vattabhede dukkaṭa”nti idaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ pubbe adente sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1409_13: Vuttañhi samantapāsādikāyaṃ “ye manussā pubbepi vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ denti,
tika-vin09t0:1409_14: ime pana sacepi attano aññātakaappavāritā honti,
tika-vin09t0:1409_16: Aññātakaviññattisikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyanti “yo pana bhikkhu aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpeyya aññatra samayā,
tika-vin09t0:1409_17: nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti iminā sikkhāpadena nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1410_0: Gimhānaṃ pacchimaddhamāsassa paṭhamadivasato paṭṭhāyāti ettha jeṭṭhamūlakāḷapakkhūposathassa pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva āsāḷhipuṇṇamā,
tika-vin09t0:1410_5: Ettāvatāti “māso seso gimhānanti bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1410_6: addhamāso seso gimhānanti katvā nivāsetabba”nti ettakena gaṇanena.
tika-vin09t0:1410_8: Etasmiñhi māse vassikasāṭikaṃ aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1410_14: Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ katthaci potthake “jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchimapāṭipadadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva kālapakkhuposatho,
tika-vin09t0:1410_21: “Addhamāso seso gimhānanti katvā nivāsetabba”nti hi pāḷi.
tika-vin09t0:1410_25: Iminā ime cattāro māsā pariyesanakaraṇanivāsanādhiṭṭhānānaṃ catunnampi khettanti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1410_26: Etesu hi catūsu māsesu aladdhaṃ pariyesituṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1411_0: Vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhīyatīti saṃvaccharaṃ uddhaṃ kaḍḍhīyati vaḍḍhīyati,
tika-vin09t0:1411_2: vassānassa paṭhamamāsaṃ ukkaḍḍhitvā gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsameva karontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1411_3: Vassūpanāyikadivase adhiṭṭhātabbāti vassānato pubbeyeva dasāhassa atikkantattā vassūpanāyikadivaseyeva adhiṭṭhātabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1411_5: Antovasse pana laddhā ceva niṭṭhitā ca tasmiṃyeva antovasse laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasāhaṃ nātikkāmetabbā,
tika-vin09t0:1411_10: Ekāhampi na labhati ito aññassa parihārassābhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin09t0:1412_0: So kuto hotīti āha “yāva hemantassa paṭhamadivaso”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1412_3: Etesu sattasu piṭṭhisamayamāsesūti paṭilomakkamena vuttesu kattikapuṇṇamāsiyā pacchimapāṭipadādīsu jeṭṭhamūlapuṇṇamāsāvasānesu
tika-vin09t0:1412_6: Viññāpentassāti “detha me vassikasāṭikacīvara”ntiādinā nayena viññattiṃ karontassa.
tika-vin09t0:1416_0: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṃ, katvā nipphādane tathā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1417_1: vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ atirekamāse sese gimhāne pariyiṭṭhaṃ atirekaddhamāse sese gimhāne katvā paridahitaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1418_1: Tikapācittiyanti atirekamāsaddhamāsesu atirekasaññivematikaūnakasaññīnaṃ pariyesananivāsanavasena tīṇi pācittiyāni,
tika-vin09t0:1418_6: vematikassa vā dukkaṭanti ettha “pariyesananivāsanaṃ karontassā”ti pāṭhaseso.
tika-vin09t0:1418_13: tañca dukkaṭaṃ udakaphusitagaṇanāya akatvā nhānapariyosānavasena payoge payoge kāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1418_14: tañca kho vivaṭaṅgaṇe ākāsato patitaudakeneva nhāyantassa,
tika-vin09t0:1418_17: Pokkharaṇiyādīsu pana naggassa nhāyantassa anāpattīti sambandho,
tika-vin09t0:1418_18: pokkharaṇiyādīsu pana satiyāpi vassikasāṭikāya naggassa nhāyantassa natthi dukkaṭāpattīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1419_0: Evaṃ antarāpattiyā anāpattiṃ dassetvā idāni nissaggiyena anāpattiṃ dassetuṃ “acchinnacīvarassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1419_6: Ettha pana mahagghavassikasāṭikaṃ ṭhapetvā nhāyantassa corūpaddavo āpadā nāmāti āha “anivattha”ntiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1419_7: Āpadāsu vā nivāsayatoti āpadāsu vijjamānāsu asamaye nivāsentassa.
tika-vin09t0:1419_8: Yaṃ pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ “acchinnacīvarassāti etaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1419_10: Ettha ca mahagghavassikasāṭikaṃ nivāsetvā nhāyantassa corūpaddavo āpadā nāmā”ti acchinnacīvarādino nissaggiyena
tika-vin09t0:1419_11: anāpattiṃ adassetvā naggassa nhāyato dukkaṭeneva anāpattidassanaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1419_13: Sabbasikkhāpadesu hi mūlāpattiyā eva āpattippasaṅge anāpattidassanatthaṃ anāpattivāro ārabhīyati,
tika-vin09t0:1422_4: Cajitvā dinnampi hi sakasaññāya gaṇhato natthi pārājikaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1422_10: “Mayā dinnāni sabbāni āharā”ti vadatopi ekavacaneneva sambahulā āpattiyo.
tika-vin09t0:1422_11: Ekaṃ cīvaraṃ pana ekābaddhāni ca bahūni acchindato ekā āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1422_12: “Acchindā”ti āṇattiyā dukkaṭanti “mayā dinnāni sabbāni gaṇhā”ti āṇattiyā ekaṃ dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1422_18: tattha yattakāni āṇattānīti yattakāni cīvarāni gaṇhituṃ āṇattānīti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1422_24: Evañca katvā samantapāsādikāya saddhiṃ imāya aṭṭhakathāya na koci virodho.
tika-vin09t0:1422_30: cīvaraṃ bhikkhussa sāmaṃ datvā acchinnaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1423_3: Na kevalaṃ anupasampannassa cīvaraṃyeva acchindato dukkaṭanti āha “anupasampannassa cā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1423_4: Tattha yaṃ kiñcīti cīvaraṃ vā hotu, pattādi,
tika-vin09t0:1423_12: tathāpi anupasampannakāle cīvaraṃ datvā upasampannakāle acchindantassa āpattito acchindanakāleyeva upasampannatā aṅganti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1426_0: Chabbidhaṃ khomasuttādinti “suttaṃ nāma cha suttāni khomaṃ kappāsikaṃ koseyyaṃ kambalaṃ sāṇaṃ bhaṅga”nti evaṃ vuttaṃ chabbidhaṃ khomasuttādiṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1426_8: Tesaṃ anulomanti tesaṃ khomādīnaṃ anulomaṃ dukūlaṃ pattuṇṇaṃ somārapaṭṭaṃ cīnapaṭṭaṃ iddhijaṃ devadinnanti chabbidhaṃ suttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1427_3: suttaṃ pavesetvā yena ākoṭento ghanabhāvaṃ sampādenti.
tika-vin09t0:1427_4: Tassa sabbappayogesu dukkaṭanti tantavāyassa ye te turivemasajjanādikā payogā,
tika-vin09t0:1427_6: tassa tantavāyassa payoge payoge bhikkhussa dukkaṭanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1427_7: Turiādīnaṃ abhāve tesaṃ karaṇatthaṃ vāsipharasuādīnaṃ maggananisānarukkhacchedanādisabbappayogepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin09t0:1427_8: Tantūnaṃ attano santakattā vītavītaṭṭhānaṃ paṭiladdhameva hotīti āha “paṭilābhena nissaggiyaṃ hotī”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1427_9: vikappanupagapacchimacīvarappamāṇe vīte nissaggiyaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1427_13: cīvaraṃ sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi vāyāpitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1428_1: Evaṃ idha dukkaṭanti idhāpi tantavāyeneva dīghato vidatthimatte,
tika-vin09t0:1428_5: Tato ce ūnatarāti vuttappamāṇato ce ūnatarā,
tika-vin09t0:1428_7: Kappiyatantavāyenapi akappiyasuttaṃ vāyāpentassa yathā pubbe nissaggiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1428_9: Teneva kappiyañca akappiyañca suttaṃ vāyāpentassa sace pacchimacīvarappamāṇā vā ūnakā vā akappiyasuttaparicchedā honti,
tika-vin09t0:1428_13: dīghato vā kappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vītaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1429_0: Yadi pana dve tantavāyā honti eko kappiyo eko akappiyo,
tika-vin09t0:1429_3: akappiyatantavāyena vīte pamāṇayutte paricchede paricchede pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1429_6: Sace dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti,
tika-vin09t0:1429_16: akappiyatantavāyena akappiyasuttamayesu pacchimacīvarappamāṇesu paricchedesu vītesu paricchedagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1429_18: Kappiyatantavāyena akappiyasuttamayesu pamāṇayuttesu vā ūnakesu vā dukkaṭameva,
tika-vin09t0:1430_1: dīghato vā akappiyaṃ tiriyaṃ akappiyaṃ katvā vinanti,
tika-vin09t0:1430_2: ubhopi vā te vemaṃ gahetvā ekato vinanti,
tika-vin09t0:1430_3: aparicchede cīvare pamāṇayutte paricchede paricchede dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1431_0: Ettha ca tantavāyo tāva aññātakaappavāritato viññattiyā laddho akappiyo,
tika-vin09t0:1431_4: Tikapācittiyanti vāyāpite vāyāpitasaññivematikaavāyāpitasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1431_5: Cīvaratthāya viññāpitasuttanti sāmaṃ vā aññena vā cīvaratthāya viññāpitasuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1431_7: tathāpi idha “cīvaratthāya sāmaṃ viññāpitasutta”nti avatvā kevalaṃ “cīvaratthāya viññāpitasutta”nti aṅgesu
tika-vin09t0:1431_8: vuttattā aññena cīvaratthāya viññāpitasuttampi saṅgahaṃ gacchatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1434_0: Cīvarasāmikehi pubbe appavārito hutvāti “kīdisena te, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1434_2: kīdisaṃ te cīvaraṃ vāyāpemi, vada, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1434_4: Ettha ca āyatādīhi tīhi suttavaḍḍhanākārena saha vāyanākāraṃ dasseti,
tika-vin09t0:1434_7: na pana aṅgadassanaṃ suttavaḍḍhanavaseneva āpajjitabbattāti āha “na bhikkhuno piṇḍapātadānamattenā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1434_9: cīvaraṃ pubbe appavāritena aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpannaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1434_11: Tikapācittiyanti aññātake aññātakasaññivematikañātakasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1437_4: tesu dasāhesu yattha katthaci divaseti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1437_8: Pavāraṇāmāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamitoti vā pavāraṇāmāsassa pakāsanato purimassa juṇhapakkhassa pañcamito paṭṭhāyāti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1437_9: Yo panettha “kāmañcesa ‘dasāhaparamaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ dhāretabba’nti imināva siddho,
tika-vin09t0:1437_10: aṭṭhuppattivasena pana apubbaṃ viya atthaṃ dassetvā sikkhāpadaṃ ṭhapita”nti pāṭho dissati,
tika-vin09t0:1437_12: Kiñca “juṇhapakkhapañcamito paṭṭhāyā”ti vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyeva pubbāparavirodhopi siyā.
tika-vin09t0:1438_1: so ca accāyikabhāvo dāyakassa gamikādibhāvenāti dassetuṃ “gamikagilānagabbhiniabhinavuppannasaddhānaṃ puggalāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1438_2: Tattha gamiko nāma “senāya vā gantukāmo hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1438_4: Aññatarena “vassāvāsikaṃ dassāmī”ti evaṃ ārocetvā dinnanti gamikādīnaṃ aññatarena gamanādīhi kāraṇehi dātukāmena dūtaṃ vā pesetvā,
tika-vin09t0:1438_5: sayaṃ vā āgantvā “vassāvāsikaṃ dassāmī”ti evaṃ ārocetvā dinnaṃ cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1438_7: accekacīvaraṃ cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmitaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1442_0: Upasampajjantiādīsu viyāti “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti imassa vibhaṅge “upasampajjā”ti uddharitabbe “upasampajja”nti uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1442_2: Ādisaddena pana “anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyyā”tiādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1442_10: Tattha hi “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti anavasesato avahāraṭṭhānapariggahena tadubhayaṃ asaṅkarato dassetuṃ “ṭhapetvā gāmañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1442_12: Idha pana suttantapariyāyena “pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima”nti āgataṃ āraññakaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya.
tika-vin09t0:1442_13: Na hi so vinayapariyāyike araññe vasanto “āraññako panthasenāsano”ti sutte vutto,
tika-vin09t0:1442_14: tasmā tattha āgatameva lakkhaṇaṃ gahetabbanti dassento “sabbapacchimāni āropitena ācariyadhanunā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1442_19: Parikkhepārahaṭṭhānatoti pariyante ṭhitagharassa upacāre ṭhitassa majjhimassa purisassa paṭhamaleḍḍupātato.
tika-vin09t0:1442_21: Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “vihārassāpi gāmasseva upacāraṃ nīharitvā ubhinnaṃ leḍḍupātānaṃ antarā minitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1443_0: Antaraghare nikkhipeyyāti antare antare gharāni ettha,
tika-vin09t0:1443_5: “Mahāpavāraṇāya pavārito hotī”ti idaṃ vassacchedaṃ akatvā vuṭṭhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1443_7: Teneva hi byatirekaṃ dassentena samantapāsādikāyaṃ vuttaṃ “sace pacchimikāya vā upagato hoti chinnavasso vā,
tika-vin09t0:1443_9: Kattikamāso nāma pubbakattikamāsassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadato paṭṭhāya yāva aparakattikapuṇṇamā,
tika-vin09t0:1443_11: saddena kattikamāsato paraṃ na labhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1443_13: kasmā gāvutato atirekappamāṇe na labhatīti āha “yatra hī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1443_14: Nimantito pana addhayojanampi yojanampi gantvā vasituṃ pacceti,
tika-vin09t0:1443_16: Sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayameva hotīti sāsaṅkañceva sappaṭibhayañca hoti. Eva-
tika-vin09t0:1443_17: saddena anāsaṅkaappaṭibhayehi aṅgayuttepi senāsane vasanto nikkhipituṃ na labhatīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1443_18: Ettāvatā purimikāya upagantvā akkhaṇḍaṃ katvā vuṭṭhavasso yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā pañcadhanusatikapacchime āraññakasenāsane viharati,
tika-vin09t0:1443_19: tasmiṃ gāme cīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā sakalakattikamāsaṃ tasmiṃyeva senāsane tena cīvarena vinā vatthuṃ anujānitvā
tika-vin09t0:1443_20: idāni vihārato aññattha vasantassa chārattaṃ vippavāsaṃ anujānanto “siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno”tiādimāha.
tika-vin09t0:1443_23: Tattha chārattaparamaṃ tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena vippavasitabbanti yo bhikkhu vihāre vasanto tato
tika-vin09t0:1443_24: aññattha gamanakicce sati antaraghare cīvaraṃ nikkhipati,
tika-vin09t0:1443_25: tena bhikkhunā tena cīvarena chārattaparamaṃ vippavasitabbaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1443_26: cha rattiyo tamhā vihārā aññattha vasitabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1444_0: “Yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin09t0:1445_0: Tasmiṃ gāme ṭhapetuṃ taṃ, māsamekaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1448_0: Tenevāha “tato ce uttari vippavaseyyāti chārattato uttari tasmiṃ senāsane sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1448_1: Tathā asakkontenāti gataṭṭhānassa dūratāya senāsanaṃ āgantvā sattamaṃ aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontena.
tika-vin09t0:1448_2: Evampi asakkontena tatreva ṭhitena paccuddharitabbaṃ “atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhassatī”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1449_1: Tattha hi aṅgesu yaṃ rattivippavāso catutthamaṅgaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1449_2: taṃ idha chārattato uttari vippavāso hotīti ayameva viseso.
tika-vin09t0:1452_2: atha kathaṃ saṅghasantako hotīti āha “so hī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1452_7: Pariṇatanti saṅghassa ninnaṃ saṅghassa poṇaṃ saṅghassa pabbhāraṃ hutvā ṭhitanti attho.
tika-vin09t0:1452_8: Yena pana kāraṇena so pariṇato hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1452_9: taṃ dassetvā tassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “dassāma karissāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1452_10: Attano pariṇāmentassāti “idaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti saṅghassa pariṇatabhāvaṃ ñatvā attano pariṇāmetvā gaṇhantassa.
tika-vin09t0:1452_13: jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmikaṃ nissaggiya”nti iminā nayena nissajjanavidhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1453_0: Saṅghacetiyapuggalesūti ettha ca antamaso sunakhaṃ upādāya yo koci satto “puggalo”ti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1453_3: “saṅghassa pariṇataṃ aññassa saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā puggalassa vā,
tika-vin09t0:1453_4: cetiyassa pariṇataṃ aññassa cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā,
tika-vin09t0:1453_5: puggalassa pariṇataṃ aññassa puggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmentassa dukkaṭa”nti.
tika-vin09t0:1454_1: apariṇate ca apariṇatasaññino cāti sambandho, pariṇate,
tika-vin09t0:1454_8: yattha vā pana tumhākaṃ cittaṃ pasīdati,
tika-vin09t0:1463_0: Sampajānamusāvādeti ettha musāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu,
tika-vin09t0:1463_6: taṅkhaṇe ca vijānantassa hoti “pubbevassa hoti ‘musā bhaṇissa’nti,
tika-vin09t0:1463_7: bhaṇantassa hoti ‘musā bhaṇāmī”’ti vuttattāti āha “pubbepi jānitvā vacanakkhaṇepi jānantassā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1463_9: itaraṃ pana hotu vā, mā vā,
tika-vin09t0:1463_11: Nanu cetaṃ bhaṇanameva ñāyatīti āha “bhaṇanañca nāmā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1464_0: Hatthakaṃ sakyaputtanti ettha hatthakoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1464_2: Buddhakāle kira sakyakulato asīti purisasahassāni pabbajiṃsu,
tika-vin09t0:1464_4: Avajānitvā paṭijānanādivatthusminti ettha avajānitvā paṭijānanaṃ nāma titthiyehi saddhiṃ kathento attano
tika-vin09t0:1464_5: vāde kañci dosaṃ sallakkhento “nāyaṃ mama vādo”ti avajānitvā puna kathento kathento niddosataṃ sallakkhetvā
tika-vin09t0:1465_0: Anupadhāretvā sahasā bhaṇantassāti avīmaṃsitvā vegena diṭṭhampi “adiṭṭhaṃ me”tiādinā bhaṇantassa.
tika-vin09t0:1465_1: “Aññaṃ bhaṇissāmī”ti aññaṃ bhaṇantassāti yo mandattā momūhattā pakkhalanto “cīvara”nti vattabbe “cīra”ntiādīni bhaṇati,
tika-vin09t0:1465_4: mayhaṃ upajjhāyaṃ passitthā”ti vutto keḷiṃ kurumāno “tava upajjhāyo dārusakaṭaṃ yojetvā gato bhavissatī”ti
tika-vin09t0:1465_5: vā siṅgālasaddaṃ sutvā “kassāyaṃ saddo”ti vutto “mātuyā te yānena gacchantiyā kaddame laggacakkaṃ uddharantānaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1465_6: ayaṃ saddo”ti vā evaṃ neva davā,
tika-vin09t0:1465_10: eko gāme thokaṃ telaṃ labhitvā vihāraṃ āgato sāmaṇeraṃ bhaṇati “tvaṃ ajja kuhiṃ gato,
tika-vin09t0:1465_12: pacchikāya ṭhapitaṃ pūvakhaṇḍaṃ labhitvā “ajja gāme pacchikāhi pūve cāresu”nti vā,
tika-vin09t0:1468_3: tasmā tena kaṇṇañceva hadayañca vijjhatīti āha “ovijjhanavacane”ti,
tika-vin09t0:1468_6: Tattha jāti nāma brāhmaṇādi ukkaṭṭhā ceva caṇḍālādi hīnā ca jāti.
tika-vin09t0:1468_7: Nāmaṃ nāma avakaṇṇakādi hīnañceva buddharakkhitādi ukkaṭṭhañca nāmaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1468_8: Gottaṃ nāma kosiyādi hīnañceva gotamādi ukkaṭṭhañca gottaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1468_9: Kammaṃ nāma pupphachaḍḍakādi hīnañceva kasivaṇijjādi ukkaṭṭhañca kammaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1468_10: Sippaṃ nāma naḷakārādi hīnañceva muddāgaṇanādi ukkaṭṭhañca sippaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1468_14: Liṅgaṃ nāma atidīghādi hīnañceva nātidīghādi ukkaṭṭhañca liṅgaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1468_16: Āpatti nāma sotāpattādikā ukkaṭṭhā ceva pārājikādi anukkaṭṭhā ca āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1468_17: Akkoso nāma “oṭṭhosī”tiādiko hīno ceva “paṇḍitosī”tiādiko ukkaṭṭho ca akkoso.
tika-vin09t0:1469_0: Yathā tathāti pāḷiāgatānāgatapadānaṃ yena kenaci ākārena.
tika-vin09t0:1469_1: Imasmiṃ sikkhāpade ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṃ bhikkhuniādayo sabbe sattā anupasampannaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti āha “idha cā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1469_3: Sabbatthāti upasampannānupasampannesu ceva pāḷiāgatānāgatapadesu cāti sabbattha.
tika-vin09t0:1469_4: Atthadhammaanusāsanipurekkhārānanti ettha “caṇḍālosī”tiādikāya pāḷiyā atthaṃ vaṇṇento atthapurekkhāro nāma.
tika-vin09t0:1469_8: Mā tamotamaparāyaṇo ahosī”tiādinā nayena kathento anusāsanipurekkhāro nāmāti veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1472_1: yāya vācāya samagge satte avayavabhūte vagge bhinne karoti,
tika-vin09t0:1472_11: Tañca kho dvīhi kāraṇehi upasaṃharatīti āha “bhikkhuno piyakamyatāya vā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1472_12: Tattha bhikkhuno piyakamyatāyāti yassa taṃ bhāsati,
tika-vin09t0:1472_13: tassa bhikkhuno “evamahaṃ etassa piyo bhavissāmī”ti attano piyabhāvaṃ patthayamānatāya.
tika-vin09t0:1472_14: Bhedādhippāyenāti “evamayaṃ tena saddhiṃ bhijjissatī”ti parassa parena bhedaṃ icchantena.
tika-vin09t0:1472_18: parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti, sā vācā,
tika-vin09t0:1473_2: vacanaṃ vā piyakamyatāya upasaṃharantassa kiñcāpi iminā sikkhāpadena āpatti na dissati,
tika-vin09t0:1473_6: īdisampi nāma bhavantaṃ puna vattabbaṃ maññissatī”ti evaṃ kevalaṃ pāpagarahitāya bhaṇantassa.
tika-vin09t0:1476_0: Padaso dhammaṃ vāceyyāti ekato padaṃ padaṃ dhammaṃ vāceyya,
tika-vin09t0:1476_2: Yasmā na kevalaṃ tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhadhammaṃyeva padaso vācentassa āpatti,
tika-vin09t0:1477_0: Yasmā pana taṃ padaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1477_6: Yaṃ kiñci vā ekaṃ akkharaṃ anvakkharaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1477_11: Etesu padādīsu yaṃ kañci koṭṭhāsaṃ bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā avasesapuggalehi saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇantassa padādigaṇanāya pācittiyanti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1478_0: Ettha gāthābandhesu tāva “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti ekamekaṃ padaṃ sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ ekato ārabhitvā ekatoyeva niṭṭhāpentassa padagaṇanāya pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1478_1: Therena “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti vutte taṃ padaṃ apāpuṇitvā “manoseṭṭhā manomayā”ti vacanakāle pattena sāmaṇerena ekato bhaṇantassa anupadagaṇanāya.
tika-vin09t0:1478_2: “Rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādi vacanakāle tena saddhiṃ “rū” kāramattameva vācentassa anvakkharagaṇanāya.
tika-vin09t0:1478_5: vedanā aniccā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vācayamāno therena “rūpaṃ anicca”nti vuccamāne sāmaṇero sīghapaññatāya “vedanā
tika-vin09t0:1478_6: aniccā”ti imaṃ aniccapadaṃ therassa “rūpaṃ anicca”nti etena aniccapadena saddhiṃ ekato bhaṇanto vācaṃ
tika-vin09t0:1479_1: Anupasampannena saddhiṃ ekato uddesaggahaṇe ekato bhaṇantassa anāpattīti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1479_5: upasampanno ca anupasampanno ca nisīditvā uddisāpenti.
tika-vin09t0:1479_6: Ācariyo “nisinnānaṃ bhaṇāmī”ti tehi saddhiṃ ekato vadati,
tika-vin09t0:1479_17: Sace bahūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antare eko sāmaṇero nisinno hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1479_18: tasmiṃ nisinne padaso dhammaṃ vācentassa acittakā āpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1479_19: Sace sāmaṇero upacāraṃ muñcitvā ṭhito vā nisinno vā hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1479_21: tesu apariyāpannattā ekena disābhāgena palāyanakaganthaṃ nāma gaṇhātīti saṅkhaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1480_1: Tassa santike uddesaggahaṇeti anupasampannassa santike uddesaggahaṇe.
tika-vin09t0:1480_2: Yebhuyyena paguṇaganthaṃ bhaṇantassāti sace ekagāthāya eko pādo nāgacchati,
tika-vin09t0:1480_7: Osārentassa cāti parisāmajjhe suttaṃ uccārentassa ca.
tika-vin09t0:1483_0: Idha “bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso anupasampanno nāmā”ti vacanato tiracchānagatopi anupasampannoyeva,
tika-vin09t0:1483_3: Tassa ca paricchedo methunadhammāpattiyā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1483_4: Dirattatirattanti ettha dirattavacanena na koci visesattho labbhati,
tika-vin09t0:1483_7: Dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā rattīnanti pana vacanatthamattadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1483_10: Seyyāti ca kāyappasāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ sayanampi vuccati “sayanaṃ seyyā”ti katvā,
tika-vin09t0:1484_0: Tattha yaṃ senāsanaṃ upari pañcahi chadanehi,
tika-vin09t0:1484_1: aññena vā kenaci antamaso vatthenāpi sabbameva paricchannaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1484_3: anāhaccāpi vā sabbantimena pariyāyena diyaḍḍhahatthubbedhena pākārena vā aññena vā kenaci antamaso vatthenāpi parikkhittaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1484_5: Yassa pana upari bahutaraṃ ṭhānaṃ channaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1484_9: idaṃ yebhuyyena channaṃ yebhuyyena paricchannaṃ nāma.
tika-vin09t0:1485_2: Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho “senāsanasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ pavisitvā kāyappasāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ seyyaṃ kappeyya vidaheyya sampādeyyā”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1485_5: Satagabbhaṃ vā catusālaṃ ekūpacāraṃ hotīti sambandho.
tika-vin09t0:1485_8: Aññattha vā tādiseti yathāvuttalakkhaṇena samannāgate aññasmiṃ pubbe avuṭṭhasenāsane vā.
tika-vin09t0:1485_9: Tena vāti yena saha purimapurimadivase vuṭṭhaṃ, tena vā.
tika-vin09t0:1485_10: Aññena vāti yena saha purimapurimasmiṃ divase vuṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1485_13: Yadi evaṃ vitthāro kathaṃ veditabboti āha “vitthāro panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1486_3: yebhuyyena paricchanne cūḷakacchanne dukkaṭa”nti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttānaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1486_4: Tatiyāya rattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasantassāti tatiyāya rattiyā aruṇato puretarameva nikkhamitvā
tika-vin09t0:1486_5: aruṇaṃ bahi uṭṭhāpetvā catutthadivase atthaṅgate sūriye puna vasantassa.
tika-vin09t0:1486_7: yebhuyyena acchanne yebhuyyena aparicchanne”ti pāḷiyaṃ āgatānaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1486_10: cūḷakacchanne cūḷakaparicchanne anāpattī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatānañca gahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1489_2: anupādinnapakkhe pana ṭhitattā sahaseyyāpattiṃ na karotī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1489_5: Paṭhamadivasepīti paṭhamasmiṃ viya sikkhāpade na catuttheyeva divase,
tika-vin09t0:1489_10: sūriyatthaṅgamananti tīṇi aṅgānīti ayampi viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1492_1: Vācāparicchedo panettha kathaṃ veditabboti āha “uttari chappañcavācāhī”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1492_8: Pāḷiyā saddhiṃ kathentena ekaṃ padaṃ pāḷito,
tika-vin09t0:1492_9: pañca aṭṭhakathātoti evaṃ cha padāni anatikkamitvāva kathetabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1493_0: Tikapācittiyanti mātugāme mātugāmasaññivematikaamātugāmasaññīnaṃ vasena tīṇi pācittiyāni.
tika-vin09t0:1493_1: Aññassa vā mātugāmassāti ekassa mātugāmassa desetvā nisinne puna āgatassa aññassa mātugāmassa,
tika-vin09t0:1493_2: evaṃ pana ekāsane nisinnena mātugāmasatassāpi desetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1493_4: Iriyāpathaparivattābhāvoti attano vā mātugāmassa vā iriyāpathaparivattābhāvo.
tika-vin09t0:1493_6: dutiyāniyate vuttalakkhaṇassa manussassa abhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1493_7: Kiriyākiriyanti ettha uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammadesanā kiriyā,
tika-vin09t0:1496_6: pana antarā vā atikaḍḍhiyamānena upasampannassa bhūtaṃ ārocetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1496_7: Anatikaḍḍhiyamānenāpi tathārūpe kāraṇe sati ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin09t0:1496_8: Teneva aññatarena daharabhikkhunā upavadito aññataro thero “āvuso,
tika-vin09t0:1496_12: imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhā”ti puṭṭho daharabhikkhu “āma, bhante,
tika-vin09t0:1496_18: Kasmā na idha ummattakādayo gahitāti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-vin09t0:1496_21: Idha na gahitāti imasmiṃ sikkhāpade padabhājaniyaṃ na gahitā.
tika-vin09t0:1496_23: Kusalābyākatacittehi dvicitta”nti idaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena ariyapuggaleyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1496_24: Na hi paṇṇattiṃ ajānantā jhānalābhino puthujjanā vatthumhi lobhavasena akusalacittenāpi na ārocentīti.
tika-vin09t0:1496_25: Dukkhavedanāya vā abhāvato “dvivedana”nti imassa anurūpaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1499_1: Āyatiṃ saṃvaratthāyāti “evamesa paresu hirottappenāpi āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjissatī”ti āyatiṃ saṃvaratthāya.
tika-vin09t0:1499_2: Āpattīnañca kulānañca pariyantaṃ katvā vā akatvā vāti “ettakā āpattiyo ārocetabbā,
tika-vin09t0:1499_3: ettakesu kulesu ārocetabbā”ti evaṃ āpattīnañca kulānañca pariyantaṃ katvā vā akatvā vā.
tika-vin09t0:1500_0: Aduṭṭhullāyāti pārājikasaṅghādisesaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesapañcāpattikkhandhasaṅkhātāya aduṭṭhullāya āpattiyā.
tika-vin09t0:1500_1: Avasese cha āpattikkhandheti saṅghādisesavajjite sese cha āpattikkhandhe.
tika-vin09t0:1500_2: Purimapañcasikkhāpadavītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ duṭṭhullanti pāṇātipātaveramaṇiādikassa ādito pañcasikkhāpadassa vītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1500_3: Itaraṃ aduṭṭhullaṃ vā ajjhācāranti tato aññaṃ vikālabhojanādikapañcakaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1500_8: kāyasaṃsaggaṃ āpanno”ti evaṃ vatthumattaṃ vā ārocentassa.
tika-vin09t0:1500_14: dubbhāsitaṃ āpanno”ti evaṃ āpattimattaṃ vā ārocentassa.
tika-vin09t0:1503_0: Pāsāṇasakkharakathalamarumbavālukādīsūti ettha muṭṭhippamāṇato upari pāsāṇāti veditabbā.
tika-vin09t0:1503_5: Aññatarassa tatiyabhāgo hotīti tatiyo bhāgo hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1503_7: yato paṃsuṃ vā mattikaṃ vā āharāpetvā visuṃ visuṃ kate dve koṭṭhāsā paṃsu vā mattikā vā eko pāsāṇādīsu aññataro hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1503_17: sā ādi yassa bhedassa so suddhapāsāṇādi. Ādi-
tika-vin09t0:1504_0: Sayaṃ khaṇatīti ettha yo antamaso pādaṅguṭṭhakenapi khaṇati,
tika-vin09t0:1504_6: Pattaṃ pacantena hi pubbe pakkaṭṭhāneyeva pacitabbo.
tika-vin09t0:1504_7: Adaḍḍhāya pathaviyā aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1504_8: Pattapacanakapālassa pana upari aggiṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1504_10: so aggi tāni dahanto gantvā pathaviṃ dahati,
tika-vin09t0:1504_13: Tatrāpi hi iṭṭhakādīnaṃyeva upari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
tika-vin09t0:1504_15: Na hi tāni aggissa upādānasaṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin09t0:1504_17: Sace pana “pathaviṃ apattameva nibbāpetvā gamissāmī”ti deti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1505_6: imasmiṃ okāse pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇā”ti pana vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1505_7: “Kandaṃ khaṇa mūlaṃ khaṇā”ti aniyametvā vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1505_9: imasmiṃ okāse kandaṃ vā mūlaṃ vā khaṇā”ti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1505_18: Tattha gokaṇṭako nāma gāvīnaṃ khuracchinnakaddamo vuccati.
tika-vin09t0:1505_21: Bhijjitvā patitanaditaṭanti bhijjitvā nadisāmantā patitaṃ omakacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhaṃ naditaṭaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1505_23: deve atirekacātumāsaṃ ovaṭṭhepi udakeyeva udakassa patitattā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin09t0:1505_24: Mahantampi naṅgalacchinnamattikāpiṇḍanti mahantampi kasitaṭṭhāne heṭṭhā pathaviyā asambaddhaṃ naṅgalacchinnamattikāpiṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1505_26: Asañcicca rukkhādipavaṭṭanena bhindantassāti pāsāṇarukkhādīni vā pavaṭṭentassa,
tika-vin09t0:1505_27: kattaradaṇḍena vā āhacca āhacca gacchantassa pathavī bhijjati,
tika-vin09t0:1505_28: sā “tena bhindissāmī”ti evaṃ sañcicca abhinnattā asañcicca bhinnā nāma hoti,
tika-vin09t0:1505_30: Asatiyā pādaṅguṭṭhakādīhi vilikhantassāti yo aññavihito kenaci saddhiṃ kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena
tika-vin09t0:1505_31: vā kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā pathaviṃ vilikhanto tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1505_32: tassa evaṃ asatiyā pādaṅguṭṭhakādīhi vilikhantassa anāpatti.
tika-vin09t0:1510_0: “Bhavantī”ti iminā viruḷhamūle nīlabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā vaḍḍhamānake taruṇagacche dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1510_1: “Ahesu”nti iminā pana vaḍḍhitvā ṭhite mahante rukkhagacchādike dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1510_6: Patiṭṭhitaharitatiṇarukkhādīnanti bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitassa haritatiṇassa ceva haritarukkhādīnañca.
tika-vin09t0:1511_0: Nanu ca rukkhādayo cittarahitatāya na jīvā,
tika-vin09t0:1511_5: vuḍḍhi pana pavāḷasilālavaṇānampi vijjatīti na tesaṃ jīvabhāve kāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1511_6: visayaggahaṇañca nesaṃ parikappanāmattaṃ supanaṃ viya ciñcādīnaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1511_8: atha kasmā bhūtagāmassa pātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ icchitanti?
tika-vin09t0:1511_16: Bījakasevālo nāma upari khuddakapatto heṭṭhā khuddakamūlo sevālo.
tika-vin09t0:1512_9: Matta saddena cettha paṇṇassa nikkhamanaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin09t0:1512_13: Vidatthimattā pattavaṭṭi niggacchatīti vidatthimattā anīlavaṇṇā pattavaṭṭi nikkhamati.
tika-vin09t0:1512_15: Harito na hotīti nīlavaṇṇo na hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1512_17: vīhiādīnaṃ vā aṅkure harite bhūtagāmasaṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin09t0:1513_0: Bhūtagāmabījagāmeti ettha bhūtagāmato viyojitaṃ viruhanasamatthameva mūlabījādikaṃ bījagāmo nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1513_6: kattaradaṇḍena vā bhūmiṃ paharitvā gacchantassa tiṇāni kuppanti.
tika-vin09t0:1513_7: Tāni tena “vikopessāmī”ti evaṃ sañcicca avikopitattā asañcicca vikopitāni nāma honti.
tika-vin09t0:1514_0: Asatiyāti aññavihito kenaci saddhiṃ kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena vā hatthena vā tiṇaṃ vā lataṃ vā vikopento tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin09t0:1515_0: Ajānitvāti ettha abbhantare “bījagāmo”ti vā “bhūtagāmo”ti vā na jānāti,
tika-vin09t0:1515_2: Evaṃ tiṇe vā palālapuñje vā khaṇittiṃ vā kudālaṃ vā saṅgopanatthāya ṭhapeti,
tika-vin09t0:1515_4: Tatra ce tiṇāni chijjanti vā ḍayhanti vā,
tika-vin09t0:1516_0: Yena kenaci aggināti kaṭṭhaggigomayaggiādīsu yena kenaci agginā,
tika-vin09t0:1516_2: “Kappiya”nti vatvāvāti yāya kāyaci bhāsāya “kappiya”nti vatvāva. Eva-
tika-vin09t0:1516_3: saddena paṭhamaṃ agginā phusitvā pacchā “kappiya”nti vattuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1516_4: “Paṭhamaṃ aggiṃ nikkhipitvā taṃ anuddharitvāva ‘kappiya’nti vutte pana vaṭṭatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin09t0:1516_9: katampi akataṃ hotīti āha “ṭhapetvā gomahiṃsādīnaṃ khure”ti.
tika-vin09t0:1516_16: “Antamaso chinditvā āhaṭenapī”ti iminā yehi kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin09t0:1516_17: tehi tatthajātakehi kātabbanti ettha vattabbameva natthīti dasseti.
tika-vin09t0:1516_18: “Satthe vuttanayenevā”ti iminā chedaṃ vā vedhaṃ vā dassentena “kappiyanti vatvāvā”ti vuttamatidisati.
tika-vin09t0:1516_19: Ettha ca kiñcāpi “kappiyanti vatvāva kātabba”ntiādinā kappiyaṃ karontena kattabbākārameva dassitaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1516_20: tathāpi bhikkhunā “kappiyaṃ karohī”ti vutteyeva anupasampannena “kappiya”nti vatvā aggiparijitādi kātabbanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1516_21: Avacanaṃ pana “punapi kappiyaṃ karohīti kāretvāva paribhuñjitabba”nti paṭhamameva vuttattā.
tika-vin09t0:1517_1: kappiye kate sabbaṃ kataṃ hotīti ekaṃyeva “kappiyaṃ karomī”ti adhippāyenapi kappiye kate ekābaddhattā sabbaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin09t0:1517_2: Dārukaṃ vijjhatīti jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā vijjhati vā vijjhāpeti vā,
tika-vin09t0:1517_7: Bhindāpetvā kappiyaṃ kāretabbanti bījato muttassa kaṭāhassa bhājanagatikattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1517_11: Nibbattabījaṃ nāma bījaṃ nibbattetvā visuṃ katvā paribhuñjituṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ ambapanasādiphalaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1520_0: Yamatthanti “tvaṃ kira dukkaṭāpattiṃ āpanno”tiādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci atthaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1520_2: Aññenaññaṃ paṭicaraṇassāti vinayadharena yaṃ vacanaṃ dosapucchanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin09t0:1520_4: Paṭicchādanatthopi hi carasaddo hoti anekatthattā dhātūnaṃ.
tika-vin09t0:1521_0: Sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ āpannoti ettha ṭhapetvā pārājikaṃ sesā sāvasesāpatti nāma,
